NK086(lu)001:1: // dpal sgrub pa chen po bka' brgyad kyi spyi don
NK086(lu)001:2: rnam pa bshad pa dngos grub snying po bzhugs so
NK086(lu)001:3: // na mo gu ru many+dzu gyo sh+aa ya //
NK086(lu)001:4: dpal ldan pad+ma las 'khrungs ye shes sku //
NK086(lu)001:5: rig 'dzin bla ma'i tshogs kyi sprin spro ba //
NK086(lu)001:6: bde chen mkha' 'gro'i dbang phyug dpa' bo'i rjer dngos po kun gyis btud de phyag bagyi'o //
NK086(lu)001:7: ye shes sku mchog 'jam dpal dpal dang ldan //
NK086(lu)001:8: rol ba'i rta skad ma chags pad+ma'i gsung //
NK086(lu)001:9: yang dag grub pa'i thugs mchog 'gyur ba med //
NK086(lu)001:10: yon tan kun bdag che mchog dpal la 'dud //
NK086(lu)001:11: dpal gyi rol pas ma mo dbang sdud cing //
NK086(lu)001:12: phrin las phur pas dgra bgegs thal bar rlog /dregs chen sngags bdag yongs kyi rjer gyur ba //
NK086(lu)001:13: 'bar ba'i bka' sdod tshogs bcad rgyal gyur cig /sngags kyis 'dul ba'i las can mtha' dag la //
NK086(lu)001:14: rab 'byams lha sngags ting 'dzin bkod pa yi //
NK086(lu)001:15: sgyu 'phrul dra ba chen po'i snying po ni //
NK086(lu)001:16: dkyil 'khor yongs kyi khyab bdag sgrub sde brgyad //
NK086(lu)001:17: gang gis mtshan tsam thos dang mos pa la'ang //
NK086(lu)001:18: rnam gnyis dngos grub rdzogs ldan sprin bzhin du //
NK086(lu)001:19: ches cher snang ba gsang sngags snying po de'o //
NK086(lu)001:20: dgongs don brgyud pa'i lung bzhin rnam par brjod //
NK086(lu)001:21: de la 'dir dus gsum gyi yi dam zhi khro rab 'byams ma lus pa gcig tu 'dus pa /
NK086(lu)001:22: las dang ye shes kyi dngos grub sgrub pa la
NK086(lu)001:23: thabs tshul man ngag mtha' dag gi zab pa mthar
NK086(lu)001:24: thug pa / byin rlabs phrin las kyi tshan kha
NK086(lu)001:25: lhag par che ba dpal ma h+aa yo ga'i sgrub
NK086(lu)001:26: sde zab mo bka' brgyad du grags pa'i dgongs don
NK086(lu)001:27: gyi tshul mdo tsam bshad pa la /
NK086(lu)001:28: thog mar dge ba lo rgyus kyi sgo nas spro ba bskyed pa /
NK086(lu)001:29: bar du dge ba lo rgyus de ldan gyi chos 'chad pa'i thabs spyir bstan pa /
NK086(lu)001:30: tha mar dge ba gsang sngags snying po sgrub pa
NK086(lu)001:31: sde brgyad kyi dgongs don rnam par bshad pa gsum
NK086(lu)001:32: gyi / dang po la spyi dang bye brag gnyis las /
NK086(lu)001:33: dang po bka' dang bstan bcos spyi'i lo rgyus ni /
NK086(lu)001:34: lha'i bu nor bu 'dzin gyis zhus pa'i mdo las /
NK086(lu)001:35: chos rnams bka' dang bstan bcos gnyis su 'dus //
NK086(lu)001:36: legs par gsung dang de yi dgong 'grel gnyis //
NK086(lu)001:37: de yi dbang gis sh+aakya'i bstan pa 'di //
NK086(lu)001:38: 'jig rten khams 'dir yun ring gnas par 'gyur //
NK086(lu)001:39: zhes gsungs pa bzhin du bka' ji ltar byung ba dang /
NK086(lu)001:40: bstan bcos ji ltar byung ba'i tshul las /
NK086(lu)001:42: dpal thog ma'i sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po nyid
NK086(lu)001:43: rang rig gdod ma'i dbyings su sangs rgyas thams cad
NK086(lu)001:44: kyi byed pa por sangs rgyas nas /
NK086(lu)001:45: sprul pa'i rol pa bsam gyi mi khyab pas zhing
NK086(lu)001:46: dang dus ris su ma chad par mnyam pa nyid
NK086(lu)001:47: kyi bkod pa chen pos sems can gyi khams mtha'
NK086(lu)001:48: yas pa'i don mdzad pa las /
NK086(lu)001:49: re zhig yul dus 'di'i sems can rnams 'dul ba'i dbang gis snang ba ni /
NK086(lu)001:50: bdag cag gi ston pa sh+aa kya thub pa 'di nyid kyis /
NK086(lu)001:53: mthar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te stong gsum
NK086(lu)001:54: mi mjed kyi 'jig rten 'dir mdzad pa bcu gnyis
NK086(lu)001:55: ston pa mchog gi sprul pa'i sku'i tshul du snang
NK086(lu)001:56: bar mdzad de theg pa thun mong pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:57: khyad par pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab 'byams bskor bar mdzad do //
NK086(lu)001:58: de yang thun mong gi gdul bya'i ngor sh+aakya'i rigs
NK086(lu)001:59: su 'khrungs shing sangs rgyas pa chags bral rab byung
NK086(lu)001:60: gi rnam pa'i sku dngos des /
NK086(lu)001:61: yul wa ra na si drang srong lhung ba'i gnas
NK086(lu)001:62: su bka' dang bo bden pa bzhi'i chos 'khor dang
NK086(lu)001:63: / rgyal po'i khab tu bar ba mtshan nyid med pa'i chos 'khor dang /
NK086(lu)001:64: yul pad+ma can du tha ma nges pa don gyi chos 'khor gsum bskor zhing /
NK086(lu)001:65: gzhan yang rgyal po'i khab tu lha mir dge bcu'i chos 'khor /
NK086(lu)001:66: yul ma ma d+har rang rgyal la rten 'brel bcu gnyis kyi chos 'khor bskor bar gsung pa sogs /
NK086(lu)001:67: gdul bya'i ngor chos kyi rnam grangs yul so sor bstan pa ni tshad med kyang /
NK086(lu)001:68: don ni gong du bshad ma thag pa'i chos 'khor
NK086(lu)001:69: rim pa gsum gyi khongs su 'du ba nyid do
NK086(lu)001:70: // de dag las mngon mtho nges legs kyi lam
NK086(lu)001:71: bstan pa lha mi'i theg pa dang nyan rag gi
NK086(lu)001:72: theg pa rnams la theg pa thun mong pa zhes
NK086(lu)001:73: // dang / theg pa chen po la ni khyad par ba'i theg pa zhes bya zhing /
NK086(lu)001:74: de la'ang rgyu dang 'bras bu'i theg pa gnyis su yod de /
NK086(lu)001:75: gang zhe na dbu ma dang sems tsam gyi dgogs
NK086(lu)001:76: pa rnam bar bzhag ba'i gzhung gi bka' thams cad
NK086(lu)001:77: ni rgyu pha rol du phyin pa'i theg pa yin
NK086(lu)001:78: la / sngags phyi nang gi gzhung du gyur ba'i
NK086(lu)001:79: bka' thams cad la ni 'bras bu gsang sngags kyi
NK086(lu)001:81: theg pa chen po pa 'di dag mthar 'bras sangs
NK086(lu)001:82: rgyas thob par 'dra yang ring lam dang nye lam
NK086(lu)001:83: gyi khyad par las rgyu 'bras gyi theg pa zhes
NK086(lu)001:84: bya'o // gsang sngags kyi theg pa de la'ang bya spyod rnal 'byor gyi rgyud sde gsum las /
NK086(lu)001:85: dang po bya rgyud la rig sngags thams cad kyi
NK086(lu)001:86: khog dbub pa dpung bzang gi rgyud sogs spyi rgyud
NK086(lu)001:87: drug dang / bye brag gi rgyud 'jam dpal dri
NK086(lu)001:88: ma med pa'i rgyud sogs 'jam dpal gyi skor dang
NK086(lu)001:89: drug dang / / za ma rtog che chung sogs spyan ras gzigs kyi skor dang /
NK086(lu)001:90: lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i rgyud sogs phyag
NK086(lu)001:91: na rdo rje'i skor te gsum gyis mtshon pa'i bya
NK086(lu)001:92: rgyud rnams ni / thun mong gi gnas nee ra dza na dang /
NK086(lu)001:93: khyad par gyi gnas lcang lo can la sogs par lha'i dbang po sogs kyis zhus pa'i ngor /
NK086(lu)001:94: ston pa nyid rigs gsum mgon po sogs su sprul nas gsungs so //
NK086(lu)001:95: rnam snang mngon byang dang rnam par mi rtog pa'i
NK086(lu)001:96: tan+t+ra sogs spyod rgyud ni bya ba dang rnal 'byor
NK086(lu)001:97: gyi rgyud kyi khog gdang mtshungs par ci rigs su
NK086(lu)001:98: gsungs so // rnal 'byor gyi rgyud de la rnal 'byor dang /
NK086(lu)001:100: rnal 'byor mchog gi rgyud gsum du yod pa las /
NK086(lu)001:101: dang po thun mong gi gnas sum cu rtsa gsum
NK086(lu)001:102: dang khyad par gyi gnas 'og min du ston pa
NK086(lu)001:103: kun rig rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnam pas /
NK086(lu)001:104: zhu ba po gsang ba'i bdag po sogs la bka' stsal te /
NK086(lu)001:105: yo ga gzhung chen po bam po sum brgya pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:106: lung chen po'i rgyud bzhi ste /
NK086(lu)001:110: rtog pa bsdus pa'i rgyud la sogs pa rnams 'khor
NK086(lu)001:111: lha dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi don du
NK086(lu)001:112: gsungs so // rnal 'byor chen po ni ma h+aa yo ga'i rgyud rnams te /
NK086(lu)001:113: de yang glang por 'bog gi rgyud la sogs pa
NK086(lu)001:114: tan+t+ra chen po sde bco brgyad kyis mtshan pa'i ma
NK086(lu)001:115: h+aa yo ga'i rgyud rnams ston pa nyid dpal nyid
NK086(lu)001:116: dpal chen po'am rnam par snang mdzad sogs su sprul
NK086(lu)001:117: nas / zhu ba po rdo rje 'dzin pa sogs 'khor gyi nang du gsungs so //
NK086(lu)001:118: ma h+aa yo ga'i rgyud de dag bsdu na thabs dang shes rab kyi rgyud gnyis su 'adu'o //
NK086(lu)001:119: rnal 'byor mchog gi rgyud la rdzogs pa a nu yo ga'i theg ba dang /
NK086(lu)001:120: rdzogs pa chen po a ti yo ga'i theg pa gnyis /
NK086(lu)001:122: rgyal mo pu ri'i tshal du /
NK086(lu)001:123: ston pa nyid dpal kun tu bzang po'am /
NK086(lu)001:124: rdo rje sems dpar sprul pa la lang+ka'i bdag pos zhus nas /
NK086(lu)001:125: mdo bzhi dems dang lngar bka' stsal te /
NK086(lu)001:126: mdo bzhi ni kun dus rig pa'i mdo /
NK086(lu)001:128: ye shes rngam ba glog gi 'khor lo'i mdo /
NK086(lu)001:129: dur khrod khu byug rol pa'i mdo /
NK086(lu)001:130: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo ni bka' thams cad kyi dems su bzhag pa'o //
NK086(lu)001:132: gnas rgyal mo bu ri'i tshal dang /
NK086(lu)001:133: za ma pu ri'i tshal du ston pa nyid dpal
NK086(lu)001:134: kun tu bzang po kun byed rgyal por sprul nas
NK086(lu)001:135: / kun tu bzang po che ba rang la gnas
NK086(lu)001:136: pa'i rgyud sogs rdzogs pa chen po sems mchog gi
NK086(lu)001:137: skor la sogs ba gsungs so //
NK086(lu)001:138: de ltar chos sna tshogs gsung pa de dag kyang
NK086(lu)001:139: 'dzam gling gi mi dang nyan rang byang sems kyi
NK086(lu)001:140: rigs can rnams la sh+aakya'i rgyal po sku dngos kyis
NK086(lu)001:141: rgyu mtshan nyid kyi theg pa rnams 'phags pa'i yul
NK086(lu)001:142: la sogs par gsugs pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:143: lha rnams dang rigs gsum mgon po sogs sems dpa'
NK086(lu)001:144: chen po rnams la kun rig rnam par snang mdzad
NK086(lu)001:145: du sprul nas phyi rgyud sde gsum gsungs pa dang
NK086(lu)001:146: / rigs lnga sras dang bcas pa rnam la dpal
NK086(lu)001:147: kun tu bzang por sprul nas nang rgyud sde gsum
NK086(lu)001:148: gsung ba de dag kyang gdul bya'i blo'i rim pa
NK086(lu)001:149: dang mthun par gnas kyang thun mong gi gnas d+ha
NK086(lu)001:150: / na ko sha / bsil ba'i tshal /
NK086(lu)001:152: ri me ri 'bar ba sogs dang /
NK086(lu)001:153: khyad par gyi gnas 'og min dang /
NK086(lu)001:154: yum gyi mkha' chos kyi dbyings la sogs par thun
NK086(lu)001:155: mong dang khyad par gyi ston par snang bas 'khor
NK086(lu)001:156: gyi gdul bya phal pa dang khyad par can rnams
NK086(lu)001:157: la rgyu dang 'bras bu'i chos kyi 'khor bskor ba
NK086(lu)001:158: nyid du snang bar zad de /
NK086(lu)001:159: don du ston pa gcig nyid kyi ye shes sku
NK086(lu)001:160: gdul bya'i bsam pa dang mthun pa sna tshogs su
NK086(lu)001:161: sprul pa'i rol pa sna tshogs kyi chos sna tshogs
NK086(lu)001:162: bstan pa de dag rgyas par bka' stsal pa chos
NK086(lu)001:164: 'bring du bka' stsal pa gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis /
NK086(lu)001:165: bsdus te bka' stsal pa theg pa rim pa dgu zhes grags shing /
NK086(lu)001:166: gzhan yang yo ga phyi nang gsang ba la sogs
NK086(lu)001:167: pa rnam par bzhag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa
NK086(lu)001:168: yod mod kyi / don du rgyu dang 'bras bu'i theg pa gnyis su 'adu'o //
NK086(lu)001:169: bka' de la gsungs tshul gyi phye na /
NK086(lu)001:172: rjes su gnang ba'i bka' gsum du yod la /
NK086(lu)001:173: de lta bu'i rgyu dang 'bras bu'i theg pa'i bka'
NK086(lu)001:174: de dag de dus kyi 'khor du 'dus ba so
NK086(lu)001:175: so'i sdud pa po rnams kyis mi 'rjed pa'i gzungs
NK086(lu)001:176: su bzung ste yi ger btab nas 'jig rten gyi
NK086(lu)001:177: khams 'dir dar zhing rgyas par mdzad pa yin te
NK086(lu)001:178: / rgyu pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa thun
NK086(lu)001:179: mong pa rnams gnas bstan 'od srung la sogs pas
NK086(lu)001:180: bka' bsdus shing mi lam mir brgyud de dar /
NK086(lu)001:181: theg pa chen po kha cig 'jam dpal la sogs
NK086(lu)001:182: pas bsdus nas byang sems phal mo che las brgyud
NK086(lu)001:183: de mi'i 'jig rten du dar bar mdzad do //
NK086(lu)001:184: 'bras bu gsang sngags kyi thog pa ni mi yul
NK086(lu)001:185: gyi gdul bya thun mong ba'i ngor ston pa sh+aa
NK086(lu)001:186: kya'i rgyal po nyid kyi zhal nas khyab brdal du
NK086(lu)001:187: ma gsung bar re zhig sbas pa'i tshul gyis skal
NK086(lu)001:188: ldan dbang po rab rnams kyi don du bstan par
NK086(lu)001:190: de'i dbang gis gdul bya phal pa dag gis gsang
NK086(lu)001:191: sngags 'di sangs rgyas kyi bka' yin min gyi the
NK086(lu)001:192: tshom bzlog pa'i phyir de dus kyi gdul bya thun
NK086(lu)001:193: mong pa'i 'khor gyi nang du ston pa sh+aakya'i rgyal
NK086(lu)001:194: po nyid kyi zhal nas gsang sngags ni gdod mi
NK086(lu)001:195: yul 'dir 'byung ba'i tshul du dngos su lung bstan
NK086(lu)001:196: te / mdo sde gdam ngag 'bog pa'i rgyal po las /
NK086(lu)001:197: nga ni mya ngan las 'og tu //
NK086(lu)001:198: lo ni brgyad dang bcu gnyis na //
NK086(lu)001:199: bstan pa'i snying po dam pa zhig /rgyal po dza yi khang thog tu //
NK086(lu)001:200: thugs rje mthun pa'i byin rlabs kyis //
NK086(lu)001:201: lag na rdo rjes ston par 'gyur /
NK086(lu)001:202: zhes pa la sogs pa gsal bar gsung pa'i tshul dang mthun par /
NK086(lu)001:203: ston pa'i thugs rjes rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas dang /
NK086(lu)001:204: rgya tshab rnams la bskul ba mdzad de //
NK086(lu)001:205: 'bras bu'i chos 'di gser gyi glegs bam la bee
NK086(lu)001:206: d+aur+ya'i yi ger bris nas thugs rje mthun pa'i byin
NK086(lu)001:207: rlabs kyis rgyal po dza'i khang thog tu rang babs
NK086(lu)001:208: su snang bar gyur ba rgyal po dza dang slob
NK086(lu)001:209: dpon ku ku r+aa dzas de'i don rnams rdo rje
NK086(lu)001:210: sems dpa'i byin rlabs kyis rtogs nas mi yul 'dir
NK086(lu)001:212: gzhan yang 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi lha'i gnas dang /
NK086(lu)001:213: spyan ras gzigs kyis klu'i gnas dang /
NK086(lu)001:214: phyag na rdo rjes gnod sbyin gyi gnas su snang bar mdzad /
NK086(lu)001:215: 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir ni kri ya rnams war na si dang /
NK086(lu)001:216: yo ga rnams ri ma la ya me ri 'bar ba dang /
NK086(lu)001:217: ma h+aa dang a nu rgyal po dza nyid kyi gnas dang /
NK086(lu)001:218: a ti yo ga d+ha na ko sha'i gling du
NK086(lu)001:219: bshad cing sgrub par byas te de las yul kun
NK086(lu)001:221: bshad pa'i rnam grangs gzhan du lung bzhi dems dang
NK086(lu)001:222: lnga bskyed rdzogs rdzogs chen gsum gyi spyi rgyud dang
NK086(lu)001:223: / sgyu 'phrul sde brgyad ni lta ba a ti
NK086(lu)001:224: dang spyod pa ma h+aar gtogs pas a na'i rgyud
NK086(lu)001:225: du 'ang gsungs te bskyed rdzogs rdzogs chen gyi gnad
NK086(lu)001:226: bstan pa'i cha nas ji ltar bzhag kyang rung ngo
NK086(lu)001:227: / // de dag na bka' ji ltar byung ba'i lo rgyus so //
NK086(lu)001:228: bstan bcos ji ltar byung ba ni /
NK086(lu)001:229: ston pa mya ngan las 'das nas lo brgya lhag tsam na /
NK086(lu)001:230: yul yangs pa can du nyan thos sdeb pa tha
NK086(lu)001:231: dad pa'i dgra bcom pa lnga brgya 'dus nas bstan
NK086(lu)001:232: bcos bye brag bshad mdzod chen po bam po sum
NK086(lu)001:233: brgya ba mdzad pa bstan pa 'di'i bstan bcos kyi
NK086(lu)001:235: de nas bzung ste zab pa dang rgya che ba'i
NK086(lu)001:236: bka' yi dgongs don 'grel ba'i shing rta chen po
NK086(lu)001:237: klu sgrub dang thog med rnam pa gnyis la sogs
NK086(lu)001:238: pa 'dzam gling rgyan mchog slob ma dang bcas pa'i
NK086(lu)001:239: tshogs kyis brtsam pa'i bstan bcos dang /
NK086(lu)001:240: sngags kyi lugs khyad chub sems dpa'i 'grel pa skor gsum dang /
NK086(lu)001:241: grub pa sde bdun du grags pa la sogs pas
NK086(lu)001:242: mtshon te grub chen rig 'dzin rnam kyis mdzad pa'i
NK086(lu)001:243: bstan bcos du ma rnams byung ba'o //
NK086(lu)001:244: bstan bcos zhes pa rgyal ba'i bka' yi rjes su
NK086(lu)001:245: 'grang nas rtsom pa po mtshan nyid dang ldan pas
NK086(lu)001:246: legs par bshad pa yin la /
NK086(lu)001:247: de'i dbye ba lung btus pa'i bstan bcos /
NK086(lu)001:249: lung don rig pa'i bstan bcos gsum /
NK086(lu)001:250: dang po ched du brjod pa'i tshom la sogs pa lta bu /
NK086(lu)001:251: gnyis pa 'bum tika la sogs pa lta bu /
NK086(lu)001:252: gsum pa ni ji skad du /
NK086(lu)001:253: don med don log don dang ldan /
NK086(lu)001:254: ngan g.yo brtse bral sdug bsngal spongs //
NK086(lu)001:255: thos rtsod sgrub pa lhur len pa //
NK086(lu)001:256: bstan bcos drug bral gsum du 'dod //
NK086(lu)001:257: ces pa ltar ngan pa drug bral zhing yon tan gsum dang ldan pa ste /
NK086(lu)001:258: rig tshogs drug dang byams chos skor lnga la sogs pa bzhin no //
NK086(lu)001:259: de dag gis bka' dang bstan bcos spyi'i tshul mdor bsdus su brjod nas /
NK086(lu)001:260: da ni gnyis pa bye brag tu khyad par gyi
NK086(lu)001:261: rgyud sgrub pa bka' brgyad kyi chos rin po che
NK086(lu)001:262: ji ltar byung ba brjod na /
NK086(lu)001:263: chos zab mo 'di ni 'og min gyi gnas su
NK086(lu)001:264: kun tu bzang po dpal he ru kas yongs su
NK086(lu)001:265: dag pa'i 'khor rnams la rdo rje'i tshig tu gsung
NK086(lu)001:266: pa rnams sdud pa po rdo rje chos la sogs
NK086(lu)001:267: pas bsdus shing / rdzu 'phrul gyi yi ger snang
NK086(lu)001:268: ba rin po che'i sgrom du bzhug ste mchod rten
NK086(lu)001:269: chen po bde byed brtsegs par mkha' 'gro ma las
NK086(lu)001:270: kyi dbang mo che mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho'i tshogs dang
NK086(lu)001:271: bcas pa la gnyer du gtad par mdzad pa dang
NK086(lu)001:272: pas bsdus shing / / gang gi tshe dur khrod
NK086(lu)001:273: ro gling bsil ba'i tshal zhes 'jigs su rung ba'i
NK086(lu)001:274: gnas su slob dpon h'u ka ra /
NK086(lu)001:277: pad+ma 'byung gnas d+ha na sam kri ta /
NK086(lu)001:280: sh+aan+t+ringa gar+b+ha dang brgyad dgongs pa mdzad cing bzhugs pa'i tshe /
NK086(lu)001:281: ya mtshan rmad du byung ba'i sgrom bu brgyad la 'od dang 'ja' tshon dkrigs pa sogs ltas dang /
NK086(lu)001:282: mkha' 'gro dang dregs pa'i tshogs kyis bskor bar byed
NK086(lu)001:283: pa gzigs par dang 'dir 'jig rten phung 'chengs nus
NK086(lu)001:284: pa'i gdams pa zab mo 'dug snyam du dgongs te
NK086(lu)001:285: / slob dpon rnams kyi der dgongs pa gtad cing
NK086(lu)001:286: bka' srung gi tshogs rnams la dam rdzas byin nas
NK086(lu)001:287: dam bsgrags shig dbang du bsdus pa'i dus der /
NK086(lu)001:288: ma mo mkha' 'gro rnams kyis bka' ci zhig stsal
NK086(lu)001:289: zer nas lhags pa la sgrom bu rnams gtod ces
NK086(lu)001:290: gsungs pas / dngul gyi sgrom bur yag dag gi
NK086(lu)001:291: chos skyor gnas pa slob dpon h'u ka ra'i phyag
NK086(lu)001:292: gsungs pas / tu gtad / lcags sgrom du 'jam
NK086(lu)001:293: dpal sku'i chos skor gnas pa 'jam dpal bshes gnyen
NK086(lu)001:295: zags sgrom du pad+ma gsung gi chos skor gnas pa klu sgrub snying po'i phyag tu gtad /
NK086(lu)001:296: g.yu yi rus pa'i'ang sgrom bur phur ba'i chos skor gnas pa pad+ma 'byung gnas kyi phyag tu gtad /
NK086(lu)001:297: gser gyi sgrum bu che mchog gi chos skor gnas
NK086(lu)001:298: pa bi ma la mi tra'i phyag tu gtad bse
NK086(lu)001:299: sgrom du ma mo'i chos skor yod pa d+ha na
NK086(lu)001:300: sam kri ta'i phyag tu gtad /
NK086(lu)001:301: mchor la cha'ang sgrom du mchod bstod kyi chos skor
NK086(lu)001:302: yod pa ram+bu gu ya de batsan+d+ra'i phyag tu gtad
NK086(lu)001:303: / gzi sgrom du drag sngags kyi chos skor yong pa phung byed shan+tinga gar+g+ha'i phyag tu gtad /
NK086(lu)001:304: rin chen sna lnga'i sgrim bu phra men gyi rgyas
NK086(lu)001:305: gtab pa bang ba brgyad bcug ba zhig slob dpon
NK086(lu)001:306: rnams kyi dbus su bzhag go //
NK086(lu)001:307: lo rgyus gzhan na phur ba'i chos skor gyi sgrom bu pra b+ha ha sti'i phyag tu gtad /
NK086(lu)001:308: rin chen sna lnga'i sgrom bu bka' brgyad dkyil 'khor
NK086(lu)001:309: gcig tu sgrub pa'i chos skor ni thams cad kyi
NK086(lu)001:310: bka' bab pa pad+ma 'byung gnas kyi phyag tu gtang
NK086(lu)001:311: zhes rig 'dzin dbu'i bka' bab gyi lo rgyus kyang
NK086(lu)001:312: 'byung ngo // de nas slob dpon rnams kyis so
NK086(lu)001:313: sor rang rang gi sgrom bu kha phyes nas so
NK086(lu)001:315: dbus kyi rin po che'i sgrom bu de slob dpon gang gis kyang kha 'byed ma nus la /
NK086(lu)001:316: rgya bcag pas kyang mchog nas /
NK086(lu)001:317: slob dpon brgyad kyi dgung 'dun du dgongs pa rtse gcig mdzad cing /
NK086(lu)001:318: mkha' 'gro ma rnams la gsol ba btab pas rgya
NK086(lu)001:319: rang grol du gyur te de'i nang nas bka' brgyad
NK086(lu)001:320: bde gshegs 'dus pa'i chos skor byung ngo //
NK086(lu)001:321: bdegs shegs 'dus pa'i chos skor sgrom bu de dus
NK086(lu)001:322: rgya ma khrol bar slar mchod rten de nyid du
NK086(lu)001:323: bzhugs pa phyis pad+ma 'byung gnas kyis rgya bkrol zhing
NK086(lu)001:324: / mkha' 'gro rnams kyis bshad dang sgrub par bka' gnang ngo zhes kyang 'byung ngo //
NK086(lu)001:325: de yang 'di ltar dbus kyi sgrom bur bde gshegs 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi skor la ni /
NK086(lu)001:328: phyi ma'i phyi ma'i rgyud la sogs pa rgyud lnga /
NK086(lu)001:329: che mchog 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud la sogs pa bcu ste rgyu bco lnga byung ngo //
NK086(lu)001:330: lcags sgrom las 'jam dpal sku'i skor la /
NK086(lu)001:332: gsang ba rgyud kyi rgyal po nyer gnyis pa /
NK086(lu)001:333: 'jam dpal gsang rgyu le'u drug cu pa /
NK086(lu)001:334: gshin rje me lce phreng ba'i rgyud la sogs pa rgyud shin tu mang po byung ngo //
NK086(lu)001:335: de bzhin du sgrom bu so so'i pad+ma gsung gi skor la /
NK086(lu)001:337: rngog ma le brgan gyi rgyud /
NK086(lu)001:338: dbang chen 'dus pa'i rgyud sogs shin tu mang po dang /
NK086(lu)001:339: yang dag thugs kyi rgyud la 'jig rten 'dis mdo
NK086(lu)001:340: dang rngam glog gal po che rgyud sogs shin tu
NK086(lu)001:341: mang po dang / phur pa 'phrin las kyi rgyud la /
NK086(lu)001:342: bid to ta ma rig pa mchog la k+ai la ya'i rgyud /
NK086(lu)001:343: k+ai la ya bcu gnyis kyi rgyud /
NK086(lu)001:344: rnal 'byor ma dam pa gsang chen gyi rgyud la sogs pa rab tu mang po dang /
NK086(lu)001:345: che mchog yon tan gyi skoor la /
NK086(lu)001:346: bdud rtsi rol pa lung bam po brgyad pa /
NK086(lu)001:347: dbyings ye shes gsang ba 'khor lo'i rgyud sogs shin tu mang po dang /
NK086(lu)001:348: ma mo rbod gtong gi chos sgor la /
NK086(lu)001:349: ma mo gsang ba gtan tshigs kyi rgyud /
NK086(lu)001:350: ma mo srid pa'i bem 'bum phrag gcig pa /
NK086(lu)001:351: ma mo gsang ba 'dus pa'i tan+t+ra 'bum sde gcig pa la sogs pa ches mang po dang /
NK086(lu)001:352: 'jig rten dregs pa'i rgyud kyi skor la /
NK086(lu)001:354: gsung rgyud ngan sngags nag po //
NK086(lu)001:355: thugs kyi rgyud dregs pa'i srog tig nag po la
NK086(lu)001:356: sogs pa shin tu mang po dang dmod pa drag
NK086(lu)001:358: sku'i rgyud drag sngags shel phreng dkar po /
NK086(lu)001:359: gsung gi rgyud drag sngags 'dus pa /
NK086(lu)001:360: thugs kyi rgyu drag sngags tsit+ta dmar 'byin la sogs
NK086(lu)001:361: pa shin tu mang po byung ba ni bka' yi
NK086(lu)001:362: skor ro // de nas bstan bcos kyi skor la
NK086(lu)001:363: grub pa'i slob dpon rnams kyi rgyud de dag gi
NK086(lu)001:364: dgongs pa legs par bkral nas 'jam dpal sku 'khor
NK086(lu)001:365: lo bzhi yi dgongs par 'dus pa la sogs pa
NK086(lu)001:366: sgrub sde brgyad so so'i dgongs don gyi grub mtha'
NK086(lu)001:367: skor ro // dang / 'jam dpal sku yi sku
NK086(lu)001:368: la sogs pa sku yi drag sngags kyi bar gyi
NK086(lu)001:369: sgrub pa re rer yang sgrub pa brgyad kyi sgrub
NK086(lu)001:370: skor ro // dang / lugs dang / 'jam dpal
NK086(lu)001:371: bshes gnyen gyi dgongs pas sgrub pa bka' brgyad kyi
NK086(lu)001:372: gnad bskyed rdzogs rdzogs chen gsum du mthar thug par
NK086(lu)001:373: skor ro // dang / lugs dang / bzhed pa
NK086(lu)001:374: dang / de bzhin du slob dpon bi ma las
NK086(lu)001:375: rgyud lung man ngag gsum du bsdus pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:376: slob dpon klu sgrub kyis rnal 'byor rnams gsum dang /
NK086(lu)001:377: slob dpon pad+ma ma h+aa a nu a ti ste yo ga gsum gyi tshul du bsgrub pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:378: slob dpon h'u ka ras lta spyod sgrub pa gsum dang /
NK086(lu)001:379: slob dpon d+ha na sam kri tas lta spyod rnams gnyis su 'dus par bzhed cing /
NK086(lu)001:380: slob dpon ram bu gu h+yas rdzong dang 'phrang rnam pa gnyis su 'dus pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:381: phung byed shit+tinga gar+b+ha'i gzhung gis sgrub pa bka' brgyad
NK086(lu)001:382: kyi mtha' srog dang srog 'phro gang gnyis thug par
NK086(lu)001:383: gzhed de so so'i bzhed pas sgrub phugs kyi rnams
NK086(lu)001:384: bzhag gsung ba rnams don la dgongs gnang mthun te
NK086(lu)001:385: gang ltar bshad kyang chog go //
NK086(lu)001:386: de las mchog tu 'phags pa grub pa'i rig 'dzin
NK086(lu)001:387: chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas kyis bsam yas 'chim phu'i
NK086(lu)001:388: brag dmar ke'u tshang du rje 'bang thugs kyi sras
NK086(lu)001:389: dgu la sgrub pa bka' brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor du
NK086(lu)001:390: dbang bskur zhing so so'i me tog rigs kyi lha
NK086(lu)001:391: tshom bu dgur bab pa'i lha so so'i grub pa
NK086(lu)001:392: brnyes shing / de rnams la gsang ba'i man ngag
NK086(lu)001:393: tu gdams pa bka' brgyad bde gshegs 'dus pa'i chos
NK086(lu)001:394: brnyes shing / skor 'di la / rgyud lung man
NK086(lu)001:395: ngag gi chos sde brgya dang sum bcur grags pa
NK086(lu)001:396: brnyes shing / skor 'di la / las / dang
NK086(lu)001:397: po rgyud kyi skor la bde gshegs 'dus pa rtsa
NK086(lu)001:398: brnyes shing / skor 'di la / las / ba'i rgyud / phyi ma nges par 'byung ba'i rgyud /
NK086(lu)001:399: phyi ma'i phyi ma sngags kyi rgyud /
NK086(lu)001:400: ma tshang pa kha skong ba'i rgyud /
NK086(lu)001:401: 'byed par byed pa lde'i mig gi rgyud lnga ni spyi rgyud lnga'o //
NK086(lu)001:403: zhi ba 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud dang /
NK086(lu)001:404: che mchog 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud la sogs pa brgyad dang /
NK086(lu)001:405: rig 'dzin 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud dang bcu ste rgyud bco lnga /
NK086(lu)001:406: byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying pos mdzad pa'i lung lnga ste /
NK086(lu)001:407: thugs rje dpyang thag gnas kyi lung /
NK086(lu)001:408: mdzad pa cho 'phrul lha yi lung /
NK086(lu)001:409: phrin las mthar phyin sgrub pa'i lung /
NK086(lu)001:410: gsang sngags nges pa don gyi lung /
NK086(lu)001:411: gsal bar byed pa sgron me'i lung ste lung lnga dang bcas pa'i de ltar rgyud lung nyi shu'o //
NK086(lu)001:413: phyi bshad thabs gsal byed kyi man ngag /nang sgrub
NK086(lu)001:414: thabs gsal byed kyi man ngag /gsang ba nyams len
NK086(lu)001:415: gsal byed kyi man ngag gsum las /
NK086(lu)001:420: sgrub thabs kyi sbyor so lnga ste chos sde nyi shu yod pa las phyi'i sdom lnga ni /
NK086(lu)001:421: gsang sngags lung gi bang mdzod /
NK086(lu)001:422: gsang sngags bka' yi tha ram /
NK086(lu)001:423: gsang sngags bka' yi lde'u mig /gsang sngags lung gi bka' mgo /
NK086(lu)001:424: sgrub pa lung gi bka' mgo dang lnga'o //
NK086(lu)001:426: khog dbub stong thun gyi chings /
NK086(lu)001:430: lag len man ngag gi chings dang lnga'o //
NK086(lu)001:433: lung sgrub thabs dang sdebs pa /
NK086(lu)001:434: sgrub thabs phrin las dang sdebs pa /
NK086(lu)001:435: phrin las lag len dang sdebs pa /
NK086(lu)001:436: lag len nyams myong dang sdebs pa lnga'o //
NK086(lu)001:437: sgrub thabs kyi sbyor lugs lnga ni /
NK086(lu)001:438: rtsa ba sgrub thabs dang sbyor ba /
NK086(lu)001:439: sgrub thabs phrin las dang sbyor ba /
NK086(lu)001:440: phrin las sgom khog dang sbyor ba /
NK086(lu)001:441: sgom khog ting nge 'dzin dang sbyor ba /
NK086(lu)001:442: ting nge 'dzin gdam par dang sbyor ba lnga'o //
NK086(lu)001:443: nang sgrub thabs gsal bar byed pa'i man ngag la /
NK086(lu)001:444: zhi ba dang khro bo'i sgrub thabs gnyis las /
NK086(lu)001:445: dang po la sgrub lugs lnga ste /
NK086(lu)001:446: dam pa rigs brgyar sgrub pa /
NK086(lu)001:447: zhi ba bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su sgrub pa /
NK086(lu)001:448: de kho na nyid rigs lngar sgrub pa /
NK086(lu)001:449: gsang chen rigs gcig tu sgrub pa /
NK086(lu)001:450: zhi ba phyag rgya rkyang pa'i sgrub pa dang lnga'o //
NK086(lu)001:452: dam pa rigs brgyar sgrub pa la las chen lnga /
NK086(lu)001:453: las chung lnga ste chos tshan bcur yod pa las /
NK086(lu)001:455: gzung ba dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga /rim pa dbang
NK086(lu)001:456: gi cho ga /byin rlabs rab gnas kyi cho ga
NK086(lu)001:457: /tshe 'das ro sreg gi cho ga /lho sgo mtshan
NK086(lu)001:460: mnyes pa mchod pa'i cho ga /mchod mgron gtor ma'i
NK086(lu)001:461: cho ga /mchod sbyin chu gtor gyi cho ga /sku
NK086(lu)001:462: gdung s+aats+tsha'i cho ga /zhi ba ro sreg gi cho
NK086(lu)001:463: ga dang lnga'o // zhi ba bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi sgrub thabs la'ang sgrub lugs lngar bkod de /
NK086(lu)001:464: phyi bskyed rim du sgrub pa /
NK086(lu)001:465: nang rdzogs rim du grub pa //
NK086(lu)001:466: gsang ba de kho na nyid ye shes lngar sgrub pa /
NK086(lu)001:467: phrin las dngos grub du sgrub pa /
NK086(lu)001:468: las phra mo kha tshar du sgrub pa'o //
NK086(lu)001:469: de nyid rigs lngar sgrub pa la'ang sgrub lugs lngar bkod de /
NK086(lu)001:470: phyi rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor du sgrub pa /
NK086(lu)001:471: nang phung po'i dkyil 'khor du bsgrub pa /
NK086(lu)001:472: gsang ba dug lnga'i 'khor du sgrub pa /
NK086(lu)001:473: de kho na nyid ye shes lngar sgrub pa /
NK086(lu)001:474: yongs su rdzogs pa sku lngar sgrub pa dang lnga'o //
NK086(lu)001:475: zhi ba phyag rgya rkyang pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:476: gsang chen rigs gcig la'ang sgrub thabs lnga ste /
NK086(lu)001:477: gnad lnga bcu rtsa lnga la brten nas 'khor 'das
NK086(lu)001:478: kyi chos thams cad gtan la dbab ste sgrub pa
NK086(lu)001:479: dang / chos thams cad rdo rje sems dpa'i rang
NK086(lu)001:480: bzhin du 'dus pa la brten nas yi dam rgyud
NK086(lu)001:481: du nar mar sgrub pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:482: phrin las kha tshar la brten nas chos spyod lam rim du sgrub pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:483: shes pa dgu la brten nas gsang sngags gzhung tshul du sgrub pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:484: bskyed rdzogs gzhung 'brel du brten nas rgyun gyi yi
NK086(lu)001:485: dam nar mar sgrub pa ste de ltar zhi ba
NK086(lu)001:486: la chos tshan sum cu tham pa'o //
NK086(lu)001:487: khro bo la 'ang rtsa ba dang yan lag gi sgrub thabs gnyis su bkod pa las /
NK086(lu)001:489: gang zag spros pa la dga' ba'i don du bskyed rdzogs chen mo rnam par spros pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:490: bsdus pa la dga' pa'i don du bskyed rdzogs 'bring po dang /
NK086(lu)001:491: rab tu bsdus pa dang shing tu bsdus pa la
NK086(lu)001:492: dga' ba'i don du bskyed rdzogs chung ngu shin tu
NK086(lu)001:493: bsdus pa dang / rgyun du sgrub bar mos pa rnams la sngags sgrub nar ma'i sgrub thabs dang /
NK086(lu)001:494: gang zag blo chung ba rnams kyi don du khro bo phyag rgya rkyang ba'i sgos sgrub dang lnga'o //
NK086(lu)001:495: de dag kun la'ang sgrub lugs lnga lngar bkod de /
NK086(lu)001:496: phyi rdul tshon gyi dal la brten nas bskyed pa ma h+aa yo gar sgrub pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:497: nang phung po'i dal la brten nas rdzogs pa a nu yo gar sgrub pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:498: gsang ba rig pa sems kyi dal la brten nas
NK086(lu)001:499: rdzogs pa chen po a ti yo gar sgrub pa
NK086(lu)001:500: dang / de kho na nyid lam rim la brten
NK086(lu)001:501: nas bskyed rdzogs zung 'brel du sgrub pa dang phrin
NK086(lu)001:502: las yongs su rdzogs pa la brten nas sgyu lus
NK086(lu)001:503: lha skur ngo sprod pa dang lnga'o //
NK086(lu)001:504: yan lag gi sgrub thabs la lnga lnga nyer lngar bkod de /
NK086(lu)001:505: de yang byin rlabs kyi sgrub chen lnga /
NK086(lu)001:506: phan gdags pa'i las chen lnga /
NK086(lu)001:508: nyams chags kyi skong chen lnga /
NK086(lu)001:509: bstong skul gyi bye brag lnga bcas so //
NK086(lu)001:510: dang po byin rlabs sgrub chen lnga ni /
NK086(lu)001:511: dus kyi bsten pa'i sgrub pa /
NK086(lu)001:512: mchad rdzas bdud rtsi'i sgrub pa /
NK086(lu)001:513: rim pa dbang gi sgrub pa /
NK086(lu)001:515: byin rlabs phur pa'i sgrub pa dang lnga'o //
NK086(lu)001:516: phan gdags las chen lnga ni /
NK086(lu)001:521: sgrol ba rgyu'i las dang lnga'o //
NK086(lu)001:522: phrin las kyi gzer chen lnga ni /
NK086(lu)001:523: 'khor lo la brten te srung ba'i gzer /
NK086(lu)001:524: gtong ma la brten te bzlog pa'i gzer /
NK086(lu)001:525: thun la brten te bsang pa'i gzer /
NK086(lu)001:526: hom la brten te bsreg pa'i gzer /
NK086(lu)001:527: thod pa la brten te mnan pa'i gzer lnga'o //
NK086(lu)001:528: nyams chags kyi skong chen lnga ni /
NK086(lu)001:533: 'gyod tshangs bshags pa'i skong dang lnga'o //
NK086(lu)001:534: bstod bskul gyi bye brag lnga ni gzhi bstod chen po chos nyid don rtags la bstod pa /
NK086(lu)001:535: bzhi bstod bsdud ba lha'i tshom bu la bstod pa /
NK086(lu)001:536: spyi bskul chen mo sku mdog phyag mtshan nas bskul ba /
NK086(lu)001:537: 'bring po lha'i mtshan grangs rkang thon nas bskul ba /
NK086(lu)001:538: chung ngu dal gyi pho brang nas bskul ba dang lnga ste /
NK086(lu)001:539: de ltar khro bo chos tshan sum tsu rtsa lnga'o //
NK086(lu)001:540: gsang ba nyams len gsal bar byed pa'i man ngag la chos tshan nyer lnga ste /
NK086(lu)001:541: bskyed rdzogs gsum gyi sgrub lugs la /
NK086(lu)001:544: khyad par gyi rdzogs rim lnga /
NK086(lu)001:546: dang po sgrub lugs lnga ni /
NK086(lu)001:547: bskyed pa ma h+aa yo gar sgrub pa /
NK086(lu)001:548: rdzogs pa a nu yo gar sgrub pa /
NK086(lu)001:549: rdzogs chen a ti yo gar sgrub pa /
NK086(lu)001:550: 'dod chags can zhi ba la brten te sgrubs pa /
NK086(lu)001:551: zhe sdang can khro bo la brten te sgrub pa lnga'o //
NK086(lu)001:552: sngags kyi yan lag lnga ni /
NK086(lu)001:553: sngags kyi sgrub thabs rin po che'i phreng ba /
NK086(lu)001:554: sngags kyi bye brag bzla thabs dang bcas pa /
NK086(lu)001:555: sngags kyi sgra'i skyon yon bstan pa /
NK086(lu)001:556: gsang sngags spyi'i sngags don bstan pa /
NK086(lu)001:557: bskyed rim sngags kyi gegs sel bstan pa dang lnga'o //
NK086(lu)001:558: thun mong gi rnal 'byor lnga ni /
NK086(lu)001:559: nang nub chos spyod kyi rnal 'byor /
NK086(lu)001:563: spyod lam rgyun gyi rnal 'byor dang lnga'o //
NK086(lu)001:564: khyad par gyi rdzogs rim lnga ni /
NK086(lu)001:565: bskyed rim la brten te lha'i rdzogs rim /
NK086(lu)001:566: sems nyid la brten pa byang chub sems kyi rdzogs rim /
NK086(lu)001:567: lus la brten pa rtsa'i rdzogs rim /
NK086(lu)001:568: dbugs la brten pa rlung gi rdzogs rim /
NK086(lu)001:569: bcung la brten pa thig le'i rdzogs rim dang lnga'o //
NK086(lu)001:570: sku gsum gyi gzer lnga ni /
NK086(lu)001:571: yi dam gyi sku la sku gsum gyi gzer btab pa /
NK086(lu)001:572: bar gcod kyi bdud la sku gsum gyi gzer btab pa /
NK086(lu)001:573: gsang ba'i dgra gsum la sku gsum gyi gzer btab pa /
NK086(lu)001:574: 'gro drug gi g.yangs sa la sku gsum gyi gzer btab pa /
NK086(lu)001:575: 'byung ba'i bdud la sku gsum gyi gzer btab pa dang lnga'o //
NK086(lu)001:576: de ltar bde gshegs 'dus pa'i chos sde la /
NK086(lu)001:577: rgyud lung man ngag gi chos tshan brgya sum cur
NK086(lu)001:578: bkod pa 'di ni mnga' bdag rgyal bos zhus pa
NK086(lu)001:579: la slob dpon pad+ma thod phreng gis gnang nas lho
NK086(lu)001:580: brag khom thing rnam snang gi sku rgyab la sogs
NK086(lu)001:581: par gter du sbas pa nyid //
NK086(lu)001:582: mnga' bdag rgyal po'i sku yi skye ba bcu drug
NK086(lu)001:583: pa mnga' bdag chen po nyang nyi ma 'od zer
NK086(lu)001:584: gyis gter nas gdan drangs shing /
NK086(lu)001:585: bdag nyid chen po de la lam 'di'i bka' gter
NK086(lu)001:586: chu bo gcig 'dres kyi tshul du bka' bab pa
NK086(lu)001:587: de las rim par brgyud nas deng sang gi bar
NK086(lu)001:588: du smin grol nyams len gyi rgyud bzang po ma
NK086(lu)001:589: nyams par bzhugs pa yin no //
NK086(lu)001:590: de dag ni lo rgyus mdor bsdus pa ste rgyas
NK086(lu)001:591: par gsang sngags lung gi bang mdzod dang chos 'byung
NK086(lu)001:593: gnyis pa bar du dge ba lo rgyus de ldan
NK086(lu)001:594: gyi chos 'chad thabs kyi sgo nas khog dbub pa
NK086(lu)001:595: la spyi dang bye brag gnyis las /
NK086(lu)001:596: dang po bka' thams cad ni ston pa dang gnas
NK086(lu)001:597: dang 'khor dang dus dang chos phun sum tshogs pa
NK086(lu)001:598: ste phun tshogs lnga yi sgo nas bka' nyid du
NK086(lu)001:599: nges pa bskyed pa'i tshul gyis 'chad cing /
NK086(lu)001:600: bstan bcos thams cad ni rtsis mgo lnga'i sgo nas 'chad de mdzad pa po gang gis mdzad /
NK086(lu)001:601: lung gang nas btus pa dang phyogs gang gtogs mtshan ci las btags /
NK086(lu)001:602: don gang gi ched du mdzad /
NK086(lu)001:603: dbu zhabs kyi don gang yin te rnam pa lnga
NK086(lu)001:604: nges pa'i tshul gyis bstan bcos rnams dag ru shes
NK086(lu)001:605: nas 'chad par bya ba yin no //
NK086(lu)001:606: thun mong du ni spyi yi don kyis khog dbub /
NK086(lu)001:608: tshig gi 'bru gnyer pa'i sgo nas bshad cing /
NK086(lu)001:609: der dgos pa shes par bya ba dang tshig phan
NK086(lu)001:610: tshun mtshams sbyar ba dang mi 'thad par dogs pa
NK086(lu)001:611: la brgal ba'i lan ston pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:612: rigs pa'i 'thad pa dang bcas pa'i sgo nas ma
NK086(lu)001:613: rtogs log rtog the tshom gyi dri ma dang bral
NK086(lu)001:614: bar nges pa'i shes pa yang dag pa bskyed pa'i
NK086(lu)001:615: tshul du bshad par bya ba ni spyir btang ngo
NK086(lu)001:616: // gnyis pa bye brag tu bshad pa la spyir
NK086(lu)001:617: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i theg pa dam pa'i chos
NK086(lu)001:618: kyi sgo thams cad theg pa rim pa dgur bsdus
NK086(lu)001:619: nas de dag gi rim pa dang mthun par so
NK086(lu)001:620: so'i phun sum tshogs pa lnga dang ldan pa'i sgo
NK086(lu)001:621: nas de dag re re'i lta sgom spyod 'bras kyi
NK086(lu)001:622: khyad par rnams ma 'dres par 'chad pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:623: phyi pa dang nang pa'i grub pa'i mthar sna tshogs
NK086(lu)001:624: pa so sor dbye zhing 'chad par bya ba yin
NK086(lu)001:625: no // de dag ni rgyas par gsang sngags lung gi bang mdzod du blta bar bya dgos la /
NK086(lu)001:626: mdo tsam 'dir brjod na grub pa'i mtha' zhes pa la phyi rol pa dang nang pa gnyis las /
NK086(lu)001:627: dang po la lta ba sum brgya drug cu dang /
NK086(lu)001:632: rtag chad gnyis la sogs pa'i dbye sgo sna tshogs
NK086(lu)001:633: yod kyang mdor bsdus na rtag chad gnyis su 'du
NK086(lu)001:634: ste / rtag lta bas ni bdag gam tshangs pa
NK086(lu)001:635: dbang phyug sogs kyi ngo bo rtag cing thams cad
NK086(lu)001:637: chad lta bas 'byung ba bzhi las da lta'i phung
NK086(lu)001:638: po 'di glo bur skye zhing shi nas rgyun chad
NK086(lu)001:639: pa'i phyir / sems can 'khor bar yang nas yang du 'khor ba ni med par 'dod do //
NK086(lu)001:640: de la gang zag gi bdag ni phung po dang
NK086(lu)001:641: gcig tha dad du ma grub pa'i rig pas khegs
NK086(lu)001:642: la / tshangs dbang khyab 'jug sogs rtag pa'i skyes
NK086(lu)001:643: bu 'jig rten thams cad skyed pa'i don byed pa
NK086(lu)001:645: rtag pa la don byed pas stong pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:646: don byed pa la mi rtag pas khyab pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:647: gzhan thams cad mi rtag la de gcig pu rtag
NK086(lu)001:648: pa'i sgrub byed med de de dngos por yod pa
NK086(lu)001:649: la rgyu las ma skyes pa'i ye yod mi srid
NK086(lu)001:650: pa'i phyir ro // chad par smra pa'ang mi rigs te /
NK086(lu)001:651: chos gang yang rgyu med par 'byung ba mi srid do //
NK086(lu)001:652: gal ste 'byung na de nyid rtag tu yod pa 'am med par thal ba dang /
NK086(lu)001:653: rten cing 'brel 'byung gi chos la rgyu tshang bzhin du 'bras bu rgyun chad pa mi srid pas /
NK086(lu)001:654: sems can skye ba'i sems kyi rgyu snga ma'i sems yin pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:655: 'chi dus kyi sems las srid pa phyi ma'i sems
NK086(lu)001:656: 'byung ba la rig pas gnod pa med cing sgrub
NK086(lu)001:658: de ltar min na da lta snang ba'i dngos po
NK086(lu)001:659: 'di kun kyang rgyu 'bras su mi rten pas thams
NK086(lu)001:660: cad yod pa 'am med par thal ba sogs nyes
NK086(lu)001:661: pa mang po yod pas khegs so //
NK086(lu)001:662: nang pa sangs rgyas pa la'ang rgyu mtshan nyid kyi theg pa'i grub mtha' dang /
NK086(lu)001:663: 'bras bu sngags kyi theg pa'i grub mtha' gnyis las /
NK086(lu)001:667: byang sems kyi theg pa gsum du yod la /
NK086(lu)001:668: nyan thos pa de la'ang bye brag smra ba dang mdo sde pa'i grub mtha' gnyis su yod de //
NK086(lu)001:669: bye brag smra bas ni phung po lnga dang 'dus
NK086(lu)001:670: ma byas gsum gyis bsdus pa'i chos thams cad shes
NK086(lu)001:671: bya gzhi lngar bsdus nas 'dus byas kyi phyogs de
NK086(lu)001:672: dag la skad cig ma dang rdul phra rab kyi
NK086(lu)001:674: gzugs can rnams rdul phran cha med kyi mtha' can dang /
NK086(lu)001:675: shes pa rnams skad cig cha med kyi phreng ba
NK086(lu)001:676: rim par skye ba tsam du blos rtogs nas de
NK086(lu)001:677: la gang zag gi bdag med cing du ma 'dus
NK086(lu)001:678: pa'i chos tsam gyi rang bzhin zag pa dang bcas
NK086(lu)001:679: pa'i phung po 'di ni skad cig gis mi rtag
NK086(lu)001:680: pa dang / sdug bsngal gsum gyi rten du gyur pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:681: gang zag gi bdag des stong pas bdag po dang
NK086(lu)001:682: byed pa med par shes pa'i sgo nas sdug bsngal
NK086(lu)001:683: gyi bden pa rtogs pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:684: sdug bsngal ba'i rang bzhin can yi phung po 'di
NK086(lu)001:685: bdag tu chags ba'i rtsa ba can gyi nyon mongs
NK086(lu)001:686: pa dang de'i dbang gis las sna tshogs bas gas
NK086(lu)001:687: pa'i rgyu rkyen las kun tu 'byung zhing /
NK086(lu)001:688: srid par yang nas yang du rab tu skye bar mthong bas kun 'byung bden pa rtogs pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:689: srid par skye ba'i rgyu yi rtsa ba bdag tu
NK086(lu)001:690: 'dzin pa nyid bdag med par rtogs pa'i shes rab
NK086(lu)001:691: kyis spang ba'i lam de ni /
NK086(lu)001:692: thar pa myang 'das sgrub pa'i lam yin zhing //
NK086(lu)001:693: de nyid kyi 'khor ba'i 'dam las nges par 'byin
NK086(lu)001:694: cing gtan gyi thar pa thob pa ni rigs pa
NK086(lu)001:695: ste mchog tu grub cing 'thad pa yin gyi /
NK086(lu)001:696: bdag med pa'i lam kho na ma gtogs de spangs
NK086(lu)001:697: nas thar pa'i lam gzhan med par mthong ba ni
NK086(lu)001:698: lam gyi bden pa rtogs pa'o //
NK086(lu)001:699: lam de gom pas bdag 'dzin kun btag dang lhan skyes rnams spangs /
NK086(lu)001:700: khams gsum 'khor bar skye ba rgyun bcad pa'i 'gog
NK086(lu)001:701: pa ni 'khor pa las gtan du nges par 'byung
NK086(lu)001:702: ba / las nyon dang sdug bsngal ming med pa
NK086(lu)001:703: zhi ba don du gnyer bya dang thob bya kun
NK086(lu)001:704: gyi nang na phul du byung ba'i gya noms pa
NK086(lu)001:705: yin par shes pas 'gog pa'i bden pa rtogs pa
NK086(lu)001:706: ba / ste / de ltar lta ba'i sgo nas bden pa bzhi rtogs pa yin la /
NK086(lu)001:707: cha med gnyis po don dam par grub par 'dod
NK086(lu)001:708: cing skye 'gag dang kun byang gi chos thams cad
NK086(lu)001:709: gzhi med pa'i stong nyid du ma rtogs pa'i chos
NK086(lu)001:710: bdag med pa ma rtogs pa yin no //
NK086(lu)001:711: de'i bsgom pa ni dug gsum gyi gnyen por mi sdug pa sogs goms par byed cing /
NK086(lu)001:712: spyod pa ni so sor thar pa'i tshul khrims yongs
NK086(lu)001:713: su dag pa la gnas pa'i sgo nas byang chub
NK086(lu)001:714: phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la spyod pa'o
NK086(lu)001:715: // 'bras bu ni gang zag zung bzhi ya brgyad de /
NK086(lu)001:716: gnas skabs lam gyi 'bras bu bdun dang /
NK086(lu)001:717: mthar thug khams gsum kun tu sbyor ba zad pa'i dgra bcom pa thob bo //
NK086(lu)001:718: nyan thos de'i grub pa'i mtha' bden bzhi dang gang
NK086(lu)001:719: zag gi bdag med 'dod pa dang cha med gnyis
NK086(lu)001:720: don dam par grub par 'dod pa 'dra yang /
NK086(lu)001:721: ldan min 'du byed dang 'dus ma byas rnams bye
NK086(lu)001:722: smra ltar rdzas su mi 'dod par btags pa tsam
NK086(lu)001:724: phyi don gyi rnam pa shes pa la shar ba
NK086(lu)001:725: nyid kyi sgo nas yul rig pa las phyi don
NK086(lu)001:726: dngos lkog na mo'i tshul du 'dod pa sogs tha
NK086(lu)001:727: snyad kyi tshul la dngos stobs kyi rig pa dang
NK086(lu)001:728: mthun pa'i khas len 'ga' zhig gis 'phags pa las
NK086(lu)001:729: mdo sde pa'i grub mtha' zhes logs su brjod kyi
NK086(lu)001:730: / lta sgom spyod 'bras rnams nyan thos dang khyad par med pa'o //
NK086(lu)001:731: gnyis pa rang rgyal gyi theg pa ni /
NK086(lu)001:732: sngon gyi tshe rnams su bdag med pa'i chos thos
NK086(lu)001:733: shing smon lam btab pa'i rgyu las srid pa tha
NK086(lu)001:735: srid pa la skyo ba'i sems shugs kyis skye zhing
NK086(lu)001:736: dur khrod du bor ba'i rus gong lta bu la
NK086(lu)001:737: brtags nas 'di ni shi ba ces bya ste /
NK086(lu)001:738: 'di'i rgyu ni skye ba blang pa las so zhes
NK086(lu)001:739: sogs ma rig pa'i bar du rten 'brel lugs zlog
NK086(lu)001:740: du brtags pas sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba'i bden
NK086(lu)001:741: pa rtogs la / yang gang zag gi bdag med
NK086(lu)001:742: kyang de ltar ma rigs pa de ni 'khrul pa'i
NK086(lu)001:743: sgro btags pa la 'dzin pa tsam las don du
NK086(lu)001:744: de'i gzung ba ltar gyi gang zag gi bdag med
NK086(lu)001:745: par rtogs na 'khor ba'i rgyu ma rig pa de
NK086(lu)001:746: 'gag par shes pas lam bden dang /
NK086(lu)001:747: ma rig pa 'gags pas rga shi'i bar 'gags pa'i
NK086(lu)001:748: rten 'brel lugs bzlog la bsam pas 'gog bden rtogs
NK086(lu)001:749: pa dang / nang gi sems skad cig ma'i phreng
NK086(lu)001:750: ba'i rten 'brel gyi dbang las phyi rol gyi don
NK086(lu)001:751: rnams rmi lam gyi snang ba bzhin du snang bar
NK086(lu)001:752: zad kyi don la phyi don du grub pa'i rdul
NK086(lu)001:753: phran cha med kyang ma grub par nang gi sems
NK086(lu)001:754: skad cig cha med tsam bden grub tu khas len
NK086(lu)001:755: pa yin pas gang zag gi bdag med dang chos
NK086(lu)001:756: kyi bdag med las gzung ba gzugs kyi phyogs bden
NK086(lu)001:757: med du shes pa'i bdag med phyed gnyis rtogs pa'i
NK086(lu)001:759: sgom pa ni bsam gtan bzhi pa la brten te
NK086(lu)001:760: sbyor lam drod nas zad mi skye shes pa'i ye
NK086(lu)001:761: shes kyi bar du stan gcig gi steng du rgyud
NK086(lu)001:763: rten 'brel lugs zlog gi gnad la nges pa 'drong ba'i tshul gyis so //
NK086(lu)001:764: spyod pa ni sgra med par lus kyi brdas chos
NK086(lu)001:765: ston cing rdzu 'phrul ya ma zung gis sems can
NK086(lu)001:767: 'bras bu ni yid bzhin bde ba mchog gi sa
NK086(lu)001:768: zhes rang rgyal dgra bcom pa'i go 'phang mngon du
NK086(lu)001:769: byed pa'o // byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa ni /
NK086(lu)001:770: bdag med gnyis ka rtogs pa'i mkhyen pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:771: sems can gyi khams mtha' dag mi 'dor ba'i snying
NK086(lu)001:772: rje chen pos rdzogs smin sbyang pa mtha' ru phyin
NK086(lu)001:773: nas sangs rgyas bsgrub par byed pa yin la /
NK086(lu)001:774: de la theg chen gyi mdo sde zab pa dang
NK086(lu)001:775: rgya che ba'i dgongs pa'i phyogs 'grel lugs kyi slob
NK086(lu)001:776: dpon dag gi rjes su 'brang ba'i dbu ma dang
NK086(lu)001:777: sems tsam pa gnyis su yod do //
NK086(lu)001:778: sems tsam pas ni gnyis stong gi rnam shes gsal rig tsam don dam pa yongs su grub la /
NK086(lu)001:779: rnam shes de la dag pa dang ma dag pa'i
NK086(lu)001:780: bag chags bzhags pa'i rten 'brel gyi gzhan dbang gis
NK086(lu)001:781: snang ba sna tshogs snang zhing de ltar gnyis su
NK086(lu)001:782: snang zhing gnyis su grub par 'dzin pa'i kun btags
NK086(lu)001:783: can gyi ngar bdag gnyis su grub par 'dzin kyang
NK086(lu)001:784: / don la gzung 'dzin gang yang med pas bdag
NK086(lu)001:785: gnyis kyis stong pa'i chos dbyings de ni rnam shes
NK086(lu)001:786: de la chos nyid kyi tshul du yod pas gzung
NK086(lu)001:787: 'dzin med pa'i shes pa de nyid gnas lugs su
NK086(lu)001:788: byas nas grub mtha' 'jog pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:789: de la'ang rnam pa 'di dag tha snyad du shes
NK086(lu)001:790: pa'i rang bzhin du bden pa rnam bden pa dang
NK086(lu)001:791: / mi bden pa med pa gsal snang tsam du 'dod pa rnam rdzun pa ste /
NK086(lu)001:792: tha snyad khas len tshul gyis grub mtha' gnyis su yod la /
NK086(lu)001:793: rnam bden pa la'ang sgo nga phyed tshal ba sogs nang gses gsum yod do //
NK086(lu)001:794: sems tsam pa'i sgom spyod 'bras bu ni theg pa chen po pa yin phyir dbu ma dang 'dra'o //
NK086(lu)001:795: dbu ma pas ni gzung 'dzin med pa'i rnam shes tsam kyang bden grub tu mi 'dod de /
NK086(lu)001:796: shes bya'i chos gang la'ang bden par grub pa rdul
NK086(lu)001:797: tsam med pa'i stong pa dang rten 'byung gi snang
NK086(lu)001:798: pa zung du zhugs pa'i chos kyi dbyings zab mo
NK086(lu)001:799: lta bas rtogs par byed pa'o //
NK086(lu)001:800: 'di la'ang gnas lugs gzhal tshul la blo'i rtsal che
NK086(lu)001:801: chung gis sgyu ma 'di la sgyu ma rig grub
NK086(lu)001:802: pa'ang zer mchan ltar gnyis su med pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:803: rab tu mi gnas pa gnyis /
NK086(lu)001:804: dang po'i 'dod pa ni 'di ltar snang ba'i kun
NK086(lu)001:805: rdzob 'di dag brtags na ma grub pa'i phyir snang
NK086(lu)001:806: yang mi bden pa sgyu ma lta bu yin te
NK086(lu)001:807: / des na snang stong gnyis med sgyu ma lta
NK086(lu)001:808: bu 'di chos kyi gnas lugs yin pas gzhi lam
NK086(lu)001:809: 'bras bu'i skabs thams cad sgyu ma lta bu 'o
NK086(lu)001:810: / zhes 'dod de / 'di dag gi lugs pa
NK086(lu)001:811: kun rdzob la yang log dang don dam la rnam
NK086(lu)001:812: grangs yin min gnyis su 'byed do //
NK086(lu)001:813: 'di ni theg pa chen po dbu ma'i lugs kyi
NK086(lu)001:814: rjes kyi nges pa tsam las spros bral ji bzhin
NK086(lu)001:815: du gtan la ma pheb pa'o //
NK086(lu)001:816: gnyis pa rab tu mi gnas pa la 'ang /
NK086(lu)001:817: stong pa rab tu mi gnas pa /
NK086(lu)001:818: rgyun chad rab tu mi gnas pa /
NK086(lu)001:819: btang snyoms rab tu mi gnas pa /
NK086(lu)001:820: zung 'jug rab tu mi gnas pa bzhi las /
NK086(lu)001:821: dang po ni kun rdzob don dam tha dad de //
NK086(lu)001:822: snang ba kun rdzob ni 'di ltar snang yang 'khrul
NK086(lu)001:823: pas btags pa ste dpyad na mi bden pa'i phyir
NK086(lu)001:825: kun rdzob med pa'i stong pa ni gnas lugs so
NK086(lu)001:826: snyam du stong pa phyang chad pa zhig gnas lugs
NK086(lu)001:827: su 'dod pa'o // 'di ni snang ba nyid ye
NK086(lu)001:828: nas stong bzhin du snang ba'i stong nyid mtha' bral
NK086(lu)001:829: ma shes par kun rdzob bkag pa'i stong rkyang la
NK086(lu)001:830: stong par 'dzin pa mthar 'dzin du lhung ba'o //
NK086(lu)001:831: rgyun chad rab tu mi gnas pa ni don stong pa 'dod lugs snga ma dang phyogs 'dra /
NK086(lu)001:832: rnam rtog yod kyi ring la tshogs bsags pa'ang yod /
NK086(lu)001:833: de'i 'bras bu ye shes skye ba'ang yod la /
NK086(lu)001:834: mthar rnam rtog zad nas ye shes kyang rgyun chad par 'dod pa'o //
NK086(lu)001:835: 'dis kyang gzhi lam 'bras ba'i gnas skabs thams cad
NK086(lu)001:836: du snang stong gnyis po ye nas 'du 'bral mi
NK086(lu)001:837: srid pa'i chos dbyings mtha' 'bral gyi gnas lugs ma
NK086(lu)001:838: rtogs pa'o // btang snyoms rab tu mi gnas pa
NK086(lu)001:839: ni yod pa dang med pa sogs ji ltar khas
NK086(lu)001:840: blang kyang sgro btags pa las ma 'das la /
NK086(lu)001:841: sgro 'dogs de ni dpyad na ma grub pas 'di
NK086(lu)001:842: zhes khas len pa gang yang med pa'i lta ba
NK086(lu)001:843: 'dzin pa'o // spyir gnas lugs ni smra bsam brjod
NK086(lu)001:844: pa las 'das pa'i khas len dang bral ba ni
NK086(lu)001:845: bden mod kyi gang du khas blang kyang rig pas
NK086(lu)001:846: sun phyung nus pa tsam zhig la brten nas khas
NK086(lu)001:847: len dang dmigs pa thams cad btang snyoms su bzhag
NK086(lu)001:848: pa tsam gyis gnas lugs ji bzhin pa gtan la
NK086(lu)001:850: bzhi pa zung 'jug rab tu mi gnas pas ni /
NK086(lu)001:851: snang stong ngo bo nyid kyis 'du 'bral med pa'i
NK086(lu)001:852: chos dbyings spros pa'i dra ba kun gyis dben pa
NK086(lu)001:853: 'phags pa rnams kyis so so rang gis rig par
NK086(lu)001:854: bya ba bden pa gnyis dbyer med pa'i gnas lugs
NK086(lu)001:855: zab mo de'i ngang du chos kun ro mnyam par
NK086(lu)001:856: gyur pas kun rdzob dang don dam gnyis su yang
NK086(lu)001:858: tha snyad du ni ji ltar snang ba rnam la brtags dpyad med par /
NK086(lu)001:859: 'jig rten na snang ba ltar khas len pa kun
NK086(lu)001:860: rdzob dang de'i rang bzhin yod med la sogs pa'i
NK086(lu)001:861: mtha' thams cad dang bral ba'i chos kyi dbyings kyi
NK086(lu)001:862: rang bzhin du gnas pa don dam bden pa zhes
NK086(lu)001:863: bya ste / mdor na deng sang dbu ma thal
NK086(lu)001:864: 'gyur pa zhes yongs su grags pa'i lugs nyid do
NK086(lu)001:865: bya ste / // 'di ni rgyal ba'i yum nas
NK086(lu)001:866: bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin chos
NK086(lu)001:867: kyi dbyings kyi dgongs pa ji bzhin pa gtan la
NK086(lu)001:868: phab pa'i phyir rgyu yi theg pa'i lta ba mthar
NK086(lu)001:869: bya ste / // thug pa'o // theg pa chen
NK086(lu)001:870: po pa 'di dag gis lta ba bdag gnyis dang
NK086(lu)001:871: bral ba'i chos kyi dbyings la dmigs nas /
NK086(lu)001:872: sgom pa theg pa chen po'i lugs kyi byang phyogs so bdun dang /
NK086(lu)001:873: spyod pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bskal pa grangs med gsum la sogs par spyad pas /
NK086(lu)001:874: 'bras bu rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'grub par 'dod pa yin no //
NK086(lu)001:875: 'di dag gi tshul rgyas pa ni gsang sngags lung gi bang mdzod du lta bar bya'o //
NK086(lu)001:876: de yan chad kyis rgyu mtshan nyid kyi theg pa'i grub mtha' bshad zin nas /
NK086(lu)001:877: gnyis pa 'bras bu gsang sngags kyi theg pa la /
NK086(lu)001:879: nang pa bla na med pa gnyis las /
NK086(lu)001:880: dang po la bya rgyud spyod rgyud rnal 'byor gyi rgyud gsum du yod la /
NK086(lu)001:881: de'i dang po bya rgyud pa ni gzhung kri ya
NK086(lu)001:882: ste drug tu grags pa la sogs pa'i dgongs pa
NK086(lu)001:883: gtso bor bzung nas dngos grub bsgrub pa ste /
NK086(lu)001:884: de la kri ya sde drug ni /
NK086(lu)001:885: dbu'i gtsug tor nas gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyud /
NK086(lu)001:886: ljags las khro bo pad+ma 'khyil pa'i rgyud /
NK086(lu)001:887: thugs ka nas rig pa mchog gi rgyud /
NK086(lu)001:888: dpung pa nas rdo rje dpung bzang gi rgyud /
NK086(lu)001:889: lte ba nas legs grub kyi rgyud /
NK086(lu)001:890: phyag las dpal mchog dang po /
NK086(lu)001:891: zhabs 'og nas bsam gtan phyi ma dang gshin rje nag po'i rgyud de bdun byung ba dang /
NK086(lu)001:892: rgyud las byung ba'i sgrub thabs sum brgya drug cu la sogs pa yod la /
NK086(lu)001:893: de dag 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad de
NK086(lu)001:894: bzhin gshegs pa dang pad+ma dang rdo rje'i rigs gsum
NK086(lu)001:895: gyis bsdus la / de re re la'ang rigs kyi
NK086(lu)001:896: bdag po'i gtsug tor ste rnam snang la sogs pa
NK086(lu)001:898: de'i yum spyan ma sogs kyi dkyil 'khor /
NK086(lu)001:899: 'jam dpal la sogs pa rigs kyi sems dpa' dang sems ma /
NK086(lu)001:900: gshin rje gshed la sogs pa khro bo khro mo
NK086(lu)001:901: dang de dag gi bka' nyan pho mo'i sgrub thabs
NK086(lu)001:903: 'jig rten pa'i rigs la nor can dang /
NK086(lu)001:905: 'jig rten pa'i rigs gsum te bya rgyud rigs drug gi dkyil 'khor zhes bshad do //
NK086(lu)001:906: de la kri ya pa'i lta ba ni don dam
NK086(lu)001:907: par chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i stong
NK086(lu)001:908: pa nyid mtha' bzhi dang bral ba las /
NK086(lu)001:909: kun rdzob du yongs su dag pa'i lha de dang
NK086(lu)001:910: bdag gnyis rje khol gyi tshul gyi byin gyis brlabs
NK086(lu)001:911: pa'i lha de'i sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan ma mngon
NK086(lu)001:912: du byas pa'i thabs la brten na myur du las
NK086(lu)001:913: dang ye shes kyi dngos grub 'grub pa'i tshul la
NK086(lu)001:914: nges pa brtan por gyur pa yin te /
NK086(lu)001:915: de'i phyi dag pa gsum gyi sgo nas 'jug pa zhes bya'o //
NK086(lu)001:916: sgom pa ni stong pa yi ge sgra gzugs la
NK086(lu)001:917: sogs pa kri ya lha drug tu grags pa'i tshul
NK086(lu)001:918: gyis gtso bor ye shes pa la dmigs nas sngags
NK086(lu)001:919: bzlas pas thugs dam bskul zhing mnyes pa'i thabs la
NK086(lu)001:920: 'jug pa'o // spyod ba ni khrus gsum dang gtsang
NK086(lu)001:921: sbra gsum spyod cing sbyin sreg dang mchod pa sogs
NK086(lu)001:922: sngags 'grub byed kyi cho ga'i yan lag rnams la
NK086(lu)001:924: 'bras bu ni gnas skabs su lus dang rdzas dang
NK086(lu)001:925: longs spyod las byung ba'i thun mong gi grub pa
NK086(lu)001:926: che chung dang / mthar thug mi tshe bcu drug
NK086(lu)001:927: na rigs gsum gyi sangs rgyas de dang gi go
NK086(lu)001:928: che chung dang / 'phang thob pa'o // u pa
NK086(lu)001:929: ya ni gzhung u pa sde bzhir grags pa lta
NK086(lu)001:930: bu sogs bka' dang de'i dgongs 'grel gyi lung la
NK086(lu)001:931: che chung dang / 'phang thob pa'o // brten nas
NK086(lu)001:932: / chos dbyings rig pa'i ye shes kyi byin rlabs
NK086(lu)001:933: rigs bzhi'i lha'i mtshan ma la bdag mdun spun grogs
NK086(lu)001:934: kyi tshul du bsgom pas dngos grub bsgrub par 'dod
NK086(lu)001:935: che chung dang / 'phang thob pa'o // brten nas
NK086(lu)001:936: / pa ste / de yang u pa sde bzhi
NK086(lu)001:937: che chung dang / 'phang thob pa'o // brten nas
NK086(lu)001:938: / pa ste / ni / rnam snang mngon byang
NK086(lu)001:939: che chung dang / 'phang thob pa'o // brten nas
NK086(lu)001:940: / pa ste / ni / gi rgyud / me
NK086(lu)001:942: phyag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i rgyud /
NK086(lu)001:943: rnam par mi rtog pa'i tan+t+ra dang bzhi zhes gsungs so //
NK086(lu)001:944: u pa ya zhes grags pa spyod rgyud pa'i lta
NK086(lu)001:945: ba ni chos kyi dbyings mtha' thams cad dang bral
NK086(lu)001:946: ba dang gnyis su med pa rig pa ye shes
NK086(lu)001:947: kyi byin rlabs rnam snang sogs rigs bzhi'i lhar shar
NK086(lu)001:948: ba nyid spun grogs kyi tshul du dmigs nas dngos
NK086(lu)001:949: grub nod pa la yod ches thob pa'o //
NK086(lu)001:950: sgom pa ni mngon byang lnga'i tshul gyis bskyed bzlas
NK086(lu)001:951: ting nge 'dzin gyi cho 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa'o
NK086(lu)001:952: // spyod pa ni phyi'i khrus dang gtsang sbra sogs
NK086(lu)001:953: grogs tsam las nang gi ting nge 'dzin nyid gtso
NK086(lu)001:954: // bor 'dzin pa'o // 'bras bu gnas skabs su mngon shes sogs thun mong gi grub pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:955: mthar thug mi tshe lnga na rigs bzhi'i sangs rgyas su 'grub pa'o //
NK086(lu)001:956: 'di dag bya ba dang rnal 'byor cha mnyam pa'i tshul gyi gnyis ka'i rgyud ces kyang bya'o //
NK086(lu)001:957: rnam 'byor rgyud nyams su len pa yo ga pas ni /
NK086(lu)001:958: de nyid bsdud pa sogs lung gi rgyud bzhir grags
NK086(lu)001:959: pa lta bu'i bka' dang de'i bstan bcos kyi rim
NK086(lu)001:960: pa la brten nas don dam mtha' bral gyi dbyings
NK086(lu)001:961: su chos thams cad mnyam par gyur kyang kun rdzob
NK086(lu)001:962: bslu ba med pa'i snang tshul du bdag dam tshig
NK086(lu)001:963: pa la 'og min nas rigs lngas bsdus pa'i ye
NK086(lu)001:964: shes kyi lha spyan drangs nas ji srid ma krol
NK086(lu)001:965: gyi bar du gnyis su med par gyur pa'i tshul
NK086(lu)001:966: gyis bzlas sgom la brten nas dngos grub myur du
NK086(lu)001:967: sgrub pa'o // de yang 'di pa'i lta ba ni
NK086(lu)001:968: yongs su dag pa'i lha nyid dang gnyis su med
NK086(lu)001:969: par bsre ba'i rnal 'byor gyi mthus dngos grub thob
NK086(lu)001:970: pa la bslu ba med pa'i yid ches dang lngan
NK086(lu)001:971: sgrub pa'o // pa'o // bsgom pa ni sku gsung
NK086(lu)001:972: thugs mdzad pa dang bcas pa'i tshul gyis rgyas btab
NK086(lu)001:973: pa'i phyag chen dang chos dang dam tshig dang las
NK086(lu)001:974: kyi phyag rgya ste phyag rgya bzhi'i tshul gyis bsgrub
NK086(lu)001:975: sgrub pa'o // pa'o // pa'o // spyod pa ni
NK086(lu)001:976: phyi'i kun spyod la mi ltos par nang gi ting
NK086(lu)001:977: 'dzin zab mo kho nas dngos grub sgrub pa gtso
NK086(lu)001:978: sgrub pa'o // pa'o // pa'o // bor byed pa'o
NK086(lu)001:979: // 'bras bu ni gnas skabs thun mong gi dngos
NK086(lu)001:980: grub dang mthar thug mi tshe gsum na rigs lnga'i
NK086(lu)001:981: sangs rgyas su 'grub pa yin no //
NK086(lu)001:982: 'di thams cad yongs su dag pa'i lha'i sku gsung
NK086(lu)001:983: thugs kyi mtshan ma lam du byed pa'i thabs je
NK086(lu)001:984: zab tu song bas mthar 'bras la je nyer gyur
NK086(lu)001:985: pas na rgyu'i theg pa las cher 'phags kyang /
NK086(lu)001:986: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag cig
NK086(lu)001:987: yongs su dag pa lha'i ngo bo nyid du ye
NK086(lu)001:988: nas sangs rgyas pa'i don ma rtogs pas /
NK086(lu)001:989: sngags nang pa ltar bde myur du tshe gcig gis 'tshang rgya nus pa ma yin no //
NK086(lu)001:990: gnyis pa sngags nang pa bla na med pa'i grub
NK086(lu)001:991: mtha' bshad pa khyad par 'phags chos bshad pa dang
NK086(lu)001:992: / khyad par de lngan gyi sngags nang pa'i grub mtha' bshad pa'o //
NK086(lu)001:994: 'di ltar rgyu pha rol du phyin pa'i theg pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:995: der ma zad sngags phyi pa dang bcas pa ni ring pa'i lam yin la /
NK086(lu)001:996: sngags bla med ni nye lam dang 'bras bu'i theg
NK086(lu)001:997: pa mtshan nyid pa yin zhing 'di las gong du
NK086(lu)001:998: gyur pa'i theg pa med de /
NK086(lu)001:999: theg pa gzhan rnams gdul bya'i bsam pa la ltos nas drang ba'i thabs su bstan la /
NK086(lu)001:1000: 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis gzigs pa
NK086(lu)001:1001: ji lta ba bzhin du nges pa'i don mthar thug
NK086(lu)001:1002: pa bstan pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
NK086(lu)001:1003: des na theg pa 'og ma kun las bla na
NK086(lu)001:1004: med pa'i theg pa 'di nyid thabs dang shes rab
NK086(lu)001:1005: kyi sgo nas cher 'phags pa'i tshul de dag 'di'i
NK086(lu)001:1006: mtshan gyi rnam grangs lngas bstan pa'i don bzhin du
NK086(lu)001:1009: gsang sngags kyi theg pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:1013: mi mnyam par dang mnyam pa'i theg pa zhes bya ba'i ming lngas bstan to //
NK086(lu)001:1014: de la gsang ba zhes pa rgyal ba rnams kyi
NK086(lu)001:1015: sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor zab mo gang zhig
NK086(lu)001:1016: ye nas chos kun gyi rang bzhin du gnas kyang
NK086(lu)001:1017: 'khrul pa'i blo can rnams la ye gsang thabs kyi
NK086(lu)001:1019: theg pa 'og ma rnams su gdul bya dman pa
NK086(lu)001:1020: la de nyid ji bzhin par ma gsung pas sbas
NK086(lu)001:1021: pa'i gsang ba nyid du mdzad pa de'i dbang gis
NK086(lu)001:1022: gdul bya thun mong pa'i spyod yul du ma gyur
NK086(lu)001:1023: pa yin la sngags zhes pa de lta bu'i gsang
NK086(lu)001:1024: ba gsum gyi dkyil 'khor de nyid bsgrub par byed
NK086(lu)001:1025: pa la gab spas med par ye ji bzhin pa'i
NK086(lu)001:1026: don bstan pas shes rab ma rmongs pa dang sgrub
NK086(lu)001:1027: byed kyi thabs mchog tu gyur pa yod pa'i phyir
NK086(lu)001:1028: sngags bla med kyi lam 'dis ni yid shes bde
NK086(lu)001:1029: myur du skyob pa'i phyir lam gzhan kun las khyad
NK086(lu)001:1030: par du 'phags pa'i phyir na de skad ces gsungs
NK086(lu)001:1031: so // thabs kyi theg pa zhes pa ni /
NK086(lu)001:1035: thabs myur ba bzhi dang ldan pa ste /
NK086(lu)001:1036: de yang lam 'di'i gnad dang ldan na kun byung
NK086(lu)001:1037: gi chos kun spang blang med par spyod kyang sgrib
NK086(lu)001:1038: par mi 'gyur bar ma zad tshogs chen po rdzogs
NK086(lu)001:1039: par 'gyur ba'i phyir thabs che zhes bya ste lam
NK086(lu)001:1040: gzhan na de lta bu'i thabs med do //
NK086(lu)001:1041: de bzhin du dka' thub dang sdom pa drag pos
NK086(lu)001:1042: gzir mi dgos par 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la
NK086(lu)001:1043: ji bde bar spyod bzhin du de nyid kyis grol
NK086(lu)001:1044: ba nyid du byed pa'i phyir thabs sla ba zhes
NK086(lu)001:1045: bya'o // sems can rnams kyi rgyud kyi chags sdang
NK086(lu)001:1046: la sogs pa nyon mongs pa mtha' yas pa rnams
NK086(lu)001:1047: gnyen po gzhan gyis bkag mi dgos par nyon mongs
NK086(lu)001:1048: pa de nyid kyi sgo nas grol ba ster ba'i
NK086(lu)001:1049: thabs du ma yod pa'i phyir thabs mang ba'o //
NK086(lu)001:1050: thabs myur ba ni rgyu mtshan bzhi'i sgo nas te /
NK086(lu)001:1052: thog ma med pa'i dus kyi spros pa'i bag chags
NK086(lu)001:1053: ma lus pa myur du ldog pa ma byed pa
NK086(lu)001:1054: ni / 'di ltar snang ba ltar shes te chos
NK086(lu)001:1055: kun spang blang med par sbyar pas gzung 'dzin gyi
NK086(lu)001:1056: rtog pa rang sa ldog pa'i phyir dang /
NK086(lu)001:1057: rnam par smin pa las ldog pa ni lta spyod
NK086(lu)001:1058: phul du phyin pa'i sgo nas rnam smin gyi lus
NK086(lu)001:1059: 'di nyid ma bor bar sangs rgyas kyi sa la
NK086(lu)001:1061: bsod nams chen po skyed pa ni /
NK086(lu)001:1062: snang ba lha'i dkyil 'khor du lta zhing mnyam pa bzhi'i dag pa dang ma bral bas /
NK086(lu)001:1063: ji ltar spyad kyang tshogs chen po rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir dang /
NK086(lu)001:1064: chos rang bzhin med pa la ngang gis 'jug pa ni /
NK086(lu)001:1065: chos nyid ci yang ma yin pa'i gnad kyis cir
NK086(lu)001:1066: yang 'char du rung bas na ting nge 'dzin gyi
NK086(lu)001:1067: ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub pas ci yang
NK086(lu)001:1068: min pa'i chos nyid mngon du rig par 'gyur ba
NK086(lu)001:1069: pa'i phyir te de ltar rgyu mtshan bzhi'o //
NK086(lu)001:1070: rdo rje'i theg pa zhes pa'i don ni /
NK086(lu)001:1071: mtshan nyid pa ltar kun rdzob sgyu ma'i chos la blang dor du spyod pa ma yin gyi /
NK086(lu)001:1072: kun rdzob don dam dbyer med par spyod cing sgo
NK086(lu)001:1073: gsum rdo rje gsum gyi rang bzhin du sbyor bas
NK086(lu)001:1074: ye nas blang dor med par sangs rgyas pa'i bdag
NK086(lu)001:1075: nyid rdo rje lta bu dbyer mi phyed pa'i don
NK086(lu)001:1076: dang ldan pa'i theg pa la rdo rje'i theg pa
NK086(lu)001:1078: 'bras bu'i theg pa ni theg pa gzhan nas rang
NK086(lu)001:1079: gi lam de nyid nyams su blang ba'i mthus skye
NK086(lu)001:1080: ba gzhan na 'bras bu chos sku stobs dang mi
NK086(lu)001:1081: 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i bdag nyid can du grags
NK086(lu)001:1082: pa de gdod thob byar 'dod la /
NK086(lu)001:1083: 'dir gzhan nyid nas 'bras bu'i ngo bor gnas shing
NK086(lu)001:1084: 'bras bu de nyid da lta nas lam du byed
NK086(lu)001:1085: pa'i phyir de skad du brjod pa'o //
NK086(lu)001:1086: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i theg pa gang zhe na /
NK086(lu)001:1087: gang dang yang mi mnyam pa ni mthar thug 'bras
NK086(lu)001:1088: bu'i sku brnyes pa dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams
NK086(lu)001:1089: te / gsang sngags 'dzin pa ni de dag gi
NK086(lu)001:1090: dgongs spyod dang mnyam pa'i phyir de skad ces bya'o
NK086(lu)001:1091: te / // de ltar khyad par 'phags pa de yi phyir na ye shes 'char lugs gsum te /
NK086(lu)001:1092: rgyu mtshan nyid kyi theg ba gsum gyi ye shes
NK086(lu)001:1093: 'char lugs ye shes chen po rgyab nas 'char ba
NK086(lu)001:1094: zhes bya ste / ji ltar na chu rnyogs pa
NK086(lu)001:1095: dwangs pa las gzugs brnyan 'char ba ltar rnam par
NK086(lu)001:1096: mi rtog pa la yun ring gnas par byas pas
NK086(lu)001:1097: rim gyis nyon mongs pa'i rnam rtog snyigs ma dngas
NK086(lu)001:1098: nas sa bcu'i mthar kun du 'od kyi sa la
NK086(lu)001:1099: sangs rgyas nas thams cad mkhyen par 'dod pa ni
NK086(lu)001:1100: zhes bya ste / / ye shes de lta bu
NK086(lu)001:1101: bskal pa grangs med gsum sogs nas phyis 'byung bar
NK086(lu)001:1102: 'bod pas ye shes rgyab nas 'char ba zhes bya'o
NK086(lu)001:1103: zhes bya ste / / // sngags phyi rgyud sde
NK086(lu)001:1104: gsum ni ye shes chen po mdun nas 'char ba
NK086(lu)001:1105: zhes bya ste / / // zhes bya ste /
NK086(lu)001:1106: da lta nyid du 'og min na bzhugs pa'i rgyal
NK086(lu)001:1107: ba rigs gsum mam rigs lnga 'khor bcas spyan drangs
NK086(lu)001:1108: te mdun mkha' sogs su bzhugs pa la phyag 'tshal
NK086(lu)001:1109: zhing mchod pa phul la dngos grub nod par byas
NK086(lu)001:1110: pas lha des dngos grub ster bar lta zhing /
NK086(lu)001:1111: bdag dang lha dang rdzas kyi rten 'brel zab mo'i thabs kyis bsgrub pas /
NK086(lu)001:1112: mi tshe bdun dang bcu drug la sogs pas mthar
NK086(lu)001:1113: thug gi 'bras bu 'grub par 'dod pa de dag
NK086(lu)001:1114: gi lam rgyu mtshan nyid kyi theg pa las 'bras
NK086(lu)001:1115: bu thob pa la myur ba'i phyir ye shes mdun
NK086(lu)001:1117: sngags nang pa thabs kyi theg pa gsum ni ye
NK086(lu)001:1118: shes chen po khong nas 'char ba zhes bya ste
NK086(lu)001:1119: / chos thams cad rang byung gi ye shes bdag nyid chen po'i ngang las ma 'das pas na /
NK086(lu)001:1120: rang gi sems nyid bde ba chen po'i de nyid
NK086(lu)001:1121: la gnas bzhin du sangs rgyas gzhan du tshol mi
NK086(lu)001:1122: dgos par tshe 'di nyid la mngon du 'char bas
NK086(lu)001:1123: na ye shes khong nas 'char ba zhes bya'o //
NK086(lu)001:1124: tshul des na 'di ltar pha rol du phyin pa'i
NK086(lu)001:1125: theg pa las bshad pa'i lam thams cad kyi gtso
NK086(lu)001:1126: bo rnam par mi rtogs pa'i ye shes zhes bya
NK086(lu)001:1127: ba / yul gang du'ang mi rtogs /
NK086(lu)001:1128: sems kyi 'dzin pa gang yang med pa /
NK086(lu)001:1129: 'du byed kyi 'jug pa thams cad dang bral ba
NK086(lu)001:1130: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don zab
NK086(lu)001:1131: mo la gnas pa'i tshul de nyid /
NK086(lu)001:1132: theg pa 'og ma pa dag gis dang por spros
NK086(lu)001:1133: pa dang bral ba'i chos nyid de lta bu rnam
NK086(lu)001:1134: par rtog pa'i spyod yul du don spyi'i tshul gyis
NK086(lu)001:1135: gtan la phab nas tshogs mtha' yas pa bsags pa
NK086(lu)001:1136: dang 'brel ba'i stobs kyis bzod ring mo zhig na
NK086(lu)001:1137: mngon du byed pa'i ye shes skyed nus pa ni
NK086(lu)001:1138: rgyu'i theg pa'i gzhung gi 'dod tshul yin la /
NK086(lu)001:1139: sngags kyi theg pa 'dir ni gsang sngags kyi de
NK086(lu)001:1140: kho na nyid sems kyi dkyil 'khor rang bzhin gyis
NK086(lu)001:1141: 'od gsal ba rnam par rtog pa mtha' dag gis
NK086(lu)001:1143: blos byas kyi bsgom pas ji ltar 'bad kyang ji
NK086(lu)001:1144: lta ba bzhin du mthong babar mi nus pa de
NK086(lu)001:1145: / rang bzhin bsal bzhag med pa gdod ma'i chos
NK086(lu)001:1146: nyid kyi gnad las mthong bar byed pa'i man ngag
NK086(lu)001:1147: zab mo bstan pa'i phyir 'di lta bu'i thabs ni
NK086(lu)001:1148: sngags bla med kyi gzhung na yod kyi mdo lam
NK086(lu)001:1149: na med pas sngags kyi lam khyad par du 'phags
NK086(lu)001:1150: / pa yin no // de lta bu'i rang byung
NK086(lu)001:1151: gi ye shes nyid la rim dang cig char du
NK086(lu)001:1152: 'jug pa'i thabs kyi man ngag gi cha nas bskyed
NK086(lu)001:1153: rdzogs rdzogs chen gsum du rnam par bzhag pa yin
NK086(lu)001:1154: / pa yin no // no // 'o na de
NK086(lu)001:1155: ltar lam la khyad bar yod pa'i phyir rgyu dang
NK086(lu)001:1156: 'bras bu'i theg pa'i thob bya 'bras bu la khyad
NK086(lu)001:1157: yod dam snyam na de med de /
NK086(lu)001:1158: mthar thug gi 'bras bu sangs rgyas kyi ye shes nyid thob par 'dra yang /
NK086(lu)001:1159: sngags ni thabs shes khyad par du 'phags bas mthar
NK086(lu)001:1160: 'bras tshe 'dir mngon du byed pa myur lam nyid
NK086(lu)001:1161: yin la lam gzhan gyis de ltar mi nus pa
NK086(lu)001:1162: yin no // de skad du yang gsang sngags bka' yi tha ram las /
NK086(lu)001:1163: 'o na 'bras bu la khyad par rung ngam zhe na /
NK086(lu)001:1164: 'bras bu yang dag pa'i don du gcig mod kyang /
NK086(lu)001:1165: gsang sngags ni thabs khyad par can mang ba dang
NK086(lu)001:1166: thogs pa med pas 'bras bu'i mchog yin pas na
NK086(lu)001:1167: / tshe 'di nyid du dgra gsum sod pas /
NK086(lu)001:1168: sa nas sar sbyang bgrod mi dgos te /
NK086(lu)001:1169: phung po lnga nyid rgyal ba rigs lngar shes pas
NK086(lu)001:1170: sangs rgyas gzhan nas thob tu med par yid ches
NK086(lu)001:1171: pa lags so // zhes gsungs so //
NK086(lu)001:1172: gnyis pa khyad par de ldan gyi sngags nang pa'i grub mtha' bshad pa la /
NK086(lu)001:1173: thun mong spyi yi grub mtha' bstan pa /
NK086(lu)001:1174: thun min so so'i grub mtha' bshad pa /
NK086(lu)001:1175: de dag gi nyams len 'gags su bsdu ba gsum las /
NK086(lu)001:1176: dang po sngags nang pa thabs kyi theg pa thams
NK086(lu)001:1177: cad thun mong du snang srid ye sangs rgyas pa'i
NK086(lu)001:1178: rang bzhin du lta ba yin la tshul de dang
NK086(lu)001:1179: mtshungs par sgom pa dang spyod pa dang dbang la
NK086(lu)001:1180: sogs pa thams cad kyang don gcig gi gnad la
NK086(lu)001:1181: 'du bar shes par bya dgos pas 'di ltar nges
NK086(lu)001:1182: par bya ste / gang zhe na gsang sngags bka' yi tha ram las /
NK086(lu)001:1183: lta ba bye brag tu bshad pa'i skabs su gsungs pa /
NK086(lu)001:1184: gsang sngags pa'i gzhung gis chos thams cad ye nas
NK086(lu)001:1185: lha yin no zhes grags pa de ji ltar bsgrub
NK086(lu)001:1186: par bya na / lung dang rig pa man ngag gsum gyis bsgrub par bya ste /
NK086(lu)001:1187: de yang dang po lung ni sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor gyi rgyud phyi ma dang /
NK086(lu)001:1189: sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba sogs las phung po nyid sangs
NK086(lu)001:1190: rgyas su ye nas gnas pa'i lung gis grub cing
NK086(lu)001:1191: / lung gi dgongs pa de bzhin du sngon gyi
NK086(lu)001:1192: mkha' shing grub pa'i rig 'dzin rnams kyis dbang gis
NK086(lu)001:1193: smin par byas pa'i gang zag la zhal nas snyan
NK086(lu)001:1194: du brgyud pa'i man ngag las kyang de ltar gsal
NK086(lu)001:1195: por gtan la phab pa yin no zhes dang /
NK086(lu)001:1196: de ltar lung dang man ngag med par gsang sngags
NK086(lu)001:1197: gtan la dbab mi nus pas na sgrub byed lung
NK086(lu)001:1198: gi rgyab skyor dang bcas te rgya cher gsungs pa
NK086(lu)001:1199: dang / yang don de lta bu la rig pas
NK086(lu)001:1200: mi gnod pa'i tshul gsung pa lha zhes pa chos
NK086(lu)001:1203: de'i dbang gis snang ba'i mtshan ma'i sku rnams la thun mong du grags pa yin la /
NK086(lu)001:1204: de lta na chos thams cad don dam spros pa
NK086(lu)001:1205: dang bral ba'i chos nyid kyi rang bzhin du dbyer
NK086(lu)001:1206: med pa dang / kun rdzob sgyu ma lta bur
NK086(lu)001:1207: yang snang ba rnams rang bzhin gcig tu nges pa
NK086(lu)001:1208: med pa dang / med pa ni / 'gro ba
NK086(lu)001:1209: rnams kyi rang snang dmyal ba'i tsha grang yi dwags
NK086(lu)001:1210: kyi rnag khrag la sogs pa ma dag pa'i snang
NK086(lu)001:1211: med pa dang / med pa ni / ba dang
NK086(lu)001:1212: / rig pa 'dzin pa sogs rgyud dag pa rnams
NK086(lu)001:1213: la lha'i dkyil 'khor du snang ba ste /
NK086(lu)001:1214: de ltar dag ma dag gi snang ba sna tshogs
NK086(lu)001:1215: su snang ba yod pa ni dgag tu med la
NK086(lu)001:1216: / de thams cad snang ba tsam du 'dra yang snang ba gang dam par gzung zhe na /
NK086(lu)001:1217: lha'i dkyil 'khor du snang ba 'di dam par gzung bar bya ste /
NK086(lu)001:1218: don dam pa thob cing mi bslu ba'i phyir ro //
NK086(lu)001:1219: zhes gsungs pa 'dis snang ba lhar bsgrub pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:1220: gzhan yang rang byung gi ye shes su ye nas gnas pa'i phyir dang /
NK086(lu)001:1221: rang snang tsam las gzhan du med la sgrib pa
NK086(lu)001:1222: dang bral ba'i ye shes kyi snang ba mi bslu
NK086(lu)001:1223: ba'i phyir de tshad mar gzung dgos pa'i phyir na
NK086(lu)001:1224: yul can ye shes su sgrub pa'i gnad log rtog
NK086(lu)001:1225: gi rtsod spong dang bcas pa legs par bstan pa
NK086(lu)001:1226: ni gzhung de nyid du blta bar bya ste /
NK086(lu)001:1227: 'di dag gi don gnad mdo tsam ni gsang ba
NK086(lu)001:1228: snying po'i spyi don du bshad zin pas 'dir rgyas
NK086(lu)001:1229: par mi spro'o // gzhan yang lung 'di nyid las /
NK086(lu)001:1230: yang gsang sngags rnal 'byor chen po'i gzhung gis chos
NK086(lu)001:1231: thams cad sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i zhing khams su
NK086(lu)001:1232: sangs rgyas shing / ye shes rang snang gi dkyil
NK086(lu)001:1233: 'khor yin par 'dod la rang bzhin dang gzugs brnyan
NK086(lu)001:1234: dang ting nge 'dzin kyang dbyer med pa yin no
NK086(lu)001:1235: zhes grags pa de yang ji ltar sgrub par bya
NK086(lu)001:1236: sangs rgyas shing / zhe dang / lung man ngag
NK086(lu)001:1237: rig pa gsum gyis gtan la dbab par bya ste
NK086(lu)001:1238: zhes de'i don re re bzhin du rgya cher bstan
NK086(lu)001:1239: sangs rgyas shing / zhe dang / pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:1240: yang gsang sngags nang pa'i gzhung gis rnam pa thams
NK086(lu)001:1241: cad sangs rgyas pa'i sku nyid du 'dod pa ste
NK086(lu)001:1242: gzhi tsam dang rgyu tsam du ma yin par ngo
NK086(lu)001:1244: de yang tshul ji ltar 'dod na /
NK086(lu)001:1245: snod bcud kyis bsdus pa'i 'jig rten gyi chos cir
NK086(lu)001:1246: yang snang ba de dag sangs rgyas pa'i sku yin
NK086(lu)001:1247: / sku mdog dang phyag mtshan dang dpe byad dang
NK086(lu)001:1248: yon tan dang cho 'phrul du snang ba'i sangs rgyas
NK086(lu)001:1249: / dang / snod bcud kyis bsdus pa'i chos su
NK086(lu)001:1250: snang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi skur bye brag phye ba
NK086(lu)001:1252: de ltar na gcig gis ni 'gro ba 'dren par nus pa yin la /
NK086(lu)001:1253: gcig gis ni de ltar ma yin pas ga la mtshungs she na /
NK086(lu)001:1254: lan du las dag pa rnams la ni gang gis kyang don byed par nus la /
NK086(lu)001:1255: las ma dag pa rnams lan gang gis kyang don
NK086(lu)001:1256: byed par nus pa ma yin bas bye brag tu
NK086(lu)001:1258: 'o na snang ba rnams ci'i phyir sangs rgyas yin
NK086(lu)001:1259: zhe na rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro
NK086(lu)001:1260: // zhes sogs lung dang rig pa'i sgo nas rgya cher gsungs so //
NK086(lu)001:1261: des na o rgyan pad+ma 'byung gnas sogs grub pa'i
NK086(lu)001:1262: rig 'dzin chen po bzhi'i dgongs nyams gcig tu bsdur
NK086(lu)001:1263: nas brtsams pa bka' brgyad bde gshegs 'dus pa'i chos
NK086(lu)001:1264: sde gsang sngags bka' yi tha ram rin po che'i
NK086(lu)001:1265: lde'u mig 'di na snang ba lhar bsgrub pa'i lung
NK086(lu)001:1266: rig man ngag zab mo sangs rgyas lag bcangs ma
NK086(lu)001:1267: 'di nyid mngon du bzhugs bzhin pa 'di la sngags
NK086(lu)001:1268: rnying ma thams cad kyis lta rtog 'them pa cis
NK086(lu)001:1269: kyang gal che'o // de ltar lta ba nyid legs par gtan la pheb nas /
NK086(lu)001:1270: bskyed rdzogs gang gi sgor 'jug kyang lta bas thag
NK086(lu)001:1271: bcad spyod pas la dor rdo rje rol pa'i rtags
NK086(lu)001:1272: la gnas pa gsum gyis nyams su len te /
NK086(lu)001:1273: ma h+aa yo ga ltar na chos thams cad sku
NK086(lu)001:1274: gsung thugs yon tan phrin las lnga'i che ba'i bdag
NK086(lu)001:1275: nyid kyi lhar lta bas thag bcad /
NK086(lu)001:1276: lta ba de lta bu'i ngang nas blang dor med
NK086(lu)001:1277: pa'i spyod pas sbyor sgrol ci byas kyang nyon mongs
NK086(lu)001:1278: dang bag chags kyis mi gos pa'i phyir spyod pa
NK086(lu)001:1279: de lta bu ni la dor ba'i thabs su bstan
NK086(lu)001:1280: / rol pa'i rtags la gnas pa ni grub pa'i
NK086(lu)001:1281: mtha' de las mi 'da' bar thabs shes gnyis su
NK086(lu)001:1282: med pa'i gding gis sa bzung ba'o //
NK086(lu)001:1283: de bzhin du a nu dang a ti gnyis kyi
NK086(lu)001:1284: lta spyod rol rtags gsum kyang bka' yi tha ram
NK086(lu)001:1286: gnyis pa thun min so so'i grub mtha' bshad pa
NK086(lu)001:1287: la sngags nang pa bla med de la'ang bskyed pa
NK086(lu)001:1288: ma h+aa yo ga /rdzogs pa a nu yo ga
NK086(lu)001:1289: / rdzogs pa chen po a ti yo ga ste nang rgyud sde gsum du yod pa las /
NK086(lu)001:1290: dang po ma h+aa yo ga de la 'ang tan+t+ra
NK086(lu)001:1291: chen po sde bco brgyad kyi bstan don rgyud sde
NK086(lu)001:1292: dang 'jam dpal sku la sogs pa'i rgyud kyis bstan
NK086(lu)001:1293: don sgrub sde gnyis su yod la /
NK086(lu)001:1294: 'dir de dag thun mong gi grub mtha' bshad pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:1295: sgrub sde'i rnam grangs bye brag tu bshad pa gnyis kyi dang po /
NK086(lu)001:1296: ma h+aa yo ga pa'i lta ba ni kun rdzob
NK086(lu)001:1297: kyi chos thams cad dag pa lha'i dkyil 'khor du
NK086(lu)001:1298: lta zhing / de dag don dam par gdod ma'i
NK086(lu)001:1299: chos dbyings dang gnyis su med pa bden pa dbyer
NK086(lu)001:1300: med blo'i spyod yul dang bral bas gtan la 'bebs
NK086(lu)001:1301: lta zhing / pa'o // bsgom pa ni ting nge
NK086(lu)001:1302: 'dzin rnam pa gsum yan lag dang bcas pa'i tshul
NK086(lu)001:1303: gyis snang srid lha'i dkyil 'khor du 'char ba'i bskyed
NK086(lu)001:1304: rim la gtso bor lam du byed pa'o //
NK086(lu)001:1305: spyod pa ni gang shar blang dor med pa'i ngang
NK086(lu)001:1306: nas thabs la mkhas pa'i spyod pa khyad par can
NK086(lu)001:1307: sbyor sgrol la sogs pa dang du len pa'o //
NK086(lu)001:1308: 'bras bu tshe 'di la rig 'dzin bzhi'i lam bgrod
NK086(lu)001:1309: de ye ge 'khor lo tshogs chen gyi sa la
NK086(lu)001:1310: sangs rgyas par 'dod pa yin no //
NK086(lu)001:1311: de yang gsang sngags kyi gzhung na lha bsgom pa
NK086(lu)001:1312: dang sngags bzla ba dang dkyil 'khor 'bri ba dang
NK086(lu)001:1313: dbang bskur ba la sogs pa bslab pa'i mtha' bcu
NK086(lu)001:1314: po thams cad spros bcas kyi sgo nas nyams su
NK086(lu)001:1315: len pa'i gang zag snang ba yul gyi blo can
NK086(lu)001:1316: rnams kyis gtso bor bskyed rim la brten te sgrub
NK086(lu)001:1317: cing bskyed pa'i rim pa'i ting 'dzin brtan po'i sgo
NK086(lu)001:1318: nas rdzogs rim drangs te bskyed rdzogs zung 'jug gi
NK086(lu)001:1319: tshul la 'jug pa rnams kyi lam gnad thams cad
NK086(lu)001:1320: ma h+aa yo ga'i snang ba lhar bsgrub pa'i gnad
NK086(lu)001:1321: la thug pa yin gyi de dang mi ldan na
NK086(lu)001:1322: lam gyi gzugs brnyan du 'gyur ro //
NK086(lu)001:1323: gnyis pa bye brag tu sgrub sde'i rnam grangs bshad pas /
NK086(lu)001:1324: dam can srog gi sgrub pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:1326: ngan sngags sgrub pa gsum las /
NK086(lu)001:1327: dang po la 'jig rten las 'das pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:1328: ma 'das pa'i srog sgrub pa gnyis las /
NK086(lu)001:1329: dang po 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lha thams cad rigs drug du 'dus te /
NK086(lu)001:1330: 'jam dpal sku'i sgrub pa nas ma mo rbod gtong
