NK086(lu)001:1331: gi sgrub pa'i bar gsang ba sde drug tu grags
NK086(lu)001:1332: pa rnams so // de dag re re la'ang sgrub
NK086(lu)001:1333: thabs kyi rnam grangs bsam gyis mi khyab kyang 'jam
NK086(lu)001:1334: dpal sku'i sgrub pa thams cad ya m+aan+ta ka'i srog
NK086(lu)001:1335: pa rnams so // tu 'dus / pad+ma gsung gi
NK086(lu)001:1336: sgrub pa thams cad rta mgrin gyi srog tu 'dus
NK086(lu)001:1337: pa rnams so // tu 'dus / / yang dag thams cad he ru ka'i srog tu 'dus /
NK086(lu)001:1338: bdud rtsi thams cad che mchog gi srog tu 'dus /
NK086(lu)001:1339: phur pa thams cad rdo rje gzhon nu'i srog tu 'dus /
NK086(lu)001:1340: ma mo thams cad kun tu bzang mo'i srog tu 'dus so //
NK086(lu)001:1341: gnyis pa 'jig rten pa'i srog sgrub pa thams cad
NK086(lu)001:1342: kyang lha ma srid sde brgyad kyi srog tu 'dus
NK086(lu)001:1343: la / de yang pho rgyud mo rgyud gnyis su 'dus so //
NK086(lu)001:1344: de ltar 'das ma 'das kyi lha gang gi srog bsgrub kyang /
NK086(lu)001:1345: phyi nang gsang ba'i sgrub lugs gsum ste /
NK086(lu)001:1346: phyi rdzas la brten te mchod rten rbod gtong gi
NK086(lu)001:1347: tshul du bsgrub pas las dang smon lam la sogs
NK086(lu)001:1348: pa'i mthu bzhin dngos grub sna tshogs ji ltar bsam
NK086(lu)001:1350: nang sngags dang ting nge 'dzin gyis sgrub pa ste /
NK086(lu)001:1351: de yang snying po sngags kyis rgyud bskul bas lha de nyid rang dbang med par nye ba dang /
NK086(lu)001:1352: ting nge 'dzin mi gtong bas nam zhig las su
NK086(lu)001:1353: rung nas sgrub pa'i lha de nyid dngos su grub
NK086(lu)001:1354: te dbang du gyur pa na /
NK086(lu)001:1355: mjug drag sngags dang ngan sngags kyis las la sbyar
NK086(lu)001:1356: bas dgra bgegs 'dul ba sogs las thams cad grub
NK086(lu)001:1357: pa'o // gsang ba ltar sgrub pa ni shes rab dang ting 'dzin las su rung bas na /
NK086(lu)001:1358: shes rab kyis cho ga thams cad rang sems kyi
NK086(lu)001:1359: rol par shes shing ting nge 'dzin gyis rang dbang
NK086(lu)001:1360: du bsgyur btub pa'i dus na /
NK086(lu)001:1361: sems kyi chos nyid rang byung gi ye shes rgyun
NK086(lu)001:1362: mi 'chad pa la dbang 'byor nas gzhan dbang las
NK086(lu)001:1363: dang nyon mongs pa'i mi bardzi ba'i tshe srog ye
NK086(lu)001:1364: shes chen por sgrub pa zhes bya'o //
NK086(lu)001:1365: 'di dag gi gnad ni srog gi skabs su gdod bshad pas shes la /
NK086(lu)001:1366: don du ye shes dang 'jig rten gyi lha rnams
NK086(lu)001:1367: kyi srog bsgrub nas dngos grub rang dbang du byed
NK086(lu)001:1368: pa'i gnad kyi man ngag rnams sgrub sde'i chos skor
NK086(lu)001:1369: las gsal zhing zab par bstan te /
NK086(lu)001:1370: ji ltar na lung gi sdebs lnga dang /
NK086(lu)001:1371: sgrub thabs kyi spyir lugs lnga las bshad pa ltar
NK086(lu)001:1372: lag len gnad du khel par byed pa gdams pa'i
NK086(lu)001:1373: man ngag gi sgo nas chud mi za bar nor
NK086(lu)001:1374: bu lag gtong gi tshul du dngos grub 'grub pa
NK086(lu)001:1375: yin no // gnyis pa drag sngags kyi sgrub pa la yang gnyis te /
NK086(lu)001:1376: gsang sngags kyi drag sngags dang /
NK086(lu)001:1378: dang po la 'jam dpal 'khor bcas kyi drag sngags /
NK086(lu)001:1379: khrag 'thung gi lha tshogs kyi drag sngags /
NK086(lu)001:1380: che mchog gi lha tshogs kyi drag sngags /
NK086(lu)001:1381: pad+ma dbang chen gyi drag sngags /
NK086(lu)001:1385: dmod pa'i drag sngags la dregs pa bco brgyad dam /
NK086(lu)001:1386: dregs pa'i rigs stong phrag brgyad bcu'i drag sngags so //
NK086(lu)001:1387: gsum pa ngan sngags kyi sgrub pa yang gnyis te /
NK086(lu)001:1388: phyi snod 'joms byed sbyor ba nag po'i ngan sngags dang /
NK086(lu)001:1389: nang bcud sems can 'joms byed sbyor ba nag po'i ngan sngags gnyis so //
NK086(lu)001:1390: de las gnyis pa nang gi ngan sngags de la /
NK086(lu)001:1391: ye shes lha'i ngan sngags dang /
NK086(lu)001:1392: lha ma srin sde brgyad kyi ngan sngags gnyis yod do //
NK086(lu)001:1393: gnyis pa lung a nu yo ga'i lta ba ni lung gi skor la brten nas /
NK086(lu)001:1394: snang ba'i cha ye nas dag pa kun tu bzang
NK086(lu)001:1395: po rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor dang
NK086(lu)001:1396: / de'i stong cha ni kun tu bzang mo ye
NK086(lu)001:1397: ji bzhin pa'i dkyil 'khor te dbyings rig de gnyis
NK086(lu)001:1398: kyang so so ma yin tha mi dad du dbyer
NK086(lu)001:1399: med pa ni sras bde ba chen po byang chub
NK086(lu)001:1400: sems kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ste /
NK086(lu)001:1401: 'di na snang srid kyi chos thams cad kyi gnad
NK086(lu)001:1402: lugs dag mnyam bde ba chen po ste lung gzhan
NK086(lu)001:1403: las kun gzhi rgyu yi rgyu dang bya ba rgyu'i
NK086(lu)001:1405: gzhi de las g.yos kyang gnyis 'dzin gyis bslad pa
NK086(lu)001:1406: can la rigs drug so so'i lus dang ngag dang
NK086(lu)001:1407: sems kyi rnam pa ris chad du snang ba'i tshe
NK086(lu)001:1408: na rang snang gis dum bur bcing ba'i lus kyi
NK086(lu)001:1409: dbus su bum nang gi nam mkha' ltar kun rdzob
NK086(lu)001:1410: rgyu yi thig le rnams la brten nas don dam
NK086(lu)001:1411: 'od gsal byang chub sems kyi theg le yang rang
NK086(lu)001:1412: gi ngo bo cha med kun 'gro khyab pa'i bdag
NK086(lu)001:1413: nyid yin yang de sems kyi chos nyid bri gang
NK086(lu)001:1414: bral ba nyid yin pa'i phyir /
NK086(lu)001:1415: sems can gang na snang ba der chos can sgo
NK086(lu)001:1416: gsum gyi dbang gis byang chub sems kyi thig le
NK086(lu)001:1417: de yang der snying po'i tshul du 'od dang gdangs
NK086(lu)001:1418: kyi rnam par snang ba'ang yod la /
NK086(lu)001:1419: snang yang cha dang dbyibs dang mdog la sogs pa'i
NK086(lu)001:1420: mtshan ma'i rnam pas gos pa'ang med de bsam gyis
NK086(lu)001:1421: mi khyab pa'i ye shes rnam pa thams cad pa
NK086(lu)001:1423: ji ltar gnas na gdod ma'i ye shes byang chub
NK086(lu)001:1424: kyi sems nam mkha' ltar 'pho 'gyur med kyang de
NK086(lu)001:1425: stong pa phyang chad min par 'od lnga la sogs
NK086(lu)001:1426: pa'i 'char gzhi rig gdangs kyi cha yod pas de'i
NK086(lu)001:1427: rtsal snang ba la gnyis 'dzin zhugs pa'i dbang gis
NK086(lu)001:1428: rtsal nyid bskyod byed las kyi rlung dang /
NK086(lu)001:1429: phra ba'i kun rtogs zung du 'grogs ba'i rnam par
NK086(lu)001:1430: shar ba las khu rdul rlung gsum gyis byed las
NK086(lu)001:1431: snang ba gsum dang 'grogs ba'i rnam shes je rags
NK086(lu)001:1432: su song ba las khams gsum gyi bsdus pa'i sgo
NK086(lu)001:1433: gsum byung te / de las rags ba'i lus dang
NK086(lu)001:1434: lnga pa 'dod pa'i gnas 'dir khams drug dang ldan
NK086(lu)001:1435: pa'i mi lus lta bu la mtshon pa /
NK086(lu)001:1436: phra ba kun gzhi'i rnam shes dang srog gi lung
NK086(lu)001:1437: 'grogs pa pha ma'i khams dkar dmar gyi dbus su
NK086(lu)001:1438: son pa'i rlung sems je rags su song ba'i byed
NK086(lu)001:1439: las kyis dbu ma la sogs pa rtsa gtso mo
NK086(lu)001:1440: gsum dang por chags pa nas gzung te mthar rtsa
NK086(lu)001:1441: yi rigs phra rags thams cad chags pa la brten
NK086(lu)001:1442: nas gnas skabs bcu'i tshul gyis lus yongs su rdzogs
NK086(lu)001:1443: par grub cing / lus de'i gnas lnga'i 'khor lo
NK086(lu)001:1444: lnga la sogs pa'i rtsa yi nang na rtsa ba
NK086(lu)001:1445: dang yan lag gi lung dang thig le phra rags
NK086(lu)001:1446: kyi khams rnams gnas pa'i byed las la brten nas
NK086(lu)001:1447: nang du kun rtog sna tshogs bskyed pa dang phyi
NK086(lu)001:1448: rol du snang ba sna tshogs 'char bar byed pas
NK086(lu)001:1449: par grub cing / na / ji ltar phyi rol
NK086(lu)001:1450: gyi snang ba rnams ji lta ba de bzhin du
NK086(lu)001:1451: nang lus kyi cha la de dag snang ba'i sa
NK086(lu)001:1452: bon nam byed pa tshang ba'ang yod de /
NK086(lu)001:1453: gal te med na phyi rol gyi snang ba 'di thams cad kyang mi snang ste /
NK086(lu)001:1454: yul gcig la'ang bzang ngan dang rgya che chung sogs
NK086(lu)001:1455: sna tshogs su snang ba yod ba ni chu gcig
NK086(lu)001:1456: la ngan song gsum dang mi dang 'dod lha dang
NK086(lu)001:1457: nam mkha' mtha' yas pa'i sems can drug gis bltas
NK086(lu)001:1459: 'di ltar nang gi rtsa rlung thig le 'di dag
NK086(lu)001:1460: lam du slong na dag pa ye shes kyi snang
NK086(lu)001:1461: ba dang / lam du ma long na ma dag 'khrul pa'i snang ba 'char bar shes nas /
NK086(lu)001:1462: phyi spros bcas kyi bskyed rim sogs la mi ltos
NK086(lu)001:1463: par rdo rje lus kyi rtsa rlung thig le la
NK086(lu)001:1464: gnad du bsnun pa'i man ngag gi sgo nas /
NK086(lu)001:1465: rags pa'i 'gyur ba thams cad thog mar gang las
NK086(lu)001:1466: byung ba 'gyur med ye shes kyi dbu ma'i dbyings
NK086(lu)001:1467: su bstim pas sems nyid bde chen byang chub sems
NK086(lu)001:1468: kyi dkyil 'khor de nyid lus thabs kyi rgyud la
NK086(lu)001:1469: lam du byas ba las mngon du 'char bar shes
NK086(lu)001:1470: pa 'di ni a nu yo ga ba'i lta ba
NK086(lu)001:1471: yin te / gnad 'di ma rtogs na lus kyi
NK086(lu)001:1472: rtsa rlung thig le lam du byas pa kho nas
NK086(lu)001:1473: 'khrus snang 'gag cing ye shes kyi snang ba skyed
NK086(lu)001:1474: nas sangs rgyas su 'grub pa'i gnad mi shes pas
NK086(lu)001:1475: mtshan bcas kyi rdzogs rim ji snyed pa kun gyi
NK086(lu)001:1476: gnad 'di la mthar thug par shes par bya'o //
NK086(lu)001:1477: de ltar shes nas sgom pa'i rim pa ni dbang
NK086(lu)001:1478: bzhi dang rjes su 'brel ba'i lta ba bzhi dang
NK086(lu)001:1479: grub mtha' bzhi la sogs pa blo che chung gi
NK086(lu)001:1480: rtsal 'phang bzhin nyams su blang du yod pa ni
NK086(lu)001:1481: he ru ka'i gal po las bstan pa bzhin du
NK086(lu)001:1482: yin la / de'i nang nas kyang gsang sher gyi
NK086(lu)001:1483: nyams len rang lus dang gzhan lus thabs ldan gyi
NK086(lu)001:1484: rnal 'byor gtso bor lam du byed pa yin cing
NK086(lu)001:1485: yin la / / de'i nyams len gyi rim pa
NK086(lu)001:1486: la'ang rgyu dang sgrub thabs so so'i man ngag gi
NK086(lu)001:1487: dbang gis sna tshogs su byung yang /
NK086(lu)001:1488: don la las rlung dbu mar bstim nas gnyug ma
NK086(lu)001:1489: byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug bar mthun
NK086(lu)001:1490: bas na / 'di ltar lus kyi dbus su gtso
NK086(lu)001:1491: mo gsum dang 'khor lo lngar brten pa'i rlung khams
NK086(lu)001:1492: kyi rim ba sna tshogs yod pas de so sor
NK086(lu)001:1493: gnad du bsnun pa las ye shes 'char ba'i thabs
NK086(lu)001:1494: kyang sna tshogs su yod la de kun gyi rtsa
NK086(lu)001:1495: bas na / ba ni / snying ga'i rtsa 'dab
NK086(lu)001:1496: brgyad kyi gsum ni chos nyid kyi rtsa zhes bya
NK086(lu)001:1497: bas na / ba ni / / gsum ni ye shes kyi rtsa zhes bya /
NK086(lu)001:1498: gcig ni rang rgyud kyi rtsa zhes bya /
NK086(lu)001:1499: gcig ni yon tan gyi rtsa zhes bya ste de ltar brgyad do //
NK086(lu)001:1500: chos nyid kyi rtsa la 'od ser po zlum po gnas shing /
NK086(lu)001:1501: de la dag pa ye shes kyi bag chags rnams bsog pa'i rten snying po dang /
NK086(lu)001:1502: ma dag pa 'khor ba'i dus kyi lha min dang
NK086(lu)001:1503: byos song du skye ba'i bag chags bsog pa'i rten
NK086(lu)001:1504: sa bon su dang tri gnas shing 'od ser po
NK086(lu)001:1505: de la brten nas kun gzhi'i rnam shes gnas so
NK086(lu)001:1506: // ye shes kyi rtsa la 'od mthing ka sbrul
NK086(lu)001:1507: dkyus pa 'dra ba la dag pa'i snying po h+aum
NK086(lu)001:1508: dang ma dag pa lha dang mi 'i sa bon
NK086(lu)001:1510: 'od de la yid kyi rnam shes gnas so //
NK086(lu)001:1511: rang rgyud kyi rtsa la 'od dmar po zla gam
NK086(lu)001:1512: la dag pa'i snying po +aa dang ma dag pa
NK086(lu)001:1513: yi dwags dang dmyal ba'i sa bon pre dang du
NK086(lu)001:1514: gnas so // 'od de la brten nas nyon mongs pa can gyi yid gnas so //
NK086(lu)001:1515: yon tan gyi rtsa la 'od dmar nag gnas pa la brten nas sgo lnga'i rnam shes rgyu'o //
NK086(lu)001:1516: rtsa de rnams kyi dbus na rtsa gsum gnas te /
NK086(lu)001:1517: g.yas thabs kyi rtsa ste yi ge /
NK086(lu)001:1518: dbus yang dag ye shes kyi rtsa ste yi ge
NK086(lu)001:1519: +aah g.yon shes rab kyi rtsa ste yi ge h'u
NK086(lu)001:1520: gis mtshan pa'o // rtsa'i dwangs ma 'di dag ni
NK086(lu)001:1521: dbyibs dar dkar gyi skud pa lta bu rta rnga
NK086(lu)001:1522: bcur gshags pa'i spom phra tsam pa phan tshun spel
NK086(lu)001:1523: nas thag pa khugs su bran pa 'dra bar gnas
NK086(lu)001:1524: ste 'di ni sra ba'i khams shin tu phra ba'i
NK086(lu)001:1525: cha yin pas sa yi dwangs ma yin na /
NK086(lu)001:1526: stong pa chen po'i ye shes te khams gsum thams
NK086(lu)001:1527: cad dbyings rnam par dag pa'i ngang du ma gyur
NK086(lu)001:1528: pa med pa'i rten byed pa'o //
NK086(lu)001:1529: rtsa'i dwangs ma de la khrag gi dwangs ma mtshal
NK086(lu)001:1530: cog la ma lta bu gnas pa ni rags pa'i
NK086(lu)001:1531: phung po gdos pa can 'byung ba'i sa bon shin
NK086(lu)001:1532: tu phra ba chu khams kyi dwangs ma yin zhing
NK086(lu)001:1533: / de ni don du mnyam pa nyid kyi ye
NK086(lu)001:1534: shes kyi rten de thams cad bkol ba med pa'i
NK086(lu)001:1536: de la drod kyi dwangs ma me long nyi ma
NK086(lu)001:1537: la bzhag pa'i 'od kyi ngad tsam zhig gnas ste
NK086(lu)001:1538: / de ni rags pa'i phung po smin par byed
NK086(lu)001:1539: pa'i mi yi sa bon dwangs ma nyid yin la
NK086(lu)001:1540: / / 'di ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes
NK086(lu)001:1541: kyis thams cad bde ba chen po'i dbyings su rtogs
NK086(lu)001:1542: pa'i sgron mar gyur ba'ang yin no //
NK086(lu)001:1543: de nyid la dbus kyi dwangs ma gser sa 'og
NK086(lu)001:1544: na gnas pa'i rlangs pa tsam kha dog sna tshogs
NK086(lu)001:1545: pa can gnas pa ni rags phung gi rlung yang
NK086(lu)001:1546: zhing g.yo ba skyed pa'i rgyu phra ba mthar thug
NK086(lu)001:1548: 'dis bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyis bya ba
NK086(lu)001:1549: thams cad la 'jug pa 'byung ba'i rten byed do
NK086(lu)001:1550: // de'i dbus na nam mkha'i dwangs ma bar snang
NK086(lu)001:1551: sang sang po go 'byed pa'i rnam pa can du
NK086(lu)001:1552: // gnas la / de lta bu'i dwangs ma lnga
NK086(lu)001:1553: 'dus pa'i dbus na sems kyi dwangs ma byang chub
NK086(lu)001:1554: kyi sems ye shes snying po'i theg le chen po
NK086(lu)001:1555: // gnas la / bzhugs te / dpe ni gser
NK086(lu)001:1556: zhun ma'i nang du nor bu ke ke ru bcug
NK086(lu)001:1557: ba lta bu la kha dog ni nyi ma 'char
NK086(lu)001:1559: de ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes ste gsal
NK086(lu)001:1560: la go 'byed pa snang la rang bzhin med pa
NK086(lu)001:1561: nam mkha'i gzugs can de khyab pa chen po'i ye
NK086(lu)001:1562: shes nam mkha'i dngas ma ste thams cad yang dag
NK086(lu)001:1563: pa'i dbyings su gsal ba'i skabs 'byed pa'o //
NK086(lu)001:1564: de ltar yang brtag gnyis las //
NK086(lu)001:1565: ye shes chen po rang lus gnas //
NK086(lu)001:1566: rtog pa thams cad yang dag spang //
NK086(lu)001:1567: dngos po kun la khyab pa po //
NK086(lu)001:1568: lus gnas lus las ma skyes pa'o //
NK086(lu)001:1570: rtag tu snying la gnas pa yi //
NK086(lu)001:1571: thig le gcig la 'gyur ba med //
NK086(lu)001:1572: de sgom byed ba'i skyes bu la //
NK086(lu)001:1573: nges par ye shes skye bar 'gyur //
NK086(lu)001:1575: rdo rje me long gi rgyud las /
NK086(lu)001:1576: lus can snying la gang gnas pa //
NK086(lu)001:1577: rang byung zag med ye shes gzugs //
NK086(lu)001:1578: mi shig thig le bde chen po //
NK086(lu)001:1579: nam mkha' lta bur kun khyab pa //
NK086(lu)001:1580: mi gnas chos sku'i rang bzhin yin /
NK086(lu)001:1581: zhes pa la sogs rgyud rnams nas gsungs pa'i phra
NK086(lu)001:1582: mo'i theg le rnams kyi don 'di la mthar thug
NK086(lu)001:1583: pa yin te / gsang ba'i 'byung ba ye shes
NK086(lu)001:1584: kyi gdangs lnga las lus kyi drod sogs nang gi
NK086(lu)001:1585: 'byung ba phra rags rnams skyed cing /
NK086(lu)001:1586: de'i mthu brtas pa las phyi rol gyi 'byung ba phal ba ji snyed pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:1587: snod kyi 'jig rten gyi 'byung ba'i bar du snang
NK086(lu)001:1588: ba ni rlung sems kyi cho 'phrul phra mo las
NK086(lu)001:1589: je rags su mched pa yin te /
NK086(lu)001:1590: dwangs ma chen po drug gi sa chu gnyis zung du zhugs pa sku rdo rje /
NK086(lu)001:1591: me rlung gnyis gsung rdo rje /
NK086(lu)001:1592: mkha' sems gnyis thugs rdo rje ste /
NK086(lu)001:1593: shin tu phra ba'i sgo gsum mam rdo rje mi
NK086(lu)001:1594: shig pa gsum 'di las snang ba thams cad mched
NK086(lu)001:1595: pa yin no // thams cad kyi mched gzhi mthar
NK086(lu)001:1596: thug pa ye shes nam mkha'i gzugs can ni 'dzin
NK086(lu)001:1597: pa brtas pa'i dbang gis rags pa'i lus su mngon
NK086(lu)001:1598: par grub pa'i tshe snying ga na bcud kyi tshul
NK086(lu)001:1599: du gnas par snang ba'ang yod mod kyi de ni
NK086(lu)001:1600: lus las ma skyes shing lus la gnas kyi gzhan
NK086(lu)001:1601: la ma khyab pa'ang min la /
NK086(lu)001:1602: dbyibs kha dog dang che chung lta bur snang yang
NK086(lu)001:1603: ngo bo phra rags rdul gyi chos las 'das pa'i
NK086(lu)001:1604: rnam kun mchog ldan gyi stong nyid pra phab kyi
NK086(lu)001:1605: snang ba lta bu yin pas che chung dang phyogs
NK086(lu)001:1607: rang lus kyi gnad 'di nyams su blang bas rnal
NK086(lu)001:1608: 'byor pa la drod rtags nyams myong gong 'phel du
NK086(lu)001:1609: skye ba yod kyang ye shes nyid kyi ngo bo
NK086(lu)001:1610: 'jig 'bral med pa rdo rje lta bu dus gsum
NK086(lu)001:1611: mnyam pa nyid yin ba ste gnas tshul rang byung
NK086(lu)001:1612: gi ye shes nyid las ma g.yos kyang /
NK086(lu)001:1613: snang tshul chos can sems kyi chos nyid du bzhugs pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:1614: kun rdzob rgyu'i thig le la don dam 'od gsal
NK086(lu)001:1615: gyi thig le rten dang brten pa'i tshul du 'brel
NK086(lu)001:1616: ba dang / thabs kyi lam gnad du tshud pa
NK086(lu)001:1617: las phung khams kyi 'gyur thams cad 'gyur med ye
NK086(lu)001:1618: shes kyi dbyings su sdom pa'i tshul 'di dag phyi
NK086(lu)001:1619: dang nang dang gzhan dang de kho na nyid kyi
NK086(lu)001:1620: tshul du 'gal med don gcig la sdud bar shes
NK086(lu)001:1621: pa ni gsang sngags thabs lam gyi dka' gnad mthar
NK086(lu)001:1622: thug pa yin pas 'dir mdo tsam brjod pa'o //
NK086(lu)001:1623: de ltar shes nas sgom pas nyams su len pa'i
NK086(lu)001:1624: thabs la g.yo ba rlung gi rdzogs rim rdo rje'i
NK086(lu)001:1625: bzlas pa dang sbyor ba bzhi ldan gyi bum pa
NK086(lu)001:1626: can tshad du goms pas rlung la rang byan tshud
NK086(lu)001:1627: pa na 'khor lo lnga la sogs pa'i gnas su
NK086(lu)001:1628: dmigs pa gtad cing der rlung zin pas rtsa yi
NK086(lu)001:1629: mdud pa rnams grol shing rlung thams cad dbu mar
NK086(lu)001:1631: rlung la dbang thob pa des sems la dbang thob pa dang tshe la dbang thob pa 'byung ste /
NK086(lu)001:1632: rig pa ye shes la yang dbang thob pa 'byung ngo //
NK086(lu)001:1633: rten pa rtsa yi rdzogs rim ni gtso mo gsum
NK086(lu)001:1634: dang 'khor lo lngar yid kyi dmigs pa gtad pa
NK086(lu)001:1636: lus kyi 'khrul 'khor la goms pa'i rim pas rtsa
NK086(lu)001:1637: yi gnas so sor rtsa yi gnad la brten nas
NK086(lu)001:1638: rlung sems zin pa'i yon tan gyi khyad par gong
NK086(lu)001:1639: nas gong du sangs rgyas kyi sa'i bar du snang
NK086(lu)001:1640: bar 'gyur ro // bkod ba thig le byang chub
NK086(lu)001:1641: sems kyi rdzogs rim ni 'bar 'dzag gi rnal 'byor
NK086(lu)001:1642: zab mos kun rdzob kun+da lta bu'i byang chub sems
NK086(lu)001:1643: la brten nas rang lus dang gzhan lus kyi thabs
NK086(lu)001:1644: las bde ba spar zhing khams 'dzag med du bcing
NK086(lu)001:1645: nas yas bab dang mas brtan gyi dga' ba drang
NK086(lu)001:1646: bas 'pho med lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes mngon
NK086(lu)001:1648: lnga'i rlung sems las su rung ba las lam lnga'i
NK086(lu)001:1650: dbu mar ra rkyang gi mdud pa nyer gcig grol
NK086(lu)001:1651: ba las sa bcu gcig gi yon tan 'char ba
NK086(lu)001:1652: yin no // don dam 'od gsal byang chub sems
NK086(lu)001:1653: kyi thig le la brten nas snying ga'i thig le
NK086(lu)001:1654: phra mor rlung sems zin pas snang ba gsum lugs
NK086(lu)001:1655: ldog du shar te de'i rim ba dang mthun par
NK086(lu)001:1656: rang bzhin brgyad cu'i kun rtog 'gag nas slong byed
NK086(lu)001:1657: rkyen gsum dang bral ba'i nam mkha' lta bu shin
NK086(lu)001:1658: tu mtshon par dka' ba'i 'od gsal ba byang chub
NK086(lu)001:1659: sems kyi gnas lugs de'i ngang du mnyam par 'jog
NK086(lu)001:1660: yin no // pa dang / de'i ngang las chu
NK086(lu)001:1661: las nya ldang ba ltar snang ba gsum lugs 'byung
NK086(lu)001:1662: du shar bas nyer len gyi rgyu byas rlung 'od
NK086(lu)001:1663: zer lnga bas lhan cig byed pa'i rkyen byas nas
NK086(lu)001:1664: sgyu ma'i dpe bcu gnyis kyis mtshon pa'i lha yi
NK086(lu)001:1665: skur ldang ba'i sgyu ma'i lus grub pa bya ba
NK086(lu)001:1666: ni thabs gtso che bas mtshan bcas kyi rdzogs rim
NK086(lu)001:1667: du bsgrangs la sems nyid gnyug ma'i dbyings su mnyam
NK086(lu)001:1668: par bzhag pas rang byung gi ye shes khong nas
NK086(lu)001:1669: shar zhing de'i rtsal snang 'khor 'das thams cad ro
NK086(lu)001:1670: mnyam dag pa chen por shar ba ni mtshan med
NK086(lu)001:1672: de gnyis gang ltar kyang chos nyid 'od gsal gyi gnad la don mthun pa nyid do //
NK086(lu)001:1673: de lta bu'i mtshan bcas kyi rdzoogs rim la gtso
NK086(lu)001:1674: bor gnad du bsnan pas rnal 'byor nang gi sa
NK086(lu)001:1675: lam rnams myur bar bgrod de 'bras bu'i ye shes
NK086(lu)001:1676: btsan thabs su 'char ba byed pa 'di ni gtso
NK086(lu)001:1677: bor lus la brten pa'i phyir lus thabs kyi rgyud
NK086(lu)001:1678: ces bya zhing / byed pa rkyen gyi rnal 'byor zhes kyang bya ste /
NK086(lu)001:1679: lus la bsten nas mthar thug gi 'bras bu mngon du byed pa'i thabs bstan pa'i phyir ro //
NK086(lu)001:1680: 'di ltar khams drug dang ldan pa'i mi yi lus
NK086(lu)001:1681: ni rdo rje theg pa nyams su len pa'i rten
NK086(lu)001:1682: mchog go zhes gsungs pa de'i rgyu mtshan kyang dud
NK086(lu)001:1683: 'gro sogs phal ba rnams ni khams drug tsam dang
NK086(lu)001:1684: ldan kyang mi ltar shes rab mi gsal bas gsang
NK086(lu)001:1685: sngags nyams su len pa'i skal pa med la /
NK086(lu)001:1686: lha sogs sems gsal kyang mi ltar gdos pa'i lus
NK086(lu)001:1687: med pas sa khams sra ba shas chung zhing khu
NK086(lu)001:1688: ba dngos su 'byin pa sogs mi lta bu min
NK086(lu)001:1689: pas na / rags pa'i rtsa yi gnad la brten
NK086(lu)001:1690: te rlung dang khams rags pa 'ching ba'i thabs med
NK086(lu)001:1691: pa de med pas rlung khams phra ba 'ching bar
NK086(lu)001:1692: dka' ste de ni thog mar rags pa la brten
NK086(lu)001:1693: nas bcing dgos pa'i phyir ro //
NK086(lu)001:1694: des na mtshan bcas kyi rdzogs rim tshul bzhin nyams
NK086(lu)001:1695: su len pa la rten ni mngal nas skyes pa
NK086(lu)001:1696: khams drug dang ldan pa'i mi'i lus skyon med pa
NK086(lu)001:1697: nyid yin par shes par bya'o //
NK086(lu)001:1698: a nu yo ga'i spyod pa ni rang lus dang
NK086(lu)001:1699: gzhan lus la brten pa'i zhu bde rjes chags kyi
NK086(lu)001:1700: bde ba nyams su len pa gtso bor gyur pa'i
NK086(lu)001:1701: thabs mkhas zab mo dang ldan pa'o //
NK086(lu)001:1702: 'bras bu ni snyigs dus kyi tshe thung 'di la
NK086(lu)001:1703: 'dun pa sems pa sogs lam lnga dang 'gyur dbang
NK086(lu)001:1704: ma nges pa'i sa sogs sa bcu gcig po nang
NK086(lu)001:1705: gi thabs mkhas kyis myur du bgrod nas sku bzhi
NK086(lu)001:1706: ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid bde ba chen po sangs
NK086(lu)001:1707: rgyas rdo rje 'chang gi sku 'grub par 'gyur te
NK086(lu)001:1708: / 'di la phyag rgya chen po 'bras bu'i rgyud
NK086(lu)001:1709: dang mthar phyin 'bras bu'i rnal 'byor zhes kyang bya'o
NK086(lu)001:1710: / // gsum pa a ti yo ga'i lta ba ni /
NK086(lu)001:1711: sems klong man ngag gi rgyud rnams la brten nas
NK086(lu)001:1712: rang gi sems nyid rang byung gi ye shes ngo
NK086(lu)001:1713: bo stong pa nyid la dmigs mtshan thams cad ka
NK086(lu)001:1714: nas dag cing / rang bzhin gsal ba khyab brdal
NK086(lu)001:1715: chen po skye 'gag las 'das par lhun gyis grub
NK086(lu)001:1716: nas dag cing / pas / de ltar ka dag
NK086(lu)001:1717: dang lhun grub dbyer med pa'i chos nyid de'i rtsal
NK086(lu)001:1718: las 'khor 'das thams cad 'char bas thugs rje kun
NK086(lu)001:1719: khyab kyi bdag nyid du bzhugs pa de nyid /
NK086(lu)001:1720: bskyed pa dang mtshan bcas rdzogs rim gyi thabs la ltos mi dgos par /
NK086(lu)001:1721: bla ma'i don brgyud 'pho ba'i byin rlabs dang sems
NK086(lu)001:1722: nyid rang sar rang ngo sprad pa'i man ngag gis
NK086(lu)001:1723: bsal bzhag med pa'i chos nyid thad kar ngos zin
NK086(lu)001:1724: par byas pas / 'khor 'das thams cad de'i rgyan
NK086(lu)001:1725: dang rol par 'char bas dgag sgrub spang blang mi
NK086(lu)001:1726: dgos par rang sar grol zhing /
NK086(lu)001:1727: rig pa 'gyur med mnyam pa nyid kyi ngang las nam yang mi g.yo bar byed pa'o //
NK086(lu)001:1728: de ltar lta ba brtogs nas sgom pa ni rig
NK086(lu)001:1729: pa de kho na chos thams cad kyi de bzhin
NK086(lu)001:1730: nyid mthar thug pa yin pas de'i rang bab ye
NK086(lu)001:1731: nas lhun gyis grub pa la da rtsol bas sgom
NK086(lu)001:1732: du med cing de'i don la nam gnas pa na
NK086(lu)001:1733: yengs su ye nas med pa'i rang bzhin bab kyi
NK086(lu)001:1734: bsam gtan la gnas pas rnam par rtog pa glo
NK086(lu)001:1735: bur pa ni de'i ngang du rang shar rang grol
NK086(lu)001:1736: yin pa'i phyir sems gnas mi gnas kyi rtsol sgrub
NK086(lu)001:1737: mi dgos par thams cad du rig pas dbang bsgyur
NK086(lu)001:1738: ba'o // spyod pa ni ched du rtsol ba'i dgag
NK086(lu)001:1739: sgrub gang yang med par snang srid thams cad rang
NK086(lu)001:1740: byung ye shes kyi rol pa nyid la lhun 'byams
NK086(lu)001:1741: shugs 'byung gi tshul gyis spyod pa'o //
NK086(lu)001:1742: 'bras bu ni rig pa'i gzhi la sku gsum gyi
NK086(lu)001:1743: yon tan ma btsal lhun gyis grub pa nyid ji
NK086(lu)001:1744: lta ba bzhin mngon du gyur pa'o //
NK086(lu)001:1745: lam 'di la'ang khregs chod cog bzhag bzhi yi dang
NK086(lu)001:1746: las ma g.yos par mig las ye shes 'od rtsa'i
NK086(lu)001:1747: lam brgyud de / nam mkha' dngas ba'i dbyings su
NK086(lu)001:1748: nang gi dbyings dang rig pa'i gdangs rtsol med mngon
NK086(lu)001:1749: sum snang ba la gnad du gzir bas snang ba
NK086(lu)001:1750: bzhi rdzogs nas gdos bcas kyi sbub 'od gsal du
NK086(lu)001:1751: dengs shing gdod ma'i dbyings su sangs rgyas par 'gyur
NK086(lu)001:1752: lam brgyud de / ro // gsum pa nang rgyud sde gsum gyi nyams len 'gags bsdus la /
NK086(lu)001:1753: spyir gsang sngags kyi rgyud 'di dag gi dgongs don /
NK086(lu)001:1754: rgyud gsum gyi rnam bzhag tu bsdus te spyir bstan /
NK086(lu)001:1755: lam rgyud dngos po dgus bye brag tu bshad par gsung bas /
NK086(lu)001:1756: dngos po dgu ni bslab bya bcu gcig las lta
NK086(lu)001:1757: spyod de gnyis spyir bzhag pa'i lhag ma dgur gsungs
NK086(lu)001:1758: so // de la gzhi yi rgyud bshad par skabs su /
NK086(lu)001:1759: ma h+aa yo ga pas ni bden pa dbyer med lhag pa'i chos sku chen po'am /
NK086(lu)001:1760: dag mnyam bden pa dbyer med kyi tshul du gtan
NK086(lu)001:1761: la phab pa sogs ni gong du bshad pa bzhin
NK086(lu)001:1762: no // nang rgyud gsum gyi gzhi gtan la dbab
NK086(lu)001:1763: tshul gyi lta ba'i khyad pa de lta bu'i phyir
NK086(lu)001:1764: no // na / chos thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas par 'dod tsul la'ang 'di ltar /
NK086(lu)001:1765: ma h+aa yo ga'i gzhung gis ni //
NK086(lu)001:1766: gnas tshul la dag pa lha'i rang bzhin du gnas kyang /
NK086(lu)001:1767: snang tshul la 'khrul pa can la de ltar snang ma nus par 'dod de /
NK086(lu)001:1768: tha snyad du yongs su dag pa'i lha dang ma
NK086(lu)001:1769: dag pa'i 'khor ba gnyis su 'byed pa'i tshul gyis
NK086(lu)001:1770: snang ba'i rang bzhin lhar bsgrub pa'o //
NK086(lu)001:1771: 'di ni las dang po pa'i ngor tshad mas sgrub
NK086(lu)001:1772: par bya ba yin pa'i phyir gnyis snang gi blo
NK086(lu)001:1773: can rtog ge ba'i rgol ba rnams la yang rig
NK086(lu)001:1774: pa'i stobs kyis bsgrub nus pa yin no //
NK086(lu)001:1776: chos thams cad bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin du
NK086(lu)001:1777: gnas pa'i phyir rgya mtsho las rlabs ltar bde chen
NK086(lu)001:1778: gcig nyid du ma'i rol par shar ba la khyad
NK086(lu)001:1779: med pas / skye ba rgyu'i sangs rgyas la sogs
NK086(lu)001:1780: pa'i tshul du sems can thams cad rang bzhin gyis
NK086(lu)001:1782: snang srid ye sangs rgyas pa lta ba'i lung zhes bya ste /
NK086(lu)001:1783: rnal 'byor can la lam gyi stobs pas de ltar bslu med du grub pa yin no //
NK086(lu)001:1784: a ti'i gzhung las rig pa rang byung gi ye
NK086(lu)001:1785: shes nyid sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi
NK086(lu)001:1786: sku mthar thug pa yin la /
NK086(lu)001:1787: de ngos zin pa'i tshe ji ltar snang ba thams
NK086(lu)001:1788: cad de'i rtsal du shar zhing don gyi ngo bo
NK086(lu)001:1789: de dang gnyis su med pa'i phyir /
NK086(lu)001:1790: snang tshul la sangs rgyas kyi sku dang ye shes su snang yang rung /
NK086(lu)001:1791: sems can gyi lus dang nyon mongs par snang yang rung /
NK086(lu)001:1792: de gnyis ka ngo bo ye nas 'khor 'das ming
NK086(lu)001:1793: med kyi ye shes chen por rnam par dag pa'i
NK086(lu)001:1794: phyir / de lta bu'i ye shes can gyi ngor
NK086(lu)001:1795: chos thams cad ye nas rnam par dag cing rang
NK086(lu)001:1798: dag dang ma dag ces ris su chad pa med pa na /
NK086(lu)001:1799: tha mal gyi snang ba 'di rnams mdog ma rjes /
NK086(lu)001:1800: spu ma bsgyur bar sangs rgyas su gnas pa zhes bya ste /
NK086(lu)001:1801: ji ltar snang ba de nyid ye nas rnam par
NK086(lu)001:1802: dag pa kun bzang bde ba chen po'i gnas nyid
NK086(lu)001:1803: yin kyi / de las gzhan zhig tu dag pa zhes bya rdul tsam med par 'dod do //
NK086(lu)001:1804: 'di ni rig pa rang snang gi blo can gyi
NK086(lu)001:1805: ngor chos nyid kyi stobs las mngon sum du grub
NK086(lu)001:1806: pa'i phyir lam thams cad kyi dgongs pa'i skyes so
NK086(lu)001:1807: yin no // lam gyi rgyud la ni ma h+aa
NK086(lu)001:1808: yo ga pa'i stong pa chen po sogs bskyed pa'i
NK086(lu)001:1809: rim pa'i rnal 'byor gtso bor byas ste ting nge
NK086(lu)001:1810: 'dzin gyi rtsal rdzogs pa na mtshan bcas kyi rdzogs
NK086(lu)001:1811: rim dang des drangs pa'i rdzogs pa chen po la
NK086(lu)001:1813: a nu yo ga pas ni zhu ba de 'gyur
NK086(lu)001:1814: med sgrub pa'i mtshan bcas kyi rdzogs rim la gtso
NK086(lu)001:1816: sngags tsam brjod pas lha yi 'khor lo rdzogs pa'i
NK086(lu)001:1817: bskyed rim dang zhu ba de dang mtshungs ldan gyi
NK086(lu)001:1818: lha sku dang / rlung sems tsam las grub pa'i
NK086(lu)001:1819: sgyu ma'i sku rnams kyi sgo nas snang cha bskyed
NK086(lu)001:1820: rim kyi don thun mong min pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:1821: bde ba'i thabs kyis drangs ba'i don gyi lhan skyes
NK086(lu)001:1822: rdzogs pa chen po nyams su len pa'ang yin no
NK086(lu)001:1823: // rdzogs pa chen po bas ni /
NK086(lu)001:1824: rig pa ye shes kyi rtsal snang lha'i 'khor lo
NK086(lu)001:1825: ye nas yin pa nyid la rnam pa ma bsgyur
NK086(lu)001:1826: kyang chog ste / ting nge 'dzin gyi bskyed pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:1827: mtshan bcas thabs kyis bsgrub pa'i lha sku la ched du mi rtsol yang /
NK086(lu)001:1828: gal te lha'i rnam par bsgyur bar 'dod na yang
NK086(lu)001:1829: skad cig dran rdzogs kyi tshul du chu las nya
NK086(lu)001:1830: ldang ba ltar rig pa'i rtsal de nyid du snang
NK086(lu)001:1831: ba ni ye nas dam ye dbyer med lhun gyis
NK086(lu)001:1832: grub pa'i lha nyid du gyur pa yin no //
NK086(lu)001:1833: mtshan bcas kyi rdzogs rim rlung bcing ba'i rim pa sogs la'ang cung zad kyang mi ltos te /
NK086(lu)001:1834: bskyed rdzogs de dag 'dir 'jug pa'i lam yin la
NK086(lu)001:1835: 'bras bu ye shes nyid la dbang 'byor ba'i tshe
NK086(lu)001:1836: bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa'i rtsol ba med par de
NK086(lu)001:1837: yi 'bras bu lhun gyis grub pa'i phyir ro //
NK086(lu)001:1838: ye shes kyi 'od rtsa'i lam nas rig gdangs rtsol
NK086(lu)001:1839: med du shar ba'i thod rgal gyi nyams len sogs
NK086(lu)001:1840: ni rdo rje'i lus la brten pa'i thabs khyad par
NK086(lu)001:1841: yin kyang / ma dag las rlung gi byed pa
NK086(lu)001:1842: bcing pa sogs rtsol bas drangs pa'i lam 'og ma
NK086(lu)001:1844: ye shes chen po ye nas gnas pa'i rang gdangs rtsol med yin pa'i phyir ro //
NK086(lu)001:1845: des na lam thams cad kyi mtha' 'dir thug pas 'di ni kun gyi bla ma dam pa'o //
NK086(lu)001:1846: 'bras bu'i rgyud ni rnam grangs sna tshogs kyis bstan
NK086(lu)001:1847: kyang don 'dra ste mthar thug rnam pa thams cad
NK086(lu)001:1848: mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sku nyid du dbye ba
NK086(lu)001:1849: med do // de ltar rgyud lung man ngag gi
NK086(lu)001:1850: gzhung gsum gyi gtan la 'babs ba'i lta ba dang
NK086(lu)001:1851: med do // / lam nyams su len tshul de'i
NK086(lu)001:1852: dbang gis spyod pa la'ang spros bcas kyi spyod pa
NK086(lu)001:1853: phyi'i rdzas dang yo byad sogs kyi rtsol ba mang
NK086(lu)001:1854: po brten pa ni ma h+aa yo ga pa yin
NK086(lu)001:1855: med do // / la / phyi'i bya ba gtso
NK086(lu)001:1856: bor mi byed par spros med kyi tshul du nang
NK086(lu)001:1857: gi thabs zab mo la 'bad pas /
NK086(lu)001:1858: zhing sngags lhan skyes kyi rnal 'byor ma rnams dang
NK086(lu)001:1859: lhan cig 'du ba thob pa'i nye rgyu'i spyod pa
NK086(lu)001:1860: gtso bor byed pa a nu yo ga pa yin
NK086(lu)001:1861: cing / phyi dang nang gi bya rtsol de dag gang yang gtso bor mi byed par /
NK086(lu)001:1862: shin tu spros med kyi tshul du rig pa ye
NK086(lu)001:1863: shes nyid kyi ngang las rtsol med shugs 'byung gi
NK086(lu)001:1864: spyod pa byed pa ni a ti yo ga pa'i
NK086(lu)001:1866: de bzhin du sgom pa la'ang ma h+aas sems gnas
NK086(lu)001:1867: pa'i thabs rim bzhin goms pas ting nge 'dzin khyad
NK086(lu)001:1869: a nus rdo rje'i lus la gnad du bstun pa'i
NK086(lu)001:1870: thabs kyis rlung sems bcing te zhi gnas khyad par
NK086(lu)001:1871: can myur du bsgrub pa dang gnyis ni rtsol ba
NK086(lu)001:1873: a ti'i lugs la ni rig pa ye shes nyid
NK086(lu)001:1874: ngos zin pas rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i bsam
NK086(lu)001:1875: gtan las sems 'dzin gyi rtsol ba ci yang mi
NK086(lu)001:1876: dgos pa'o // de bzhin du dkyil 'khor la yang
NK086(lu)001:1877: bskyed rdzogs rdzogs chen gsum po'i rim pa bzhin gzugs
NK086(lu)001:1878: brnyan dang lhag ting gi dkyil 'khor gtso bor nyams
NK086(lu)001:1880: bde chen byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor la nyams len gtso bor byed pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:1881: rang bzhan gdod ma'i dkyil 'khor rtsol med du lam du byed pa gsum gyi khyad par dang /
NK086(lu)001:1882: dbang la'ang sngags bla med thams cad dbang bzhis smin par byed pa 'dra yang /
NK086(lu)001:1883: gzugs brnyan dang ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor du
NK086(lu)001:1884: phyi rol rdzas la brton te dbang nod pa gtsi
NK086(lu)001:1886: rdo rje lus kyi dkyil 'khor las yab yum mnyam
NK086(lu)001:1887: par sbyor ba'i byang chub sems kyi dbang rdzas las
NK086(lu)001:1888: dbang nod pa gtso bor byed pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:1889: rig pa byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor du bskur
NK086(lu)001:1890: thob med pa'i chos nyid ngo sprod pa rig pa
NK086(lu)001:1891: rtsal gyi dbang bskur ba gtso bor byed pa'i khyad
NK086(lu)001:1892: bar dang / dam tshig la'ang rtsa ba dang yan lag gis bsdus pa'i srung bya dang /
NK086(lu)001:1893: sgrub bya rnams dran shes kyi sgo nas tshul bzhin blang dor bgyid pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:1894: dam tshig thams cad la rang dbang 'byor ba'i phyir
NK086(lu)001:1895: bde ba chen po sgrub pa'i rten kun+da lta bu'i
NK086(lu)001:1896: byang chub kyi sems mi nyams pa'i thabs dang mtshan
NK086(lu)001:1897: nyid dang ldan pa'i las kyi phyag rgya brtan pa
NK086(lu)001:1898: sogs kyi bya ba gtso bor sgrub pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:1899: chos thams cad rang byung ye shes nyag gcig gi
NK086(lu)001:1900: ngang du lhun gyis grub par gnas pas bya ba
NK086(lu)001:1901: dang mi bya ba'i srung mtshams med par phyal bar
NK086(lu)001:1902: gnas pa 'da' nyams las 'das pa'i khyad par dang
NK086(lu)001:1903: / ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab nang gi yo
NK086(lu)001:1904: byad dang phyi'i sgrub ba chen po'i yo byad de
NK086(lu)001:1905: phyi nang gi yo byad dang ldan pa'i sgo nas
NK086(lu)001:1907: rang lus thabs ldan bsnyen pa dang gzhan lus thabs
NK086(lu)001:1908: ldan sgrub pa ste rjes su chags pa'i brtul zhugs
NK086(lu)001:1909: nyid gtso bor phyed pa'i tshul gyis lha bsgrub pa
NK086(lu)001:1910: dang / sgrub bya sgrub byed gnyis su med pa
NK086(lu)001:1911: byang chub kyi sems shes shing de la goms pa
NK086(lu)001:1912: gding du gyur pa kho nas bsnyen sgrub byed pa'i
NK086(lu)001:1913: dang / khyad par dang / phyi dang nang gi
NK086(lu)001:1914: dam tshig gi rdzas dngos su bshams pa dang yid
NK086(lu)001:1915: kyis srul pa'i mchod pa gtso bor byed ba dang
NK086(lu)001:1916: dang / khyad par dang / / gsang ba'i mchod
NK086(lu)001:1917: pa d+hu ti'i dbyings su lung dang rtog ba gsod
NK086(lu)001:1918: cing gnyis su med par sbyor ba'i bde chen byang
NK086(lu)001:1919: chub sems kyi mchod pa gtso bor byed ba dang
NK086(lu)001:1920: dang / khyad par dang / / / ye nas
NK086(lu)001:1921: mchod bya mchod byed med par de kho na nyid
NK086(lu)001:1922: mnyam pa chen po'i mchod pa gtso bor byed pa'i
NK086(lu)001:1923: dang / khyad par dang / / / khyad par
NK086(lu)001:1924: dang / rdzas sngags ting 'dzin gyi thabs gtso bor
NK086(lu)001:1925: byas te phrin las sgrub ba dang /
NK086(lu)001:1926: rlung sems la rang dbang thob pa'i srog gzugs grub pa'i sgo nas las bsgrub pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:1927: sems kyi chos nyid la dbang 'byor ba nyid kyis
NK086(lu)001:1928: rtsal snang las rab 'byams rtsol med du sgrub pa
NK086(lu)001:1930: phyi bca' pa'i phyag rgya dang ting nge 'dzin gyi
NK086(lu)001:1931: lha sku'i phyag rgya sgom pa'i rtsol ba gtso bor
NK086(lu)001:1932: byed pa dang / rdo rje'i lus nyid kyi bsgul
NK086(lu)001:1933: bskyod phyag rgya 'gro 'dug gar du shes shing gzungs
NK086(lu)001:1934: kyi phyag rgya la brten nas bde ba'i brtul zhugs
NK086(lu)001:1935: grub pa'i lam gtso bor byed pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:1936: chos thams cad ye nas phyag rgya chen po'i dkyil
NK086(lu)001:1937: 'khor du lhun gyis grub pas rtsol ba med par
NK086(lu)001:1938: phyag rgya bzhi'i don dang ldan pa'i khyad par dang
NK086(lu)001:1939: / bzlas brjod kyi sngags kyi rtsol ba la gtso bos byed pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:1940: rdo rje'i bzlas pa dang bum can sogs kyis srog
NK086(lu)001:1941: mi shig pa'i thig ler sgrub pa'i sngags gtso bo
NK086(lu)001:1942: byed pa dang / chos nyid rang byung gi ye
NK086(lu)001:1943: shes la dbang 'byor bas gzhom med rdo rje n+aa
NK086(lu)001:1944: de'i gsung dang ye nas ldan ba'i phyir ngag tu
NK086(lu)001:1945: brjod pa med kyang mi gsung mnyam par bzhag pa
NK086(lu)001:1946: sngags kyi rgyal po'i don dang ldan cing /
NK086(lu)001:1947: tshig tu brjod pa thams cad kyang rdo rje'i glu
NK086(lu)001:1948: dang gsang sngags kyi ngo bor gyur ba'i khyad par
NK086(lu)001:1949: 'di dag bskyed rdzogs rdzogs chen gsum gyi gzhung gi
NK086(lu)001:1950: dgongs pas bslab pa'i mtha' bcu gcig nyams su len
NK086(lu)001:1951: tshul gyi khyad bar yin bas don gyi 'gags bkrol
NK086(lu)001:1952: ba yin la / rgyud gsum dang bslab bya bcu
NK086(lu)001:1953: gcig gi rnam bzhag rgyas pa ni gsang ba snying
NK086(lu)001:1954: po'i spyi don du brjod zin pas 'dir ma bris
NK086(lu)001:1955: ba yin la / so // rgyas par sngags rgyud
NK086(lu)001:1956: sde drug so so'i che ba dam tshig lta ba
NK086(lu)001:1958: phyi nang gi grub mtha' bshad pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:1959: rgyud kyi 'chang thabs bshad pa sogs ni phyi bshad
NK086(lu)001:1960: thabs gsal bar byed pa'i man ngag gi chos sde
NK086(lu)001:1961: nyi shu rnams su legs par blta bar bya'o //
NK086(lu)001:1962: gsum pa tha mar dge ba sgrub pa chen po
NK086(lu)001:1963: bka' brgyad kyi dgongs pa'i rnam bzhag bshad pa la
NK086(lu)001:1964: / so so'i dgongs don rnam par bshad pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:1965: thun mong du don bsdus te bstan pa'o //
NK086(lu)001:1966: dang po la 'jam dpal sku 'khor lo rnam pa bzhi'i dgongs pa /
NK086(lu)001:1967: pad+ma gsung rta skad theng gsum gyi dgongs pa /
NK086(lu)001:1968: yang dag thugs ru lu 'bru brgyad kyi dgongs pa /
NK086(lu)001:1969: che mchog yon tan bdud rtsi rnam dag gi dgongs pa /
NK086(lu)001:1970: phur pa phrin las thal 'byin rnam pa bzhi'i dgongs pa /
NK086(lu)001:1971: ma mo rbod gtong rtsa rlung thig le'i dgongs pa /
NK086(lu)001:1972: 'jig rten mchod bstod mchod bsgrub brten gsum gyi dgongs pa /
NK086(lu)001:1973: dmod pa drag sngags 'bod rbad bsad gsum gyi dgongs pa /
NK086(lu)001:1974: bla ma rig 'dzin bsnyen sgrub rnam pa bzhi'i dgongs pa bshad pa'o //
NK086(lu)001:1976: 'jam dpal sku'i sgrub pa thams cad 'khor lo rnam
NK086(lu)001:1977: pa bzhi'i dgongs par 'dus pa'i tshul bstan pa gang
NK086(lu)001:1978: zhen / gnas pa'i 'khor lo lta bar bshad pa /
NK086(lu)001:1979: srid pa'i 'khor lo gcod par bshad pa /
NK086(lu)001:1980: sgrub pa'i 'khor lo cho 'phrul du bshad pa /
NK086(lu)001:1981: gcod pa'i 'khor lo phrin las su bshad pa'o //
NK086(lu)001:1982: dang po la mdo rgyas gnyis /
NK086(lu)001:1983: dang po gnas pa'i 'khor lo bdag nyid ya m+aan ta ka'i thugs ka na gnas te /
NK086(lu)001:1984: dper na nor bu rin po che lta bu'o //
NK086(lu)001:1985: ji ltar na nor bu las dgos 'dod thams cad 'byung ba ltar /
NK086(lu)001:1986: 'jam dpal ya m+aan+ta ka'i thugs yang dag pa'i ye
NK086(lu)001:1987: shes ni chos thams cad 'byung ba'i ngo bor gnas
NK086(lu)001:1988: shing ye nas rnam dag 'pho 'gyur med po'i phyir
NK086(lu)001:1989: chos thams cad ya m+aan+ta ka'i thugs ka na gnas
NK086(lu)001:1990: zhes bya'o // gnyis pa gnas pa'i 'khor lo zhes
NK086(lu)001:1991: bya ba de gang yin snyams na rang gi sems
NK086(lu)001:1992: nyid bde ba chen po byang chub kyi sems de
NK086(lu)001:1993: nyid la gnas pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya ste /
NK086(lu)001:1994: gang gi phyir na de kho nar chos thams cad 'dus shing 'ub chub pa'i phyir ro //
NK086(lu)001:1995: ji ltar 'dus na skabs 'dir rnam bzhag rnam pa brgyad kyis bstan te /
NK086(lu)001:1997: ye shes bzhi gnas pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:1999: bden pa gnyis gnas pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:2000: lta spyod gnyis gnas pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:2001: thabs shes gnyis gnas pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:2002: zhi lhag gnyis gnas pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:2004: dang po sku gnas pa'i tshul ni /
NK086(lu)001:2005: rang gi byang chub sems rig pa'i rgyal po rang dbang du gyur pa'i dus na /
NK086(lu)001:2006: phyi nang snang srid kyis bsdus pa'i chos thams cad
NK086(lu)001:2007: ni rang sems las byung zhing sems ni de thams
NK086(lu)001:2009: sems kyi ngo bo'am rang bzhin ni rig stong gnyis
NK086(lu)001:2010: su med par ye shes chen po de kho na
NK086(lu)001:2012: de ltar mngon du gyur ba la chos kyi sku
NK086(lu)001:2013: zhes brjod kyi de las gzhan du cung zad kyang
NK086(lu)001:2014: med do // de'i tshe 'dod yon lnga ma bkag
NK086(lu)001:2015: par ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin longs spyod pa'i dbang
NK086(lu)001:2016: zad pa med pa thob pa ni longs spyod rdzogs
NK086(lu)001:2018: de bzhin du bdag nyid thams cad kyi lus su
NK086(lu)001:2019: sprul zhing yid kyis ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin dbang
NK086(lu)001:2020: bsgyur ba ni sprul pa'i sku zhes bya ste /
NK086(lu)001:2021: de ltar sku gsum po rang lo rang chas su gnas pa ni sku gnas pa'o //
NK086(lu)001:2023: rang sems nam mkhar bzhin du stong la /
NK086(lu)001:2024: stong bzhin du snang ba'i snang stong zung 'jug gi
NK086(lu)001:2025: chos nyid mngon sum snang la ma zhen pa de
NK086(lu)001:2026: la ni chos dbyings ye shes zhes bya'o //
NK086(lu)001:2027: de'i ngang las 'phro 'du las kyi phyag rgya sna
NK086(lu)001:2028: tshogs pa byed pa'i dus na dngos po thams cad
NK086(lu)001:2029: me long gi gzugs brnyan dang 'dra bar ji ltar
NK086(lu)001:2030: ba ltas pa ltar snang yang dngos por grub pa
NK086(lu)001:2031: med par rang gis rtogs pa ni me long lta
NK086(lu)001:2033: rang gi byang chub kyi sems la /
NK086(lu)001:2034: phung lnga dbang lnga rnam shes lnga yul lnga kha
NK086(lu)001:2035: dog lnga yab lnga yum lnga sogs ye nas gnas
NK086(lu)001:2036: shing de dag mnyam la so sor ma 'dres pa'i
NK086(lu)001:2037: tshul gyi shes pa ni so sor rtogs pa'i ye
NK086(lu)001:2038: shes so // chos thams cad ye nas ma rtsal
NK086(lu)001:2039: ma sgrub par rnam par grol ba'i rang bzhin du
NK086(lu)001:2040: gzod nas lhun gyis grub par rtogs pa ni bya
NK086(lu)001:2041: ba grub pa'i ye shes te /
NK086(lu)001:2042: de ltar ye shes bzhi yang rang gi byang chub
NK086(lu)001:2043: kyi sems la ye nas rang bab kyis gnas pa'o
NK086(lu)001:2044: // gsum pa 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa gnyis su snang ba yang /
NK086(lu)001:2045: rang sems la de dang de'i rnam par snang ba zad la /
NK086(lu)001:2046: ji ltar snang ba de ni rang gi sems kyi
NK086(lu)001:2047: snang ba sems kyi cho 'phrul tsam du zad cing
NK086(lu)001:2048: / sems rang nyid 'khor 'das ltar snang gi /
NK086(lu)001:2049: de las logs su 'khor 'das zhes bya ba rang
NK086(lu)001:2050: gi ngo bos grub pa rdul tsam med par nges
NK086(lu)001:2051: shing de yang byang chub kyi sems don dam pa'i
NK086(lu)001:2052: dbyings su mthar thug pas na 'khor 'das gnyis kyang
NK086(lu)001:2053: der gnas pa'o // bzhi pa ni /
NK086(lu)001:2054: chos thams cad don dam par byang chub sems su mthar thug pa ni don dam bden pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:2055: de'i rtsal snang las snang pas bsdus pa'i chos thams
NK086(lu)001:2056: cad kyang kun rdzob tsam du ma 'dres par snang
NK086(lu)001:2057: ba ni kun rdzob bden pa ste /
NK086(lu)001:2058: de ltar bden pa gnyis rang gi byang chub kyi sems la ye nas gnas pa'o //
NK086(lu)001:2059: lnga pa lta ba ni mig dang 'dra ste yul gyi nyes skyon thams cad gdar sha gcod la /
NK086(lu)001:2060: spyod pa las dang 'dra ste las so so'i bya
NK086(lu)001:2061: ba gang yin chud ma zos par spyod pa'i lta
NK086(lu)001:2062: spyod kyi mtha' ni gang zhe na /
NK086(lu)001:2063: chos thams cad snying po chos nyid byang chub sems
NK086(lu)001:2064: su shes bzhi lta ba'i mthar thug pa yin la
NK086(lu)001:2065: / lta ba de lta bu'i ngang nas gang spyod
NK086(lu)001:2066: chos nyid dang mi 'gal mi 'bral bar spyod pa
NK086(lu)001:2067: ni spyod pa'i rgyal po ste /
NK086(lu)001:2068: de lta bu'i lta spyod kyang gzhan na med de /
NK086(lu)001:2069: rang gi byang chub kyi sems la ye nas gnas pa'o //
NK086(lu)001:2071: rang gis byas pa'i las thams cad snying po byang chub kyi sems las byung zhing /
NK086(lu)001:2072: de'i ngang las ma 'das par shes pa ni shes rab /
NK086(lu)001:2073: de nyid rang bzhin med par spyod pa ni thabs te /
NK086(lu)001:2074: thabs dang shes rab dag kyang rang gi byang chub kyi sems la rang chas su gnas pa'o //
NK086(lu)001:2076: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin byang chub kyi sems
NK086(lu)001:2077: kyi ngang du gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni zhi
NK086(lu)001:2078: gnas dang / de lta bur rtogs pa'i shes rab
NK086(lu)001:2079: kyis chos thams cad la phyin ci ma log par
NK086(lu)001:2080: spyod pa ni lhag mthong ste /
NK086(lu)001:2081: zhi lhag kyang rang gi byang chub sems la ye nas gnas pa'o //
NK086(lu)001:2082: brgyad pa rnal 'byor pa'i gsang ba'i yo byad gnyis
NK086(lu)001:2083: su grags pa ni shes rab dang ting nge 'dzin
NK086(lu)001:2084: te / ting nge 'dzin gyi sems las su rung ba las yon tan thams cad 'byung zhing /
NK086(lu)001:2085: shes rab kyis phyin ci ma log par spyod pa'i
NK086(lu)001:2086: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i mnga' dbang chen po 'byor bas
NK086(lu)001:2087: na 'di dag rnal 'byor pa'i yo byad chen po'o
NK086(lu)001:2088: // de gnyis kyang ye nas zhi lhag zung du
NK086(lu)001:2089: 'brel ba'i rang rig pa bya chub kyi sems la
NK086(lu)001:2091: de ltar rnam bzhag rnam pa brgyad po 'dis chos
NK086(lu)001:2092: thams cad byang chub sems kyi ngo bor gnas pa'i
NK086(lu)001:2093: tshul bshad pa'o // 'khor lo zhes pa thugs yang
NK086(lu)001:2094: dag pa'i ye shes de lta bu mtha' gang du
NK086(lu)001:2096: chos thams cad phar dgag sgyub ris chad med par
NK086(lu)001:2097: sna tshogs su 'phrul zhing rgyun ma chad par 'khor
NK086(lu)001:2099: rnam pa gcig tu na 'khor lo'i las ni gcod ba'i don te /
NK086(lu)001:2100: 'khor lo gsang ba'i mdzod ces bya ba'i lung las /
NK086(lu)001:2101: 'jam dpal thugs kyi ye shes 'khor lo yis /
NK086(lu)001:2102: srid gsum 'khor ba'i rmongs pa rtsad nas gcod //
NK086(lu)001:2103: ces pa la sogs pa gsungs ba bzhin no //
NK086(lu)001:2104: gnyis pa srid pa'i 'khor lo ni ya m+aan+ta ka'i lte ba na gnas pa zhes bya ste /
NK086(lu)001:2105: dpe sa mdo'i mkhar bzang po lta bu'o //
NK086(lu)001:2106: ji ltar na rdo rje'i mkhar bzang po der yul
NK086(lu)001:2107: khams bdag 'dug pa'i gnas yod pas der zhugs na
NK086(lu)001:2108: rang nyid gzhan gyis mi tshugs pa sogs ji ltar
NK086(lu)001:2109: bya ba'i dbang yod pa ltar 'jam dpal ya m+aan+ta
NK086(lu)001:2110: ka dang gnyis su med pa'i sku brnyes pa'i dus
NK086(lu)001:2111: na / khams gsum srid gsum lus ngag yid gsum rtsa rlung thig gsum la sogs pa /
NK086(lu)001:2112: srid pa gsum gyis bsdus pa'i chos thams cad la
NK086(lu)001:2113: 'jam dpal ya m+aan+ta ka'i longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i
NK086(lu)001:2114: dbang byed pa'i phyir te thams cad de'i sku'i ngang
NK086(lu)001:2117: nga las srid pa gsum po byung //
NK086(lu)001:2118: nga ni thams cad kun gyi rje /
NK086(lu)001:2119: zhes sogs gsungs pa bzhin no //
NK086(lu)001:2120: de'i phyir phyi ltar na las kyi gshin rje'i rgyal
NK086(lu)001:2121: po'i lto ba na srid pa gsum gnas pas khams
NK086(lu)001:2122: gsum gyi sems can rnam tshe'i dus byed pa'i tshe
NK086(lu)001:2123: na rnam par shes pa kho'i lag du mi 'gro
NK086(lu)001:2124: mi srid pas srid pa gsum gyi srog dbugs kyi
NK086(lu)001:2126: gshin po rnams kyi rjer gyur pa de dag kyang /
NK086(lu)001:2127: rtags kyi phyag rgya bstan pa'i sku gang gi lto
NK086(lu)001:2128: ba na gnas shing tha mal pa'i gshin rje'i gshed
NK086(lu)001:2129: du gyur ba 'khor 'das thams cad kyi bdag po
NK086(lu)001:2130: / de'i gong na gzhan med pa ni yang dag
NK086(lu)001:2131: pa'i ye shes kyi sku 'jam dpal ya m+aan+ta ka
NK086(lu)001:2133: nang lta na mngal nas skyes pa'i sems can rnams dang po lte ba nas chags te /
NK086(lu)001:2134: las rlung 'pho ba'i gzhi lte ba la brten nas
NK086(lu)001:2135: chags shing lte ba de ni brtson ra'am zo chu'i
NK086(lu)001:2136: 'khyud mo dang 'dra bas der rnam shes chags nas
NK086(lu)001:2137: mi 'chor bar 'dzin cing nang gi 'pho ba'i dus
NK086(lu)001:2138: kyis sems can rnams rim gyis 'pho zhing 'joms bar
NK086(lu)001:2140: gsang ba ltar na yang dag pa'i ye shes dang
NK086(lu)001:2141: ye shes kyi rlung gi byed pas dus kyi dgra
NK086(lu)001:2142: de dag 'pho med du 'joms pa ni dpal ya
NK086(lu)001:2143: m+aan+ta ka ste / des na srid pa'i 'khor lo lte ba na gnas zhes bya'o //
NK086(lu)001:2144: de la 'khor lo zhes 'dogs pa ni /
NK086(lu)001:2145: srid pa gsum gyi sems can rnams ma rig log
NK086(lu)001:2146: rtog gi 'khrul pas gzung 'dzin zhen chags brtags nas
NK086(lu)001:2147: gnas gcig nas gcig tu 'khrul zhing 'khor bas na
NK086(lu)001:2149: de ltar shes nas srid pa'i 'khor lo bskor ba'i
NK086(lu)001:2150: 'phul byed nyon mongs pa brgyad khri bzhi stong yang
NK086(lu)001:2151: dag pa'i ye shes kyis gcod par byed pa ni
NK086(lu)001:2153: gsum pa sprul pa'i 'khor lo ni ya m+aa n+ta ka'i zhabs kyi 'og na gnas te /
NK086(lu)001:2154: dpe sgyu ma mkhan lta bu'o //
NK086(lu)001:2155: ji ltar sgyu ma mkhan mkhas pas sgyu ma'i snang
NK086(lu)001:2156: ba sna tshogs kyi rnam pa ci byas kyang de
NK086(lu)001:2157: dang de'i rnam par snang zhing bya ba byed pa
NK086(lu)001:2159: 'jam dpal ya m+aan+ta ka'i thugs nyid las ma g.yos bzhin du /
NK086(lu)001:2164: 'khor lo drug zhabs kyis mnan par snang zhing /
NK086(lu)001:2165: thugs rjes sprul sku thub drug gis rigs drug gi gnas su don mdzad par ston te /
NK086(lu)001:2166: 'di ni 'gyur med byang chub kyi dbyings las rtsal
NK086(lu)001:2167: snang ma 'gag par 'char ba'i dbang gis rtags kyi
NK086(lu)001:2168: phyag rgyar snang ba ya m+aan+ta ka'i sku'i zhabs 'og
NK086(lu)001:2169: tu rigs drug mnan pa'i tshul du snang ba la
NK086(lu)001:2171: rigs drug so so'i lam kyi rnam smin pa'i dbang
NK086(lu)001:2172: gis gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'khor bas 'khrul
NK086(lu)001:2173: 'khor zhes bya'o // de ltar rtogs nas de'i byed
NK086(lu)001:2174: las 'khor ba'i dug lnga 'joms pa'i cho 'phrul mngon
NK086(lu)001:2175: du 'byin par bya ba ni nyams su len tshul
NK086(lu)001:2176: 'khor zhes bya'o // lo // bzhi pa gcod pa'i
NK086(lu)001:2177: 'khor lo ni ya m+aan+ta ka'i sku yi phyag na
NK086(lu)001:2178: mtshon cha'i tshul du bsnams pa ste /
NK086(lu)001:2179: de'i ngo bo ni phrin las yin la dpe mtshon cha rnon po lta bu'o //
NK086(lu)001:2180: ji ltar na mtshon cha rnon pos gang la btab pa thogs med du gcod pa ltar /
NK086(lu)001:2181: ya m+aan+ta ka'i phyag mtshan gyi 'khor lo las phrin
NK086(lu)001:2182: las rnam pa bzhis rang rang gi 'gal zla gcod
NK086(lu)001:2183: par byed de / zhi ba'i dus su me chu
NK086(lu)001:2184: dug mtshon dmag mu ge dgra dus min 'chi ba
NK086(lu)001:2185: ste 'jigs pa brgyad po gcod cing zhi bar byed
NK086(lu)001:2186: par byed de / / rgyas pa'i dus su tshe
NK086(lu)001:2187: ring dbang che bkra shis gzi mdangs che ba 'khor
NK086(lu)001:2188: mang longs spyod che ba'i bar du gcod pa gcod
NK086(lu)001:2189: cing de drug po rgyas pas 'byor pa drug ldan
NK086(lu)001:2190: par byed de / / du byed / dbang gi
NK086(lu)001:2191: dus su gdul bya de dag gi bdag la pha
NK086(lu)001:2195: slob dpon lta bu'i tshul du mos par byas nas mi gus pa gcod cing dbang du byed /
NK086(lu)001:2196: drag po'i dus su bstan pa la gnod pa'i dgra
NK086(lu)001:2197: dang bgegs thams cad tshar gcod par byed pas gcod
NK086(lu)001:2199: phrin las sna tshogs su 'khrul cing 'khor bas 'khor lo zhes bya'o //
NK086(lu)001:2200: de ltar 'khor lo bzhi po de yang gnas pa'i 'khor lo sems la 'dus te /
NK086(lu)001:2201: sems la sems 'dus chos kyi sku zhes dang /
NK086(lu)001:2202: srid pa'i 'khor lo lus la 'dus te /
NK086(lu)001:2203: lus med lus te lus kyi mchog /zhes dang /
NK086(lu)001:2204: sprul pa'i 'khor lo zhabs la 'dus te /
NK086(lu)001:2205: goms pa bgrod pas rigs drug mnan zhes dang /
NK086(lu)001:2206: gcod pa'i 'khor lo phyag mtshan te /
NK086(lu)001:2207: phrin las bzhi yis dngos po gcod //
NK086(lu)001:2209: de ltar 'khor lo rnam pa bzhi po bsdus na don rtags gnyis su 'du ste /
NK086(lu)001:2210: don ni gnas pa'i 'khor lo la /
NK086(lu)001:2211: rtags ni 'khor lo gsum du bzhed ces gsungs shing /
NK086(lu)001:2212: de la don lta ba yin te /
NK086(lu)001:2213: chos thams cad kyi 'byung gnas dang ngo bor gyur
NK086(lu)001:2214: pa chos nyid byang chub kyi bstan pa'i phyir ro
NK086(lu)001:2215: // rtags ni phrin las yin te /
NK086(lu)001:2216: srid pa'i 'khor lo ni phrin las kyi yul dang /
NK086(lu)001:2217: sprul pa'i 'khor lo ni phrin las kyi gzhi cho 'phrul snang ba dang /
NK086(lu)001:2218: gcod pa'i 'khor lo ni phrin las dngos yin pa'i phyir ro //
NK086(lu)001:2219: des na lta ba gcig dang sbyod pa gsum po
NK086(lu)001:2220: de lta bu la ma bral na gsang sngags kyi
NK086(lu)001:2221: don khong du chud kyis tshig tsam du gsang sngags
NK086(lu)001:2224: bslab pa'i mtha' drug rdzogs shing yo byad gnyis la
NK086(lu)001:2225: longs ma spyad na gsang sngags 'dzin par rlom yang
NK086(lu)001:2226: rnal 'byor pa dang chos su 'dzol bar gsungs so
NK086(lu)001:2227: // gnyis pa'i gcod pa'i 'khor lo khyad par du bshad pa ni /
NK086(lu)001:2229: 'khrul 'khor mthar thug gshin rje'i gshed ces dang /
NK086(lu)001:2230: gshin rje grub na 'khor lo bskor /
NK086(lu)001:2232: gshin rje'i gshed kyi rgyud 'dir 'khrul 'khor gyi tshul
NK086(lu)001:2233: mtha' dag bstan pas na de'i rnam bzhag cung zad
NK086(lu)001:2235: de yang gcod pa'i 'khor lo ni ya m+aan+ta ka'i phyag mtshan gyi phrin las su bshad la /
NK086(lu)001:2236: rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi nyams su len pa'i tshe
NK086(lu)001:2237: na 'khrul 'khor la brten nas las sgrub pa de
NK086(lu)001:2238: la gcod pa'i 'khor lor bshad pa'i phyir /
NK086(lu)001:2239: de lta bu'i gcod pa'i 'khor lo la gnyis te /
NK086(lu)001:2241: dang po thog gis brag la sogs pa gang yang thog med du 'joms pa ltar /
NK086(lu)001:2242: sngags gcig gis las thams cad thog rdug med par
NK086(lu)001:2243: myur du byed pa gnam thog chen mo zhes grags
NK086(lu)001:2244: so // gnyis pa lcags kyi mtshon sna tshogs rdeg pa ltar /
NK086(lu)001:2245: sngags mang po las gcig ma grub bar du yang yang brdegs pa ste /
NK086(lu)001:2249: 'khor lo nyi ma bzhi pa rkyang par bskor ba'o //
NK086(lu)001:2250: dang po 'khrul 'khor la gnyis te 'khrul 'khor chen po gsang ba dgu skor /
NK086(lu)001:2251: 'khrul bskor chung ngu phyi nang drug skor ro //
NK086(lu)001:2252: dang po la 'khrul 'khor bskor ba 'khrugs sdeb gzhung bsang ba gsum /
NK086(lu)001:2254: 'od zer rnam pa brgyad du 'khrul 'khor bskor ba /
NK086(lu)001:2257: phyi nang gsang ba dgur bskor ba /
NK086(lu)001:2258: rgyu rdo rje rgya gram du bskor ba /
NK086(lu)001:2259: mgar ba las kyi don du 'khrul 'khor bskor ba ste /
NK086(lu)001:2260: de rnams kyi bzlas thabs ni 'khor lo dka' gcod sgron mer shes par bya'o //
NK086(lu)001:2265: lde'u mig che chung gnyis ste brgyad do //
NK086(lu)001:2266: gsum pa gzhung bsrang ba ni /
NK086(lu)001:2268: gsung gi sgrub pa kha thun /
NK086(lu)001:2269: thugs kyi sgrub pa gsod byed /
NK086(lu)001:2270: yon tan gyi sgrub pa las bcu /
NK086(lu)001:2271: phrin las kyi sgrub pa las bzhi'o //
NK086(lu)001:2272: rtsa ba gsum ni khams gsum dbang sdud che 'bring chung gsum /
NK086(lu)001:2273: kha skong gsum ni sgrol ba mdung thung /
NK086(lu)001:2276: sdud pa gsum ni khams gsum dbang sdud /
NK086(lu)001:2278: las kyi mtha' sdud gsum mo /
NK086(lu)001:2279: las gang yang ma grub na mthar thug gsum la /
NK086(lu)001:2280: 'chi bdag drag po dmod la bor ba /
NK086(lu)001:2281: gshed po lto ba dkrug pa /
NK086(lu)001:2282: phyin ci log gnyis kyis gnad la dbab pa ste /
NK086(lu)001:2283: nyin bzhi pa'i phyin ci log gis pho gnad la dbab pa /
NK086(lu)001:2284: nub re la phyin ci log gis mo gnad la dbab pa'o //
NK086(lu)001:2285: de lta bu'i 'khrul 'khor thams cad kyi don bsdus
NK086(lu)001:2286: na lta ba don gyi 'khrul 'khor dang spyod pa
NK086(lu)001:2288: dang po snying po byang chub sems rig pa rang
NK086(lu)001:2289: byung gi ye shes 'khrul 'khor du gnas pa dang
NK086(lu)001:2291: dmigs gsal du gnas pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:2292: 'khrul pa'i me long du gnas pa rnams ni lta ba don gyi 'khrul 'khor te /
NK086(lu)001:2293: 'khor lo gsang ba'i mdzod 'byed pa'i lde'u mig go //
NK086(lu)001:2294: gnyis pa spyod pa rtags kyi 'khrul 'khor ni /
NK086(lu)001:2298: bcu bdun pa tshogs brgyad kyi sngags dang /
NK086(lu)001:2299: sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'i ngo bo gnas pa de /
NK086(lu)001:2300: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gshin rje stong gi ngo bor gnas pa dang snying por gnas pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:2301: 'jig rten pa'i bla srog gi ngo bor bstan pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:2303: gnyis pa dge sdig las kyi 'khrul 'khor la /
NK086(lu)001:2304: gso ba yon tan gyi 'khrul 'khor dang /
NK086(lu)001:2305: gsod pa phrin las drag po'i 'khrul 'khor /
NK086(lu)001:2308: thog ser skar mad'i 'khrul 'khor la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab kyang /
NK086(lu)001:2309: de dag las brgya rtsa brgyad du 'dus shing /
NK086(lu)001:2310: de yang bsdu na las bcur 'dus te /
NK086(lu)001:2311: zhi ba zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du bskor ba /
NK086(lu)001:2312: rgyas pa glang chen rgyab tu bskor ba /
NK086(lu)001:2313: dbang btsun mo'i mkhar bskor ba /
NK086(lu)001:2314: bsad pa gshin rje'i lto bar /
NK086(lu)001:2316: dbye ba rta glang 'thab pa'i bar du bskrad pa rnga mo'i 'phongs su /
NK086(lu)001:2317: smyo 'bog shan dmar gyi rgyab tu /
NK086(lu)001:2318: lkug pa lug gi khog par /
NK086(lu)001:2319: mnan pa ri rab rmad du bskor ba ste /
NK086(lu)001:2320: de dag kyang ye shes zla bar zhi ba'i las 'grub pa'i nus pa yod /
NK086(lu)001:2321: 'jig rte zla bar zhi las myur du grub pa'i nus pa yod /
NK086(lu)001:2322: tha mal gyi zla ba la zhi las 'grub pa'i cha mthun yod /
NK086(lu)001:2323: byin rlabs kyi zla ba thob shor med pas na
NK086(lu)001:2324: zhi ba zla ba'i dkyil du bskor bas bsgrub bya
NK086(lu)001:2325: gang la'ang the tshom med pa de bzhin gzhan dgu
NK086(lu)001:2326: po la'ang / rgyu mtshan bzhi po spyar te shes par bya'o //
NK086(lu)001:2327: las bcu po de dag kyang bsdus na zhi rgyas dbang drag bzhir 'dus la /
NK086(lu)001:2328: de bzhin yang gso bsad gnyis su 'dus ste zhi rgyas kyis gso ba'am rjes su 'dzin pa //
NK086(lu)001:2329: dbang drag gis bsad pa 'am tshar gcod par byed do //
NK086(lu)001:2331: ka ba bzhi dang gdung ma drug ste 'khrul 'khor chung ngu'o //
NK086(lu)001:2332: ka ba bzhi ni nyi ma bzhi pa'i lam kyi gang mtshams chen po bzhi la bya'o //
NK086(lu)001:2334: phyi nang gsang ba drug la bya'o //
NK086(lu)001:2335: de yang lcags 'dra ni phyi nang gsang ba dgu bskor gyi gzhung ste /
NK086(lu)001:2336: spyi'i phyi nang gsang ba dang /
NK086(lu)001:2337: nang gi phyi nang gsang ba dang /
NK086(lu)001:2338: gsang ba'i phyi nang gsang ba'o //
NK086(lu)001:2339: re la bskor lugs gsum ste /
NK086(lu)001:2340: phyi'i phyi mang gsang gsum mi reng 'gros su bskor ba dang /
NK086(lu)001:2341: nang gi phyi nang gsang gsum phyi rus sbal 'gros su bskor ba dang /
NK086(lu)001:2342: gsang ba'i phyi nang gsang gsum phyi nang dbus mtha' med par glang po'i 'gros su bskor ba'o //
NK086(lu)001:2345: phyi yi phyi dang gsang ba dang /
NK086(lu)001:2346: gsang ba'i phyi dang gsang ba ni /
NK086(lu)001:2347: dbus mtha' med par 'khor ba yin /
NK086(lu)001:2348: nang gi phyi dang gsang ba ni /
NK086(lu)001:2353: las byang rgyas 'bring bsdu gsum bka' stsal pa blo'i rim pa dang sbyar nas bshad pa'o //
NK086(lu)001:2354: ye shes lha nye bar bsnyen pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:2355: khro bo nye bar sgrubs pa gzhung bsrang nas /
NK086(lu)001:2356: nye bar 'ong zhing dngos su brtan pa thob par byas la /
NK086(lu)001:2357: 'khor lo bskor ba'i dus su sgrub pa'i gzhung bsrang ngo //
NK086(lu)001:2358: myur 'gyogs btsan thabs su byed na /
NK086(lu)001:2359: rdo rje ging pho mo'i 'khor lo so brdar te
NK086(lu)001:2360: 'tshon mi srid pa'i lugs su gzhug par bya ste
NK086(lu)001:2361: / de yang phyi nang gsang ba gsum gyis 'khor lo mtha' bsal te /
NK086(lu)001:2362: sngags kyi mtshams sbyar ba dang /
NK086(lu)001:2366: yon tan gyi 'gyur bstan pa la sogs pa ni man ngag las shes par bya'o //
NK086(lu)001:2367: de dag ni gshin rje'i thar ma bshad pa ste
NK086(lu)001:2368: deng sang 'di dag gi lag len rgyas pa byed
NK086(lu)001:2369: mkhan dkon yang / gshin rje gshed kyi 'khrul 'khor
NK086(lu)001:2370: gyi rgyud snga 'gyur bka' gter gyi phyogs du ma
NK086(lu)001:2371: mkhan dkon yang / dang / rtog pa gsum pa'i rgyud rong zom chos bzang gis bsgyur ba dang /
NK086(lu)001:2372: man ngag snying gzer nag po sogs rgyud dang man
NK086(lu)001:2373: ngag gi rim pa mang du bzhugs pa'i gshed skor
NK086(lu)001:2374: gyi 'khrul 'khor gyi phyag bzhes ma nyams par byin
NK086(lu)001:2375: rlabs kyi tshan pa dang bcas te gnas pa nyid
NK086(lu)001:2376: rnal 'byor pas gcod pa'i 'khor lo nyams su len
NK086(lu)001:2378: de ltar 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed ni sku yi bdag nyid yin pas /
NK086(lu)001:2379: de'i rgyud mtha' dag gi dgongs pa slob dpon 'jam
NK086(lu)001:2380: dpal gshes gnyen gyis 'khor lo bzhir bsdus pa 'di
NK086(lu)001:2381: dag ya m+aan+ta ka'i sku gcig la tshangs par bstan
NK086(lu)001:2382: pa'i tshul gyis gshed rgyud kyi dgongs pa gsal bar
NK086(lu)001:2384: 'chad tshul la gzhan du bdag gi bla ma 'jam
NK086(lu)001:2385: pa'i dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i dbang po'i snyan brgyud sogs las
NK086(lu)001:2386: gnas pa'i 'khor lo ni gnas lugs ngo bo nyid
NK086(lu)001:2387: kyi gzhi ste sbyang gzhi sems nyid rang byung gi
NK086(lu)001:2388: ye shes dang / srid pa'i 'khor lo ni 'khrul pa btags pa'i gzhi ste /
NK086(lu)001:2389: dbyings las glo bur gyi 'khrul pas sems can gyi
NK086(lu)001:2390: sgo gsum kun gzhi dang bcas ba'i snang ba sbyang
NK086(lu)001:2392: sprul pa'i 'khor lo ni 'khrul pa sbyong byed kyi lam ste /
NK086(lu)001:2393: de yang snang ba spyod byed dbyibs kyi rnal 'byor
NK086(lu)001:2394: lha sku'i gsal snang dang sngags kyi 'od zer 'phro
NK086(lu)001:2395: 'du / zhen pa sbyong phyir sngags kyi rnal 'byor
NK086(lu)001:2396: rdor bzlas bum can gtum mo gzhan lus dang bcas
NK086(lu)001:2397: 'du / pa / mthar thug chos kyi rnal 'byor
NK086(lu)001:2398: 'khor 'das dbyer med nges don zil gnon chen po'i
NK086(lu)001:2399: rang bzhin nyid lta bas rtogs shing de dang ma
NK086(lu)001:2400: bral ba'i tshul gyi mtshan bcas sor sdud sogs kyi
NK086(lu)001:2401: 'du / pa / rdzogs rim dang / mtshan med
NK086(lu)001:2402: khregs chod thod rgal gyi rdzogs rim ste sgom spyod
NK086(lu)001:2403: 'du / pa / rdzogs rim dang / kyis bsdus
NK086(lu)001:2404: pa'o // gcod ba'i 'khor lo ni mthar thug gi
NK086(lu)001:2405: 'bras bu nges pa don gyi ya m+aan+ta ka'i skur
NK086(lu)001:2406: 'du / pa / rdzogs rim dang / kyis bsdus
NK086(lu)001:2407: pa'o // grub ba ste / sgrib gnyis bag chags
NK086(lu)001:2408: dang bcas pa gcod cing 'gro don rgyun mi 'chad
NK086(lu)001:2413: nges don rdzogs pa'i rim par sbyar ba'i tshul gyis
NK086(lu)001:2414: bzhed pa 'dra min yod pa shes par bya zhing
NK086(lu)001:2415: de bzhin sgrub bka' gzhan la'ang shes par bya'o //
NK086(lu)001:2416: gnyis pa pad+ma gsung gi sgrub pa thams cad rta skad theng gsum gyi dgongs par bstan pa la /
NK086(lu)001:2418: theg pa rim par bgrod pa'i rta skad rta yi
NK086(lu)001:2419: 'gros dgus theg dgu rtser chib par bshad pa dang
NK086(lu)001:2420: / sa lam la sbyar ba'i rta skang bcu gsum
NK086(lu)001:2421: dang sbyar te bshad pas sa bcu lam lnga myur
NK086(lu)001:2422: du bgrod bar bshad pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:2423: gsang sngags la shan dbye ba'i rta skad rta mgo
NK086(lu)001:2424: ljang zhur kyis dpal rta mgrin nyid che ba'i yon
NK086(lu)001:2425: tan gzhan las 'phags pa'i sgo nas bshad pa dang
NK086(lu)001:2426: / gdul bya thabs kyi rta skad dpal chen po
NK086(lu)001:2427: dang ma mo 'bum pa rnga 'phrad klong rdol dbang
NK086(lu)001:2428: sgyur ba'i sgo nas bshad pa'o //
NK086(lu)001:2430: rta yi 'gros dgu dper byas nas theg pa dgu mtshon ba ste /
NK086(lu)001:2431: 'jig rten na rta la 'gros tshul dgu yod pa ni /
NK086(lu)001:2434: pho nya srun zhes pa rung ba'i don no srun gyi 'gros /
NK086(lu)001:2441: de la dang po sgrog gi 'gros ni /
NK086(lu)001:2442: rta rnams sgrog gsum lag du tshud ba'i tshe 'gros mi myur bar 'gro ba ltar /
NK086(lu)001:2443: lha mi'i theg pa rnams ni ma skyes mnyam pa'i don gyi lta ba ni ma mthong la /
NK086(lu)001:2444: legs smon gyi bsam pas dge ba bcu la sogs pa'i khrims dam pa sgrog lta bus bsdam nas /
NK086(lu)001:2445: bag yang pa'i lta spyod zab mor dbang med pa dang chos 'dra'o //
NK086(lu)001:2446: sor bzhag lha mi'i theg pa ste dang po'o //
NK086(lu)001:2448: rta lag gnyis lcags grog gis bsdam pa de sgrog
NK086(lu)001:2449: gi 'gros las myur yang lag ba bsdam pas rang
NK086(lu)001:2451: gang zag gi bdag med tsam mthong ba'i nyan thos pa rnams ni /
NK086(lu)001:2452: lha mi'i theg pa rkyang pa las 'phags kyang /
NK086(lu)001:2453: theg pa chen po'i don ma mthong bas mnyam pa
NK086(lu)001:2454: nyid kyi lta spyod kyi sgo nas bag yangs su
NK086(lu)001:2455: rgyu ba'i dbang ma thob par /
NK086(lu)001:2456: log tu lci ba 'dus ba lcags sgrog dang 'dra
NK086(lu)001:2457: bas bsdam pa ni myur du sangs rgyas kyi sa
NK086(lu)001:2458: la dbugs mi 'byin pa'i sdug bsngal dang bcas pa'o
NK086(lu)001:2461: rta yi rkang lag la 'ching byed med par rang
NK086(lu)001:2462: nyid dal bus 'gro ba ni snga ma las myur
NK086(lu)001:2463: yang 'gros gong ma rnams las zhan ba ltar /
NK086(lu)001:2464: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ni nyan thos las
NK086(lu)001:2465: gzung ba gzugs kyi phyogs rang bzhin med par rtogs
NK086(lu)001:2466: pa'i cha nas 'phags lte srid pa tha mar sngon
NK086(lu)001:2467: gom pa'i shugs kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen la mi
NK086(lu)001:2468: ltos par rten 'brel gyi don rang nyid kyis khong
NK086(lu)001:2469: du chud nas rang rgyal ba'i 'bras bu mngon du
NK086(lu)001:2470: byed nus kyang / theg pa chen po mnyam pa
NK086(lu)001:2471: nyid kyi don ma mthong la thabs shes chung bas
NK086(lu)001:2472: mthar thug gi sa la myur du phyin mi nus
NK086(lu)001:2474: bzhi pa mtshams legs gzengs kyi 'gros ni /
NK086(lu)001:2475: rta de mgo 'phang bsgrib nas cung zad mgyogs par
NK086(lu)001:2476: 'gro ba ltar theg pa chen po'i mdo sde pha
NK086(lu)001:2477: rol tu phyin pa'i don thugs su chud pa rnams
NK086(lu)001:2478: ni bdag med gnyis rtogs nas mthar thug mnyam pa
NK086(lu)001:2479: nyid la nges shes skyes kyang da dung bsal ba
NK086(lu)001:2480: grangs med pa'i bar du sbyang bgrod dgos pas theg
NK086(lu)001:2481: dman las sangs rgyas pa myur la sngags las bul
NK086(lu)001:2482: ba'i phyir rta yi 'gros 'di dang sbyar ro //
NK086(lu)001:2483: lnga pa gom bu nyol 'gros te /
NK086(lu)001:2484: rta gom pa'i 'gros su mgyogs par 'gro ba ltar
NK086(lu)001:2485: kri ya pas mnyam pa nyid mthong ba'i steng du
NK086(lu)001:2486: / kun rdzob tu lha'i sku gsung thugs mtshan la
NK086(lu)001:2487: dmigs shing gtsang sbra la sogs pa'i thabs dang bcas
NK086(lu)001:2488: pas tshogs gnyis myur du rdzogs pa'i thabs mkhas dang
NK086(lu)001:2489: ldan pas phar phyin theg pa las lam bgrod pa
NK086(lu)001:2490: myur bas 'gros 'di dang mtshungs par sbyar ba'o //
NK086(lu)001:2491: drug pa sbyang mo'i 'dur 'gros ni spyang ku 'dur nas 'gro ba ltar /
NK086(lu)001:2492: rta rnams goms 'gros las kyang mgyogs par bskul nas 'dur nas 'gro ba ltar /
NK086(lu)001:2493: u pa ya dang yo ga'i theg pa ni /
NK086(lu)001:2494: kri ya'i lta spyod kyis steng du bdag dang lha
NK086(lu)001:2495: mnyam pa spun grogs kyi tshul lam dam ye gnyis
NK086(lu)001:2496: med du sgrubs pa'i dgongs spyod kyis 'phags la phyi
NK086(lu)001:2497: nang gi rgyu rkyen cha mnyam par spyod pas bya
NK086(lu)001:2498: rgyud pa las lam 'grod pa myur ba ni rta
NK086(lu)001:2499: yi 'dur 'gros dang mtshungs par sbyar ba'o //
NK086(lu)001:2500: bdun pa ni 'dur 'gros las kyang rol mo'i stabs 'gros zhes /
NK086(lu)001:2501: ldang stabs kyis 'gro ba mgyogs pa ltar /
NK086(lu)001:2502: kri yog las kyang rnal 'byor chen po ma h+aa yo ga pa'i theg pa 'phags te /
NK086(lu)001:2503: sems nyid mnyam pa nyid kyi dbyings nas yi ge'i
NK086(lu)001:2504: cho 'phrul las rten dang brten pa'i lha'i 'khor lo
NK086(lu)001:2505: rnams snang stong zung 'jug chu zla'i tshul du bsgom
NK086(lu)001:2506: pa'i phyir na 'bras bu sku dang ye shes kyi
NK086(lu)001:2507: dkyil 'khor la da lta nas lam du byed pa'i
NK086(lu)001:2508: thabs khyad par 'phags pa yod pas sangs rgyas kyi
NK086(lu)001:2509: sa la bgrod pa myur ba'i phyir ro //
NK086(lu)001:2510: brgyad pa 'jol mo dkyus kyi 'gros zhes /
NK086(lu)001:2511: rta shin tu mgyogs par rgyug chung byas te 'gro ba ni /
NK086(lu)001:2512: ldeng 'gros las kyang sa chod che zhing mgyogs pa ltar /
NK086(lu)001:2513: a nu'i theg ba ni phyi spros bcas bskyed rim
NK086(lu)001:2514: gyi ngal ba mi dgos par rgyu dag pa'i dbyings
NK086(lu)001:2515: nas 'bras bu ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor shar ba'i
NK086(lu)001:2516: tshul rang gi phung khams rnams gdod nas dag pa'i
NK086(lu)001:2517: sangs rgyas kyi ngo bor shes nas dbyings ye dbyer
NK086(lu)001:2518: med bde ba chen po'i de nyid lam du byed
NK086(lu)001:2519: pa'i thabs khyad par can du ldan pa'i phyir lam
NK086(lu)001:2520: bgrod pa 'og ma bas ches myur ba'i phyir ro
NK086(lu)001:2521: // dgu pa dkyus tshang pa'i 'gros zhes bya ba
NK086(lu)001:2522: rta rang la rgyug rtsal ji yod phyung te thag
NK086(lu)001:2523: thogs med par brgyug pa ltar /
NK086(lu)001:2524: a ti yo ga'i theg pa ni /
NK086(lu)001:2525: chos thams cad sems kyi rang snang yin la /
NK086(lu)001:2526: sems ni sems med ngo bo nyid kyis stong te
NK086(lu)001:2527: ye nas skye 'gag med pa'i rig pa byang chub
NK086(lu)001:2528: sems kyi bde ba chen po thig le nyag gcig
NK086(lu)001:2529: 'od gsal ba'i ye shes rang byung gi bdag nyid
NK086(lu)001:2530: chen po bcos su med pa'i don 'byung 'jug med
NK086(lu)001:2531: pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bya rtsol gyi 'ching ba
NK086(lu)001:2532: spang te so ma gnyug mar gnas pas /
NK086(lu)001:2533: da lta nas 'bras bu'i sa la lhun gyis grub
NK086(lu)001:2534: pa'i tshul gyis dbang 'byor bar byed pas na lam
NK086(lu)001:2535: thams cad kyi rtse mor phyin pa yin pa'i phyir
NK086(lu)001:2536: ro // de ltar lta yi 'gros dgus theg pa'i rim pa shes par bya ba ni /
NK086(lu)001:2537: theg pa kun gyi rgyal po rdzogs pa chen po
NK086(lu)001:2538: rang byung gi ye shes mnyam pa nyid rta skad
NK086(lu)001:2539: theg gcig gam rta skad dang po'i dgongs pa lta
NK086(lu)001:2540: ba'i gnad bstan pa'i phyir du yin no //
NK086(lu)001:2541: gnyis pa lam la sbyar ba'i rta skad ni rgyal
NK086(lu)001:2542: ba thams cad kyi thugs rje chen po'i rang gzugs
NK086(lu)001:2543: 'phags mchog spyad ras gzigs nyid khro bo'i skabs na
NK086(lu)001:2544: dpal rta mgrin zhes bya ste /
NK086(lu)001:2545: ma chags pad+ma'i rigs su snang ba'i khro bo thams
NK086(lu)001:2546: cad kyi spyo dpal chen po 'di ni ye shes
NK086(lu)001:2547: dang las dang 'jig rten gyi gtso bo dam pa
NK086(lu)001:2548: thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i rje btsun bla na
NK086(lu)001:2549: med pa yin pas lhag pa'i lha gzhan las kyang
NK086(lu)001:2550: thugs rje byin rlabs myur ba'i che ba rta yi
NK086(lu)001:2551: skad la yon tan bcu gsum yod pa'i ldog chas
NK086(lu)001:2552: mtshon pa ste / ji ltar na /
NK086(lu)001:2553: rta yi skad snyad pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:2564: ngar che ba dang phul du phyin pa'o //
NK086(lu)001:2565: de yang dang po rta skad snyan pa ltar dpal
NK086(lu)001:2566: rta mgrin yang thugs rje chen pos 'gro ba'i don
NK086(lu)001:2568: sa dang po rab tu dga' ba dang lam ni tshogs kyi lam dang sbyar ro //
NK086(lu)001:2569: gnyis pa rta skad 'jam pa ltar dpal rta mgrin
NK086(lu)001:2570: yang 'gro ba'i don la thugs byams pa chen pos
NK086(lu)001:2571: 'jam pa'o // sa gnyis pa dri ma med pa dang lam sbyor lam dang sbyar ro //
NK086(lu)001:2572: gsum pa rta skad rgyang ring du gtang pa ste thos pa ltar /
NK086(lu)001:2573: dpal rta mgrin kyang 'gro ba'i don la ma thos
NK086(lu)001:2574: pa med par thams cad du snyoms par khyab cing
NK086(lu)001:2575: gnas pa ste / sa gsum pa 'od byed pa dang sbyar ro //
NK086(lu)001:2576: bzhi pa rta skad gsang ba ni sgra gzhan dang
NK086(lu)001:2577: nag nog med par sang nger thos pa ltar dpal
NK086(lu)001:2578: rta mgrin yang 'gro ba'i don la thugs gsal la
NK086(lu)001:2580: de ni sa bzhi pa 'od 'phro ba dang spyar ro //
NK086(lu)001:2581: lnga pa rta skad ring ba ste /
NK086(lu)001:2582: dbugs sna mi thung ba ring du sgrogs pa ltar /
NK086(lu)001:2583: dpal rta mgrin ni 'gro ba'i don la dus rtag tu mi skyo bar ring pa'o //
NK086(lu)001:2584: de ni sa lnga pa sbyang bka' ba dang mthong ba'i lam dang sbyar ro //
NK086(lu)001:2585: drug pa rta skad ni thos na yid du 'ong
NK086(lu)001:2586: ba ltar dpal rta mgrin ni thams cad la thugs
NK086(lu)001:2587: rje mnyam pas re ba rdzogs par mdzad pa ste
NK086(lu)001:2588: sa drug pa mngon du gyur pa dang sbyar ro
NK086(lu)001:2589: // bdun pa rta skad ni gdangs che chung sogs snyoms par 'brel ba ltar /
NK086(lu)001:2590: dpal rta mgrin ni 'gro ba rnams la thugs rje rtag tu 'brel bas gzigs pa'o //
NK086(lu)001:2591: de ni sa bdun pa ring du song ba dang sbyar ro //
NK086(lu)001:2592: brgyad pa rta yi skad ni stong theb gcig po ngar sgra bar ma chad par sgrogs pa ltar /
NK086(lu)001:2593: dpal rta mgrin ni 'gro don rgyun mi gcod pa ste //
NK086(lu)001:2594: sa brgyad pa mi g.yo ba dang lam ni bsgom pa'i lam dang sbyar ro //
NK086(lu)001:2595: dgu pa rta yi skad zil che ba ste byin
NK086(lu)001:2596: chags shing mngon par 'phags pa ltar dpal rta mgrin
NK086(lu)001:2597: kyang 'gro ba rnams kyi nyon mongs pa 'joms shing
NK086(lu)001:2598: thams cad zil gyis gnon ste /
NK086(lu)001:2599: sa dgu pa legs pa'i blo gros dag sbyar ro //
NK086(lu)001:2600: bcu pa rta skad rtsal che ba ste /
NK086(lu)001:2601: skad che chung ji ltar 'byin par 'dod pa bzhin bde blag du 'byin pa'i rtsal yod pa ltar /
NK086(lu)001:2602: dpal rta mgrin ni 'gro ba'i don la mthu stobs kyi rtsal dang ldan pa ste /
NK086(lu)001:2603: sa bcu pa chos kyi sprin dang lam mi slob pa'i lam dang sbyar ro //
NK086(lu)001:2604: bcu gcig pa rta yi skad sgra gdangs che ba ltar /
NK086(lu)001:2605: dpal rta mgrin kyang thugs rje chen pos 'khor bar don mdzad pa'i gdengs sam dbyings rgya che ba'o //
NK086(lu)001:2606: de ni sa bcu gcig pa kun tu 'od dang sbyar ro //
NK086(lu)001:2607: bcu gnyis pa rta skad ngar che ba ste shugs
NK086(lu)001:2608: che bar sgrogs pa bzhin du dpal rta mgrin kyang
NK086(lu)001:2609: 'gro ba sgrol pa'i ngar dang ldan pa ste /
NK086(lu)001:2610: sa bcu gnyis pa ma chags pad+ma can dang sbyar ro //
NK086(lu)001:2611: bcu gsum pa rta skad ni yon tan du ma dang ldan pas phul du phyin pa ltar /
NK086(lu)001:2612: dpal rta mgrin ni 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa la phul du phyin pa ste /
NK086(lu)001:2613: sa bcu gsum pa yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen gyi sa dang sbyar bar bya'o //
NK086(lu)001:2614: de ltar dpal rta mgrin gyi che ba'i yon tan bcu gsum po rta skad kyis mtshon cing /
NK086(lu)001:2615: dpal rta mgrin gyi rta skad theng gcig bsgrags pa
NK086(lu)001:2616: la rta skad kyi yon tan bcu gsum dus gcig
NK086(lu)001:2617: tshang ba ltar / sa bcu gsum dang lam lnga
NK086(lu)001:2618: yang ma bgrod dus gcig la rdzogs nus pa'i yon
NK086(lu)001:2619: tan gyi khyad par de lta bu mnga' ba'i don
NK086(lu)001:2620: tshang ba ltar / / dbu gtsug gi rta mgo
NK086(lu)001:2621: ljang gu dpral bar zhur dkar po rngogs dmar bo
NK086(lu)001:2622: tshang ba ltar / / // phu phun ser po
NK086(lu)001:2623: can gyis brda dang rtags kyi sgo nas mtshon te
NK086(lu)001:2625: gsum pa gsang sngags la shan dbye ba'i rta skad ni /
NK086(lu)001:2626: dpal rta mgrin gyi lha sngags ting 'dzin la brten pa'i gsang sngags kyi dgongs spyod ni /
NK086(lu)001:2627: rta shugs che la 'gro mgyogs pa ltar gsang sngags
NK086(lu)001:2628: kyi dgongs spyod zab mo la brten na lam gzhan
NK086(lu)001:2629: las sangs rgyas kyi sa la bgrod pa mgyogs /
NK086(lu)001:2630: rta lam la bgrod mkhas pa ltar theg dgu dang
NK086(lu)001:2631: sa lam bgrod pa la mkhas shing rtse mor phyin
NK086(lu)001:2632: par byed / rta kha rtsal che ba ltar /
NK086(lu)001:2633: rta mchog gi gsang sngags gzhan las kha rtsal che /
NK086(lu)001:2634: rta ni drag po'i ngar dang ldan pa ltar /
NK086(lu)001:2635: rta mgrin kyang drag po'i rngam tshul gis gdug pa 'dul /
NK086(lu)001:2636: rta de rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ldan pas sangs
NK086(lu)001:2637: rgyas kyis myur du gnon par byed pa'i rtags dang
NK086(lu)001:2638: ldan pa ste / de'i phyir rta mgrin zhes bya la /
NK086(lu)001:2639: phyi yi rta mgrin de yang nang rnal 'byor pa'i sku /
NK086(lu)001:2640: gsang ba rang gi sems las gud na med par
NK086(lu)001:2641: snang grags rig gsum rta mgrin gyi sku gsung thugs
NK086(lu)001:2642: su shes shing / sems nyid rang byung gi ye
NK086(lu)001:2643: shes kun khyab bde ba chen po de nyid nges
NK086(lu)001:2644: pa don gyi pad+ma dbang gi rgyal po yin par
NK086(lu)001:2645: shes na skad cig de la mchog thun mong gi
NK086(lu)001:2646: dngos grub thob pa yin pas sa lam dang sbyar
NK086(lu)001:2647: ba dang gsang sngags la shan dbye ba'i rta skad
NK086(lu)001:2648: 'di ni sgom pa'i gnad kyi che ba bstan pa
NK086(lu)001:2649: yin par rta skad gnyis pa'i dgongs par don gyis
NK086(lu)001:2651: bzhi pa gdul bya thabs kyi rta skad ni /
NK086(lu)001:2652: dpal rta mgrin gyi rta skad theng gsum gyis ma mo mkha' 'gro'i tshogs la brda' sprad pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:2653: ma mo'i 'gying skad theng gsum gyis dpal rdo rje'i
NK086(lu)001:2654: ming sring brda 'phrod de dgongs klong rdol ba dang
NK086(lu)001:2655: / rnal 'byor pa'i brda' skad theng gsum gyis snang
NK086(lu)001:2656: srid ma mo'i tshogs la dbang bsgyur te las byed
NK086(lu)001:2657: pa'i tshul bstan pa gsum las /
NK086(lu)001:2658: dang po thabs kyi rta skad theng gsum ni /
NK086(lu)001:2659: dpal rta mgrin gyi dbu gtsug nas rta skad dang po theng gcig bsgrags pa'i tshe /
NK086(lu)001:2660: sna srid kyi chos thams cad ye nas ma bcos
NK086(lu)001:2661: ma bsgyur bar 'khor 'das mnyam pa nyid rang byung
NK086(lu)001:2662: gi ye shes chen po'i ngang du dpal rta mgrin
NK086(lu)001:2663: gyi dkyil 'khor du lhun gyis grub par rtogs pa'o
NK086(lu)001:2664: // rta skad bar ma bos pas /
NK086(lu)001:2665: khams gsum srid gsum gyi bsdus pa'i chos thams cad sha chen gyi phung po /
NK086(lu)001:2667: keng rus kyi ri rab du gyur pas /
NK086(lu)001:2668: snang srid kyi ma mo dang mkha' 'gro thams cad dgyes pa'i longs spyod rgyun mi 'chad par byas /
NK086(lu)001:2669: rta skad tha ma bsgrags pas ma mo dang mkha'
NK086(lu)001:2670: 'gro thams cad bka' 'og tu bsdus nas ci bgyis
