NK086(lu)001:2671: bka' nyan cing 'gying glu dang bcas nas bkug te
NK086(lu)001:2672: / phrin las rnam pa bzhi sogs yid bzhin du rdzogs par byed do //
NK086(lu)001:2673: 'di ni dpal chen po rta mgrin nyid kyi rta skad theng gsum bsgrags pa'i mdzad pa yin la /
NK086(lu)001:2674: lam dus su rta mgrin gyi rnal 'byor pas de ltar sgom pa'ang yin cing /
NK086(lu)001:2675: rta skad gsum po des brda rtags kyis mtshon don /
NK086(lu)001:2676: lta sgom spyod pa gsum bstan te /
NK086(lu)001:2677: rta skad dang pos mnyam pa nyid kyi lta ba bstan /
NK086(lu)001:2678: gnyis pas gsang sngags thabs la mkhas pa'i khyad par
NK086(lu)001:2679: dug gsum gnas su sbyong zhing ma mo mkha' 'gro
NK086(lu)001:2680: dbang du bsdus nas gsang ba sbyor sgrol gyi nyams
NK086(lu)001:2681: len dang / khro bo'i ting nge 'dzin sogs bskyed rdzogs kyi lam khyad par can bstan /
NK086(lu)001:2682: rta skad gsum pas gsang sngags kyi rnal 'byor pas
NK086(lu)001:2683: ma mo mkha' 'gro'i tshogs dbang du bsdus te phrin
NK086(lu)001:2684: las rnam pa bzhi sgrub pa'i tshul gyis spyod pa
NK086(lu)001:2686: der ma zad bdag gi bla ma gter chen rin po che'i snyan brgyud las /
NK086(lu)001:2687: drang don dang sbyar ba'i rta skad theng gsum yongs grags la /
NK086(lu)001:2689: rta skad dang pos gzhi 'khor 'das dbyer med rig stong gnyug ma don gyi ye shes bstan /
NK086(lu)001:2690: gnyis pa sa lam bskyed pa'i rim pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:2691: rdzogs rim sor sdud la sogs pa'i sbyor ba yan lag drug gi rnal 'byor bstan /
NK086(lu)001:2692: rta skad gsum pas 'bras bu mthar thug gi ye
NK086(lu)001:2693: shes mngon du byed pa'i tshul bstan pa smin khrid
NK086(lu)001:2694: kyi tshul du bdag cag gis legs pa non pa
NK086(lu)001:2695: yin no // de ltar dpal gyi rta skad theng
NK086(lu)001:2696: gsum gyis bskul ba'i dus na ma mo mkha' 'gro
NK086(lu)001:2697: rnams 'gyings bzhin sngon gyi dam tshig dang tha tshig
NK086(lu)001:2698: las mi 'da' ba'i glu len te gang zhe na
NK086(lu)001:2699: yin no // / bdag cag nam mkha'i dbyings nas mchi /
NK086(lu)001:2700: nam mkha'i dbyings nas mi mchi ru /
NK086(lu)001:2701: bdag cag gnas ni nam mkha' lags //
NK086(lu)001:2702: bdag cag 'theng zhing grum zhing mchi //
NK086(lu)001:2703: 'thing zhing grub zhing mi mchi ru //
NK086(lu)001:2704: keng rus rir rab rtse mo tsha //
NK086(lu)001:2705: bdag cag 'bog cing brkyang zhing mchi //
NK086(lu)001:2706: 'bog cing rgyal zhing mi mchi ru //
NK086(lu)001:2707: rak+ta'i rgya mtsho gting re zab //
NK086(lu)001:2708: bdag cag thang gcig yud la mchi //
NK086(lu)001:2709: thang gcig yud la mi mchi ru //
NK086(lu)001:2710: ming po rdo rje bka' lus gnyan //
NK086(lu)001:2712: de la rnal 'byor pa'i brda skad theng gsum ni /
NK086(lu)001:2713: chos la dgra byung gis sangs rgyas ra mda' bzlog ces pa'i brda' skad dang bcas ste /
NK086(lu)001:2714: thal mo dang po brdab pa'i brdas dpal khrag 'thung rnams dbyings nas bskul /
NK086(lu)001:2715: bar ma brdab pas phra men rnams dbyings nas bskul /
NK086(lu)001:2716: thal mo tha ma brdab pas las kyi mkha' 'gro
NK086(lu)001:2717: rnams las la bskul te bstan pa'i brtsigs pa ni
NK086(lu)001:2718: rnal 'byor pa'i brda skad theng gsum zhes bya'o //
NK086(lu)001:2719: de la dpal gyi rta skad kyi brda sprad /
NK086(lu)001:2720: ma mo'i 'gying skad kyis klong rdol rnal 'byor pa'i
NK086(lu)001:2721: brda skad kyis dbang du bsdus te phrin las byed
NK086(lu)001:2722: pa la gdul bya thabs kyi rta skad ces bya'o
NK086(lu)001:2723: // de ltar rta skad de dag thams cad kyi don bsdus na /
NK086(lu)001:2724: rta skad lta bar dgongs pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:2725: rta skad spyod par dgongs pa gnyis su 'dul /
NK086(lu)001:2726: dang po la ngo bo don gyi rta skad dang gsang sngags gnad kyi rta skad gnyis /
NK086(lu)001:2728: rang bzhin ngo bo don gyi rta skad /
NK086(lu)001:2729: rig pa ngo bo don gyi rta skad /
NK086(lu)001:2730: gnyis su med pa'i ngo bo don gyi rta skad gsum gyi /
NK086(lu)001:2731: dang po ni chos thams cad ma bcos mnyam pa
NK086(lu)001:2732: nyid nges pa don gyi rtam mgrin du rtogs pa'o
NK086(lu)001:2733: // gnyis pa de'i ngang las rang rig pa dpal
NK086(lu)001:2734: chen po rta mgrin gyi skur ye nas ma bcos
NK086(lu)001:2735: // par gsal ba'o // gsum pa de lta bu'i
NK086(lu)001:2736: snang stong thabs shes bden gnyis dbyings ye rnams gnyis
NK086(lu)001:2737: med bde ba chen po dpal rta mgrin gyi dkyil
NK086(lu)001:2738: 'khor du snang srid kyi chos thams cad rtogs pa
NK086(lu)001:2739: ni ngo bo don gyi rta skad de lta ba
NK086(lu)001:2740: // par gsal ba'o // bstan pa'o // gnyis pa gsang sngags gnad kyi rta skad ni /
NK086(lu)001:2741: rta'i 'gros dang theg rim sbyar ba rta skad dang
NK086(lu)001:2742: sa lam sbyar ba rta yi yon tan dang sbyar
NK086(lu)001:2743: ba'i gsang sngags la shan dbye ba gsum ni /
NK086(lu)001:2744: dpal rta mgrin gyi rnal 'byor zab mo'i lam ni theg pa'i rtse mo dang /
NK086(lu)001:2745: sa lam cig car bgrod pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:2746: gsang sngags gzhan las 'phags pa'i che ba ston par byed pa yin no //
NK086(lu)001:2747: des sgom pa yang don gyis mtshon no //
NK086(lu)001:2748: gnyis pa rta skad sbyong bar dgongs pa la /
NK086(lu)001:2749: 'dul bya thabs kyi rta skad dang /
NK086(lu)001:2750: dpal che mche ba'i rta skad gnyis /
NK086(lu)001:2752: dpal gyi rta skad theng gsum /
NK086(lu)001:2754: rnal 'byor pa'i brda skad theng gsum mo //
NK086(lu)001:2755: dpal gyi rta skad theng gsum ni /
NK086(lu)001:2756: dang po dam tshig rjes su bskul ba'i rta skad /
NK086(lu)001:2757: bar pa bka' la drangs pa /
NK086(lu)001:2758: tha ma don byed pa'i rta skad gsum mo //
NK086(lu)001:2759: ma mo'i 'gying glu theng gsum ni /
NK086(lu)001:2760: rang rgyud che ba'i rngam skad /
NK086(lu)001:2761: byin rlabs rdzas ldan gyi gdangs skad /
NK086(lu)001:2762: drag po'i las la chas pa'i rngam skad gsum mo //
NK086(lu)001:2763: rnal 'byor pa'i brda' skad theng gsum /
NK086(lu)001:2767: dpal gyi che ba'i rta skad ni /
NK086(lu)001:2769: thams cad dbang du sdud par byed /
NK086(lu)001:2771: lha srin sde brgyad nyer ma 'dod /
NK086(lu)001:2772: rtags ma thon bgo ba mi nyan na /
NK086(lu)001:2773: sde brgyad srid pa dkrugs pa'i don du bdag pad+ma
NK086(lu)001:2774: dbang chen gyi ting 'dzin gsal brtan tshad dang ldan
NK086(lu)001:2775: pas na skad theng gsum bsgrags na /
NK086(lu)001:2776: snang srid sde brgyad thams cad 'brong rgod 'drog pa bzhin du had kyis sdangs shing /
NK086(lu)001:2777: sha rul la sbrang bu bzhin rang dbang med par 'du ba dang /
NK086(lu)001:2778: rgyal khrims dam pa'i dmang bzhin las byed par 'gyur
NK086(lu)001:2779: bas de lta bu'i don dang ldan pa ni rta
NK086(lu)001:2780: mgrin gyi rnal 'byor pa'o zhes gsungs so //
NK086(lu)001:2781: de lta bur rta skad kyi dgongs pa rnam par
NK086(lu)001:2782: bzhag pa sna tshogs kyang mthar thug rang byung ye
NK086(lu)001:2783: shes de la 'dus zhes gsungs pa ltar rta skad
NK086(lu)001:2784: theng gcig gi dgongs pa yang zer te /
NK086(lu)001:2785: rang byung ye shes thig le nyag gcig du skyol
NK086(lu)001:2786: ba ni skabs 'dir ma zad sgrub sde gzhan thams
NK086(lu)001:2787: cad kyi dgongs pa'i phug de kho nar skyel bar
NK086(lu)001:2788: bya dgos so // gsum pa yang dag thugs kyi
NK086(lu)001:2789: sgrub pa thams cad ru lu 'bru brgyad kyi dgongs
NK086(lu)001:2791: lta ba la shan dang sbyar te bshad pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:2792: phrin las lag len dang sbyar te bshad pa /
NK086(lu)001:2793: bskyed rim bsnyen sgrub dang sbyar te bshad pa /
NK086(lu)001:2794: man ngag sgang bsgril rdzogs rim dang sbyar te bshad pa bzhi las /
NK086(lu)001:2796: spyir yang dag zhes bya ba sgrib pa mi mnga' ba'i don te /
NK086(lu)001:2797: 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das ba'i chos thams
NK086(lu)001:2798: cad gnyis su med par mnyam nyid rang byung gi
NK086(lu)001:2799: ye shes thig le nyag gcig du gnas pa de
NK086(lu)001:2800: kho na / dus gsum gyi rgyal ba thams cad
NK086(lu)001:2801: kyi thugs yang dag pa'i ye shes yin pas de
NK086(lu)001:2803: de'i phyir chos thams cad sku gsung thugs phyag rgya
NK086(lu)001:2804: chen po'i dkyil 'khor du lhun gyis grub pa ni
NK086(lu)001:2806: de ni rigs thams cad kyi khyab bdag dpal chen
NK086(lu)001:2807: po nyid yin bas gcig pu nyid ces bya ste
NK086(lu)001:2808: / he ru ka'i gal po las /
NK086(lu)001:2809: yang dag grub pa gcig pu nyid //
NK086(lu)001:2810: sangs rgyas bde chen kun 'dus pa //
NK086(lu)001:2811: rnal 'byor zab mo sku gsum rdzogs //
NK086(lu)001:2812: mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog bde zhes dang /
NK086(lu)001:2813: sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor sogs las /
NK086(lu)001:2815: gcig pu nyid ni che ba'i lha //
NK086(lu)001:2816: zhes sogs gsungs pa bzhin no //
NK086(lu)001:2817: de lta bu'i yang dag pa'i ye shes dpal chen
NK086(lu)001:2818: po'i thugs ni ru lu'i gsang sngags kyi rnam par
NK086(lu)001:2819: shar ba de'i mtshon don don rtags kyi lha dang
NK086(lu)001:2820: / de bzlas sgom gyi thabs dang /
NK086(lu)001:2821: de la brten pa zab gsal gyi ting nge 'dzin
NK086(lu)001:2822: lam du byas pas dpal he ru ka'i thugs kyi
NK086(lu)001:2823: dngos grub myur du thob pas na yang dag gi
NK086(lu)001:2824: sgrub pa thams cad du ru lu'i dgongs par 'du
NK086(lu)001:2825: zhing de'i tshul la mkhas par bya dgos so //
NK086(lu)001:2827: ni ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin /
NK086(lu)001:2828: ru ni rak+ta'i sgra las chags pa dang dmar ba'i don te /
NK086(lu)001:2829: sems can gyi srog khrag gi rang bzhin chags pa'i ye shes pad+ma he ru ka'i ngo bo /
NK086(lu)001:2830: yang ru ni kun gzhi byang chub sems mar me
NK086(lu)001:2831: ltar 'bar ba'i ye shes klong dgu he ru ka
NK086(lu)001:2833: lu ni lum bi ni ste dga' ba'i tshal ltar
NK086(lu)001:2834: bde ba chen po'i 'byung gnas khro mo yum gyi
NK086(lu)001:2835: tshogs so // b+h+yo ni ma mo mkha' 'gro las la 'dzud pa /
NK086(lu)001:2836: h'u 'phags pa'i thugs rje skul ba dang /
NK086(lu)001:2837: slar yang dngos grub rang gi thugs kar bsdus pa'i sngags so //
NK086(lu)001:2838: de lta bu'i gsang sngags khyad par can des gzhi
NK086(lu)001:2839: dus na sems kyi chos nyid ye shes klong brgyad
NK086(lu)001:2840: mtshon la / de thams cad dbyer med pa rang
NK086(lu)001:2841: byung gi ye shes ni yang dag he ru ka
NK086(lu)001:2842: mtshon la / gcig pu'o // de bzhin du 'khrul
NK086(lu)001:2843: pa btags ba'i chos ma dag pa'i tshogs brgyad kyang
NK086(lu)001:2844: mtshon la / gcig pu'o // mtshon / lam dus
NK086(lu)001:2845: su bskyed rim gyi bsnyen sgrub yan lag bzhi dang
NK086(lu)001:2846: rdzogs rim gyi stong bzhi dang dga' bzhi sbyar ba'i
NK086(lu)001:2847: ye shes bzhi ste brgyad po mtshon zhing /
NK086(lu)001:2848: 'bras dus kyi ye shes klong brgyad dang de kun
NK086(lu)001:2849: gcig du 'khyil ba'i thugs yang dag pa'i ye shes
NK086(lu)001:2850: 'bras bu'i dpal chen po mtshon pa'i phyir ru lu
NK086(lu)001:2851: 'bru brgyad po 'dis gsang sngags don gyi lta ba
NK086(lu)001:2853: bla ma'i snyan brgyud h'u chen ka ra'i man ngag las kyang de ltar gsal bar gsungs so //
NK086(lu)001:2854: gnyis pa phrin las lag len dang sbyar te bshad na /
NK086(lu)001:2855: dpal chen po'i thugs yang dag ba'i ye shes ni
NK086(lu)001:2856: chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid du gyur bas
NK086(lu)001:2857: nam mkha' ltar 'pho 'gyur med la dngos po dang
NK086(lu)001:2858: mtshan ma med pa'i bdag nyid yang dag pa zhes
NK086(lu)001:2859: bya'o // de ni sems can thams cad kyi sems dang gnyis su med par ye nas grub cing /
NK086(lu)001:2860: de'i rang rtsal gsang sngags kyi rgyal po ru lu
NK086(lu)001:2861: 'bru brgyad kyi bzlas sgom la brten nas de nyid
NK086(lu)001:2862: mngon du sgrub pa'i phrin las kyi lag len thams
NK086(lu)001:2863: cad kyang ru lu 'bru brgyad la 'du ste /
NK086(lu)001:2865: ru lu dkyil 'khor du shes pa /
NK086(lu)001:2872: chos nyid du shes pa brgyad kyi sgo nas phrin las lag len du 'deb pa yin pas /
NK086(lu)001:2873: dang po ru lu dkyil 'khor du shes pa la /
NK086(lu)001:2876: sku phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gsum las /
NK086(lu)001:2877: dang po la 'jig rten rim gyis bskyed pa'i yig 'bru /
NK086(lu)001:2879: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yig 'bru /
NK086(lu)001:2880: lha bskyed ba'i yig 'bru la sogs ba thams cad ni gsung yig 'bru'i dkyil 'khor ste /
NK086(lu)001:2881: mdor na sa bon h'u dang b+h+yo la sogs pa
NK086(lu)001:2882: las rten dang brten pa'i lha bskyed par byed ba'o
NK086(lu)001:2883: // gnyis pa rnam par mi rtog pa dang kun tu snang ba sogs kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /
NK086(lu)001:2884: phra mo'i phyag mtshan la dmigs pa sogs yid kyi ting 'dzin dang /
NK086(lu)001:2885: de'i sgor gyur pa phyag mtshan thams cad ni thugs phyag mtshan gyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o //
NK086(lu)001:2886: gsum pa zhi ba rdo rje dbyings dang /
NK086(lu)001:2887: khro bo 'jig byed chen po'i sku yi dkyil 'khor ro //
NK086(lu)001:2888: de lta bu'i sku gsung thugs thams cad kyang ru
NK086(lu)001:2889: lu 'bru brgyad kyi rang bzhin thugs yang dag pa'i
NK086(lu)001:2890: ye shes kyi rol pa yin pas rten dang brten
NK086(lu)001:2891: pa thams cad lha'i dkyil 'khor du gnas pa shes
NK086(lu)001:2892: pa'o // gnyis pa ru lu lhar shes pa ni /
NK086(lu)001:2893: ye shes lnga'i snying po rigs lnga khrag 'thung yab yum gyi ngo bo //
NK086(lu)001:2894: ru lu gong ma koo ri brgyad /
NK086(lu)001:2897: b+h+yo dbang phyug nyer brgyad de zla gam lnga bcu rtsa brgyad pa'i lha'i ngo bor dag ba dang /
NK086(lu)001:2898: h'u 'og ma ni de thams cad kyi byin rlabs
NK086(lu)001:2899: dngos grub rnams rang gi thugs kar bsdu ba'i sa
NK086(lu)001:2900: bon ni // yang na mjug gi h'u khro bcu'i
NK086(lu)001:2901: sa bon du byas te zla gam drug cu'i brgyad
NK086(lu)001:2902: pa'i lhar byas na'ang rung ngo //
NK086(lu)001:2903: gsum pa ru lu sgrar shes pa ni /
NK086(lu)001:2904: ru ni ra me ste rmongs pa med pa'i mdzad
NK086(lu)001:2905: spyod dang thugs rje ye shes chen pos dga' bar
NK086(lu)001:2906: byed pa dang / yang ru ni ra ga ste /
NK086(lu)001:2907: thugs rje chen pos chags pa'i bdag nyid yin pa thabs dang /
NK086(lu)001:2909: yum gyi mkha' klong ngam rnam par gsal ba'i shes rab ste /
NK086(lu)001:2910: de ltar thabs shes gnyis su med pa'i ngang nas
NK086(lu)001:2911: rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad skyed pa'i don du
NK086(lu)001:2912: shes pa ni ru lu sgrar shes pa'am /
NK086(lu)001:2913: ru lu'i sgra don shes pa'o //
NK086(lu)001:2914: bzhi pa ru lu phrin las su shes pa ni /
NK086(lu)001:2915: ru lu'i 'od zer rnams phar 'phros pas 'phags pa
NK086(lu)001:2916: mchod cing thugs dam bskul te 'gro ba'i don byas
NK086(lu)001:2917: / slar bdag gi thugs kar thim par bsam pa
NK086(lu)001:2918: don gnyis sgrub pa'i phrin las kyi bzlas dmigs dang
NK086(lu)001:2919: / / ru lu'i 'od zer dkar pos zhi ba /
NK086(lu)001:2922: nag pos drag po'i phrin las byed par dmigs pas
NK086(lu)001:2923: phrin las gang dang gang brtsam pa de bzhin 'grub
NK086(lu)001:2924: par shes pa'o // lnga pa ru lu mchod bar shes pa ni /
NK086(lu)001:2925: las ye shes lnga'i 'od zer gyis 'phags pa rnams mnyes shing thugs dam bskang ba dang /
NK086(lu)001:2926: ru lu gong mas ting 'dzin ye shes kyi stobs
NK086(lu)001:2927: las sprul pa'i me tog sogs phyi'i mchod pa dang
NK086(lu)001:2928: / ru lu 'od mas 'dod yon lnga'i lha mo spros te nang gi mchod pa phul ba dang /
NK086(lu)001:2929: h'u las byang chub sems kyi 'od 'phros pas dkyil
NK086(lu)001:2930: 'khor ba rnams mchod nas thugs gsang ba'i dngos grub
NK086(lu)001:2931: thob pa gsang mchod yin no //
NK086(lu)001:2932: drug pa ru lu dbyangs su shes pa ni /
NK086(lu)001:2933: glu drug blang pas don drug 'grub ces pa ltar /
NK086(lu)001:2934: ru lu dbyangs su bzlas pa'i tshe na 'di ltar
NK086(lu)001:2935: dbyangs kyi khyad par 'khur ba dbugs kyi rlung 'byin
NK086(lu)001:2936: ba'i dbyangs su bzlas pas nyon mongs pa'i rtog pa
NK086(lu)001:2937: bud shing 'dra ba rnams bsregs par byed /
NK086(lu)001:2938: mkhun zhing gdung ba'i dbyangs su bzlas bas gdug pa
NK086(lu)001:2939: can thams cad zil gyis gnon cing ye shes kyi
NK086(lu)001:2941: sngags kyi yi ge sgra sgrogs pa'i dbyangs su bzlas
NK086(lu)001:2942: pas yang dag pa'i don gsal bar byed cing rmongs
NK086(lu)001:2944: zab cing 'brug sgra ltar sgrogs pa'i dbyangs su bzlas
NK086(lu)001:2945: pas bdud dang mu stegs thal bar rlog /rdo rje
NK086(lu)001:2946: srin po'i ngur sgra'i dbyangs su bzlas pas thugs rje
NK086(lu)001:2947: chen po me dang 'dra bas nyon mongs pa'i bud
NK086(lu)001:2949: tshangs pa dbyangs kyi 'dren tshul du bzlas pas ma
NK086(lu)001:2950: mo mkha' 'gro thams cad dbang du sdud par byed
NK086(lu)001:2951: pa'o // bdun pa ru lu bsnyen par shes ba ni /
NK086(lu)001:2952: bdag he ru kar gsal ba'i thugs rin po che
NK086(lu)001:2953: zur brgyad pa la ru lu 'bru brgyad kyis bskor
NK086(lu)001:2954: ba'i dbus su a las zla ba'i dal dong tse
NK086(lu)001:2955: tsam gyi steng du ye shes sems dpa' tshon gang
NK086(lu)001:2956: ba'i thugs kar ma las nyi dkyil sran ma bkas
NK086(lu)001:2957: pa tsam gyi dbus su rdo rje nas tsam gyi
NK086(lu)001:2958: lte bar h'u spus bris pa tsam la ru lu
NK086(lu)001:2960: rdo rje'i phyi na yang ru lu 'bru brgyad kyis bskor bar bsam la bsnyen pa dbul bar bya'o //
NK086(lu)001:2961: brgyad pa ru lu chos nyid du shes pa ni /
NK086(lu)001:2962: chos thams cad gang nas kyang ma byung la ma
NK086(lu)001:2963: skyes pa'i chos nyid mnyam pa chen po yang dag
NK086(lu)001:2964: pa'i ye shes thig le nyag gcig tu shes pa
NK086(lu)001:2965: ni nges pa don gyi dpal chen po'i thugs kyi
NK086(lu)001:2966: sgrub pa'o // gsum pa bskyed rim bsnyen sgrub dang sbyar te bshad pa ni /
NK086(lu)001:2967: rig 'dzin sgrub pa po rnams kyi lus ngag yid
NK086(lu)001:2968: gsum dang dpal chen po'i sku gsung thugs ye nas
NK086(lu)001:2969: gnyis su med par grub pa'i bdag nyid ni dpal
NK086(lu)001:2970: chen po gcig pu'i go 'phang rdo rje lta bu'o
NK086(lu)001:2971: // de ni ma skyes pa chos sku /
NK086(lu)001:2973: sna tshogs 'char ba'i sprul sku'i rang bzhin du gnas la /
NK086(lu)001:2974: de nyid ji lta ba bzhin mngon du byed pa'i phyir bsnyen pa dang nye bsnyen sgrub pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:2975: sgrub chen bzhis tshul gyis 'jug pa la /
NK086(lu)001:2976: dang po bsnyen pa nam mkhar yi ge b+h+r+aum dmar nag tshon gang ba gsal nas /
NK086(lu)001:2978: slar 'dus pa'i rin po che dmar po tshon gang
NK086(lu)001:2979: ba de las gzhal yas khang mtshan nyid dang ldan
NK086(lu)001:2980: pa lha so so'i gdan dang bcas par gsal ba'i
NK086(lu)001:2981: dbus kyi gdan steng rang gi byang chub sems nyid
NK086(lu)001:2982: kyi ngo bo thig le dkar zlum du gsal ba
NK086(lu)001:2983: bsnyen pa'o // de h'u mthing gar gyur pa nye bsnyen no //
NK086(lu)001:2984: h'u rdo rje rtse lngar gyur pa bsgrub pa'o //
NK086(lu)001:2985: h'u ha he phatahcesa bskul bas /
NK086(lu)001:2986: bdag badz+ra he ru ka mthing nag zhal gsum phyag
NK086(lu)001:2987: drug g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing nag zhabs bzhi
NK086(lu)001:2989: dur khrod chas brgyad kyis brgyan pa me dpung 'bar
NK086(lu)001:2990: ba'i dbus na bzhugs par sgom pa ni sku yongs
NK086(lu)001:2991: su rdzogs pa ste sgrub pa chen po'o //
NK086(lu)001:2992: de la zhal g.yas dkar ba sku'i rang bzhin dang koo ri ma /
NK086(lu)001:2993: g.yon dmar ba gsung gi rang bzhin dang pra mo ha /
NK086(lu)001:2994: dbus mthing ga thugs kyi rang bzhin dang dpal chen po nyid yin la /
NK086(lu)001:2995: phyag dang po rdo rje rtse lnga thugs kar 'dzin
NK086(lu)001:2996: pa mig gi rnam shes dag pa dang tsoo ri
NK086(lu)001:2997: ma / gnyis pas kha t+w+aam 'dzin pa rna ba'i rnam shes dag pa dang bee ta le /
NK086(lu)001:2998: tha mas rnge chung 'dzin pa sna'i rnam shes dag pa dang puk+kasi /
NK086(lu)001:2999: g.yon pas dril bu dku la brten pa lce'i rnam shes dag pa dang g+hasma ri /
NK086(lu)001:3000: bar mas thod pa khrag bkang 'dzin pa lus shes dag pa dang sme sha ni /
NK086(lu)001:3001: tha mas rgyu zhags bsnams pa nyon yid dag pa dang tsan+d+ha li dang sbyor /
NK086(lu)001:3002: rgyan thams cad mchod pa'i yo byad dang sbyar /
NK086(lu)001:3003: zla gam brgyad ni seng ha la sogs ba'i phra chen brgyad dang /
NK086(lu)001:3004: de yang dmar por snang ba ni yum kro ti shwa ri ma dang sbyar /
NK086(lu)001:3005: de ltar yul dgu ni don dgu dang sbyar te /
NK086(lu)001:3006: zla gam dmar po yum gyi rak+ta dmar po ste kun tu bzang mo'i dbyings yin la /
NK086(lu)001:3008: mar me'i sdong bu ni yab /
NK086(lu)001:3009: 'od dgu ni yum gyi rang bzhin thig le dmar po'o //
NK086(lu)001:3010: de ltar gsal nas bsnyen pa bgrang ba'i dus su
NK086(lu)001:3011: rang nyid dpal chen po'i thugs kar zla dkyil la
NK086(lu)001:3012: ye shes sems dpa' dkar po tshon gang ba rdo
NK086(lu)001:3013: rje dril bu 'dzin pa'i thugs dbus rdo rje nas
NK086(lu)001:3014: tsam gyi dkyil du h'u dmar po yung 'bru tsam
NK086(lu)001:3015: la 'gal me bzhin du h'u dmar po grangs med
NK086(lu)001:3017: dpal chen po ma mo mkha' 'gro dang bcas pa'i
NK086(lu)001:3018: thugs kar phog te thugs rgyud bskul tshur 'dus pas
NK086(lu)001:3019: de dag gi byin rlabs dngos grub thams cad bdag
NK086(lu)001:3020: gi h'u la bsdus par dmigs te /
NK086(lu)001:3021: bzla bya'i snying po ru lu 'bru brgyad bazla'o //
NK086(lu)001:3022: de yang ni yab he ru ka /ru ni yum kro ti shwa ri /
NK086(lu)001:3023: ru ni he ru ka rigs bzhi /
NK086(lu)001:3024: lu ni yum rnams h'u ni thugs dam bskul ba /
NK086(lu)001:3025: b+h+yo ni dbang phyug mo rnams /
NK086(lu)001:3026: h'u tha ma ni dngos grub bsdus ba ste /
NK086(lu)001:3027: de ltar bsnyen pa dbul bar bya'o //
NK086(lu)001:3028: bskyed rim gyi skabs 'dir bsnyen sgrub bzhir yod de /
NK086(lu)001:3029: dpal chen po'i skur gsal ba bsnyen pa /
NK086(lu)001:3030: yum kro ti shwa rir gsal ba nye bsnyen /
NK086(lu)001:3031: yab yum gnyis su med pa'i byang chub sems las phra men bcu drug byung ba sgrub pa /
NK086(lu)001:3032: de thams cad kyang ma skyes pa chos kyi dbyings su mnyam par shes pa sgrub pa chen po'o //
NK086(lu)001:3033: de ltar bsnyen sgrub byed pa'i drod tshad ni /
NK086(lu)001:3034: dpal chen po phra men bcu drug gis bskor ba
NK086(lu)001:3035: mngon sum gsal ba ni mngon sum pa'i drod tshad
NK086(lu)001:3036: / bdag sgrub pa byed pa'i dus su lus las 'od byung ba 'od kyi drod tshad /
NK086(lu)001:3037: de las sgra grags pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:3038: gzugs su snang ba'i drod tshad gzhan thams cad kyang 'od kyi khongs su 'dus te /
NK086(lu)001:3039: de ltar drod byung ba ni sgrub pa chen po'o //
NK086(lu)001:3040: bzhi pa man ngag sgang bsgril rdzogs pa'i rim pa
NK086(lu)001:3041: dang sbyar na 'di ltar sems dang sems byung gi
NK086(lu)001:3042: chos thams cad / don dam par ma skyes ma
NK086(lu)001:3043: 'gag chos dbyings mtshan ma'i spros pa dang bral ba'i
NK086(lu)001:3044: klong du mnyam pa de nyid la don gyi chos
NK086(lu)001:3045: nyid yin pas na yang dag ces bya zhing /
NK086(lu)001:3046: chos nyid de lta bu rig pa ye shes kyis
NK086(lu)001:3047: phyin ci ma log par rtogs pa ni grub pa'am
NK086(lu)001:3049: dbyings rig gnyis med thig le nyag gcig de ni
NK086(lu)001:3050: gcig pu ste gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi dbyings
NK086(lu)001:3051: so // de nyid lung las gsungs pa ltar ru lu'i don dang sbyar na /
NK086(lu)001:3052: mi gnas pa yang dag pa'i ye shes /
NK086(lu)001:3053: ru mkha' klong bde ba chen po //
NK086(lu)001:3054: lu dbyings rnam dag kun tu bzang mo //
NK086(lu)001:3055: b+h+yo byang chub kyi sems bde ba chen por byung ba /
NK086(lu)001:3056: h+aum ni de thams cad byung yang byang chub kyi
NK086(lu)001:3057: sems las byung la de'i ngo bo 'dus ma byas
NK086(lu)001:3058: pa'o // de lta byang chub kyi sems thugs yang
NK086(lu)001:3059: dag pa'i ye shes de ni rang gi sems kyi
NK086(lu)001:3060: chos nyid du ye nas grub cing 'dus ma byas
NK086(lu)001:3061: pa thig le nyag gcig go //
NK086(lu)001:3062: de ltar yang dag thugs kyi sprul pa'i mtha' thams
NK086(lu)001:3063: cad yang dag rgyun gyi rnal 'byor sangs rgyas lag
NK086(lu)001:3065: de'i mtha' yang rang rig byang chub sems thugs yang dag pa'i ye shes su 'du zhing /
NK086(lu)001:3066: de mngon du byed pa'i thabs dman pa dbyibs kyi rnal 'byor sku'i gsal snang la sems bzung ba /
NK086(lu)001:3067: zab pa sngags kyi rnal 'byor gsung bzlas pa dang rlung gi rdzogs rim /
NK086(lu)001:3068: mthar thug chos kyi rnal 'byor snying ga'i mi shig
NK086(lu)001:3069: pa'i thig le la sems 'dzin pa sogs mtshan bcas
NK086(lu)001:3070: dang / mtshan med rtsol bral rdzogs pa chen po'i
NK086(lu)001:3071: lam rnams la brten nas rgyal ba thams cad kyi
NK086(lu)001:3072: thugs yang dag pa'i ye shes nyid du grub par
NK086(lu)001:3074: bzhi pa che mchog yon tan gyi sgrub pa thams
NK086(lu)001:3075: cad bdun rtsi rnam dag gi dgongs par 'du bar
NK086(lu)001:3076: bstan pa la / spyir 'khor 'das kyis bsdus pa'i
NK086(lu)001:3077: chos thams cad ye nas rnam par dag cir blang
NK086(lu)001:3078: dor las 'das pa rang byung gi ye shes bde
NK086(lu)001:3079: ba chen po'i bdag nyid du gnas pa ni bdud
NK086(lu)001:3080: rtsi rnam dag gi dgongs pa yin la /
NK086(lu)001:3081: tshul de chos kyi bdud rtsi dang /
NK086(lu)001:3083: rtags sam sman gyi bdud rtsi dang /
NK086(lu)001:3084: rdzas kyi bdud rtsi ste rnam pa bzhi'i tshul gyis gtan la bab ste bstan pa ni /
NK086(lu)001:3085: chos bdud rtsi thams cad tshang ba rnam pa brgyad du bsdus te bshad pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:3086: don bdud rtsi thams cad shes pa rnam pa brgyad du bsdus te bshad pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:3087: sman bdud rtsi thams cad dmigs pa rnam pa brgyad du bsdus te bshad pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:3088: dam rdzas bdud rtsi thams cad bsgom pa rnam pa brgyad du bsdus te bshad pa dang bzhi'o //
NK086(lu)001:3089: dang po chos thams cad bsdus na rang gi sems la tshang /
NK086(lu)001:3090: sman thams cad bsdus pas ro rnam pa lngar tshang /
NK086(lu)001:3091: dam tshig thams cad rtsa ba gsum du tshang /
NK086(lu)001:3092: phrin las thams cad bsdus na sbyor sgrol du tshang /
NK086(lu)001:3093: dkyil 'khor thams cad bsdus pas dkyil 'khor brgyad du tshang /
NK086(lu)001:3094: ye shes thams cad bsdus bas ye shes lngar tshang /
NK086(lu)001:3095: sgrub pa thams cad bsdus pas bdud rtsi sgrub par tshang /
NK086(lu)001:3096: sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu pas rdo rje dbyings la tshang ste de ltar brgyad do //
NK086(lu)001:3098: chos thams cad byang chub kyi sems bde ba chen po la tshang /
NK086(lu)001:3099: rnam shes tshogs brgyad kyang rtsa ba kun gzhi'i rnam shes la tshang /
NK086(lu)001:3100: theg pa brgyad kyang bdud rtsi yon tan gyi sgrub pa'i nang du tshad /
NK086(lu)001:3101: 'byung lnga srin gsum lha srin sde brgyad thams ca da chos kyi dbyings su tshang /
NK086(lu)001:3102: phung po lnga dang lus ngag yid gsum rang gi sems la tshang /
NK086(lu)001:3103: phyi'i sman thams cad kyang rtsa ba lnga 'bru lnga snying po lnga /
NK086(lu)001:3108: nang gi sman thams cad kyang dam rdzas rnam pa lngar 'dus shing tshang ba brgyad do //
NK086(lu)001:3109: de ltar gnad kyi mdo 'gag bsdus pa'i tshul gyis bdud rtsi'i sgrub pa'i gnad bshad pa'o //
NK086(lu)001:3110: gnyis pa don bdud rtsi ci zhe na /
NK086(lu)001:3111: sems nyid rang byung gi ye shes ni bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru kar shes par bya /
NK086(lu)001:3112: 'byung ba lnga yum lngar shes par bya /
NK086(lu)001:3113: phung po lnga rigs lngar shes par bya /
NK086(lu)001:3114: bdud rtsi lnga dug lnga yang ye shes lngar shes par bya /
NK086(lu)001:3115: rnam shes lnga sku lngar shes par bya /
NK086(lu)001:3116: srid pa gsum po bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor du shes par bya /
NK086(lu)001:3117: skye 'gro thams cad bdud rtsi'i lhar shes par bya /
NK086(lu)001:3118: dam rdzas rnams bdud rtsi dngos yin par shes par bya'o //
NK086(lu)001:3119: yang 'chad lugs rnam pa gcig tu /
NK086(lu)001:3120: ra sa ya na ta na dza ya zhes pa'i
NK086(lu)001:3121: yig 'bru brgyad po 'dir rgyud 'bum sde'i don 'dus
NK086(lu)001:3122: te / ra sa ya na bzhi ni 'byung ba bzhi dang /
NK086(lu)001:3124: phung po bzhi rnams ni rigs bzhir shes par bya /
NK086(lu)001:3125: ta ni nam mkha' dang rnam par shes pa'i phung po byang chub sems su shes par bya /
NK086(lu)001:3126: na ni nyon mongs pa lnga ye shes lngar bya /
NK086(lu)001:3127: dza ni dbang po bzhi dang rnam shes bzhi byams
NK086(lu)001:3128: pa la sogs pa'i sems dpa' bzhi bzhir shes par
NK086(lu)001:3129: bya / ya ni gzugs sgra sogs bzhi dang dus bzhi lha mo brgyad du shes par bya ste /
NK086(lu)001:3130: de ltar yi ge brgyad kyi mtshon pa'i shes pa brgyad do //
NK086(lu)001:3131: yang rnam pa gzhan du 'byung lnga yum lnga /
NK086(lu)001:3133: bdud rtsi lnga ye shes lnga /
NK086(lu)001:3134: dbang shes brgyad sems dpa' brgyad /
NK086(lu)001:3135: yul dus brgyad sems ma brgyad /
NK086(lu)001:3136: nyon mongs drug thub pa drug /rtag chad bzhi sgo ba bzhir shes par bya ba dang /
NK086(lu)001:3137: der ma zad gzhan yang bdud rtsi sgrub pa'i dus su sbyor ba chos nyid /
NK086(lu)001:3139: snang srid gsal ba mchog gi man+dala /
NK086(lu)001:3140: srid gsum ban+d+h+aa dmar po'i gzhal yas khang /
NK086(lu)001:3141: sgrub po rnams lha dang lha mo //
NK086(lu)001:3143: de yang bzhi ba'i dus na rdo rje dbyings dang /
NK086(lu)001:3144: khro bo'i dus na gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor du shes par bya ba dang /
NK086(lu)001:3145: dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan rnams kyang mda' bzhi sems dpa' bzhi /
NK086(lu)001:3146: phur pa bzhi khro bo bzhi /
NK086(lu)001:3147: ral gri bzhi rgyal po bzhi /
NK086(lu)001:3149: sman gyi bum pa lha'i dkyil 'khor /
NK086(lu)001:3150: gzungs thag byang chub kyi lam /
NK086(lu)001:3151: sngags 'phro 'du sman sangs rgyas gdugs 'jam dpal /
NK086(lu)001:3152: lus la btags pa dang gyon pa sogs yo byad
NK086(lu)001:3153: thams cad lha rnam gsum gyis mchod pa 'bul ba'i
NK086(lu)001:3155: mdor na don gyi bdud rtsi ni chos thams cad
NK086(lu)001:3156: sku dang ye shes lha dang lha mo'i dkyil 'khor
NK086(lu)001:3157: du ye nas gnas pa'i snang srid bde ba chen
NK086(lu)001:3158: po'i don gyi bdud rtsi yin te /
NK086(lu)001:3159: khams gsum gyi sdug bsngal dang nyon mongs sogs ma
NK086(lu)001:3160: dag pa thams cad ming yang med par rnam par
NK086(lu)001:3161: dag pa'i bdud rtsi chen po yin pa'i phyir de
NK086(lu)001:3162: dag shes par bya ba yin no //
NK086(lu)001:3163: gsum pa sman bdud rtsi thams cad dmigs pa rnam pa brgyad du bsdus te bshad pa ni /
NK086(lu)001:3164: 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad thig le chen por dmigs /
NK086(lu)001:3165: yid kyi yul nang kun gzhi la bltas nas bltar
NK086(lu)001:3166: med pa'i gzung don la brtags na mthong ba med
NK086(lu)001:3167: pa'i phyir yul sems gnyis ka tha dad du ma
NK086(lu)001:3168: grub pa'i stong pa nyid la dmigs /
NK086(lu)001:3169: 'byung ba lnga dang des bskyed pa dang de la
NK086(lu)001:3170: gnas pa thams cad sman ra sa ya nar dmigs
NK086(lu)001:3171: / yab yum gnyis su med pa lhag pa'i byang
NK086(lu)001:3172: chub sems ni bdud rtsi gsang ba'i mchod pa dang
NK086(lu)001:3174: yum ni rigs kyi yum du dmigs /
NK086(lu)001:3175: bdag ni rigs kyi gtso bo gang yin par dmigs /
NK086(lu)001:3176: sgrub pa'i rdzas sman ra sa y+aa na kun la
NK086(lu)001:3177: lus ngag yid gsum dang thabs shes rab kyi cha
NK086(lu)001:3178: yod par dmigs / bdag gi phung khams skye mched
NK086(lu)001:3179: thams cad gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor du dmigs
NK086(lu)001:3180: yod par dmigs / so // yang rnam pa gcig du na /
NK086(lu)001:3181: man+dala gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du dmigs ban+d+ha srid pa mchog gi dkyil 'khor du dmigs /
NK086(lu)001:3182: snod sems ma bcu drug tu dmigs /
NK086(lu)001:3183: rdzas sems dpa' bcu drug tu dmigs /
NK086(lu)001:3184: sman gyi bum pa sngags kyi 'phro 'du byed pa
NK086(lu)001:3185: mdzad pa bcu gnyis kyi 'phro 'du byed par dmigs
NK086(lu)001:3186: / kun tu bzang mo'i mkha' dbyings stong gsum du
NK086(lu)001:3187: thabs kyi phyag rgya sems rig kun gsal ba'i ye
NK086(lu)001:3189: ru tra'i phung po ni gzhal yas khang du dmigs /
NK086(lu)001:3190: sems ni skye shi med pa rdo rje sems dpar dmigs pa'o //
NK086(lu)001:3191: 'di ni bdud rtsi sgrub pa'am lam gyi dus su
NK086(lu)001:3192: dmigs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor gyi don
NK086(lu)001:3193: bsgom pa'i tshul bstan pa yin no //
NK086(lu)001:3194: bzhi pa dam rdzas thams cad bsgom pa rnam pa brgyad du bsdus te bstan pa ni /
NK086(lu)001:3195: srid pa gsum ni mi gtsang ba'i ming med par
NK086(lu)001:3196: thams cad bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor du sgom pa dang
NK086(lu)001:3197: / sems nyid ma yin pa ci yang med pas thams cad sangs rgyas par bsgom pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:3198: 'khor pa'i ming med par ye nas sangs rgyas par bsgom pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:3199: r+ts+wa bur dang 'jag ma yan chad sman ra sa
NK086(lu)001:3200: y+aa na rtsa ba lnga'am brgyad la yan lag stong
NK086(lu)001:3201: stong dang ldan par bsgom pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:3202: phyi nang snod bcud kyis bsdus pa'i chos thams cad
NK086(lu)001:3203: don dbyings ye gnyis dang rtags yab yum thabs shes
NK086(lu)001:3204: gnyis su med pa'i byang chub sems su bsgom pa
NK086(lu)001:3205: dang / phyi 'byung ba lnga rigs kyi yum lnga
NK086(lu)001:3206: nang 'gro ba lnga rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas khams skye
NK086(lu)001:3207: mched lha dang lha mo sems dpa' sems ma'i dkyil
NK086(lu)001:3209: bdud rtsi lnga ni rigs lnga la sogs pa'i rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du bsgom pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:3210: rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i gnas nas de 'dra
NK086(lu)001:3211: ba'i ye shes pa spyan drangs nas dam tshig sems
NK086(lu)001:3212: dpar thim nas gnyis su med par bsgom pa'o //
NK086(lu)001:3213: yang rnam pa gcig du na /
NK086(lu)001:3214: phyi nang snod bcud gsang ba b+ha ga'i dkyil 'khor du bsgom pa /
NK086(lu)001:3215: dam rdzas bdud rtsi rigs lnga ye shes lngar bsgom /
NK086(lu)001:3216: mar me ye shes kyi rang bzhin du bsgom /
NK086(lu)001:3217: rnal 'byor pho rnams yab tu bsgom /
NK086(lu)001:3218: rnal 'byor mo rnams yum du bsgom /
NK086(lu)001:3219: sman byang chub sems su bsgom sngags kyi 'phro 'du 'od zer du bsgom /
NK086(lu)001:3220: bdud rtsi 'chi med mu tig dkar po lta bur bsgom mo //
NK086(lu)001:3221: 'di ni bdud rtsi sgrub pa'i sgom pa bstan pa'o //
NK086(lu)001:3222: gzhan yang chos kyi bdud rtsi ni chos phung brgyad khri bzhi stong yin te /
NK086(lu)001:3223: de dag gis gtan du 'chi ba med par byed pa'i phyir ro //
NK086(lu)001:3224: de lta bu'i chos phung thams cad kyi don kyang mthar thug bdud rtsi'i lung 'dir 'du ste /
NK086(lu)001:3225: de ni tshang ba brgyad kyi tshul gyis bstan to /
NK086(lu)001:3226: don gyi bdud rtsi ni chos thams cad ye nas
NK086(lu)001:3227: rnam par dag pa la 'khor ba rgyu 'bras dang
NK086(lu)001:3228: 'chi ba ming med pa ni rtog bya'i don yin
NK086(lu)001:3229: te / de ni shes pa rnam pa brgyad kyis bstan to //
NK086(lu)001:3230: rtags kyi bdud rtsi ni chos nyid de lta bu'i
NK086(lu)001:3231: phyir na chos can gyi snang ba thams cad kyang
NK086(lu)001:3232: bdud rtsi de mtshon pa'i sgo yin pas rtags kyi
NK086(lu)001:3234: de ni dmigs pa brgyad kyi tshul gyis bstan to //
NK086(lu)001:3235: rdzas kyi bdud rtsi ni 'jig rten na bdud rtsir grags pa'i dngos po ste /
NK086(lu)001:3236: de yang rang bzhin dang thabs la mkhas pas de
NK086(lu)001:3237: bsgrub pa'i tshul gyis kun kyang 'chi ba med pa'i
NK086(lu)001:3238: bcud len du gyur par sgrub tshul ni bdud rtsi'i
NK086(lu)001:3240: de ni bsgom pa rnam pa brgyad kyi tshul du shes par bya ba yin te /
NK086(lu)001:3241: de la sogs pa rnam bzhag gi tshul gzhan dang gzhan yang shes par bya'o //
NK086(lu)001:3242: de lta bur chos kyi bdud rtsi la sogs pa rnam pa bzhir bstan pa yang bsdus na /
NK086(lu)001:3244: yongs su rdzogs pa'i bdud rtsi gnyis su 'du la /
NK086(lu)001:3246: phyi nang snod bcud thams cad bdud rtsi lngar bsdus la rgyal ba rigs lngar bsgrub par bya ste /
NK086(lu)001:3247: rang byung gdod nas rnam par dag /ces gsungs pa bzhin no //
NK086(lu)001:3248: de yang dri chen dri chu mam sa rak+ta khu
NK086(lu)001:3249: ba ste bdud rtsi lnga la phyi nang gi rtsa
NK086(lu)001:3250: ba brgyad brgyad du phye ba rtsa ba'i sman te
NK086(lu)001:3251: / 'di dag 'jig rten na mi gtsang bar grags
NK086(lu)001:3252: shing dor byar byed kyang dang du blang na rigs
NK086(lu)001:3253: lnga'i dngos grub thob cing nad lnga sel la ye
NK086(lu)001:3254: nas gtsang dme med par dag pa chen po bde
NK086(lu)001:3255: chen bdud rtsi'i bdag nyid du rtog pa pa'i lta
NK086(lu)001:3256: / ba dang / rjes su mthun pa mnyam nyid
NK086(lu)001:3257: rtogs pa'i bog dbyung ba dang mkha' 'gro'i tshogs mnyes
NK086(lu)001:3258: nas dngos grub myur du thob bar byed do //
NK086(lu)001:3259: de'i skyob dang 'phrod du gyur pa'i sman bzang po
NK086(lu)001:3260: drug dang a ru ra sogs sa las skyes pa'i
NK086(lu)001:3262: sa dang chur gnas pa'i srog chags kyi sha khrag sogs thams cad /
NK086(lu)001:3264: yang na kha dog sogs kyi sgo nas rigs lngar phye la sman du sgrub par bya ste /
NK086(lu)001:3265: de yang bdud rtsi'i gtso bo lnga la rtsa ba brgyad du yod cing /
NK086(lu)001:3266: re re la'ang kha dog dang dbyibs gnyis gnyis phye bas lnga bcu /
NK086(lu)001:3267: nang gi dam rdzas rtsa ba lnga la kha dog
NK086(lu)001:3268: dang nus mthus phye bas lnga bcu ste khyon brgya
NK086(lu)001:3269: tham pa / de la thabs shes gnyis kyis phye bas nyis brgya /
NK086(lu)001:3270: de la sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las lngar phye bas stong 'byung bas /
NK086(lu)001:3271: rtsa brgyad yan lag stong la sbyar ba'i sman zhes bya zhing /
NK086(lu)001:3272: de lta bu'i rigs dang sder byas nas mthun pa'i
NK086(lu)001:3273: skyob dang 'phrod du sman gyi rigs thams cad sbyar
NK086(lu)001:3274: bas rtsa ba 'bum phrag yangs pa'i bcud ces bya'o
NK086(lu)001:3275: // de lta bu'i bdud rtsi la don rnam pa brgyad de /
NK086(lu)001:3284: dang po bdud rtsi'i rgyu yab yum gnyis kun bzang yab yum gnyis su gnas pa'am /
NK086(lu)001:3285: spyir dad dang rang bzhin dang bdag nyid chen po
NK086(lu)001:3286: ste snang srid rnam par dag pa'i dbyings nas skyed
NK086(lu)001:3287: pa'o // bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin ni 'byung lnga phung
NK086(lu)001:3288: lnga sgo gsum srid pa gsum thams cad kyang ye
NK086(lu)001:3289: nas bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin no //
NK086(lu)001:3290: bdud rtsi'i spyod pa ni za zhing spyad pa'i las
NK086(lu)001:3291: su bstan te gang cir spyad kyang bdud rtsi'i las
NK086(lu)001:3292: la spyod pa'o // bdud rtsi'i las ni nad bzhi
NK086(lu)001:3293: brgya rtsa bzhi zhi zhing dug lnga sel la bdud
NK086(lu)001:3295: bdud rtsi'i yon tan ni chos dbyings byang chub sems
NK086(lu)001:3296: la skye shi 'du 'bral med pa'i don dang ldan
NK086(lu)001:3297: pa'o // bdud rtsi'i lung ni 'di lta ste /
NK086(lu)001:3298: lta ba'i lung dang spyod pa'i lung dang sgrub pa'i lung dang dam tshig gi lung dang /
NK086(lu)001:3299: phrin las kyi lung dang dkyil 'khor gyi lung dang
NK086(lu)001:3300: ye shes kyi lung thams cad kun bdud rtsi'i lung
NK086(lu)001:3302: de thams cad kyang ye shes kyi sman gyis rtog
NK086(lu)001:3303: pa'i dug sel zhing gtan du mi 'pho ba'i go
NK086(lu)001:3304: 'phang ster ba'i don du 'gro ba'i phyir ro //
NK086(lu)001:3305: bdud rtsi'i de nyid ni phyi 'byung ba lnga yang bdud rtsi'i de nyid yin /
NK086(lu)001:3306: nang dam rdzas lnga yang bdud rtsi'i di nyid yin /
NK086(lu)001:3307: gsang ba chos nyid byang chub kyi sems kyang bdud rtsi'i nyid yin te /
NK086(lu)001:3308: de gsum las ma gtogs pa'i bdud rtsi zhes bya ba gzhan na med de /
NK086(lu)001:3309: de dag rang bzhin gyis bdud rtsir gnas pa'o //
NK086(lu)001:3311: gtan du mi 'chi ba ye shes kyi bdud rtsi
NK086(lu)001:3312: de ni dpal ldan bla ma dam pa'i zhal nas
NK086(lu)001:3313: man ngag gi tshul du slob ma'i snyan gyi ga'ura
NK086(lu)001:3314: brgyud de tsit+ta sems kyi dkyil 'khor du bstim pa
NK086(lu)001:3315: na / dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin lhan skyes
NK086(lu)001:3316: bde ba chen po rang rig pa'i ye shes mnyam
NK086(lu)001:3317: pa'i don thugs la rdol nas ngo 'phrod pa ni
NK086(lu)001:3318: rdo rje gsang ba'i bral du da lta nas 'khod
NK086(lu)001:3319: na / pa'o // de lta bu 'di la ni
NK086(lu)001:3320: bdud rtsi'i don gyi rnal bzhag ma 'dres pa gsal
NK086(lu)001:3321: por phye ba'i phyir ma 'dres pa'i bdud rtsi zhes
NK086(lu)001:3322: na / pa'o // bya'o // gnyis pa yongs su
NK086(lu)001:3323: rdzogs pa'i bdud rtsi chen po la ni dbye bsal
NK086(lu)001:3324: med par thams cad bdud rtsi bde ba chen po
NK086(lu)001:3325: thig le nyag gcig du zlum pa ni chos thams
NK086(lu)001:3326: cad bdud rtsi lngar rdzogs par gnas pa zhes bya
NK086(lu)001:3327: na / pa'o // bya'o // ste / bdud ni nyon mongs pa'i rnam par rtog pa yin la /
NK086(lu)001:3328: rtsi ni ye shes kyi rang bzhin te /
NK086(lu)001:3329: don la thams cad ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin gyi bdud rtsi chen por ye nas gnas pa'o //
NK086(lu)001:3330: de nyid ma rtogs par 'jig rten na bde sdug
NK086(lu)001:3331: 'khor 'das gtsang dme gnyis su mthong nas spong len
NK086(lu)001:3332: byed pa'i rtog pas 'ching zhing de las bzlog nas
NK086(lu)001:3333: mnyam pa nyid blang dor med par rtogs pa'i ye
NK086(lu)001:3334: shes kyis thams cad bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin du shes
NK086(lu)001:3335: shing rig pa byang chub sems kyi klong du 'khor
NK086(lu)001:3336: ba bde sdug gtsang dme thams cad ro mnyam du
NK086(lu)001:3337: gyur ba las gtan du 'chi ba med pa bdud
NK086(lu)001:3338: rtsi mchog gi go 'phang grub pa yin no //
NK086(lu)001:3339: de ltar bdud rtsi'i dgongs don de thams cad kyang don rtags gnyis su 'du ste /
NK086(lu)001:3340: dang po mtshon bya don gyi bdud rtsi ni /
NK086(lu)001:3341: chos thams cad ye nas rnam par dag pa'i bdud
NK086(lu)001:3342: rtsi chen po rang byung ye shes kyi bdag nyid
NK086(lu)001:3344: de nyams su len pa'i thabs thams cad bzhag thabs brgyad du 'du ste /
NK086(lu)001:3345: chos nyid mnyam pa'i ngang la rig pa mnyam par
NK086(lu)001:3346: bzhag /snang srid bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor du thugs su
NK086(lu)001:3347: tshud par bzhag /kun tu bzang mo yum gyi b+ha
NK086(lu)001:3348: ga yangs pa'i mkha' klong du rig pa byang chub
NK086(lu)001:3349: kyi sems mkha' la nyi ma shar ba ltar bzhag
NK086(lu)001:3350: /rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad gsang ba mchog gi
NK086(lu)001:3351: dkyil 'khor chen por ma bcos bar bzhag /phung po
NK086(lu)001:3352: lnga dur khrod kyi thod pa lnga'i nang du ye
NK086(lu)001:3353: shes kyi mar me lnga rang gsal bar bzhag /rang
NK086(lu)001:3354: sems ye nas rang byung gi ye shes yin pa'i
NK086(lu)001:3355: blo gzhag /rang gi dam rdzas lnga ni rang byung
NK086(lu)001:3356: gi bdud rtsi dam rdzas chen po yin pa'i blo
NK086(lu)001:3357: bzhag /bdag gi yid dang kun gzhi gnyis kun tu
NK086(lu)001:3358: bzang po dang bzang mo yin pa'i blo bzhag ste
NK086(lu)001:3359: / mdor na ye ji bzhin pa'i don la ma
NK086(lu)001:3360: bcos sor bzhag du bzhag pas don gyi bdud rtsi
NK086(lu)001:3361: nyams su myong bar byed do //
NK086(lu)001:3362: mtshon byed rtags kyi bdud rtsi ni rgas rgud nad
NK086(lu)001:3363: sogs sel zhing mi 'chi bar byed pa'i bdud rtsi
NK086(lu)001:3364: ra sa y+aa na sgrub pa yin la /
NK086(lu)001:3365: de'i nyams len ni sbyor ba brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor du 'du ste /
NK086(lu)001:3366: kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa chos nyid stong zhing
NK086(lu)001:3367: bdag med pa'i dkyil 'khor du lhang gis gsal ba'i
NK086(lu)001:3368: dus na nam mkha' ye nas dngas shing gsal ba
NK086(lu)001:3369: la nyi ma shar ba lta bu ni rig pa
NK086(lu)001:3370: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor du sbyor ba ste /
NK086(lu)001:3371: de ni rnam dag byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor du rdzogs pa'o //
NK086(lu)001:3372: mchod pa'i rdzas rnams la brten nas bsod nams dang
NK086(lu)001:3373: ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs pas tshe dpag med kyi
NK086(lu)001:3374: dkyil 'khor du sbyor ba ste don rdo rje dbyings
NK086(lu)001:3376: 'bar pa las kyi phrin las ni /
NK086(lu)001:3377: ta na ga na'i dkyil 'khor du sbyar te /
NK086(lu)001:3378: phrin las rnam bzhi'i dkyil 'khor du rdzogs /
NK086(lu)001:3379: thugs rje thabs la mkhas pa'i dkyil 'khor ni bsgrub pa'i dam tshig gang la sbyar ste /
NK086(lu)001:3380: rta mgrin dbang gi dkyil 'khor du rdzogs /
NK086(lu)001:3381: dngos grub dbang gi dkyil 'khor ni e sum brtsegs dang sbyar te /
NK086(lu)001:3382: sku rang byung gi ye shes te sku gdung 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor dang sbyar /
NK086(lu)001:3383: thams cad bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor dang sbyar ba ste brgyad do //
NK086(lu)001:3384: rtags kyi bdud rtsi dam rdzas sgrub pa la khrol
NK086(lu)001:3385: bur rigs brgya rigs lnga rigs gcig gis sgrub nas
NK086(lu)001:3386: / btags btsags spol zhing gzhal la bdud rtsi'i dal du bzhag nas /
NK086(lu)001:3388: sbyor ba brgyad kyis byang chub sems kyi sprin dbab
NK086(lu)001:3389: te bsgrub pa'i myong grol ra sa y+aa na'i phyag
NK086(lu)001:3390: len rnams ni zur du sman gyi sgrub pa sogs
NK086(lu)001:3392: bdag gi bla ma dam pa'i snyan brgyud las ni /
NK086(lu)001:3393: chos kyi bdud rtsi lta ba rang byung gi ye shes ngo sprad /
NK086(lu)001:3394: rtags kyi bdud rtsi he ru ka'i dkyil 'khor bskyed
NK086(lu)001:3395: pa'i rim pa srog sdom gzir bzhi'i tshul gyis rgyud
NK086(lu)001:3396: sbyang / don gyi bdud rtsi dug lnga ye shes lngar lam du byed ba'i rdzogs rim la /
NK086(lu)001:3397: 'byung lnga phung lnga dug lnga dag byed lam lnga
NK086(lu)001:3398: ste bdag byin rlabs 'bar 'dzag gi sgo nas rang
NK086(lu)001:3399: lus gzhan lus la brten pa'i thabs lam ni me
NK086(lu)001:3400: dang 'du shes 'dod chags dag byed kyi lam dang
NK086(lu)001:3401: / sgyu lus ni zhe sdang nam mkha' rnam shes dag byed /
NK086(lu)001:3402: 'od gsal ni gti mug sa khams gzugs phung dag byed /
NK086(lu)001:3403: rmi lam ni chu khams tshor ba nga rgyal dag byed /
NK086(lu)001:3404: snang grags rigs gsum sku gsung thugs dang bsre ba
NK086(lu)001:3405: bsre 'pho'i rnal 'byor ni 'du byed dang rlung khams
NK086(lu)001:3406: phrag dog dag par byed pa ste /
NK086(lu)001:3407: de ltar rdzogs pa'i rim pas dug lnga /
NK086(lu)001:3408: lam du khyer ba don gyi bdud rtsi yin no //
NK086(lu)001:3409: rtags don gnyis ni bskyed rdzogs te sgom pa'am sgrub pa'i rim pa'o //
NK086(lu)001:3410: de ltar sgrub pa byas pa'i gang zag 'dis las
NK086(lu)001:3411: sbyor gyi tshul du mthong thos myong reg grol ba
NK086(lu)001:3412: bzhi ldan rdzas kyi bdud rtsi sgrub pa la /
NK086(lu)001:3414: shes rab kyi rdzas bdud rtsi lnga gtso bor gyur
NK086(lu)001:3415: pa'i rtsa brgyad stong sbyar 'du byas la khrol sgrub
NK086(lu)001:3416: sogs gzhung ltar bsnyen sgrub bzhi'i tshul gyis 'bad pas
NK086(lu)001:3417: dngos grub thob par byed pa ste /
NK086(lu)001:3418: lam de lta bu la brten nas gnas skabs su rig 'dzin bzhi dang /
NK086(lu)001:3419: mthar thug gi 'bras bu dpal che mchog he ru
NK086(lu)001:3420: ka'i go 'phang bla na med pa 'grub po zhes
NK086(lu)001:3421: gsungs so // lnga pa phur pa phrin las kyi
NK086(lu)001:3422: sgrub pa thams cad thal 'byin rnam pa bzhi'i dgongs
NK086(lu)001:3423: par 'dus pa'i tshul bshad pa la /
NK086(lu)001:3424: phur pa'i mtshan nyid rnam par bzhis don gyi la shan phye nas bshad pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:3425: phur pa sgrub pa'i gang zag de'i snod kyi rim
NK086(lu)001:3426: pa dang sbyar nas mthar dbyung bar bshad pa dang
NK086(lu)001:3427: / phur pa'i sgrub rdzas bzhi so so'i sgrub gzhung bzung nas bshad pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:3428: sgrub lugs chen po bzhis phur pa'i gting phyang te bshad pa bzhi las dang po ni /
NK086(lu)001:3429: rig pa ye shes kyi phur pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:3430: gsang ba byang chub sems kyi phur pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:3431: tshad med snying rje'i phur pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:3432: 'dus byas rdzas kyi phur pa bzhi /
NK086(lu)001:3433: dang po rig pa ye shes kyi phur pa la gsum ste /
NK086(lu)001:3436: gnyis su med pa'i phur pa'o //
NK086(lu)001:3437: de re re la'ang ngo bo nges tshig yul thabs yon tan ma gdab pa'i skyon /
NK086(lu)001:3438: thebs pa'i 'bras bu sogs kyi sgo nas rgyas par
NK086(lu)001:3439: 'chad pa'i tshul ni gsang sngags bka' yi tha ram
NK086(lu)001:3441: 'dir ni don gyi gnad mdor bsdus te bstan na /
NK086(lu)001:3442: dbyings spros pa med pa dang rig pa rang gsal
NK086(lu)001:3443: gyi ye shes nyid gnyis su med pa rang byung
NK086(lu)001:3444: gi ye shes chen po rang shar phyogs ris med
NK086(lu)001:3445: pa ni rig pa ye shes kyi phur pa'i ngo
NK086(lu)001:3446: bo ste des chos thams cad la rgyas btab pas
NK086(lu)001:3447: 'khrul pa'i snang ba thal 'byin du phug ste gnyis
NK086(lu)001:3448: med ye shes chen po chos kyi sku thob pa
NK086(lu)001:3449: yin no // gnyis pa byang chub sems kyi phur
NK086(lu)001:3450: pa ni yab yum mnyam par sbyor pa'i stobs kyi
NK086(lu)001:3451: zhu bdes drang pa'i bde ba chen po lhan cig
NK086(lu)001:3452: skyes pa'i ye shes ni de'i ngo bo yin la
NK086(lu)001:3453: yin no // / des rtsa rlung thig le'i grong
NK086(lu)001:3454: khyer la rgyas btab pas ma dag pa'i rlung sems
NK086(lu)001:3455: dbyings su nub nas dag pa'i ye shes mngon du
NK086(lu)001:3456: 'char bar byed cing lha dang lha mo'i dkyil 'khor
NK086(lu)001:3457: gyi dbang phyug longs sku thob par byed do //
NK086(lu)001:3458: gsum pa tshad med snying rje'i phur pa ni snying
NK086(lu)001:3459: rje chen pos sems can yongs su mi gtong ba
NK086(lu)001:3460: yin la / des yul rigs drug gi sems can
NK086(lu)001:3461: rnams la btab pas thugs rje'i dpyang thag gis zin
NK086(lu)001:3462: nas 'khor ba'i gnas nas sgrol zhing sprul pa'i sku
NK086(lu)001:3464: bzhi pa 'dus byas rdzas kyi phur pa ni mtshan
NK086(lu)001:3465: ma rtag kyi phyag rgya rten dang bcas ste 'di'i
NK086(lu)001:3471: dang po la rang bzhin gyi phur pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:3472: ting nge 'dzin gyi phur pa gnyis su yod pa'i rang bzhin gyi phur pa zhes bya ba ni /
NK086(lu)001:3473: 'og min gyi zhing na rang bzhin gyis bzhugs pa'i
NK086(lu)001:3474: phrin las kyi lha tshogs rten dang brten par bcas
NK086(lu)001:3476: de ni rnal 'byor pas sgom par bya ba dang sgrub par bya ba'i yul yin no //
NK086(lu)001:3477: gnyis pa ting nge 'dzin gyi phur pa ni /
NK086(lu)001:3478: phur pa'i lha rnams gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis
NK086(lu)001:3479: tha mal pa'i rnam rtog la rgyal btab nas bsnyen
NK086(lu)001:3480: sgrub yan lag bzhi'i tshul gyis sgrub pas bskyed rim
NK086(lu)001:3481: snang srid phur bu'i lha tshogs su shar bas dngos
NK086(lu)001:3483: ting 'dzin dang rang bzhin kyi phur pa rang gnyis
NK086(lu)001:3484: la 'dus byas rdzas kyi phur par ci la btags
NK086(lu)001:3485: snyam na 'dus byas rdzas kyi phur pa lha grangs
NK086(lu)001:3486: dang mnyam pa dal du bkod nas de la dmigs
NK086(lu)001:3487: rten byas te / ting 'dzin gyis sprul pa dam
NK086(lu)001:3488: tshig gi dkyil 'khor de rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor
NK086(lu)001:3489: dang dbyer med par sgrub pas na de skad du
NK086(lu)001:3490: rten byas te / btags so // gnyis pa las
NK086(lu)001:3491: bzhi'i phur pa ni phrin las rnam pa bzhi'i phur
NK086(lu)001:3492: pa tshad ldan 'du byas la de rten du byas
NK086(lu)001:3493: te lha sngags ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo nas yul
NK086(lu)001:3494: gang la btab pa tsam gyis phrin las bzhi mthar
NK086(lu)001:3496: de yang las so so'i phur pa'i mtshan nyid bcu gcig du gsung pa'i don bsdus te bshad na /
NK086(lu)001:3497: zhi ba'i phur pa'i rgyu ni dngul lam shing sogs
NK086(lu)001:3498: kha dog dkar po can la mdog dkar po phur
NK086(lu)001:3499: pa'i dbal dbyibs zlum po tshad sor brgyad pa can
NK086(lu)001:3500: byas la der zhi ba'i lha dmigs shing shan+tim sogs
NK086(lu)001:3501: kyi sngags kha sgyur can bzla ba dang /
NK086(lu)001:3502: 'od zer dkar po'i 'phro 'du sogs zhi ba'i ting
NK086(lu)001:3503: nge 'dzin gsal ba'i sgo nas yul 'jigs brgyad sogs
NK086(lu)001:3504: la btab pas mi mthun pa'i phyogs de dag zhi
NK086(lu)001:3505: par byed pa'o // rgyas par gser sogs kyi rgyu
NK086(lu)001:3506: las mdog ser po dbyibs gru bzhi sor drug pa'i
NK086(lu)001:3507: tshad can gyi phur bu rten du byas nas lha
NK086(lu)001:3508: sngags ting 'dzin sogs rgyas pa'i skabs kyi dmigs gsal
NK086(lu)001:3509: par byed pa'o // bzhin du bya'o // dbang la
NK086(lu)001:3510: zangs sogs dmar po'i rgyu las mdog dmar zhing dbyibs
NK086(lu)001:3511: zla gam sor bcu pa'i tshad can gyi phur bu
NK086(lu)001:3512: la brten te dbang gi las bya'o //
NK086(lu)001:3513: drag po'i phur pa rgyu lcags sogs nag po'i rgyu
NK086(lu)001:3514: las mdog nag cig dbyibs gru gsum pa'i dbal can
NK086(lu)001:3515: tshad sor brgyad dam bcu gnyis pa rten du byas
NK086(lu)001:3516: te drag po'i lam sgrub par bya ba yin no
NK086(lu)001:3517: // gsum pa byin rlabs sras mchog gi phur pa
NK086(lu)001:3518: ni sras mchog rigs bzhi'am bsdu na gcig gis kyang
NK086(lu)001:3519: // rung ste / stod zhal gsum mgrin 'og rgya
NK086(lu)001:3520: mdud de 'og lcum zhog brgyad dam rdo rje'i dbyibs
NK086(lu)001:3521: // rung ste / / de 'og rgya mdud 'og ma /
NK086(lu)001:3522: de 'og chu srin gyi kha nas byung ba'i dbal gru gsum pa can nam /
NK086(lu)001:3523: rtser rgya mdun can du'ang gsung ste /
NK086(lu)001:3524: de nyid sras mchog du lha sngags ting nge 'dzin
NK086(lu)001:3525: gyis byin gyis brlabs la dgra bgegs kyi snying dkar
NK086(lu)001:3526: nag gi mtshams su btab bas las grub bar byed
NK086(lu)001:3527: pa ste 'di la byin rlabs rtags kyi phur pa
NK086(lu)001:3528: zhes kyang bya'o // de la stod kyi rgya mdud
NK086(lu)001:3529: gong ma'i phyogs bzhi dbus lnga rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas
NK086(lu)001:3530: dang ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin //
NK086(lu)001:3531: lcum zhog brgyad ni rnam thar brgyad kyi rang bzhin /
NK086(lu)001:3532: rgya mdud 'og ma tshad med pa bzhi /
NK086(lu)001:3533: chu srin gyi kha ni 'dzin cing mi gtong ba'i thugs rje /
NK086(lu)001:3534: zur gsum sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin yin no //
NK086(lu)001:3535: de lta bu'i sras mchog gi phur pa la shes pa gsum ste /
NK086(lu)001:3536: dang po sras mchog lhar shes pa ni cum zhog gi dbus su dpal rdo rje gzhon nu /
NK086(lu)001:3537: rgya mdud gong 'og gi dngul su steng 'og gi khro bo dang /
NK086(lu)001:3538: zur bzhi log brgyad la phyogs mtshams kyi khro bo
NK086(lu)001:3539: bcu sku dngos sam h'u yig gi tshul du bzhugs
NK086(lu)001:3540: pa / rgya mdud 'og ma'i log la sgo ma bzhi bzhugs pa'i lha'i rang bzhin du shes pa'o //
NK086(lu)001:3541: gnyis pa sras mchog gzhal yas khang du shes pa ni /
NK086(lu)001:3542: phur ba'i nang gzhal yas khang du gyur pa na
NK086(lu)001:3543: lha rnams rdo rje ri rab kyi phur pa 'dril
NK086(lu)001:3545: gsum pa sras mchog nyid du shes pa la mu bzhi ste /
NK086(lu)001:3546: mchog yin la sras ma yin pa /
NK086(lu)001:3547: sras yin la mchog ma yin pa /
NK086(lu)001:3548: sras dang mchog gnyis ka ma yin pa /
NK086(lu)001:3549: sras dang mchog gnyis ka yin pa bzhi yod pa las /
NK086(lu)001:3550: 'di ni sras kyang yin la mchog kyang yin te
NK086(lu)001:3551: gtso bo'i sras yin la 'khor rnams kyi mchog yin
NK086(lu)001:3552: pa'i phyir ro // sras mchog rdo rje phur pa
NK086(lu)001:3553: 'di la dkyil 'khor gsum ka rdzogs pa yin no
NK086(lu)001:3554: pa'i phyir ro // // gnyis pa gang zag snod
NK086(lu)001:3555: kyi rim par sbyar nas nyams len mthar dbyung ste
NK086(lu)001:3557: rig pa ye shes kyi phur pa ni nam mkha'
NK086(lu)001:3558: lta bu'i gang zag gis mthar dbyung bar byed de
NK086(lu)001:3559: / gang zhe na blo yangs shing shes rab che
NK086(lu)001:3560: la dbang po rno ba'i gang zag gang zhig mnyam
NK086(lu)001:3561: pa'i brtul zhugs dang ldan pa de la rig pa
NK086(lu)001:3562: rtsal gyi dbang bskur te rang rig ye shes kyi
NK086(lu)001:3563: phur ba'i ngo bo bstan pas lhang gis rtogs nas
NK086(lu)001:3564: phur pa theb ste mthar phyin par nus so //
NK086(lu)001:3565: gnyis pa 'dod chags che zhing brtson 'grus dang ldan
NK086(lu)001:3566: pa'i gang zag bya ka lan+ta ka lta bu la
NK086(lu)001:3567: / yum bkra shis mtshan dang ldan pa gtad la /
NK086(lu)001:3568: gsang sher gyi dbang bskur nas /
NK086(lu)001:3569: lhag pa'i byang chub sems kyi phur pa gnyis su
NK086(lu)001:3570: med pa bde ba chen po'i don bstan pas lhang
NK086(lu)001:3571: gis rtogs pa dang phur pa thebs te mthar phyin
NK086(lu)001:3572: par 'gyur ro // gsum pa tshad med snying rje'i
NK086(lu)001:3573: phur pas ri bo lta bu'i gang zag mthar dbyung
NK086(lu)001:3574: par 'gyur ro // ba ni / gang zag dad
NK086(lu)001:3575: pa dang snying rje brtan pos gzhan don dang spros
NK086(lu)001:3576: pa la dga' ba de la /
NK086(lu)001:3577: rang gzhan gyi don du tshad med pa bzhis blo
NK086(lu)001:3578: sbyong te bla med pa'i byang chub du sems bskyed
NK086(lu)001:3579: du bcug la sngags kyi dbang bskur nas /
NK086(lu)001:3580: tshad med bzhi'i dam bca' bzung zhing las kyi man
NK086(lu)001:3581: ngag bstan pas lhang gis rtogs pa dang phur pa
NK086(lu)001:3582: thebs te mthar phyin par 'gyur ro //
NK086(lu)001:3583: tshad med snying rje'i phur pa 'di'i tshab du gzhung gzhan na /
NK086(lu)001:3584: bskyed rim srid pa phur bu zhes gsungs pa ltar
NK086(lu)001:3585: na gang zag nga rgyal che zhing sems brtan pa
NK086(lu)001:3586: ri bo lta bus bskyed rim srid pa phur bu
NK086(lu)001:3587: nyams su blang nas mthar dbyung bar gsungs so //
NK086(lu)001:3588: bzhi pa mtshan ma rdzas kyi phur pa la brten
NK086(lu)001:3589: nas tsan dan lta bu'i gang zag mthar dbyung ba
NK086(lu)001:3590: ste / 'di rnams la gang zag gis phur pa'i don de mthar dbyung ba dang /
NK086(lu)001:3591: phur pa des gang zag de mthar dbyung ba gnyis
NK086(lu)001:3592: don la 'dra bar sbyar lugs ji ltar byas kyang
NK086(lu)001:3593: rung ngo // gang zag gang zhig zhe sdang pas gdug pa dang gnag pa che la /
NK086(lu)001:3594: bstan pa srung bar blo phyogs pa de la dbang
NK086(lu)001:3595: bskur nas rdo rje phur pa'i bsnyen sgrub las sbyor
NK086(lu)001:3596: dang bcas pa'i sngags bstan pas snang srid phur pa'i
NK086(lu)001:3597: dkyil 'khor du lhang gis rtogs na phur pa thebs
NK086(lu)001:3598: te mthar phyin par byed do //
NK086(lu)001:3599: gsum pa phur pa'i sgrub rdzas bzhis so so'i gzhung btsugs te bshad pa ni /
NK086(lu)001:3600: rig pa ye shes kyi phur pa ni /
NK086(lu)001:3601: lha phur dang shel lam me long la rten byas te sgrub /
NK086(lu)001:3602: byang chub sems kyi phur pa sgrub pa'i snod thod
NK086(lu)001:3603: pa dang rdo rje dang pad+ma'i 'du 'phro las bsgrub
NK086(lu)001:3604: / tshad med snying rje'i phur pa las kyi phur
NK086(lu)001:3605: pa dang lha sngags ting nge 'dzin dang yul sems
NK086(lu)001:3606: can la rten byas te sgrub /
NK086(lu)001:3607: 'dus byas rdzas kyi phur pa ni bsnyen pa'i dus su phur pa dang nyungs dkar /
NK086(lu)001:3608: bsgrub pa'i dus su 'khor lo dang ling ga las
NK086(lu)001:3609: rdzogs pa'i dus su mnan bsreg 'phang gsum la brten
NK086(lu)001:3611: bzhi pa sgrub lugs chen po bzhis phur pa'i gting phyung te bshad pa ni /
NK086(lu)001:3612: rig pa'i shes kyi phur pa rang bzhin gyi dkyil
NK086(lu)001:3613: 'khor du bsgrub la lta ba'i gting phyungs te bshad
NK086(lu)001:3614: / byang chub sems kyi phur pa bde stong gnyis
NK086(lu)001:3615: su med pa'i dkyil 'khor du bsgrub la sbyod pa
NK086(lu)001:3617: tshad med snying rje'i phur pa ting nge 'dzin gyi
NK086(lu)001:3618: dkyil 'khor du sgrub te sgom pas nyams su blang
NK086(lu)001:3619: te bshad / 'dus byas rdzas kyi phur pa gzugs
NK086(lu)001:3620: brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor du bsgrub te phrin las su
NK086(lu)001:3622: de la gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa la gsum te /
NK086(lu)001:3623: bsnyen pa'i dkyil 'khor rtsib brgyad pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:3624: sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor e khram nyer gcig pa /
NK086(lu)001:3625: bsad pa'i las kyi dkyil 'khor rtsib drug pa'o //
NK086(lu)001:3627: ye shes kyi lha dang mkha' 'gro ma dang ging sgrub pa gsum mo //
NK086(lu)001:3628: ye shes kyi lha bsgrub pa la gsum ste /
NK086(lu)001:3629: ki la ya brgya rtsa brgyad kyi sgrub lugs /
NK086(lu)001:3630: k+ai la ya rigs lnga'i sgrub lugs /
NK086(lu)001:3631: k+ai la ya dpal bo gcig pa'i sgrubs lugs so //
NK086(lu)001:3632: gnyis pa mkha' 'gro ma sgrub pa la'ang /
NK086(lu)001:3633: phur srung bcu gnyis phyi nang gsang ba ltar sgrub pa gsum mo //
NK086(lu)001:3634: gsum pa skyes bu gis bsgrub pa la'ang /
NK086(lu)001:3635: ging bcu gnyis phyi nang gsang ba ltar sgrub pa gsum mo //
NK086(lu)001:3636: spyir 'dus byas rdzas kyi phur pa la dkyil 'khor brgyad de /
NK086(lu)001:3637: 'khor lo rtsis brgyad sku phyag rgya dkyil 'khor /
NK086(lu)001:3638: gru gsum shes gyi dal gsung yig 'bru'i dkyil 'khor /
NK086(lu)001:3639: rgya mdud spel ma thugs phyag mtshan gyi dkyil 'khor /
NK086(lu)001:3640: mkha' 'gro 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor rtsib bcu drug /m+aa
NK086(lu)001:3641: ra ya bsad pa'i dkyil 'khor bar rim gsum pa
NK086(lu)001:3642: / las kyi mtha' sdud kyi dkyil 'khor mnan ba sreg 'phang gsum te /
NK086(lu)001:3643: de thams cad bsdu na 'dus byas rdzas kyi phur par 'dus /
NK086(lu)001:3644: de yang dpal rdo rje gzhon nu la 'dus so //
NK086(lu)001:3645: bdag gi bla ma'i snyan brgyud kyi gter kha sogs las ni /
NK086(lu)001:3646: rig pa ye shes kyi phur pa /
NK086(lu)001:3647: rdzogs rim byang sems phur pa /
NK086(lu)001:3648: bskyed rim srid ba phur bu /
NK086(lu)001:3649: mtshan ma rdzas kyi phur pa bzhir gsung te de
NK086(lu)001:3650: dag gi nyams len kyang lha phur dang las phur
NK086(lu)001:3651: tshad ldan 'du byas la sras mchog tu bskyed cing
NK086(lu)001:3652: byin rlabs bya byug bdug brab gsum gyis gzi mdangs
NK086(lu)001:3653: bskyed pa'i rdzas phur tshad ldan dal du bkod de
NK086(lu)001:3654: de la dmigs pa'i rten byas nas /
NK086(lu)001:3655: bskyed rim srid pa phur bu'i don cho ga'i sngon
NK086(lu)001:3656: 'gro dngos gzhi mjug gsum tshang ba'i sgo nas bdag
NK086(lu)001:3657: rdo rje gzhon nu yab yum rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor
NK086(lu)001:3658: / khro bcu yab yum khra thabs dang bcas pa phyogs bcu khro bo'i dkyil 'khor /
NK086(lu)001:3659: sras mchog gi phur pa la lha bskyed pa mtshan ma rdzas kyi dkyil 'khor te /
NK086(lu)001:3660: dkyil 'khor gsum gsal brtan dag gsum ldan pa'i sgo
NK086(lu)001:3661: nas bskyed cing dgug bstims mchod bstod sogs dang sngags
NK086(lu)001:3662: bzla zhing nus pa thob pa'i sgo nas stod las
NK086(lu)001:3664: smad las dgra bgegs bsgral ba'i las kyi rim pas
NK086(lu)001:3665: bar chad bdud las rgyal zhing bskyed rim mthar dbyung
NK086(lu)001:3666: ba dang / de nas rdzogs rim byang sems phur bu'i dgongs don /
NK086(lu)001:3667: rang lus gzhan lus thabs ldan gyi sgo nas dpe yi ye shes drangs bar byas la /
NK086(lu)001:3668: de nyid mtshon bya don gyi ye shes su go
NK086(lu)001:3669: 'pho ba'i slad du rig pa ye shes kyi phur
NK086(lu)001:3670: pa rdzogs pa chen po khregs chod dang thod rgal
NK086(lu)001:3671: gyi gnad nyams su len pa yin no zhes gsungs
NK086(lu)001:3672: so // drug pa ma mo rbod gtong gi dgongs
NK086(lu)001:3673: pa thams cad ma mo rtsa rlung gi dgongs par
NK086(lu)001:3674: 'dus pa bstan pa la bzhi ste /
NK086(lu)001:3675: ma mo thams cad 'jig rten snang tshul dang sbyar
NK086(lu)001:3676: te rigs rgyud cho 'brang dang bcas te bshad pa
NK086(lu)001:3677: dang / gab spas gter gyi lugs su sbyar te sbas pa mngon du phyungs nas bshad pa rang /
NK086(lu)001:3678: lta ba don dang sbyar te sbyor sgrol lam du bshad pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:3679: bstan srung phrin las dang sbyar te drag po ngan sngags su bshad pa dang bzhi'o //
NK086(lu)001:3682: rang bzhin gyi rnal 'byor ma bcu bzhi dang /
NK086(lu)001:3683: dman mo lnga bcu rtsa brgyad la sogs pa ye
NK086(lu)001:3684: shes dang las kyi ma mo 'bum sde bsam yas
NK086(lu)001:3685: pa rnams te / de dag thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings las sprul zhing /
NK086(lu)001:3686: rnam rtog dbang gi snang ste /
NK086(lu)001:3687: rtag chad kyi rjes su bzung bas /
NK086(lu)001:3688: de rnams kyi pha dang ma dang sde dang tshe dang ming dang gzugs gang yin pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:3692: dus gang la rgyu ba dang /
NK086(lu)001:3694: skyon ji lta yod pa la sogs pa phan gnod
NK086(lu)001:3695: kyi bdag mo rnams kyi khung dang lung zhib du
NK086(lu)001:3696: spros pa thams cad ni 'jig rten snang tshul dang
NK086(lu)001:3697: sbyar te bshad pa yin la /
NK086(lu)001:3698: de yang chos kyidabyingasa las sems can rnams kyi rnam
NK086(lu)001:3699: par rtog pa g.yo zhing las mthun par bsags pa'i
NK086(lu)001:3700: dbang gis nam mkha' stong pa'i klong du 'byung bzhi
NK086(lu)001:3701: ri rab lha mi'i gnas ris tha dad ba'i tshul
NK086(lu)001:3702: can 'jig rten 'di chags shing gnas pa'i tshe /
NK086(lu)001:3703: ji ltar snang ba'ii srid pa de la dbang byed
NK086(lu)001:3704: pa'i gtso bo ni snang srid ma mo'i tshogs yin
NK086(lu)001:3705: pas de rnams kyi lo rgyus shes shing bkol thabs
NK086(lu)001:3706: la mkhas pas gnas skabs su ci dang ci la
NK086(lu)001:3707: rbod cing gtong ba'i don 'grub cing /
NK086(lu)001:3708: dbyings kyi ma mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu
NK086(lu)001:3709: phyin ma'i don la mkhas pas mchog gi dngos grub
NK086(lu)001:3710: thob te / srid pa ma rgyud kyi dkyil 'khor
NK086(lu)001:3711: thams cad kyi rtsa ba yin pas phrin las kyi
NK086(lu)001:3712: mnga' bdag dam pa yin no //
NK086(lu)001:3713: gnyis pa gab sbas mngon du phyungs te bshad pa ni /
NK086(lu)001:3714: thog mtha' bar ma'i dus gsum gyis khyad par byar med pa /
NK086(lu)001:3715: dus med mnyam pa chen po'i dus kyi tshe /
NK086(lu)001:3716: chos dbyings skye ba med pa las ma mo rig
NK086(lu)001:3717: pa'i ye shes 'gag pa med par shar ba na
NK086(lu)001:3718: / dpal chen po mngon rdzogs rgyal po'i dgongs pa
NK086(lu)001:3719: khyad par can gyis snang srid ma mo thams cad
NK086(lu)001:3720: yum gyi b+ha gar shar par gzigs nas /
NK086(lu)001:3721: dbang du bsdus shing dam tshig bstsal te ma mo
NK086(lu)001:3722: thams cad kyis kyang phrin las sgrub pa'i rbod gtong
NK086(lu)001:3723: gi bdag mor khas blang shing mna' bor te yab
NK086(lu)001:3724: mngon rdzogs rgyal po'i rtsa rlung gi dkyil 'khor du
NK086(lu)001:3725: gab pa'i gter du spas te bzhag pa'o //
NK086(lu)001:3726: de nas sbas pa rnams mngon du phyungs ba'i dus ni /
NK086(lu)001:3727: 'jig rten gyi khams 'khrugs shing sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa nyams /
NK086(lu)001:3728: log lta'i ru tra rnam gnyis dar ba'i tshe /
NK086(lu)001:3729: yab kyi sku la gab cig sbas pa'i ma mo
NK086(lu)001:3730: rnams mngon du phyungs te phrin las rnam pa bzhi
NK086(lu)001:3731: sgrub par bya ba yin pas /
NK086(lu)001:3732: de yang dur khrod 'jigs shing ya nga ba dben
NK086(lu)001:3733: zhing ma mo mkha' 'gro 'du ba'i gnas la sogs
NK086(lu)001:3734: pa phun sum tshogs pa lnga dang ldan pa'i sgo
NK086(lu)001:3735: nas / 'du 'dzin dang rnam g.yeng le lo nyon mongs pa rnams spang te /
NK086(lu)001:3736: bar chad kyi rnam pa gang gis kyang mi tshugs pa'i gding dang ldan pas /
NK086(lu)001:3737: ting nge 'dzin gsum las byung ba 'byung ba rim
NK086(lu)001:3738: brtsegs kyi dkyil 'khor dang dbang chen gyi gzhal yas
NK086(lu)001:3740: rnal 'byor pa bdag gi yid byed pa po kun tu bzang po las /
NK086(lu)001:3741: yab mngon rdzogs rgyal po che mchog he ru ka
NK086(lu)001:3742: dbu dgu phyag bco brgyad pa dur khrod chas kyis
NK086(lu)001:3743: brgyan pa bskyed / chos bya ba mo kun tu bzang mo las /
NK086(lu)001:3744: srid pa rgyal mo nyid bzhi mu kha le dbu gcig zhal lnga /
NK086(lu)001:3745: zhabs brgyad mkha' bzhi yis brgyan par bskyed la /
NK086(lu)001:3746: yab yum gnyis med du rol ba'i brdas bskul te
NK086(lu)001:3747: chags pa so sor g.yo shing rol pa mdzad pas
NK086(lu)001:3748: yab kyi mkha' nas 'beb byed ma dang /
NK086(lu)001:3750: bskul byed ma ste ma mo gsum byung ngo //
NK086(lu)001:3751: yum gyi mkha' nas len byed ma dang /
NK086(lu)001:3753: tshim byed ma ste ma mo gsum shar ro //
NK086(lu)001:3754: de nas yab yum gnyis su med pa'i byang chub
NK086(lu)001:3755: kyi sems las yi dam bsgom legs ma zhes bya
NK086(lu)001:3756: ba byung ste / de ltar mdun gyi mkha' dbyings la dkyil 'khor bdun ces bya'o //
NK086(lu)001:3757: de nas yab kyi rnam shes tshogs brgyad las /
NK086(lu)001:3758: koo r+ai ma mo brgyad byung ste /
NK086(lu)001:3759: de dag yab kyi phyag g.yas brgyad na khra thabs su bsnams par mdzad do //
NK086(lu)001:3760: rnam par shes pa'i cho 'phrul brgyad las sing ha phra men brgyad byung ste /
NK086(lu)001:3761: g.yon gyi phyag brgyad bum thabs su bsnams par mdzad pa /
NK086(lu)001:3762: de dag phyag mtshan gyi las zhes bya'o //
NK086(lu)001:3763: de nas spyi dpal khro bo'i rgyal pos 'jig rten gyi dregs pa can rnams gzir te /
NK086(lu)001:3764: shar phyogs brgya byin gyi gdan la bdag gi sha
NK086(lu)001:3765: yi khams las mkha' 'gro ma rnam snang gsal bskyed
NK086(lu)001:3766: / lhor gshin rje bsgyel ba'i gdan la drod las 'od gsal 'bar bskyed /
NK086(lu)001:3767: nub tu chu bdag gi gdan la khrag las mnyen gsal 'khril bskyed /
NK086(lu)001:3768: byang du gnod sbyin gyi gdan la dbugs las g.yang gsal g.yos bskyed /
NK086(lu)001:3769: g.yas phyogs su ya bdud bsgyel ba'i gdan la bkrag dang mdangs las bkrag gsal mnyam bskyed /
NK086(lu)001:3770: de ltar 'byung ba lnga'i ma mo de yang chags pa'i gdan gyi dkyil 'khor du gyur to //
NK086(lu)001:3771: de nas che mchog bla med he ru kas rang bzhin gyi rnal 'byor ma bcu bzhi gzir te /
NK086(lu)001:3772: phra men rgya mtsho dang nyi zla thod phreng bsgyel
NK086(lu)001:3773: ba'i gdan la bde chen byang chub sems kyi rtsal
NK086(lu)001:3775: phung byed sbas pa'i ma bzhi so sor bsgyel ba'i
NK086(lu)001:3776: gdan la mdangs bzhi'i rtsal dkar mo mig gcig dang
NK086(lu)001:3779: bde ba rmong byed ma ste gsang ba'i yum bzhi bskyed /
NK086(lu)001:3780: khros pa'i ma bzhi dang dgyes sde bzhi bsgyel ba'i gdan la /
NK086(lu)001:3781: mig rna sna lce'i dbang shes brgyad kyi rtsal las khams gsum gcod ma brgyad bskyed do //
NK086(lu)001:3782: de ltar rje mo bcu bzhi dbang du bsdus nas chags pa'i gdan du gyur to //
NK086(lu)001:3783: de nas sman mo lnga bcu rtsa brgyad gzir pas dgra la rbad pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:3784: thun mong gi mthu dang rdzu 'phul thams cad kyi
NK086(lu)001:3785: bdag mo yin pas thun mong gi las gang 'dod
NK086(lu)001:3787: de ltar ma mo'i tshogs dbang du bsdus nas rbod gtong gi las rab 'byams sgrub pa yin no //
NK086(lu)001:3788: tshul 'dis ni ma mo rnams dbang du bsdu ba'i sgrub pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:3789: sbas don nang rtsa rlung gi ma mo dbang du byed pa'i rdzogs rim kyang mtshon par byas pa'o //
NK086(lu)001:3790: gsum pa ma mo lta ba don dang sbyar te bshad pa ni /
NK086(lu)001:3791: rnal 'byor pa'i grol lam du bshad pa ste /
NK086(lu)001:3792: rnal 'byor pa bdag gi lus ngag yid gsum ma
NK086(lu)001:3793: mo rbod gtong gi dkyil 'khor du shes shing de
NK086(lu)001:3794: la gnas pa'i dus na snang grags kyi chos thams
NK086(lu)001:3795: cad ma mor ma gyur ba gang yang med la
NK086(lu)001:3796: / ma mo'i sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las
NK086(lu)001:3797: lnga mi zad pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo la longs
NK086(lu)001:3798: spyod pas rmad du byung ba zhes bya ste /
NK086(lu)001:3799: 'di ltar chos thams cad ma mo'i rang bzhin du
NK086(lu)001:3800: spyod pa de yang gzhan nas 'ong ba ma yin
NK086(lu)001:3801: te / rang gi snying po byang chub kyi sems kyi cho 'phrul du snang ba yin la /
NK086(lu)001:3802: sems kyi chos nyid ni rgyu rkyen la rag ma
NK086(lu)001:3803: lus par gdod ma nas 'bras bu'i snying por rang
NK086(lu)001:3804: byung bas ma mo thams cad kyang sems su lhun
NK086(lu)001:3807: ma chos kyi dbyings las mo rig pa'i ye shes su shar ba /
NK086(lu)001:3808: ma skye ba med pa las mo 'gag pa med pa'i rol par shar ba zhes gsungs pa ltar /
NK086(lu)001:3809: chos thams cad chos dbyings kun tu bzang mo shes
NK086(lu)001:3810: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid bzhi mu
NK086(lu)001:3811: kha le'i dbyings las shar bas na /
NK086(lu)001:3812: dbyings las ye shes dang de'i rtsal las las kyi
NK086(lu)001:3813: ma mor snang ba snang srid ma mo'i tshogs thams
NK086(lu)001:3814: cad kyang rtsa ba chos dbyings byang chub sems su
NK086(lu)001:3815: gdar sha chod na ma dang mo yi don rtogs
NK086(lu)001:3816: te ma mo'i stong srog phrog pa yin no //
NK086(lu)001:3817: tshul 'dis ni lta ba'i gnad bstan pa'o //
NK086(lu)001:3818: bzhi pa bstan srung phrin las dang sbyar nas drag po ngan sngags kyi lugs su bshad pa ni /
NK086(lu)001:3819: spyir srid pa'i ma mo thams cad la mngon rdzogs
NK086(lu)001:3820: rgyal po'i dgongs pa khyad par can gyis sgrub thabs
NK086(lu)001:3821: mang du bka' stsal pa yang /
NK086(lu)001:3822: bsdu na sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las lngar 'dus ste /
NK086(lu)001:3823: de dag gang la'ang don brgyad kyis sa lam mthar dbyung bar bya dgos pas /
NK086(lu)001:3824: dang po ma mo'i spyi 'dun bca' ba ni /
NK086(lu)001:3825: spyi sngags gcig tu dril te bsnyen pa bya ba'o //
NK086(lu)001:3826: gnyis pa dmag dpung bsdu ba ni sgos so so nas bsnyen pa bya ba'o //
NK086(lu)001:3827: gsum pa dmag drangs pa ni /
NK086(lu)001:3828: drug bcu rtsa brgyad thun gyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /
NK086(lu)001:3829: rigs so sor phye nas thun thig ler btab pa gnyis kyis bya'o //
NK086(lu)001:3830: bzhi pa dmag dpon bsko ba ni ma mo thams
NK086(lu)001:3831: cad kyi las mkhan re ma ti yin pas re
NK086(lu)001:3832: ma ti las mkhan du bsdu bar bya'o //
NK086(lu)001:3833: lnga pa las kyi ngo blang ba ni las kyi dmigs dang sbyar te bsad pa bzhi ste /
NK086(lu)001:3834: gling bzhi spyi mdos dang las mkhan ma mo ma
NK086(lu)001:3835: trang gi gtor bzlog la brten nas bsad pa dang
NK086(lu)001:3836: gcig /dbang drag phur bus bsad pa dang gnyis /
NK086(lu)001:3837: ma mo spyi'i nye 'byed dang phra men sgos kyi
NK086(lu)001:3838: nye 'byed de phra men nye 'byed kyis bsad pa
NK086(lu)001:3839: dang gsum / spyi thun gcig tu dril ba dang
NK086(lu)001:3840: sgos thun du phyogs bzhi dbus lnga'i ma mos nad
NK086(lu)001:3841: mtshon gyi thun dbab lugs lnga te /
NK086(lu)001:3842: de ltar ngan sngags thun gyis bsad pa dang bzhi'o //
NK086(lu)001:3843: drug pa las kyi lhag ma bsdu ba ni /
NK086(lu)001:3844: man ngag mnan bsregs 'phang gtad rdzogs par bya ba'o //
NK086(lu)001:3845: bdun pa las 'gor na bdud dpung bshig cing dmag dpung gtor ba ni /
NK086(lu)001:3846: ma mo'i shis bstan phyir dkrug pa ste /
NK086(lu)001:3847: dkrug pa dang dkrug rim dang lto ba dkrug pa'o //
NK086(lu)001:3848: brgyad pa dmag zas byin cing dmag dus btab pa ni /
NK086(lu)001:3849: las grub pa dang gtang rag dus su btang la phyis kyi las gnyer gtad bya ba'o //
NK086(lu)001:3850: tshul 'di rbod gtong drag sngags kyi bsgrub lugs bstan pa yin no //
NK086(lu)001:3851: mdor na ma mo rtsa rlung gi dgongs pa ni
NK086(lu)001:3852: phyi nang gsang ba gsum gyis shes par bya ste
NK086(lu)001:3853: / phyi ltar na 'jig rten chags gnas byed pa'i
NK086(lu)001:3854: rtsa ba srid pa'i dbang chen ma mo mkha' 'gro
NK086(lu)001:3855: rnams kyi thog ma'i skye rgyud /
NK086(lu)001:3856: da lta gnas pa sogs dang /
NK086(lu)001:3858: bsnyen sgrub las sbyor ji ltar byed pa'i tshul shes pa ni /
NK086(lu)001:3859: phyi srid pa ma mo'i snang tshul la brten te sgrub pa yin no //
NK086(lu)001:3860: nang ltar na phyi'i ma mo thams cad nang rang gi rtsa rlung gi cho 'phrul yin te /
NK086(lu)001:3861: ji ltar phyi rol de bzhin nang zhes gsang sngags spyi yi gzhung gis bzhed la /
NK086(lu)001:3862: phyi rol du 'jig rten chags gnas 'jig par byed
NK086(lu)001:3863: pa ma mo 'di dag gis byed par snang ba
NK086(lu)001:3864: bzhin du nang du lus dang bde sdug thams cad
NK086(lu)001:3865: rtsa rlung thig le'i 'pho bas byed cing 'di gnyis
NK086(lu)001:3867: nang gi rlung sems kyi cho 'phrul las phyi rol
NK086(lu)001:3868: du de ltar snang zhing phan gnon kyang bslu med
NK086(lu)001:3869: du byed la / gang du nang gi 'pho ba
NK086(lu)001:3870: dbang du gyur pa na phyi rol gyi ma mo
NK086(lu)001:3871: rnas kyang dbang du 'gyur pas na nang rtsa rlung
NK086(lu)001:3872: gi byed bcing zab mo'i man ngag gis srid pa'i
NK086(lu)001:3873: snang ba thams cad la dbang sgyur dgos pas ma
NK086(lu)001:3874: mo'i dgongs pa'i mtha' rtsa rlung la thug pa 'di
NK086(lu)001:3875: ma rgyud spyi dang lugs 'dir khyad par du basngagasa
NK086(lu)001:3876: du byed la / so // de la snang srid
NK086(lu)001:3877: thams cad ni kun tu bzang mo nyid bzhi mu
NK086(lu)001:3878: kha le'i mkha' dbyings las shar zhing de las ye
NK086(lu)001:3879: shes dang las kyi ma mo 'bum phrag yangs pa'i
NK086(lu)001:3880: cho 'phrul du snang nas srid pa thams cad snang
NK086(lu)001:3881: du byed la / so // ba byed do //
NK086(lu)001:3882: ma mo 'bum phrag bsdu na bzhi brgya rtsa bzhir
NK086(lu)001:3883: du byed la / so // ba byed do //
NK086(lu)001:3884: 'dus la / de dag kyang skye 'gro'i rtsa bzhi
NK086(lu)001:3886: rtsa bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi ni rtsa chen bzhi la 'dus nas gnas /
NK086(lu)001:3887: de bzhi yang srog rtsa gser gyi spu gur 'dus nas gnas /
NK086(lu)001:3888: gser spug kyang tsit+ta 'od kyi khang par 'dus nas gnas /
NK086(lu)001:3889: rtsa chen po tsit+ta 'od kyi khang pa na dwangs
NK086(lu)001:3890: ma lnga 'dus pa'i thig le la brtan nas byang
NK086(lu)001:3891: chub sems kyi 'od tshon gang ba gcig du gnas
NK086(lu)001:3892: so // snang srid kyi chos su snang ba thams
NK086(lu)001:3893: cad phar spros pa'i tshe byang chub kyi sems las
NK086(lu)001:3894: rtsal snang sgyu ma lhar 'phro zhing sprul /
NK086(lu)001:3895: tshul bsdu ba'i tshe de la 'du bas na /
NK086(lu)001:3896: nang du rlung khams kyi byed pa dbu ma'i dbyings su sdud pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:3897: de las 'phro ba'i tshul gyis 'khor 'das kyi snang
NK086(lu)001:3898: ba 'char tshul shes nas rtsa rlung gnad du bsdu
NK086(lu)001:3899: ba dang / phyi rol du mngon rdzogs rgyal pos
NK086(lu)001:3900: ma mo rnams gdan du byas te dbang du byed
NK086(lu)001:3902: zhib par nang gi rtsa rlung dang /
NK086(lu)001:3903: phyi'i ma mo'i lha grangs sbyar te bstan pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:3904: rtsa rlung gi nyams len rnams gzhung dang man ngag las shes par bya'o //
NK086(lu)001:3905: gsang ba ltar na chos thams cad skye 'gag med
NK086(lu)001:3906: pa chos dbyings kun tu bzang mo'i rang bzhin las
NK086(lu)001:3907: ma 'das pas ma mo'i ngo bo nyid de /
NK086(lu)001:3908: rtsal snang snang srid kyi chos thams cad rang sems
NK086(lu)001:3909: gdod nas ma skyes pa'i chos nyid yongs la brdal
NK086(lu)001:3910: ba chen po byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin du
NK086(lu)001:3911: 'ub chub par shes na ma mo'i don rtogs pa
NK086(lu)001:3912: yin no // bdun pa 'jig rten mchod bstod thams
NK086(lu)001:3913: cad mchod brten sgrub gsum du 'dus par bstan pa
NK086(lu)001:3914: yin no // la / 'jig rten las kyi dregs
NK086(lu)001:3915: pa can mthu dang stobs su ldan pa phan gnod
NK086(lu)001:3916: kyi las sna tshogs byed pa de dag legs par
NK086(lu)001:3917: mchod na mgon byed pa 'jig rten spyi yi chos
NK086(lu)001:3918: yin no // la / lugs yin pas / lung
NK086(lu)001:3919: las 'jig rten mchod bstod ni mchod cing bstod pas
NK086(lu)001:3920: 'grub par gsung pas de dag mchod cing brten pa'i
NK086(lu)001:3922: 'jig rten 'di na mthu dang stobs su ldan pa'i
NK086(lu)001:3923: dregs pa tshad med pa yod kyang de dag gi
NK086(lu)001:3924: gtso bo sde dpon chen po sus cu po 'di
NK086(lu)001:3925: ni dregs pa yongs kyi rgyal po yin la /
NK086(lu)001:3926: dpal chen po'i bka' nyan cing rnal 'byor pa'i grogs
NK086(lu)001:3927: byed par khas blangs pa'i rdo rje'i tha tshig las
NK086(lu)001:3928: nam yang mi 'da' bas 'di dag ni mchod cing
NK086(lu)001:3929: brten par byas na thun mong gi dngos grub sgrub
NK086(lu)001:3931: mthar thug gi dngos grub sgrub pa'i grogs su 'gyur pa yin la /
NK086(lu)001:3932: de yang mgon byed pa'i lha 'di dag la mthun pa'i rdzas kyis mchod pas mnyes par bya /
NK086(lu)001:3933: phyi nang gsang ba'i sgrub rdzas rten du btsugs te rgyun du brten /
NK086(lu)001:3934: srog gi snying po drang pa'i tshul gyis sgrub par
NK086(lu)001:3935: bya ba gsum ni spyi yi don du shes par
NK086(lu)001:3936: bya la / gzhung gzhan du mchod bstod kyi dgongs
NK086(lu)001:3937: pa sgrub lugs don bzhi pa 'dus par gsungs pa
NK086(lu)001:3938: bya la / / yang bsnyen sgrub las gsum du
NK086(lu)001:3939: gsungs pa sogs kyang so so'i bzhed pa'i skabs kyis
NK086(lu)001:3940: bya la / / shes par bya'o // de la
NK086(lu)001:3941: 'jig rten pa'i dregs pa chen po de dag bsdu
NK086(lu)001:3942: na dregs pa sde brgyad du 'dus shing dregs pa
NK086(lu)001:3943: bya la / / shes par bya'o // de rnams ni / lha yang byed la 'dre yang byed /
NK086(lu)001:3944: sman kyang yin la dug kyang yin //
NK086(lu)001:3946: mchod na 'go zhing bcol na sgrub la /
NK086(lu)001:3947: rbad na 'gro ba chos nyid yin pa ni dregs
NK086(lu)001:3948: pa sgrub pa'i skabs su ma zad ye shes kyi
NK086(lu)001:3949: lha'i sngags rnams kyang rjes 'dzin dang tshar gcod kyi
NK086(lu)001:3950: las rab 'byams gang la sbyar kyang rtog med nor
NK086(lu)001:3951: bu'i tshul du ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin 'grub pa
NK086(lu)001:3952: rten 'brel gyi chos nyid yin pa smos ma dgos
NK086(lu)001:3953: pa bzhin no // de yang skabs 'dir 'jig rten
NK086(lu)001:3954: mchod bstod kyi bsgrub pa'i khong snying brus nas dregs
NK086(lu)001:3955: pa can rnams khyi snying 'khrud ma la chags su
NK086(lu)001:3956: gzhug pa'i thabs kyi man ngag rnam pa bzhi bshad
NK086(lu)001:3957: pa bzhin no // de / 'jig rten pa thams
NK086(lu)001:3958: cad lha ma srin sde brgyad du bsdus te bshad
NK086(lu)001:3959: pa bzhin no // de / pa / mchod thabs
