NK086(lu)001:3960: thams cad gsol kha brgyad du bsdus te bshad pa
NK086(lu)001:3961: pa bzhin no // de / pa / / brten
NK086(lu)001:3962: thabs thams cad brten thabs rnam pa brgyad du bsdu
NK086(lu)001:3963: pa bzhin no // de / pa / / te
NK086(lu)001:3964: bshad pa / sgrub thabs thams cad sgrub lugs rnam
NK086(lu)001:3965: pa brgyad du bsdus te bshad pa'o //
NK086(lu)001:3967: dkar po thams cad bsdu na ging du bsdu /
NK086(lu)001:3968: de bzhin du dmar po thams cad btsan /
NK086(lu)001:3970: ser po thams cad gnod sbyin /
NK086(lu)001:3971: smug po thams cad srin po //
NK086(lu)001:3972: steng gi dbang chen thams cad gza' /
NK086(lu)001:3973: 'og gi dbang chen thams cad klu /
NK086(lu)001:3974: mo rgyud thams cad ma mor bsdu te sde brgyad pa de /
NK086(lu)001:3975: mchod bstod bya ba'i yul 'jig rten gyi dregs pa bzung bar bya ste /
NK086(lu)001:3976: de dag la spyir mthu nus bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:3977: bye brag du smyo 'bog la dbang ba ging /
NK086(lu)001:3978: nad rims la dbang ba ma mo sogs so so'i
NK086(lu)001:3979: las kyi mthu rtsal drag po dang ldan pa'i phyir
NK086(lu)001:3980: mchod cing bskul na las myur du byed pa'i phyir
NK086(lu)001:3981: ro // gnyis pa mchod pa thams cad gsol kha brgyad du bsdus te bstan pa ni /
NK086(lu)001:3982: ging thams cad rgyal bshos mkhar thabs kyis gsol zhing mchod /
NK086(lu)001:3983: de bzhin du bdud thams cad la bdud bshos gsang pu /
NK086(lu)001:3984: btsan la gri bshos rgyan can /
NK086(lu)001:3986: srin po dpal bshos zur gsum /
NK086(lu)001:3988: klu bshos zlum dkar mngar brgyan pa /
NK086(lu)001:3989: ma mo mkha' 'gro'i skyus gtor gyis gsol zhing mchod
NK086(lu)001:3990: pa des mtshon nas rang rang gi phyi nang gsang
NK086(lu)001:3991: ba'i mthun pa'i mchod rdzas kyang lung dang man ngag
NK086(lu)001:3992: gi gzhung bzhin shes par byas nas /
NK086(lu)001:3993: legs par mchod na sdong grogs byed par 'gyur bas mchod cing bstod pa byed pa gal che'o //
NK086(lu)001:3994: gsum pa brten lugs rnam pa brgyad du brten thabs thams cad bsdus te bstan pa ni /
NK086(lu)001:3997: de ltar bsten ma shes pa'i skyon brgyad so sor gsung yang /
NK086(lu)001:3999: ging thams cad rgyal po ltar brten /
NK086(lu)001:4000: des che btsan dbang gi dngos grub 'byung /
NK086(lu)001:4001: de ltar brten ma shes na 'khor la chags shing rang dpal so dma' /
NK086(lu)001:4002: bdud thams cad pha ltar brten /
NK086(lu)001:4003: de ltar brten na nor phyugs 'phel /
NK086(lu)001:4004: de ltar brten ma shes na nor la gzan cing rang nyid ltog por 'gro /
NK086(lu)001:4005: btsan thams cad grogs ltar brten /
NK086(lu)001:4006: des snying chags par slu dngos grub 'byung /
NK086(lu)001:4007: de ltar brten ma shes na glo bur nad mang la tha ma gri ru 'chi /
NK086(lu)001:4008: gnod sbyin thams cad lha ltar brten /
NK086(lu)001:4009: des rgyud 'jam la mgon skyabs che ba'i dngos grub 'byung //
NK086(lu)001:4010: de ltar brten ma shes na /
NK086(lu)001:4011: bsgo ba nyan dka' zhing bkra mi shis /
NK086(lu)001:4012: srin po thams cad khol bo ltar brten /
NK086(lu)001:4013: des bka' nyan cing las grub pa'i dngos grub 'byung /
NK086(lu)001:4014: de ltar brten ma shes na bsgo ba mi nyan la tsab tsub mang //
NK086(lu)001:4015: gza' rgod thams cad rje ltar brten /
NK086(lu)001:4016: des drag rtsal dbal so rno ba'i dngos grub 'byung /
NK086(lu)001:4017: de ltar brten ma shes na ko long che zhing nor la gzan /
NK086(lu)001:4018: klu thams cad bran ltar brten /
NK086(lu)001:4019: des kha log chung zhing las myur ba'i dngos grub 'byung /
NK086(lu)001:4020: de ltar brten ma shes na bkra mi shis pa dang bu spal lcong 'dra ba 'byung /
NK086(lu)001:4021: ma mo thams cad ma ltar brten /
NK086(lu)001:4022: des snying nye dam la 'du zas skoms 'phel /
NK086(lu)001:4023: de ltar brten ma shes na las la g.yel zhing zas nor mi 'adu'o //
NK086(lu)001:4024: bzhi pa sgrub pa thams cad gnad kyi sgrub pa brgyad du bsdus te bstan pa la /
NK086(lu)001:4025: thabs brgyad dang de ltar ma shes pa'i skyon brgyad
NK086(lu)001:4026: so sor sde tshan du gsung yang 'dir bsdu te
NK086(lu)001:4027: bshad na ging la chings kyi gnad kyis bsgrub na
NK086(lu)001:4028: 'grub cing / de ltar chings kyis ma bcings na
NK086(lu)001:4029: rgyal khrims gcod pa'i rgyal po bzhin du snyan kha
NK086(lu)001:4031: bdud la khugs kyi gnad kyis bsgrub na 'grub te /
NK086(lu)001:4032: de ltar khugs kyis ma bkug na /
NK086(lu)001:4033: pha tshan dbang chen dang 'dra ste bgo ba mi nyan /
NK086(lu)001:4034: btsan la se long gi gnad kyis bsgrub na 'grub /
NK086(lu)001:4035: se long med na grogs po khrel med dang 'dra ste rang gi bdud du 'ong /
NK086(lu)001:4036: gnod sbyin chun gyi gnad kyis bsgrub na 'grub /
NK086(lu)001:4037: chun gyis ma gcun na gtso bo dbang chen dang 'dra ste lha rgod grir 'chor ro //
NK086(lu)001:4038: srin po ar la gtad pa'i gnad kyis sgrub na 'grub /
NK086(lu)001:4039: de ltar ar gtad ma shes na gshed ma rtsub
NK086(lu)001:4040: mo dang 'dra ste rang srog rang gis bcad nyen
NK086(lu)001:4041: yod / gza' rgod lto ba dkrug pa'i gnad kyis bsgrub na 'grub /
NK086(lu)001:4042: lto ba ma dkrugs na dmag dpon med pa'i dmag mi dang 'dra ste las rnams rdug par 'gyur /
NK086(lu)001:4043: klu la log non gyi gnad kyi bsgrub na 'grub /
NK086(lu)001:4044: log non med na sbrul smyug dong du bcug par dang 'dra ste rang la log nyen yod /
NK086(lu)001:4045: ma mo la dbang du bsdu ba'i gnad kyis bsgrub na ba grub /
NK086(lu)001:4046: dbang du ma 'dus na gza' dpon med pa'i byi mod dang 'dra ste /
NK086(lu)001:4047: 'khu ldog mang zhing las la g.yel lo //
NK086(lu)001:4048: de ltar lha ma srin sde brgyad kyi mchod brten
NK086(lu)001:4049: sgrub lugs ngo shes na khyi bzang jo bos rbad
NK086(lu)001:4050: pa ltar bsgob nyan zhing rang la bla yid chags
NK086(lu)001:4051: pas na / 'jig rten mchod bstod kyi sgrub pa
NK086(lu)001:4052: khyi snying 'khrud ma la chags su gzhug pa'i gnad
NK086(lu)001:4053: kyis mchod thabs brten thabs gal che'o //
NK086(lu)001:4054: de yang dregs pa 'di dag gtso bor mchod brten gyi sgo nas sgrub cing /
NK086(lu)001:4055: khyad par du gong gnon gnyen po'i lha'i lha sngags
NK086(lu)001:4056: ting 'dzin gyi sgo nas srog dbang du bsdu ba
NK086(lu)001:4057: dang / mchog tu gyur pa lha srin rang sems
NK086(lu)001:4058: su shes pa'i lta bas zin pa gal che zhing
NK086(lu)001:4059: mthong khol dngos su 'byung ba'i bar du sgrub pa
NK086(lu)001:4060: byas na las gang yang thogs med du 'grub par
NK086(lu)001:4061: dang / 'gyur ro // brgyad pa dmod pa drag
NK086(lu)001:4062: sngags kyi sgrub pa thams cad 'bod rbad bsad gsum
NK086(lu)001:4063: gyi dgongs par 'du ba sngags kyi spu gri'i man
NK086(lu)001:4064: ngag du bstan pa la dmod pa thams cad lha
NK086(lu)001:4065: srin sde brgyad kyi rang skad du bsdus te bshad
NK086(lu)001:4066: dang / 'gyur ro // dang / dregs pa thams
NK086(lu)001:4067: cad rno ba'i dpe brgyad du bsdus te bshad pa
NK086(lu)001:4069: thams cad mtshon cha rnam pa brgyad du bsdus te
NK086(lu)001:4071: pa dang / sgrub pa thams cad man ngag rnam
NK086(lu)001:4072: pa brgyad du bsdus te bshad pa bzhir gsungs la
NK086(lu)001:4074: pa dang / / gzhung gzhan du dmod pa drag
NK086(lu)001:4075: sngags rdzong 'phrang srog gsum gyi dgongs pa zhes gsungs
NK086(lu)001:4076: pa de ni sgrol ba lam du byed pa'i drag
NK086(lu)001:4077: sngags thams cad kyi gnad don yin pas 'dir yang
NK086(lu)001:4078: de ltar yin mod kyang skabs 'dir dmod pa'i drag
NK086(lu)001:4079: sngags rang gi sger chos kyi spyi sdoms bod rbad
NK086(lu)001:4081: gzhung las drag sngags dug lnga rang bsad kyi dgongs
NK086(lu)001:4082: pa gnad kyi man ngag bzhi la sogs par gsang
NK086(lu)001:4083: ba yang phal cher rdzong dang 'phrang gi gnad kyis
NK086(lu)001:4084: drag sngag log par mi gol bar sgrol ba lam
NK086(lu)001:4085: du slong pa'i gnad la dgongs shing /
NK086(lu)001:4086: 'dir ni drag sngags rang gi nus pas srog dmar
NK086(lu)001:4087: 'byin du byed pa'i dmod pa'i mthu gtso bor brjod
NK086(lu)001:4088: pa'i skabs yin pa'i phyir gong ltar 'chad do //
NK086(lu)001:4089: de la dmod pa thams cad sde brgyad kyi rang skad du bsdus te bshad pa gang zhe na /
NK086(lu)001:4090: ye shes dang 'jig rten pa'i lha'i drag sdags kyi rnam pa mang du yod kyang /
NK086(lu)001:4091: 'jig rten gyi dregs pa'i gtso bo bsdus pa'i sngags
NK086(lu)001:4092: bdag dregs pa bco brgyad rang rang gi dmod pa'i
NK086(lu)001:4093: sngags dang de'i sgrub thabs rnams drag sngags kyi sgrub
NK086(lu)001:4095: dregs pa de dag sdus na sde brgyad du 'dus
NK086(lu)001:4096: pas de dag gi dmod pa brgyad du bsdus te
NK086(lu)001:4097: bstan pa ni / 'chi bdag gshin rje'i dmod pa gshin rje du 'bod kyi dmod pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:4098: 'dod khams ma mo'i dmod pa ma la ngu 'bod kyi dmod pa /
NK086(lu)001:4099: che dreg lha'i dmod pa bka' chad drag rtsal kyi dmod pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:4100: gdug rtsub gnod sbyin gyi dmod pa gnod sbyin drag po lce mdung gi dmod pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:4101: myur mgyogs srin po'i dmod pa srin po dung ba ro len gyi dmod pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:4102: khyab 'jug gza' yi dmod pa 'brug sgra glog 'byin gyi dmod pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:4103: glen pa klu yi dmod pa sprul nag dug lce'i dmod pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:4104: khram bdag bdud kyi dmod pa mun gling sum khugs
NK086(lu)001:4105: kyi dmod pa dang brgyad de dmod pa de dag
NK086(lu)001:4106: sde brgyad so so'i rang dmod yin te sngon sa
NK086(lu)001:4107: bon rtsub mos 'phang bas so so'i rang rgyud rtsub
NK086(lu)001:4108: mo blangs nas rang skad dmod pa de rnams su
NK086(lu)001:4109: sgrogs pas gang la bya ba'i snying srog la 'phab
NK086(lu)001:4110: par byed pa'o // des na drag po'i dmod pa
NK086(lu)001:4111: 'di dag bzlas pa'i dbang gis pha rol phung bar
NK086(lu)001:4112: byed pa'i mthu can du shes par bya'o //
NK086(lu)001:4113: gnyis pa dregs pa thams cad rno ba'i dpe brgyad du bsdus te bshad pa ni /
NK086(lu)001:4114: 'chi bdag gshin rje'i khram shing des gang la bya ba ri dwags gdos su bcug pa dang 'dra /
NK086(lu)001:4115: de bzhin du 'dod khams ma mo'i nad rkyal rims nad khong du zhugs pa dang 'dra /
NK086(lu)001:4116: snang srid lha'i dal yams khog du mtshon shor ba dang 'dra /
NK086(lu)001:4117: kun khyab gaza'i thog ser khong gi 'byung ba khong nas 'khrugs pa'am thog bab pa dang 'dra /
NK086(lu)001:4118: glen pa klu'i dug ni sbyar dug khong du song ba dang 'dra /
NK086(lu)001:4119: gdug rtsub gnod sbyin gyi sbyor ba btsan dug khong du song ba'am lcags sgrog dang 'dra /
NK086(lu)001:4120: myur mgyogs srin po'i shan dmar gcan gzan 'jum nas sems can gyi srog gcod pa dang 'dra /
NK086(lu)001:4121: nag po bdud kyi khram nag tshe zad lus 'pho ba dang 'dra /
NK086(lu)001:4122: de ltar lha srin dregs pas 'gyings pa rnams la
NK086(lu)001:4123: rang rang gi drag rtsal re re yod pas de
NK086(lu)001:4124: la gtad cing de dag gi sngags kyi las la
NK086(lu)001:4125: bskul nas drag rtsal gyi las byas na /
NK086(lu)001:4126: gang yang rang dbang med par gang la bya ba
NK086(lu)001:4127: de 'chor mi srid cing rdul du blag par byed
NK086(lu)001:4128: do // gsum pa sngags thams cad mtshon cha rnam pa brgyad du sdus te bshad pa ni /
NK086(lu)001:4129: 'chi bdag gshin rje'i sngags ni mtshon cha'i 'khor lo bskor ba dang 'dra ste 'khor zhing gcod //
NK086(lu)001:4130: 'dod khams ma mo'i sngags ni dpag chen mda' dang 'dra ste mthu rtsal che /
NK086(lu)001:4131: che dreg lha'i sngags ni mdung la dar btags pa dang 'dra ste gsor zhing 'bigs /
NK086(lu)001:4132: khyab 'jug gaza'i sngags ni stobs chen sgyog dang 'dra ste drag la myur /
NK086(lu)001:4133: glen pa klu'i sngags ni sa 'og ral gri dang 'dra ste ma tshor bar gcod /
NK086(lu)001:4134: gdug rtsub gnod sbyin gyi sngags ni 'ur rdo dang thog 'dra ste drag cing rtsub /
NK086(lu)001:4135: myur mgyogs srin po'i sngags ni dpal bo'i ral gri dang 'dra ste myur du rgol /
NK086(lu)001:4136: khram bdag bdud kyi sngags ni gsang bug du mda'
NK086(lu)001:4137: dang 'dra ste zin shor gnad la brdeg /de ltar
NK086(lu)001:4138: lha ma srin sde brgyad kyi sngags ni mtshon cha
NK086(lu)001:4139: brgyad kyi 'debs lugs dang 'dra ste gang la bya
NK086(lu)001:4140: pa'i srog la rgol ba'i mthu yod par shes par
NK086(lu)001:4141: bya'o // bzhi pa sgrub thabs thams cad man ngag brgyad du bsdus te bshad pa ni /
NK086(lu)001:4142: 'chi bdag gshin rje'i drag sngags skyes dar ma'i snying
NK086(lu)001:4143: shun la bsgrub pa'i man ngag /de bzhin du nad
NK086(lu)001:4144: bdag ma mo'i drag sngags snel gri mo'i snying shun
NK086(lu)001:4146: gdug rtsub gnod sbyin gyi drag sngags ra khams pa gdan dmar gyi snying shun du bsgrub pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:4147: kun khyab gaza'i drag sngags lug sngo tshe'am ra nag po'i snying shun du bsgrub pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:4148: drag rtsal lha yi drag sngags g.yag dkar po'i snying shun du bsgrub pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:4149: gdug pa klu yi drag sngags sbal ba'i snying shun du bsgrub pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:4150: myur mgyogs srin po'i drag sngags skyes pa grir shi ba'i snying shun du bsgrub pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:4151: khram bdag bdud kyi drag sngags lug nag po'i snying shun du bsgrub pa'i man ngag ste /
NK086(lu)001:4152: de ltar snying shun rnam pa brgyad ni /
NK086(lu)001:4153: lha ma srid sde brgyad kyi srog la brten nas /
NK086(lu)001:4154: dgra bo'i srog gcod pa'i rang gnad rang la dbab pa'i man ngag ste /
NK086(lu)001:4155: phyag cha dgra la bskor ba'i man ngag ces bya'o //
NK086(lu)001:4156: de ltar na don dang po drag sngags kyi ngo bo //
NK086(lu)001:4157: gnyis pas sngags bdag gi mthu //
NK086(lu)001:4159: bzhi pas sgrub thabs kyi man ngag gi tshul tsam smos pa ste /
NK086(lu)001:4160: drag sngags lag tu len pa'i gong gnon stobs ldan nag po'i bsnyen pa mthar dbyung la /
NK086(lu)001:4161: 'khor 'das stong srog 'phrog pa'i lta ba'i gding dang
NK086(lu)001:4162: ldan pa'i sgo nas gang rbad pa'i dregs pa de
NK086(lu)001:4165: mthar las la sbyar ba'i tshul gyis sgrub pa yin zhing /
NK086(lu)001:4166: bsnyen sgrub dang 'bod rbad la mi ltos par glo
NK086(lu)001:4167: bur cog brdung ral gri phyung brdeg gi drag sngags
NK086(lu)001:4168: las la sbyor ba'ang yod pa sogs kyi gnad ni
NK086(lu)001:4169: so so'i gzhung dang man ngag gi rim pa bla
NK086(lu)001:4170: ma'i zhal las shes par bya'o //
NK086(lu)001:4171: de yan chad kyis sgrub pa chen po bka' brgyad kyi dgongs pa'i mdo bshad pa song nas /
NK086(lu)001:4172: da ni tshom bu dgu'i nang tshan rig 'dzin bla
NK086(lu)001:4173: ma'i sgrub thabs kya dgongs pa mdo tsam kha skong
NK086(lu)001:4174: du brjod na bla ma rig 'dzin gyi sgrub pa
NK086(lu)001:4175: thams cad ni bsnyen sgrub rnam pa bzhi'am bsnyen sgrub
NK086(lu)001:4176: las gsum du 'du ba yin te /
NK086(lu)001:4177: 'di la gzhung gzhan du rig 'dzin bla ma byin
NK086(lu)001:4178: rlabs kyi dgongs pa thugs gsal rnam dag ces kyang
NK086(lu)001:4179: gsungs so // de la spyir theg pa che chung
NK086(lu)001:4180: gi yon tan thams cad dge ba'i bshes gnyen la
NK086(lu)001:4182: rig 'dzin 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las //
NK086(lu)001:4183: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang //
NK086(lu)001:4184: dgra bcom nyan thos rang rgyal dag /so so'i skye bo dang po pa'i //
NK086(lu)001:4185: yon tan phun tshogs ma lus pa //
NK086(lu)001:4186: gong ma dag la brten pas 'byung //
NK086(lu)001:4188: khyad par du gsang sngags zab mo'i dngos grub thams
NK086(lu)001:4189: cad bla ma la brten te 'byung gi gzhan du
NK086(lu)001:4191: bla mas dbang gis smin par ma byas pa la
NK086(lu)001:4192: gsang sngags nyan pa tsam gyi skal pa'ang med la
NK086(lu)001:4193: / dbang thob nas kyang thun mong dang thun min
NK086(lu)001:4194: gyi man ngag rnams bla mas bstan pa las shes
NK086(lu)001:4195: / dgos shing / ma bstan pa dang bka' lung
NK086(lu)001:4196: non pa med par sngags kyi las phra mo la
NK086(lu)001:4197: spyod na'ang chos la dbang za ba'i nyes pa yod
NK086(lu)001:4198: / dgos shing / pa dang / sgrub pa chud
NK086(lu)001:4199: za la 'bras bu mi 'byin pa sogs nyes pa
NK086(lu)001:4200: che bas sngags kyi dngos grub che phra ji thob
NK086(lu)001:4201: pa bla ma'i thugs mnyes nas byin rlabs zhugs pa
NK086(lu)001:4202: kho nas byed pa yin pas las phra mo sgrub
NK086(lu)001:4203: pa'i gdam pa zhig zhu na'ang yon sogs kyis bla
NK086(lu)001:4204: ma mnyes par byas na tshegs med par 'grub kyi
NK086(lu)001:4205: de las bzlog na nyes pa 'byung ba'i tshul lung
NK086(lu)001:4206: dang lo rgyus rnams las rgya che 'byung ba ltar
NK086(lu)001:4207: nges pa rnyed pa gal che zhing /
NK086(lu)001:4208: khyad par du lta ba chos nyid kyi rjod tshig
NK086(lu)001:4209: dang dpe las 'das pa'i don gyi lhan cig skyes
NK086(lu)001:4210: pa rtogs pa ni bla ma'i man ngag gis ngo
NK086(lu)001:4211: sprad pa 'am / don brgyud kyi byin rlabs 'pho
NK086(lu)001:4212: ba kho na las gzhan gang gis kyang mi nus
NK086(lu)001:4213: pa'i phyir te rgyud las kyang //
NK086(lu)001:4214: gzhan gyis brjod min lhan cig skyes //
NK086(lu)001:4215: gang du yang ni mi rnyed de //
NK086(lu)001:4216: bla mas dus thabs bstan pa dang //
NK086(lu)001:4217: bdag gi bsod nams las shes bya //
NK086(lu)001:4218: zhes gsungs pa sogs bka' dang dgongs 'brel rnams nas yang yang gsungs shing /
NK086(lu)001:4219: dpe ji ltar na nyi ma yod kyang /
NK086(lu)001:4220: mtshams sbyar rkyen me shel med na spra ba la me 'byung ba'i thabs med pa ltar /
NK086(lu)001:4221: dus gsum gyis sangs rgyas sras bcas bzhugs su zin kyang /
NK086(lu)001:4222: bla ma med na slob ma'i rgyud la lha rnams
NK086(lu)001:4223: kyi byin rlabs dang zab mo'i rtogs pa 'jug pa
NK086(lu)001:4224: med pas na bla ma kho na byin rlabs kyi
NK086(lu)001:4225: rtsa ba dngos grub kyi 'byung gnas /
NK086(lu)001:4226: phrin las kyi gzhi ma yin te //
NK086(lu)001:4227: sngon grub pa thob pa'i rig 'dzin rnams kyis yi
NK086(lu)001:4228: dam gyi lha zhal dngos su bstan pa'i tshe na
NK086(lu)001:4229: slob ma phal gyi yi dam ched cher bzung bas
NK086(lu)001:4230: rten 'brel 'chug nas dngos grub ma thob pa'i lo
NK086(lu)001:4231: rgyus ltar bla ma nyid sangs rgyas kun 'dus kyi
NK086(lu)001:4233: mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i bla ma'i thugs ye shes
NK086(lu)001:4234: de ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bdag nyid yin
NK086(lu)001:4235: la / rim brgyud byin rlabs ldan pa'i bla ma'i
NK086(lu)001:4236: ba spu'i khung bur rgyal ba rab 'byams bzhugs nas
NK086(lu)001:4237: byin gyis rlob par gsungs pas /
NK086(lu)001:4238: rang gi bla ma de yon tan gyi ngos nas sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam la /
NK086(lu)001:4239: bka' drin gyi ngos nas sangs rgyas byang sems mang
NK086(lu)001:4240: po bzhugs kyang mi mthong ba'i skal ngan bdag la
NK086(lu)001:4241: sangs rgyas sras bcas kyi phrin las mdzad pa'i phyir
NK086(lu)001:4242: sangs rgyas las kyang lhag pas na dkon mchog kun
NK086(lu)001:4243: 'dus sam dkon mchog bzhi par grags pa gsang sngags
NK086(lu)001:4244: ston pa'i bla ma la mchod pa phul na de'i
NK086(lu)001:4245: ba spu'i bu ga gcig mchod kyang /
NK086(lu)001:4246: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas mchod pa las ches 'phags pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:4247: brnyas na phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas la thugs mi mnyes
NK086(lu)001:4248: par sgrub pa las ches lci ba'i tshul rgyud lung
NK086(lu)001:4249: rnams nas rgya cher gsungs pa'i don yid la bzhag
NK086(lu)001:4250: nas sngags kyi dngos grub 'dod pas bla ma rig
NK086(lu)001:4251: pa 'dzin pa brten par bya ste /
NK086(lu)001:4253: de bas dang po'i las can gyis /
NK086(lu)001:4254: thog ma nyid du 'bad pa yis /
NK086(lu)001:4255: rig pa 'dzin pa nye bar brten /
NK086(lu)001:4257: byin rlabs bla ma'i sgrub pa ni shin tu gal che ste /
NK086(lu)001:4258: dpal o rgyan chen pos bde gshegs 'dus pa'i bskyed
NK086(lu)001:4259: rdzogs chen mo'i ti ka las rig 'dzin ni bla
NK086(lu)001:4260: ma sgrul par bya ba yin te shin tu gal
NK086(lu)001:4261: che / bskyed na rang yi dam gang byed du sgom /
NK086(lu)001:4262: de'i spyi bor bla ma bsgom /
NK086(lu)001:4263: 'khor rig 'dzin rnams bskyed la so so nas spyan
NK086(lu)001:4264: drang ba la sogs pa ma 'dres par byas pas
NK086(lu)001:4265: / byin rlabs chen po mod la 'byung ngo //
NK086(lu)001:4267: rig 'dzin bla ma sgrub pa'i tshul la spyi dang khyad par gnyis /
NK086(lu)001:4268: dang po ni spyir dge legs yon tan thams cad kyi 'byung gnas dang /
NK086(lu)001:4269: khyad par rdo rje'i theg pa'i lam gyi rtsa bar
NK086(lu)001:4270: gyur pa bla ma mtshan nyid dang ldan pa de'i
NK086(lu)001:4271: drung du bsnyen nas lus ngag yid gsum gus pa
NK086(lu)001:4272: chen pos thugs mnyes par byas la smin grol gyi
NK086(lu)001:4273: gdam pa legs par nod cing bla ma'i thugs mdzod
NK086(lu)001:4275: de yang ring lugs rdo rje rtse mo'i grub mtha' snyogs mi snyog kyi gnad ni /
NK086(lu)001:4276: thos bsam rgya chen po dang bsags sbyang phyi tshul sogs ji ltar phun sum tshogs par byas kyang /
NK086(lu)001:4277: de kho na thun min lam gyi grub mtha' zin pa'i nges pa med cing /
NK086(lu)001:4278: rdzogs pa chen po'i don brgyud dang ldan pa'i bla ma /
NK086(lu)001:4279: sems nyid chos skur ngo sprod pa'i man ngag snyan
NK086(lu)001:4280: khung du brgyud nus pa rang dang skal ba mnyam
NK086(lu)001:4281: pa'i mi yi tshul du bstan pa'i bshes gnyen chen
NK086(lu)001:4282: po de lta bu gang na yod kyang yon tan
NK086(lu)001:4283: de kho nas sangs rgyas dang mtshungs par rnyed dka'
NK086(lu)001:4284: ba'i 'du shes kyis sgo gsum g.yo zol med par
NK086(lu)001:4285: gus pas brten nas thugs mdzod lon pa de gcig
NK086(lu)001:4286: pus rdo rje'i snying po'i grub mtha' snyogs pa 'byung
NK086(lu)001:4287: bas na / rgyal ba rig 'dzin brgyud pa dang bcas pas yang yang gsungs pa ltar /
NK086(lu)001:4288: gsang sngags snying po'i lam tshol ba rnams kyi bla
NK086(lu)001:4289: ma mtshan nyid dang ldan pa dbang bzhi pa'i ye
NK086(lu)001:4290: shes la myong ba can bsten par bya ba las
NK086(lu)001:4291: / gzhan gang gis kyang mi phan pa 'di kho
NK086(lu)001:4292: na mi shes su mi rung ba'i gnad yin pas
NK086(lu)001:4293: / / rig 'dzin gong ma rnams kyi lam ma
NK086(lu)001:4294: nor ba 'di la lam nyid du ngo shes pa'i
NK086(lu)001:4295: nges shes su la ldan pa de la gsang sngags
NK086(lu)001:4296: snying po'i skal ba yod pa'i phyir /
NK086(lu)001:4297: thob grangs dang bzlas grangs bla ma mang po brten
NK086(lu)001:4298: pa'i grangs tsam zhig la blo gding mi 'cha' bar
NK086(lu)001:4299: rang sems chos skur ngo sprod pa'i man ngag zab
NK086(lu)001:4300: mo dpal ldan bla ma'i zhal nas mnyan te /
NK086(lu)001:4301: de la nan tan snying por bya ba 'di kho na bshad bshad kyi snying po //
NK086(lu)001:4303: btsal btsal gyi don po yin pas gnad 'di ma stor bar gyur pa cis kyang gal che'o //
NK086(lu)001:4304: de nas bla ma'i gdam ngag phog pa bzhin du
NK086(lu)001:4305: bskyed rdzogs zab mo'i don rtse gcig nyams su blangs
NK086(lu)001:4306: nas bla ma'i thugs dang dbyer med kyi dgongs pa
NK086(lu)001:4308: de ltar rang sems gnyug ma rtogs pa'i dngos grub
NK086(lu)001:4309: thob nas bstan pa dang sems can gyi don ji
NK086(lu)001:4310: ltar nus pa bzhin du byed cing khyad par du
NK086(lu)001:4311: theg mchog snying po'i bstan pa spel ba ni las
NK086(lu)001:4312: spyor te / tshul des rig 'dzin gong ma rnams kyi thugs kyi bzhed pa skong zhing gdung 'dzin /
NK086(lu)001:4314: gzhan gyi don byas nas rang yang rig 'dzin gyi gral la gnas par 'gyur ro //
NK086(lu)001:4315: gnyis pa khyad par du byin rlabs kyi rtsa ba
NK086(lu)001:4316: bla ma thams cad ngo bo rigs bsdus nas grub
NK086(lu)001:4320: 'khor dpa' bo mkha' 'gro dang bcas ba'i dkyil 'khor
NK086(lu)001:4321: de nyid byin rlabs gsol 'debs kyi tshul du bsnyen
NK086(lu)001:4323: rang dang dbyer med pa'i rnal 'byor gyi sgo nas
NK086(lu)001:4324: sgrub pa dang sgrub pa chen po'i tshul gyis rig
NK086(lu)001:4326: yang na bsnyen sgrub las sbyor gsum gyi tshul gyis
NK086(lu)001:4327: byin rlabs bla ma'i sgrub pa mthar dbyung bar bya
NK086(lu)001:4328: ste / de dag gi tshul rgyas pa ni /
NK086(lu)001:4329: rig 'dzin 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud dang /
NK086(lu)001:4330: de dag gi sgrub thabs la sogs pa'i khung dang
NK086(lu)001:4331: man ngag rnams kyi dgongs don bzhin du byin rlabs
NK086(lu)001:4332: bla ma'i sgrub pa spyi dang kun 'dus pad+ma thod
NK086(lu)001:4333: phreng gi sgrub thabs rnams rang rang gi gzhung bzhin
NK086(lu)001:4334: bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa'i tshul gyis nyams su blang
NK086(lu)001:4335: bar bya'o // de ltar rab 'byams zhi khro'i khyab
NK086(lu)001:4336: bdag dngos grub thams cad kyi nye lam dam pa
NK086(lu)001:4337: dpal ldan tshom bu dgu yi sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor
NK086(lu)001:4338: chen po dag gi dgongs pa'i don rnam par bzhag
NK086(lu)001:4339: pa de dag kyang so so'i lugs kyis ji ltar
NK086(lu)001:4340: bshad kyang don gyi mtha' chos thams cad kyi de
NK086(lu)001:4341: kho na nyid rig pa rang byung gi ye shes
NK086(lu)001:4342: thig le nyag gcig po 'di la tha mi dad
NK086(lu)001:4343: pa 'du zhing dbyer med par gyur pa kho na
NK086(lu)001:4344: bar bya'o // yin te / de nyid la sku 'jam dpal 'chi med kyi dgongs pa /
NK086(lu)001:4345: gsung rta skad theng gcig /thugs yang dag sgrub pa /
NK086(lu)001:4346: yon tan bdud rtsi rnam dag la sogs pa nyid du brjod pa las gzhan du med cing /
NK086(lu)001:4347: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad nges pa don
NK086(lu)001:4348: gyi gnas lugs 'di nyid du mnyam par gyur pa
NK086(lu)001:4349: yin no // de skad du yang /
NK086(lu)001:4350: bkra shis rig pa'i khu byug gi rgyud las //
NK086(lu)001:4351: chos sku ro gcig 'gro don byed mnyam ste //
NK086(lu)001:4352: mos pa'i blo la so so nyid du gsal //
NK086(lu)001:4353: ye shes dbyings su phyag rgya kun gcig phyir //
NK086(lu)001:4354: bde gshegs gcig bsgom rgyal ba kun gyi ngang //
NK086(lu)001:4356: da ni sa bcad gnyis pa gong du bstan pa'i
NK086(lu)001:4357: dpal sgrub pa chen po bka' brgya kyi dgongs pa'i
NK086(lu)001:4358: don de thams cad nyams len gnad du dril na
NK086(lu)001:4359: / gsang sngags kyi bslab pa'i mtha' bcu'am drug tu 'du ste /
NK086(lu)001:4363: mkhas pa phul du phyin par bslab pa bzhis sgro 'dogs bcad par bya ste /
NK086(lu)001:4364: thog mar rgyud lung man ngag gi don zab mo
NK086(lu)001:4365: ma thos na blang dor gyi dmigs mi 'byed pas
NK086(lu)001:4366: rgyud thos pas grol ba rta pho sgrogs bkrol ba
NK086(lu)001:4367: lta bu gzhir bzhug /de yang thos pa nyung ngus
NK086(lu)001:4368: shes rab rgya chen po grol bar mi nus pas
NK086(lu)001:4369: thos pa'i sgo mang po btsal te sgo kun nas
NK086(lu)001:4370: sdud pa bung ba tshang tshol ba lta bus mang
NK086(lu)001:4372: mang du thos kyang lag len gnad du ma khel
NK086(lu)001:4373: na rang rgyud mi grol bas mthar thug pa'i man
NK086(lu)001:4374: ngag gi gnad zab mo nyams 'og tu tshud par
NK086(lu)001:4375: byas nas mdo gcig tu sdud pa tshong pa khe
NK086(lu)001:4376: tshol ba lta bu'i don gnad du phog par bya
NK086(lu)001:4377: / de ltar byas nas thos pas rgyud kyi don shes /
NK086(lu)001:4378: lung gis rgyud don nyams su blang /
NK086(lu)001:4379: man ngag gis yid ches nas the tshom med pa'i
NK086(lu)001:4380: gding dang ldan par bslab pa'i sgo nas mkhas pa
NK086(lu)001:4381: phul du phyin pa ri mthon po'i rtser phyin pa
NK086(lu)001:4383: de bzhi ni gsang sngags la bslab pa'i tshul lo //
NK086(lu)001:4384: de bzhi'i steng du bslab bya'i yul gyi cha nas
NK086(lu)001:4385: bslab pa'i mtha' drug du gsungs pa bsnan nas bslab
NK086(lu)001:4387: de la bslab pa'i mtha' drug gang zhe na /
NK086(lu)001:4389: gzhi dam tshig gis bzung thag lta bas bcad /
NK086(lu)001:4390: nyams su ting nge 'dzin gyis blang /
NK086(lu)001:4392: don man ngag gis sgrub pa drug go //
NK086(lu)001:4393: de la rim pa dbang gis bgrod pa ni gsang
NK086(lu)001:4394: sngags kyi dbang thob pa dang gsang ba'i dbang thob
NK086(lu)001:4395: nas nyon mongs pas mi bardzi ba'i las can du
NK086(lu)001:4396: gyur pa rgyal bu rgyal sa zin pa lta bu'o
NK086(lu)001:4397: // gzhi dam tshig gis bzung ba ni bla ma
NK086(lu)001:4398: mnyes par byas la ji skad gsungs pa' dam tshig
NK086(lu)001:4399: las mi 'da' ba zhing sa gshin po lta bu
NK086(lu)001:4400: dngos grub kyi lo tog skye rung ba'i las can
NK086(lu)001:4401: // no // thag lta bas bcad pa ni /
NK086(lu)001:4402: 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad rang gi sems su
NK086(lu)001:4403: 'du la sems ye nas sangs rgyas pa rang byung
NK086(lu)001:4404: gi ye shes su rtogs nas bya rtsol re dogs
NK086(lu)001:4405: dang bral te bag yangs su rgyu ba khyung nam
NK086(lu)001:4406: mkha' la lding ba lta bu'o //
NK086(lu)001:4407: nyams su ting nge 'dzin gyi blang ba ni shes
NK086(lu)001:4408: rab kyis dmigs pa'i don la ting nge 'dzin gyis
NK086(lu)001:4409: g.yeng ba med par rtse gcig byas pa nor bu
NK086(lu)001:4410: rin po che len pa lta bu'o //
NK086(lu)001:4411: la spyod pas dor ba ni mnyam bzhag tu bya
NK086(lu)001:4412: ba'i las thams cad spang nas sgom pa'i las la
NK086(lu)001:4413: 'jug pa dang rjes thob tu blang dor med pa
NK086(lu)001:4414: mnyam pa nyid kyi lta bu zab mo dang mthun
NK086(lu)001:4415: par 'jigs med tu rgyu zhing phrin las sna tshogs
NK086(lu)001:4416: la ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin 'jug pa glang po
NK086(lu)001:4418: don man ngag gis sgrub pa ni gang ched du
NK086(lu)001:4419: sgrub pa'i don la gnad du 'byor ba'i man ngag
NK086(lu)001:4420: gis the tshom med pa'i gding dang ldan par sgrub
NK086(lu)001:4421: pas nyams su lon nas ting 'dzin thob pa'i dus
NK086(lu)001:4422: na bdud bzhi chom nas sku gsum thob pa rin
NK086(lu)001:4423: po che nyos pa lta bu'o //
NK086(lu)001:4424: de ltar mtha' drug la bslab cing sher ting gi
NK086(lu)001:4425: yo byad gnyis la longs spyod pa ni rnal 'byor
NK086(lu)001:4428: de ltar bsgrub pa'i mtha' bcu 'am drug tu bstan
NK086(lu)001:4429: pa'i tshul gyis sgrub pa chen pos brgyad kyi dgongs
NK086(lu)001:4430: don la 'jug tshul de yang gnad bsdus na rdzong
NK086(lu)001:4431: 'phrang srog gsum gyi nyams len la 'du bas de
NK086(lu)001:4433: rdzong ni lta ba yin te lta ba gding ldan
NK086(lu)001:4434: gyi rdzong zin na gang las kyang mi 'jigs par
NK086(lu)001:4435: rang nyid gtan srid zin pa'i phyir ro //
NK086(lu)001:4437: sgom pa'i 'phrang nas der 'grod dgos te /
NK086(lu)001:4438: lta thog tu myong bas ma sleb na go yul
NK086(lu)001:4439: tsam gyis mi phan pas sgom pa'i 'phrang bgrod nas
NK086(lu)001:4440: lta ba'i rdzong du phrin par byed dgos so //
NK086(lu)001:4441: des na lta don bzhin bsgom pa gal che ste /
NK086(lu)001:4442: ma sgom par sangs rgyas ba ni rdo rje sems
NK086(lu)001:4443: dpas kyang ma gsungs so zhes gdam pa yin no
NK086(lu)001:4444: // sgom pa'i 'phrang las lta ba'i rdzong zin te
NK086(lu)001:4445: spyod pa'i sgo nas srog phrog pas 'khor 'das kyi
NK086(lu)001:4446: chos kun la dbang bsgyur ba thob pas na de
NK086(lu)001:4447: lta bu ni rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po'i dgongs
NK086(lu)001:4448: // pa zhes bya'o // de la lta ba'i rdzong gang zhe na /
NK086(lu)001:4449: 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos thams cad rang sems su 'du la /
NK086(lu)001:4450: rang gi sems ye nas skye 'gag med pa mnyam
NK086(lu)001:4451: pa nyid rang byung gi ye shes gdod ma'i bde
NK086(lu)001:4452: ba chen po byang chub kyi sems su rgyud dang
NK086(lu)001:4453: lung gi dgongs pa bzhin bla ma'i man ngag gis
NK086(lu)001:4454: gnad du phog ste ngo 'phrod pa ni rdzong zhes
NK086(lu)001:4455: bya ste / 'khor 'das stong srog 'phrog ba'i gnad mthar thug pa 'di yin te /
NK086(lu)001:4456: sems gyi rang bzhin gnyug ma'i ye shes ngos zin na /
NK086(lu)001:4457: sgrub bya'i lha dang 'jig rten gyi dregs pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:4458: snang srid kyi chos thams cad de kho na nyid
NK086(lu)001:4459: nyag gcig gi klong du mthar phyin cing 'ub chub
NK086(lu)001:4460: pa yin no // 'di la gsang sngags bka' yi
NK086(lu)001:4461: tha ram las lta ba'i rdzong dang 'phrang gnyis dang
NK086(lu)001:4462: pa yin no // / rdzong la'ang khyab bdal bde
NK086(lu)001:4463: chen rdzogs pa'i rdzong dang 'ub chub kun 'dus dgongs
NK086(lu)001:4464: pa'i rdzong zhes su dbye zhing gsungs pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:4465: bka' brgyad rdzong 'phrang las rdzong gi chos gsum ste kun gzhi gnad kyi stong thun /
NK086(lu)001:4467: ma rig sgo nga'i sbub 'byed gsum gyis bstan pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:4468: gzhan yang dgongs pa'i don bcu sogs kyis bstan pa
NK086(lu)001:4469: la sogs ba lta ba'i gnas bshad pa'i lung dang
NK086(lu)001:4470: man dag thams cad don la sems nyid rang byung
NK086(lu)001:4471: gi ye shes thig le nyag gcig de kho na'i
NK086(lu)001:4472: gnad la thug pa yin no //
NK086(lu)001:4473: gnyis pa ni ting nge 'dzin la brten pa thob
NK086(lu)001:4474: dgos pas re zhig bka' brgyad rdzong 'phrang las gsungs
NK086(lu)001:4475: pa ltar phyag bzhes kyi dbang du byas te thog
NK086(lu)001:4476: mar ras bris kyi lha sku lta bu la lta
NK086(lu)001:4477: zhing dmigs rten byas te ma yengs par bsgom pas
NK086(lu)001:4478: dmigs pa zin cing brtan pa na yid yul du
NK086(lu)001:4479: bsgom zhing nyams lnga mthar phyin par byas pa'i lag
NK086(lu)001:4480: rjes la gsal ba gsum 'byung ste /
NK086(lu)001:4481: dang po yid kyi yul du me long la gzugs
NK086(lu)001:4482: brnyan ltar lhang nger gsal zhing mi g.yo ba 'byung
NK086(lu)001:4483: / de nas rang gi dbang po'i yul du mthong reg gi rnam pa can du gsal /
NK086(lu)001:4484: mthar lus kyi yul du gsal ba zhes ting nge
NK086(lu)001:4485: 'dzin gyi sprul pa rang gzhan kun gyi spyod yul
NK086(lu)001:4486: du dngos su thog reg gi rnam pa can du
NK086(lu)001:4487: byed nus pa yul dngos dang khyad med pa lta
NK086(lu)001:4488: bu 'byung te gom pa'i tshad do //
NK086(lu)001:4489: de yi dus su ting nge 'dzin gyis sprul pa'i
NK086(lu)001:4490: snang ba de dbang po'i spyod yul du mngon sum
NK086(lu)001:4491: snang yang rang sems kyi cho 'phrul las med pas
NK086(lu)001:4492: lhar snang rab 'byams su bsgom pa 'ang ting nge
NK086(lu)001:4493: 'dzin gyi cho 'phrul yin la des mtshon nas snang
NK086(lu)001:4494: srid kyi chos sems la snang ba thams cad sems
NK086(lu)001:4495: kyi cho 'phrul du shes par bya zhing /
NK086(lu)001:4496: thams cad kun byed kyi mkhan po sems de yang
NK086(lu)001:4497: dngos po dang mtshan ma'i rang bzhin thams cad dang
NK086(lu)001:4498: bra ba'i ye stong gzhi med rang gsal rang bab
NK086(lu)001:4499: rig stong gnyis su med pa'i ye shes chen por
NK086(lu)001:4501: de ltar bsgoms pas nyams legs par skye dgos pas
NK086(lu)001:4502: de'i tshul bsam gtan nyams kyi yig chung dang nyams
NK086(lu)001:4503: sna tshogs skyes pa tsam gyis mi phan te rim
NK086(lu)001:4504: gyis sangs rgyas kyi sa'i bar du bgrod dgongs pas
NK086(lu)001:4505: bslab mtha' skyong pa'i yig chung la sogs pa'i dgongs
NK086(lu)001:4506: don bzhin sgom pa rtsal spyod par byas na /
NK086(lu)001:4507: tshul de sgom pa'i 'phrang las lta ba'i rdzogs zin te /
NK086(lu)001:4510: 'gro drug gi g.yang sa chod pa yin no //
NK086(lu)001:4511: de la dang po dgra gsum gyi phyi dgra ni
NK086(lu)001:4512: 'byung bzhi'i gnod pa dang dgra bgegs lta bya phyi
NK086(lu)001:4513: rol gyi nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad do //
NK086(lu)001:4514: nang gi dgra ni rang gi phung po las byung
NK086(lu)001:4515: ba'i lus sems kyi nad dang nyon mongs pa lta
NK086(lu)001:4516: bu nang gi nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad do
NK086(lu)001:4517: // gsang ba'i dgra ni sems kyi steng gi gzung
NK086(lu)001:4518: 'dzin nga bdag du zhen pa lta bu yang dag
NK086(lu)001:4520: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyi rtsa bar gyur pa thams cad do //
NK086(lu)001:4521: 'jigs pa'i bdud bzhi ni rang dbang med par 'chi bar byed pa 'chi bdag gi bdud dang /
NK086(lu)001:4522: dug gsum la sogs pa nyon mongs pa'i bdud dang /
NK086(lu)001:4523: srid pa nye bar len pa'i phung po phung po'i bdud dang /
NK086(lu)001:4524: srid par bzir byed dga' rab dbang phrug sogs nag
NK086(lu)001:4525: po'i rtsa lag rnams lha'i bu'i bdud ste bdud bzhi
NK086(lu)001:4526: po de dag kyang ming med du bcom pa'o //
NK086(lu)001:4528: lha dang lha min mi dang byol song /
NK086(lu)001:4529: yi dwags dang dmyal ba ste /
NK086(lu)001:4530: rang dbang mthong pa'i so so'i skye bo rnams thog
NK086(lu)001:4531: ma med pa nas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de
NK086(lu)001:4532: 'khor bar gyur pa'i gnas kyi g.yeng ba 'di dag
NK086(lu)001:4533: rig pa'i stongs kyis bcad nas slar gtan du las
NK086(lu)001:4534: nyon gyis der mi 'khor bar gyur pa'o //
NK086(lu)001:4535: gong du smos pa lta bu la sher teng gi
NK086(lu)001:4536: nus pa ma rdzogs shing klong du ma gyur na
NK086(lu)001:4537: / gsang ba'i dgra gsum me ma mur bas tsha ste rang rgyud bsregs /
NK086(lu)001:4538: 'jigs pa'i bdud bzhi mtshon cha pas rno ste srog la rgol /
NK086(lu)001:4539: 'gro drug gi g.yangs sa rig par rbab pas ngos
NK086(lu)001:4540: drag te bzlog tu med pas de thams cad rang
NK086(lu)001:4541: gi sems la sems kyis bcad dgos pas bde bar
NK086(lu)001:4542: gshegs pa dang / de yi sras rig pa 'dzin
NK086(lu)001:4543: pa rnams kyi gdam ngag sangs rgyas lag bcang ma
NK086(lu)001:4544: 'di lta bu dang 'phrad pa'i skabs su phyi bshol
NK086(lu)001:4545: med pa'i brtson pa drag pos rdzong 'phrang gi gnad
NK086(lu)001:4546: la blo sbyang ste rnal 'byor dbang phyug rnams kyi
NK086(lu)001:4547: grub mtha' snyegs par bya dgos so //
NK086(lu)001:4548: gsum pa srog ces bya ba ni /
NK086(lu)001:4549: chos dbyings byang chub kyi sems ni 'khor 'das thams
NK086(lu)001:4550: cad la khyab pa'i srog gam rang bzhin lhun gyis
NK086(lu)001:4551: gnas pa'i srog dang gnyug ma rdo rje'i srog zhes
NK086(lu)001:4552: bya ba ste / de ni lta bas gtan la dbab par bya ba yin la /
NK086(lu)001:4553: de la 'phrog bya dang 'phrog byed 'phrog pa'i bya ba gsum gang yang mi dmigs mod kyi /
NK086(lu)001:4554: de nyid kyi don la gdings nam thob pa na
NK086(lu)001:4555: 'khor 'das thams cad kyi srog dus gcig la thob
NK086(lu)001:4556: pa yin pas lta ba'i gnad 'di la gsang ba'i
NK086(lu)001:4557: srog lta ba zab mos 'phrog pa zhes bya ste
NK086(lu)001:4558: 'khor 'das stong srog 'phrog pa'i tha snyad mdzad do
NK086(lu)001:4559: // chos nyid de lta bu'i ngang las ma g.yos
NK086(lu)001:4560: bzhin du chos can 'khor 'das kyi snang ba sna
NK086(lu)001:4561: tshogs par shar ba'i tshe na dag pa dang ma
NK086(lu)001:4562: dag pa gang ltar snang yang rung so so brgyud
NK086(lu)001:4563: kyi rnam par snang bzhi sangs rgyas dang sems can
NK086(lu)001:4564: gang yin pa de nyid gyi /
NK086(lu)001:4565: rgyud gcig po de'i sgo gsum dang dbang po'i snyed
NK086(lu)001:4566: pa ris mthun par gnas pa'i rtsa ba phra mo
NK086(lu)001:4567: ljon pa'i skad lta bur snying por gyur pa la
NK086(lu)001:4569: de 'phrog pas gang la bya ba de bdag gi dbang du 'dod dgur gyur pa yin no //
NK086(lu)001:4570: de yang rlung sems kyi cho 'phrul shin tu phra
NK086(lu)001:4571: ba gang zhig rags pa'i phung po kun gyi gzhir
NK086(lu)001:4572: gyur pa ni yi ge'i rnam par snying ga na
NK086(lu)001:4574: dag pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la'ang ye shes kyi rlung
NK086(lu)001:4575: dang ye shes kyi snang cha thugs srog gi rnam
NK086(lu)001:4577: mi la sogs pa'i 'gro ba phal mo che'i rang
NK086(lu)001:4578: rang gi snying ga na sa bon so so'i ngo
NK086(lu)001:4580: mi ma yin pa rnams la'ang de bzhin du so so'i srog yig dang /
NK086(lu)001:4581: phyi rol gyi rdzas la gnas pa'ang yod par gsung la /
NK086(lu)001:4582: khyad par du chos nyid kyi don rtogs pa mthar
NK086(lu)001:4583: phyin pas gnyug ma'i srog la dbang thob pa'i sangs
NK086(lu)001:4584: rgyas rnam kyi srog ni mi 'pho ste chos kyi
NK086(lu)001:4585: dbyings dang mnyam pa 'chi med rdo rje'i sku brnyes
NK086(lu)001:4586: pa'o // chos nyid kyi don ma rtogs pa'i sems
NK086(lu)001:4587: can rnams ni rigs drug so so'i rten de'i bla
NK086(lu)001:4588: srog la rten byas nas so so'i tshe tshad rdzogs
NK086(lu)001:4589: pa'i bar du gnas shing srog mi brtan pas nyams
NK086(lu)001:4590: shing 'pho ba'i tshe dang ldan pa'o //
NK086(lu)001:4591: dug lnga lhag par brtas shing las kyi dbang gis dregs pa can /
NK086(lu)001:4592: zhe sdang dbang gis byung ba bdud dang gshin rje
NK086(lu)001:4593: rnams kyi srog lcags kyi spyang ku bung ba tsam
NK086(lu)001:4594: ri rab kyi 'og dpag tshad brgyad khri na lcags
NK086(lu)001:4595: mkhar sgo med pa'i nang du bse sgrom nag po'i
NK086(lu)001:4596: nang du bcug nas lcags kyi tha ram brgyab nas
NK086(lu)001:4597: gnas so // 'dod chags dbang gis dregs pa ma
NK086(lu)001:4598: mo dang gnod sbyin gyi srog zangs kyi bye ma
NK086(lu)001:4599: le ba bye'u skyig mo'i mgo tsam zhig /rgya mtsho
NK086(lu)001:4601: g.yu yi gur phub pa'i nang na g.yu sgrom du
NK086(lu)001:4602: bcug te lcags kyi tha ram btsal nas gnas so
NK086(lu)001:4603: // gti mug dbang gis dregs pa can du gyur
NK086(lu)001:4604: pa klu ba su rigs bzhi'i srog ni dug sbrul
NK086(lu)001:4605: nag po gshogs pa can zhig rus sbal gyi sgrom
NK086(lu)001:4606: du bcug nas mthing gi gzer bcas te spos ngad
NK086(lu)001:4607: ldan gyi mtsho'i nang na gnas so //
NK086(lu)001:4608: nga rgyal dbang gis dregs pa gza' skar dang rgyal
NK086(lu)001:4609: po'i srog ni dung gi bya rgod me stag tsam
NK086(lu)001:4610: zhig dung gi ga bur bcug te /
NK086(lu)001:4611: bar snang la lding pa rlung gis phyogs bzhir 'ded par byed de //
NK086(lu)001:4612: phrag dog dbang gis dregs pa dmu dang btsan gyi
NK086(lu)001:4613: srog ni zangs kyi stag mo bye'u tsam zhig zangs
NK086(lu)001:4614: kyi gu 'ur btsal te bse'i sgo lcags bcug nas
NK086(lu)001:4615: g.ya' dang gangs kyi stod na gnas so //
NK086(lu)001:4616: sman dang ma sang gi srog ni dngul gyi bye
NK086(lu)001:4617: ma leb zhig dar dkar gyi khug mar bcug te
NK086(lu)001:4618: / spang snar phyi log la gnas so //
NK086(lu)001:4619: slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis lha srin sde
NK086(lu)001:4620: brgyad kyi bla srog de ltar gnas par gzigs te
NK086(lu)001:4621: / 'jam dpal gnam sdom chen po'i rgyud las btus nas /
NK086(lu)001:4622: srog gi sgo lcags dbye ba'i dngos gzhi dang /
NK086(lu)001:4623: 'das ma 'das kyi srog dang bla brtags pa'i man ngag rnams phyi rabs kyi don du mdzad do //
NK086(lu)001:4624: de ltar bshad ma thag pa'i srog de lta bu
NK086(lu)001:4625: ni sde brgyad kyi sde tshan so so'i spyi srog
NK086(lu)001:4627: so so'i srog yig ni gzhung rnams su bshad pa bzhin no //
NK086(lu)001:4628: de ltar 'das pa'i srog ni rigs lnga'am /
NK086(lu)001:4629: sku'i rigs thams cad kyi srog 'jam dpal ya m+aan+ta
NK086(lu)001:4630: ka 'dus pa sogs sgrub pa chen po bka' brgyad
NK086(lu)001:4631: du 'dus la / de dag 'phrog nas byin rlabs
NK086(lu)001:4632: dngos grub thams cad bdag gis thob par byed pa
NK086(lu)001:4634: dang po srog sdoms gzer bzhi'i sgo nas lha'i thugs
NK086(lu)001:4635: srog 'phrog te lha dang rang gnyis su med par
NK086(lu)001:4636: bya ba dang / rdzogs rim rdo rje bzhi yi
NK086(lu)001:4637: ye shes skyed pa mtshan bcas mtshan med kyi rnal
NK086(lu)001:4638: 'byor zab mos gnyug ma rdo rje'i srog la rang
NK086(lu)001:4639: dbang thob par byed pa yin cing /
NK086(lu)001:4640: 'jig rten las ma 'das pa'i lha srin drag po
NK086(lu)001:4641: rnams ni srog 'phrog pa'i man ngag gis dbang du
NK086(lu)001:4642: bsdu zhing las la bskul ba dang /
NK086(lu)001:4643: dgra bgegs rnams kyi srog drag po'i sngags kyi cho
NK086(lu)001:4644: gas phrogs te bdag gi tshe'i gsos su bya ba
NK086(lu)001:4645: yin la / de yang rdzong 'phrang las 'di ltar gsungs te srog gi 'phrog lugs bzhi ni /
NK086(lu)001:4646: bdag gi srog phrogs te phung po lhag ma med pa'i sa la btang /
NK086(lu)001:4647: ye shes lha'i srog phrogs nas sems rnam grol sangs rgyas kyi sa la btang /
NK086(lu)001:4648: dam can srung ma'i srog 'phrogs te 'jig rten gyi mi ma yin mthong 'khol mngon sum du bya /
NK086(lu)001:4649: dam nyams dgra 'dre'i srog phrogs pas phyi bstan pa
NK086(lu)001:4650: la 'tshe ba nang bar chad kyi dam sri rnams
NK086(lu)001:4651: bsgral ba'o // de yang bdag srog btsa' ste tshe
NK086(lu)001:4652: 'gug /bu srog bskyabs te bla 'gug /dgra srog bcad
NK086(lu)001:4654: de yang nyams na tshe nyams /
NK086(lu)001:4657: bdag gi bla bskyab tshe ba sring srog gso /
NK086(lu)001:4658: dgra'i bla 'gugs tshe bstung srog gcod pa'i phan gnod kyi bsgyur kha shes pa gal che bas /
NK086(lu)001:4659: de yang bla na gnas pa lus la gnas /
NK086(lu)001:4660: gzugs ni sha ba g.yag dang lug dang ra la sogs par sprul /
NK086(lu)001:4661: 'khyam sa ni nges med gar yang 'khyams /
NK086(lu)001:4662: bsdong ni lhan skyes kyi lha dang bsdong /
NK086(lu)001:4663: tshe ni snying gi dkyil rtsa ba spra 'dra ba /
NK086(lu)001:4664: dwangs ma lnga 'dus kyi dbus su n+ri ljang gu'i
NK086(lu)001:4665: dbyibs su gnas shing dran byed kyi shes pa de
NK086(lu)001:4666: la brten nas gnas te dbugs dang 'grogs nas dran
NK086(lu)001:4668: 'chi dus n+ri de rlung dang 'grogs nas phyir thon nas yal 'gro //
NK086(lu)001:4669: yid la rten med pas bar do'i gnas su 'khyams so //
NK086(lu)001:4670: srog la rnam pa bzhi yod de /
NK086(lu)001:4671: chags pa khrag gi srog ni lus chags shing de la te /
NK086(lu)001:4672: srid pa chags byed cha snyoms bsgyel ba'i gdan la
NK086(lu)001:4673: gsang ba'i rtsa las dug gsum dbang du sdud ma
NK086(lu)001:4674: bskyed / nam mkha'i rgyal mo bsgyel ba'i gdan la
NK086(lu)001:4675: lte ba'i rtsa las rak+sha kro ti shwa ri bskyed
NK086(lu)001:4676: bskyed / / e ka dz+aa ti spun drug bsgyel ba'i gdan la /
NK086(lu)001:4677: skye shi rtsad gcod ma bskyed /
NK086(lu)001:4678: 'dong khams gtso mo spun gnyis bsgyel ba'i gdan la srog rtsa las pad+ma kro ti shwa ri bskyed /
NK086(lu)001:4679: ma bdun bsgyel ba'i gdan la snying gi rtsa las yak+sha kro ti shwa ri bskyed /
NK086(lu)001:4680: dmag gi rgyal mo bzhi dang sring mo bzhi bsgyel
NK086(lu)001:4681: ba'i gdan la nyon yid dang rkang lag bzhi'i rtsa
NK086(lu)001:4682: las gu ya kro ti shwa ri bskyed /
NK086(lu)001:4683: dbang phyug ma nyer brgyad bsgyel ba'i gdan la /
NK086(lu)001:4684: nyon yid 'gyu ba'i rtsa las bi shwa kro ti shwa ri bskyed cing de ltar bsgom mo //
NK086(lu)001:4685: dbyings kyi ma mo bcu gsum /
NK086(lu)001:4686: dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor lus la drug cu rtsa brgyad
NK086(lu)001:4687: kyi dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa ni drag shul nan tan
NK086(lu)001:4688: kyi dkyil 'khor sku las bskyed pa'i sras mchog bco
NK086(lu)001:4690: srid pa sems kyi dbu gcig ma thugs kyi dkyil
NK086(lu)001:4691: 'khor na gnas pa ni srid pa thugs kyi dkyil
NK086(lu)001:4692: 'khor / yab mngon rdzogs rgyal po'i dbu gtsug na
NK086(lu)001:4693: rta mgo thon pa ni dpal rta mgrin gyi dkyil
NK086(lu)001:4694: 'khor / 'khor ro // de lta ma mo thams
NK086(lu)001:4695: cad mngon rdzogs rgyal mo'i sku la rdzogs pas na
NK086(lu)001:4696: 'khor / 'khor ro // / srid pa'i ma mo thams cad kun //
NK086(lu)001:4697: rnal 'byor pa yi khyon du rdzogs //
NK086(lu)001:4699: de nas mngon rdzogs rgyal po'i zhal nas h+aum gi sgra dang /
NK086(lu)001:4700: spyi gtsug gi rta zhal nas h+r+aih yi sgra byung ste /
NK086(lu)001:4701: rta skad theng gsum gyis thams cad dbang du bsdus
NK086(lu)001:4702: shing che ba'i nga rgyal bskyed nas ma mo rnams
NK086(lu)001:4703: kyi snying khrag zhal du bsdus te srog 'phrog par
NK086(lu)001:4704: mdzad / slar phyag dang po gnyis na rdo rjes
NK086(lu)001:4705: 'khor ba bsgral ba'i dung khrag dkrugs te ma mo
NK086(lu)001:4706: rnams kyi zhal du bdud rtsi dmar chen blug /lag
NK086(lu)001:4707: tu rdo rje byin dam tshig 'bru gsum snying gar
NK086(lu)001:4708: bzhag nas dam tshig la gnas par byas /
NK086(lu)001:4709: 'byor tshogs kyi mchod pa phul nas rim pa rim
NK086(lu)001:4710: par gdan las bkye ste phrin las rbod gtong gi
NK086(lu)001:4711: las la mngag pa la ma mo rbod gtong gi
NK086(lu)001:4713: de yang srid pa gsum na dbang che ba ma
NK086(lu)001:4714: mo yin pas dbang gi ma mor byas te dbang
NK086(lu)001:4715: bsgyur ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi tshe
NK086(lu)001:4716: srog ma mo mkha' 'gro'i lag na gnas pas tshe
NK086(lu)001:4717: yi ma mor byas te tshe sgrub pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:4718: nad yams thams cad kyi bdag mo yin pas 'jig rten nad yams bcad pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:4719: dmod pa drag sngags kyi bdag mo yin sems brten
NK086(lu)001:4720: pa'i srog chags gzugs su snang ba thams cad do
NK086(lu)001:4721: // 'di la bsad dang bcad du yod pas 'chi bar snang pa yin no //
NK086(lu)001:4722: gnas pa don gyi srog ni bde bar gshegs pa'i
NK086(lu)001:4723: srog yin te chos nyid don gyi gnas lugs kyi
NK086(lu)001:4724: srog dgongs pas chod pas mya ngan las 'das pa'i
NK086(lu)001:4726: 'khrul pa yid kyi srog mi ma yin gyi srog ste /
NK086(lu)001:4727: yid lus la brten pas dngos su bsad cing brdung du med kyang /
NK086(lu)001:4728: rdzas sngags ting nge 'dzin gyis yid sems dbang du
NK086(lu)001:4729: bsdus pas bor ba la rang dbang med par de'i
NK086(lu)001:4730: srog la dbang byar yod do //
NK086(lu)001:4731: rtsa rlung byang chub sems kyi srog ni sgom pa
NK086(lu)001:4732: yin te lus gang na gnas pa na rtsa gnas
NK086(lu)001:4733: / rtsa la rlung gnas pas rlung sems d+hu tir
NK086(lu)001:4734: tshud na rlung sems la dbang thob pas 'khor 'das
NK086(lu)001:4735: kyi srog dus gcig du thob pa yin no //
NK086(lu)001:4736: zhes gsungs pa ltar bla tshe srog gsum gyi gnad 'di srog las la gal che ste /
NK086(lu)001:4737: don du sngar bshad pa ltar rlung sems kyi cha
NK086(lu)001:4738: phra ba kun gzhi dang dran rig gi rten lus
NK086(lu)001:4739: kyi dbus na dwangs ma'i tshul du gnas pa de
NK086(lu)001:4740: la res srog zhes kyang bya ste /
NK086(lu)001:4741: de dbang po thams cad kyi gzhi 'dzin pa'i rtsa ba yin pa'i phyir dang /
NK086(lu)001:4742: res de la tshe zhes btags te de mnyams pa srid du 'tsho ba'i rgyud gnas pa'i phyir dang /
NK086(lu)001:4743: de nyid kyi cha las rlung sems 'pho ba'i dbang
NK086(lu)001:4744: gis nang du lus la 'pho zhing g.yo ba'i tshul
NK086(lu)001:4745: gyis gnas la / de nyid la rags lus med par rlung sems kyi cha yin pa'i phyir /
NK086(lu)001:4746: phyi rol du gang zag de'i rnam pa'am bla rtags
NK086(lu)001:4747: kyi tshul du 'khyams pa res gzhan gyis mthong ba'ang
NK086(lu)001:4748: yod la / bla dgug pa'i tshe bla rtags mthong thos dang rjes sogs 'ong ba de yin te /
NK086(lu)001:4750: srog ni tshe yin drod dang ni //
NK086(lu)001:4751: rnam shes rten gang yin pa'o //
NK086(lu)001:4752: zhes tshe srog don gcig du bshad pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:4753: gzhung la lar tha dad du bshad pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:4754: yang srog rlung la ngos 'dzin pa sogs bzhed pa de thams cad don la mi 'gal te /
NK086(lu)001:4755: lus kyi dbus na rnam shes kyi rten rlung khams dwangs mi'i yi ge gnas pa de srog dang /
NK086(lu)001:4756: de gnas pa'i yun gyi cha la tshe zhes bya ba dang /
NK086(lu)001:4757: de sems dang 'grogs nas 'pho ba'i cha nas bla zhes btags te tha dad du bzhag la /
NK086(lu)001:4758: dgra bo'i bla khug na de'i tshe nyams shing srog chad pa'i gnad kyang de'o //
NK086(lu)001:4759: des na srog gi gnas lugs shes te thabs kyis
NK086(lu)001:4760: 'phrog pa sogs cir yang bsgyur btub pa'i gnad shes
NK086(lu)001:4761: shing lag len gyis rang dbang du gyur pa na
NK086(lu)001:4762: ji ltar 'dod ba bzhin nus pa'i gdings thob ste
NK086(lu)001:4763: / dper na mdze nad can la phan 'dogs pa'i
NK086(lu)001:4764: tshe klu'i srog 'phrog nas phyag rdor du mtshan bsgyur
NK086(lu)001:4765: bas gnod byed klu'i srog gnas gyur te gnod byed
NK086(lu)001:4766: kyi 'dre yang phan byed kyi lhar gyur nas byin
NK086(lu)001:4767: rlabs shin tu che bar 'gyur la /
NK086(lu)001:4768: gnod skyel na de'i lha phyag rdor gyi srog phrog
NK086(lu)001:4769: nas klur mtshan bsgyur bas phan byed kyi lha yang
NK086(lu)001:4770: gnod pa'i 'drer 'gyur ba ltar srog la dbang thob
NK086(lu)001:4771: pas phan gnod kyi las gang la'ang rang dbang byar
NK086(lu)001:4772: yod pa rten 'brel zab mo'i don shes pas sems
NK086(lu)001:4773: can gyi srog sangs rgyas kyi srog tu bsgyur nas
NK086(lu)001:4774: mtshan bsgyur te lha nyid du 'grub pa sogs las
NK086(lu)001:4775: gang yang 'dod dgur 'grub par gsungs so //
NK086(lu)001:4776: de ltar srog gi gnas lugs shes nas srog de
NK086(lu)001:4777: ji ltar 'phrog pa'i thabs bshad pa la gsum te
NK086(lu)001:4778: / phyi srog gsang sngags zab mos 'phrog pa /
NK086(lu)001:4779: nang srog ting nge 'dzin zab mos 'phrog pa /
NK086(lu)001:4780: gsang srog lta ba zab mos 'phrog pa'o //
NK086(lu)001:4781: dang po ni ya ki rgyal ba zhi khro nas
NK086(lu)001:4782: ma ki grong rgyug the'u rang yan chad la srog
NK086(lu)001:4784: mi 'gyur ba'i srog ni 'khor 'das thams cad kyi e'am yang na tri /
NK086(lu)001:4785: gnas pa'i srog ni mi yi n+ri la sogs pa so so'i srog dngos /
NK086(lu)001:4786: 'dren pa'i srog ni lha 'dre so so'i snying po'i sngags bgrang rgyu de yin la /
NK086(lu)001:4787: brtags pa'i srog ni so so'i ming ste bzhi'o //
NK086(lu)001:4788: 'dren pa'i srog ming nas 'bod pa can der btags 'dren gnyis ka tshang /
NK086(lu)001:4789: yang bla dwags sogs ming gzhan kyang btags srog tu'ang rung /
NK086(lu)001:4790: yang na mi yi mi 'gyur ba'i srog n+ri btags srog 'dren srog gnyis ka rang ming /
NK086(lu)001:4791: gnas srog ming yig dang po bshad do //
NK086(lu)001:4792: yang bka' brgyad rdzong 'phrang las lha srin rnams kyi
NK086(lu)001:4793: rang bzhin gyi srog bla gnas sgrom bu ste de
NK086(lu)001:4795: gnas pa srog gi snying po rang srog yi ge'i tshul du snying la gnas pa'o //
NK086(lu)001:4796: myur ba srog gi snying po bzlas pas phrin las gang bcol sgrub pa'o //
NK086(lu)001:4797: ngo bo nyid kyi srog gi snying po sems dang chos nyid dbyer med pa'o //
NK086(lu)001:4799: yang srog ni sa bon gyi yig 'bru dang snying
NK086(lu)001:4800: po bzla bya'i sngags su gsungs pa sogs srog gi
NK086(lu)001:4801: rnam grangs du mar gsung pa thams cad don la
NK086(lu)001:4802: bsgrub bya'i lha la ni de'i thugs srog dang snying
NK086(lu)001:4803: po'i sngags gnyis su don gyi 'du la /
NK086(lu)001:4804: phal pa mi la sogs pa la'ang rang srog dang
NK086(lu)001:4805: mig gnyis su 'du bas de 'phrog cing gzir ba'i
NK086(lu)001:4806: las kyis ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin las 'grub po
NK086(lu)001:4807: // de la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lha la
NK086(lu)001:4808: ni rang dang gnyis su med par mnyam par bzhag
NK086(lu)001:4809: pa'i sgo nas srog sdoms gzer bzhi btab ste lha'i
NK086(lu)001:4810: snying po bzlas pas yang nas yang du bskul bas
NK086(lu)001:4811: lha rang la nye bar 'gyur zhing gnyis su med
NK086(lu)001:4812: par sgrub pa'i sgo nas dngos grub thob par 'gyur
NK086(lu)001:4813: // ro // 'jig rten pa'i dregs pa rnams kyi srog gi tha ram 'byed pa'i lde'u mig ni /
NK086(lu)001:4814: thog mar lha srin dbang du 'du ba'i rten 'brel
NK086(lu)001:4815: gyi che shos bla ma mnyes par byas la gong
NK086(lu)001:4816: non yi dam lha'i bsnyen pa legs par them nas
NK086(lu)001:4817: / bdag he ru ka gang rung ting nge 'dzin
NK086(lu)001:4818: la gnas pas gang la byed pa de'i sngags bzlas
NK086(lu)001:4819: pas sngags kyi sgra 'od kyis bde gshegs mchod thugs
NK086(lu)001:4820: / dam bskul / rigs drug sems can gyi bag chags sbyar /
NK086(lu)001:4821: sde brgyad spyi'am gang byed de la phog pas so
NK086(lu)001:4822: so'i snying gi dbus su gnas pa'i rin po che'i
NK086(lu)001:4823: sgrom bu rnams kha ba nyi mas bzhus pa'am bya
NK086(lu)001:4824: sgro mes tshig pa ltar zhu bar bsam pa sgo
NK086(lu)001:4825: lcags dbye ba'am srog mkhar gzhom zhes bya'o //
NK086(lu)001:4826: de nas rin chen sgrom bu'i nang na dwangs ma
NK086(lu)001:4827: lnga 'dus kyi sa bon la kho yi ming gis
NK086(lu)001:4828: bskor la de sngags kyi lcags kyus nya ltar drang
NK086(lu)001:4829: par bsam la / yi dam dang khyad par gang byed dregs pa'i srog snying bazla'o //
NK086(lu)001:4830: de yang chos nyid kyi lta bas rtsis zin cing
NK086(lu)001:4831: gong non lta'i nga rgyal gyis lha srin dregs pa'i
NK086(lu)001:4832: srog snying bzlas na shing lo rlung gis brdab ba
NK086(lu)001:4833: bzhin sde brgyad la 'dug pa'i dbang med de srog
NK086(lu)001:4834: gi dbang pos mi bzod par bdag gi drug du
NK086(lu)001:4836: de nas de la phyi dang nang gi mthun rdzas
NK086(lu)001:4837: kyis mchod cing las la bskul bas don 'grub bo
NK086(lu)001:4838: // de'i tshe bsnyen dus nyer ma btub na rengs
NK086(lu)001:4839: pa khugs su gzhug /rbad dus 'gro ram btub na
NK086(lu)001:4840: 'khyil ba lam du gzhug /bsad dus las ma grub
NK086(lu)001:4841: na log rdug mtha' la gtad pa'i man ngag sogs
NK086(lu)001:4842: sngags kyi man ngag rnams nyams 'og tu tshud par
NK086(lu)001:4843: byas na tshegs med par 'grub bo //
NK086(lu)001:4844: phyi ltar srog 'phrog pa 'di ni lta sgom mos slob tsam las med kyang /
NK086(lu)001:4845: dbang thob cig dam tshig la gnas pas sngags kyi
NK086(lu)001:4846: bzlas pa nyid kyi sgo nas dregs pa dngos su
NK086(lu)001:4847: mthong khol gyi bar du 'byung ba yin no //
NK086(lu)001:4848: gnyis pa nang ltar srog 'phrog pa ni ting nge 'dzin gyis te /
NK086(lu)001:4849: gsang sngags bka' yi tha ram las //
NK086(lu)001:4850: nang ltar srog snying 'phrog pa ni //
NK086(lu)001:4851: srog ni ting 'dzin brtan po la //
NK086(lu)001:4852: snying po 'gug pa'i gsang sngags te //
NK086(lu)001:4853: yon tan pha rol drung du 'ong //
NK086(lu)001:4855: de yang sngags bzlas pa grub pa'i dbang gis snying
NK086(lu)001:4856: po zab mos dngos su khug cing sngags de gang
NK086(lu)001:4857: la btab kyang bden pa grub pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:4858: dgongs pa zab mos thams cad rang sems su shes
NK086(lu)001:4859: shing gnyis med du grol ba dang ting 'dzin zab
NK086(lu)001:4860: mos yi dam gyi lha sku la yul gsum gsal
NK086(lu)001:4861: ba'i gsal snang tshad du gyur nas sku mthong ba
NK086(lu)001:4862: de lta bu'i dgongs pas srog sdoms gzer bzhi'i gnad
NK086(lu)001:4863: dang srog gi dmigs gnad kyis gcun nas snying po
NK086(lu)001:4864: bzlas pas ye shes 'jig rten gang yang dngos su
NK086(lu)001:4865: mthong zhing dngos grub ster bar byed do //
NK086(lu)001:4866: nang ltar srog 'phrog tshul 'di la lta spyod grogs
NK086(lu)001:4867: su ldan pa tsam yin gyi gtso bo ting nge
NK086(lu)001:4868: 'dzin brtan pa'i sgo nas bsgrub pa yin no //
NK086(lu)001:4869: gsang ba ltar srog 'phrog pa ni /
NK086(lu)001:4870: gsang sngags bka' yi tha ram las //
NK086(lu)001:4871: gsang ba srog snying 'phrog pa ni //
NK086(lu)001:4872: snang srid lha srin thams cad kun //
NK086(lu)001:4873: rang gi sems nyid yin shes na //
NK086(lu)001:4874: log nas srog snying 'phrog tu med //
NK086(lu)001:4875: des na gsang ba'i snying 'phrog pa'o //
NK086(lu)001:4877: gnyis med chos sku chen po thig le nyag gcig
NK086(lu)001:4878: gi lta ba sngar smros pa ltar thag chod cing
NK086(lu)001:4879: gdings rnyed na 'khor 'das thams cad kyi srog der
NK086(lu)001:4880: 'ub chub pa las gzhan cung zad kyang med la
NK086(lu)001:4881: / ting nge 'dzin gsal brtan gyad du gyur pas
NK086(lu)001:4882: mthong reg gi mtshan ma dang lha sku dngos su
NK086(lu)001:4883: mthong yang lta ba'i gdings mchod na thun mong gi
NK086(lu)001:4884: dngos grub tsam las mchog gi dngos grub sangs rgyas
NK086(lu)001:4885: / mi thob la / chos nyid mnyam pa chen
NK086(lu)001:4886: po'i lta ba'i gdings gyis zin na 'gong po spun
NK086(lu)001:4887: dgu'i nang nas ngan shos shing bsgrub kyang 'tshang rgya
NK086(lu)001:4888: / mi thob la / ba yin no // zhes gsungs so //
NK086(lu)001:4889: de ltar rdzong 'phrang srog gsum gyi gnad spyir shes
NK086(lu)001:4890: par byas nas bye brag du gdul bya gdug pa
NK086(lu)001:4891: can rnams mngon spyod kyi sgo nas bsgral te srog
NK086(lu)001:4892: 'phrog par bya ba ni sngags kyi phrin las thams
NK086(lu)001:4893: cad kyi nang na phul du byung ba ste /
NK086(lu)001:4894: rgyu mtshan gang gis phyir zhe na /
NK086(lu)001:4895: thugs rje'i dpyad thag gis bzung zhing sngags kyi phrin
NK086(lu)001:4896: las 'jug pa'i yul sems can gyi ris ni rnams
NK086(lu)001:4897: pa gnyis te / gdul sla ba dang /
NK086(lu)001:4899: dang po las nyon srab cing dkon mchog gsum la
NK086(lu)001:4900: gus pa rnams ni chos bstan pa sogs thugs rje'i
NK086(lu)001:4901: thabs kyis thar pa'i gnas su bsgral ba'i skal ba
NK086(lu)001:4902: dang ldan pa yin pas gdul bar sla ba'o //
NK086(lu)001:4903: gnyis pa las nyon shugs drag pos rang dbang med
NK086(lu)001:4904: par mnar ba gang zhig dkon mchog gsum la rgyab
NK086(lu)001:4905: kyi phyogs shing bstan pa dang sems can la gnod
NK086(lu)001:4906: pa zhi ba'i thabs gang gis kyang gdul bar mi
NK086(lu)001:4907: nus pa mnar med pa sogs ngan song gi 'gro
NK086(lu)001:4908: bar shin tu mu mtha' med par 'khyams pa de
NK086(lu)001:4909: ni drag po'i shugs kyis sgrol ba'i phrin las 'jug
NK086(lu)001:4911: las ngan gdul dka' de lta bu thugs rje'i dpyang
NK086(lu)001:4912: thag gis mi gtong zhing thabs mkhas pa'i cho 'phrul
NK086(lu)001:4913: gyi sgo nas rjes su 'dzin pa'i thabs shes gnyis
NK086(lu)001:4914: ka phul du byung ba ni sgrol ba'i lam 'di
NK086(lu)001:4916: ji ltar bsgral ba'i tshul ni thog mar rdzong 'phrang
NK086(lu)001:4917: srog gsum gyi dgongs spyod zab mo'i sgo nas rtogs
NK086(lu)001:4918: pas bdag bsgral bar byas nas /
NK086(lu)001:4919: de'i 'og tu las ngan gyi gdul bya la snying rje chen po mtshungs pa med pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:4920: mnyam nyid du rtogs pa'i shes rab chen po phul
NK086(lu)001:4921: du byung ba'i stobs kyi thugs rjes gzhan sgrol ba
NK086(lu)001:4922: dang du len pa yin la /
NK086(lu)001:4923: de yang mdun du rang gi sems kyis sprul pa'i
NK086(lu)001:4924: dmigs bya gsal la de'i lag pa nas bzung te
NK086(lu)001:4926: yul dngos kyi lag pa nas bzung te bsad pa
NK086(lu)001:4927: gnyis la khyad yod par 'dzin pa yod kyi ring
NK086(lu)001:4928: la bsgral kyang rnam smin yod la /
NK086(lu)001:4929: de gnyis ka sems kyi snang ba tsam du byed
NK086(lu)001:4930: med pas bsgral kyang sgyu ma mig yor gyi tshul
NK086(lu)001:4931: du ya nga spu tsam mi skye ba'i tshe na
NK086(lu)001:4932: bsgral kyang las kyi 'bras bu rang gi khur du
NK086(lu)001:4933: mi 'gyur bas rtogs tshad de lta bu dgos pa'i
NK086(lu)001:4934: rdzong 'phrang las gsung zhing tshad dang ldan pa'i sgrol
NK086(lu)001:4935: ba lam du byas pa la rnam smin ngan pa
NK086(lu)001:4936: med par ma zad tshogs rdzogs pa'i thabs kyi nang
NK086(lu)001:4937: na khyad par du 'phags pa yin no //
NK086(lu)001:4938: tshad du ma phyin pa'i sgrol ba byas pa rnams
NK086(lu)001:4939: ni sngags kyi thabs zab pas pha rol gsod par
NK086(lu)001:4940: nus kyang rang la rnam smin med pa dka' bas
NK086(lu)001:4941: na pha rol la gnas sbyong gi 'dun pa rnams
NK086(lu)001:4943: bsgral ba'i thabs ni dmigs pa'i rten la gzas pa
NK086(lu)001:4944: po 'gug cing lha dang dbye la drag po'i thun
NK086(lu)001:4945: dbab / snying ga'i dwangs ma lnga 'dus kyi srog 'phrog te /
NK086(lu)001:4946: las ngan gyi bag chags thams cad ye shes kyi 'od kyis sbyong bar bsam pa'i khrus lung /
NK086(lu)001:4947: pha rol pa'i tshe bsod bdag gi tshe yi gsos su bstim pa tshe lung /
NK086(lu)001:4948: dgra bgeg kyi rnam shes 'og min du rgyal ba
NK086(lu)001:4949: yab yum gyi sbyor mtshams su 'phang te rigs kyi
NK086(lu)001:4950: sras su bsgyur ba gnas lung ste /
NK086(lu)001:4951: dgongs spyod de lta bu dang ldan pa'i phyir pha
NK086(lu)001:4952: rol gyi tshe bsod rang la khug pas bdag rnal
NK086(lu)001:4954: dgra bgegs kyi sha khrag ye shes kyi bdud rtsir
NK086(lu)001:4955: gyur bas bka' sdod dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi
NK086(lu)001:4957: pha rol dgra bgegs kyi las ngan rgyun chod nas
NK086(lu)001:4958: bde bar gshegs pa'i sras su gyur pas gzas pa
NK086(lu)001:4960: 'tshengs pa gsum dang ldan pa'i dgongs spyod zab mo
NK086(lu)001:4961: grub pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams ni 'jigs med phyogs
NK086(lu)001:4962: las rnam par rgyal ba'i brtul zhugs dbang 'byor pa
NK086(lu)001:4963: yin no // de yang rdzong lta bas ma zin
NK086(lu)001:4964: na thog reg gi mtshan ma byung yang mi grol
NK086(lu)001:4965: yin no // / mthu stobs che yang srin po dang 'dra /
NK086(lu)001:4966: 'phrang sgom spyod kyis la ma bzlas na /
NK086(lu)001:4967: snang ba lha'i dkyil 'khor la dbang mi thob /
NK086(lu)001:4969: thos pa che yang ne tso dang 'dra /
NK086(lu)001:4970: srog bla tshe gsum gyi gnad la mkhas shing gdings
NK086(lu)001:4971: ma thob na phan gnod kyi phrin las mthar phyin
NK086(lu)001:4972: pa la dbang mi 'byor bas de gsum gcig grogs
NK086(lu)001:4973: su gcig bzung zhing ya ma bral bar rnam pa
NK086(lu)001:4974: kun du gsum ldan du nyams su blang bas grub
NK086(lu)001:4975: pa'i rig 'dzin dam pa rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug
NK086(lu)001:4976: chen po rnams kyi dgongs spyod zab mo'i grub mthar
NK086(lu)001:4978: des na de gsum gyi don gtan la dbab pa'i
NK086(lu)001:4979: phyir rgyal ba byang chub sems kyi rdzong bstan pa
NK086(lu)001:4980: sems sde ma bu bco brgyad kyi don rnal 'byor
NK086(lu)001:4981: dbang phyug rnams kyis nyams len du bsdus pa dgongs
NK086(lu)001:4982: pa bcu la sogs pa dang gdung rab nyer lnga'i
NK086(lu)001:4983: man ngag ci rigs pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:4984: gzhan yang bka' gter gyi gdam pa sems nyid chos skur ngo sprad pa'i rim pa thams cad dang /
NK086(lu)001:4985: bsgom pa gsal ba gsum gyad du gyur par sgrub pa'i 'phrang gtan la 'beb pa /
NK086(lu)001:4986: sgrub pa bka' brgyad la sogs pa'i sgrub thabs man ngag gi rim pa ji snyed pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:4987: bsam gtan nyams kyi gnad yig gi rim pa sna tshogs pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:4988: spyod pa mngon spyod phrin las srog gi chos drag sngags kyi shog dril nyi shu pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:4989: gzhan yang nye bar mkho ba'i man ngag gi gnad /
NK086(lu)001:4990: sngags sdeb snying gzer nag po ma bu dang bcas pa /
NK086(lu)001:4991: srid pa'i gter khyim dang srog khyim la sogs pa'i
NK086(lu)001:4992: man ngag gi rim pa mkha' dang mtsho ltar rgya
NK086(lu)001:4993: che ba rnams ci rigs su shes par bya la
NK086(lu)001:4994: / gnad kyi mthar thug pa sems nyid rang byung
NK086(lu)001:4995: gi ye shes rang la mngon du gsal ba'i thabs
NK086(lu)001:4996: ni zab mo'i dgongs brgyud ldan pa'i bla ma dam
NK086(lu)001:4997: pa sgo kun nas mnyes par byas te /
NK086(lu)001:4998: don brgyud kyi dgongs pa 'pho bar bya dgos so //
NK086(lu)001:4999: de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs
NK086(lu)001:5000: gsang ba'i mdzod zab mo'i theg pa 'di la 'phags
NK086(lu)001:5001: yul du bka' bab pa'i mkhas grub mang du bzhugs
NK086(lu)001:5002: mod kyi / thams cad kyi dbus na mchog du
NK086(lu)001:5003: 'phags shing 'gran zla dang bral ba'i bka' srol la
NK086(lu)001:5004: rgya gar gyi pan grub bzhi /
NK086(lu)001:5005: bod kyi bzhi ste brgyad du yod pa las /
NK086(lu)001:5006: dang po yi dam lhas dbang bskur nas thob pa dga' rab rdo rje ste /
NK086(lu)001:5007: de yang 'og min du kun bzang yab yum gyis rgyal tshab rdo rje sems dpa' la dbang bskur /
NK086(lu)001:5008: rdo rje sems dpa' dngos las he badz+ra ste /
NK086(lu)001:5009: dga' rab rdo rjes thob pas byang chub sems ye nas ma bcos lhun grub tu shar ba'o //
NK086(lu)001:5010: bka' rgyud rtags kyi glengs bam gyi dbang bskur nas
NK086(lu)001:5011: thob pa phyag na rdo rje'i sprul pa rgyal po
NK086(lu)001:5013: de nyid ri ma la yar dgongs par bzhugs pa na /
NK086(lu)001:5014: rmi lam du glegs bam khang steng du bab pa
NK086(lu)001:5015: sogs rmis pa ltar khang steng du glegs bam rnams
NK086(lu)001:5016: babs 'dug pa don ma shes pa'i tshul mdzad nas
NK086(lu)001:5017: slob dpon ku ku r+aa dza la bstan kyang ma
NK086(lu)001:5018: shes nas / glegs bam rang gi spyi bor bzhag
NK086(lu)001:5019: ste gdung ba bskyed nas zhag bdun mnyam par bzhag
NK086(lu)001:5020: pas rdo rje sems dpa'i zhal mthong /
NK086(lu)001:5021: de nas yang zhag nyer gcig tu mnyam par bzhag
NK086(lu)001:5022: pas glegs bam gyi don thams cad thugs su chud
NK086(lu)001:5023: de t+aan+t+ra'i don thams cad la mkhas par gyur pas
NK086(lu)001:5025: rang rig pa rtsal gyis dbang bskur nas thob pa pad+ma sam b+ha wa te /
NK086(lu)001:5026: snang srid thams cad rang rig byang chub sems su
NK086(lu)001:5027: gnas pa de nyid dpa' rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo
NK086(lu)001:5028: bo nyid yin pa la rig pa rang la rang
NK086(lu)001:5029: shar te khams gsum yongs bsgral /
NK086(lu)001:5031: dug gsum rtsad bcad nas rang gis rang rtogs pa'i dbang thob ste /
NK086(lu)001:5032: sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las lnga lhun gyis grub par gyur pa'o //
NK086(lu)001:5033: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis dbang bskur nas thob pabi ma la mi tra ste /
NK086(lu)001:5034: rgya gar gyi rgyal po'i mchod gnas su pan+di ta
NK086(lu)001:5035: lnga brgya bzhugs pa'i gral du rgyal po des zhus
NK086(lu)001:5036: pa / bdag la bod kyi rgyal pos gser phye
NK086(lu)001:5037: bre gang bskur nas skyes lan pan+di ta mkhas pa
NK086(lu)001:5038: bod du rdzongs shing zhus 'dug pas khyed rnams kyi
NK086(lu)001:5039: nang nas mkhas pa zhig bod du gshegs par 'tshal
NK086(lu)001:5040: pa / zhes zhus pas / lnga brgya'i nang na
NK086(lu)001:5041: lnga tshigs dbus su mkhas pa bi ma la mi
NK086(lu)001:5042: tra bzhugs pa la yar mar rnams kyi spyan dus
NK086(lu)001:5043: gcig tu bi ma la la gzigs pas bi mas
NK086(lu)001:5044: bod du song cing par go nas gzhu mo dag
NK086(lu)001:5046: zhes sogs tshigs su bcad pa gsung nas bod du byon /
NK086(lu)001:5047: bi ma la de ni pan+di ta lnga brgyas dbang bskur nas thob pa'o //
NK086(lu)001:5048: de nas bod yul du pad 'byung bi ma /
NK086(lu)001:5050: shan+tinga gar+b+ha bzhi byon pas bud+d+ha gu ta ni gangs
NK086(lu)001:5051: ti se nas rje 'bang la gdam ngag sprad ste
NK086(lu)001:5053: shin+tinga gar+b+ha rak+shi ta dgongs pa la gshegs nas bod la chos spel ba ma byung /
NK086(lu)001:5054: bod du dbang gi chu bo bzhi'i mgo bo ni /
NK086(lu)001:5058: bee ro tsa na ste rgya gar gyi slob dpon gnyis /
NK086(lu)001:5060: de yang phyag rdor gyi sprul pa gu ru pad
NK086(lu)001:5061: ma la rgya gar gyi bka' bab gsum po'i dbang
NK086(lu)001:5062: gi chu bo yang 'dus shing bod yul du rje
NK086(lu)001:5063: btsun rig 'dzin chen po de nyid kyis bsam yas
NK086(lu)001:5064: mchims phu'i brag dmar ke'u tshang du dpal sgrub pa
NK086(lu)001:5065: chen po bka' brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor du rje 'bangs
NK086(lu)001:5066: thugs kyi sras dgur dbang bskur ba'i tshe mda' bdag
NK086(lu)001:5067: rgyal po'i me tog dbus su bab pa sogs so
NK086(lu)001:5068: so'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor sgrub pas zhes mthong zhing
NK086(lu)001:5069: dngos grub thob nas rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs bstan par
NK086(lu)001:5070: mdzad do // de bzhin du rdo rje phur pa'i dkyil 'khor du yang dbang bskur ro //
NK086(lu)001:5071: de dag gi bka' yang gnyag dz+ny+aa na la bab so //
NK086(lu)001:5072: yang chos nyid kyi bden pa mngon sum du mthong
NK086(lu)001:5073: ba slob dpon bi ma la mi tras yar lung
NK086(lu)001:5075: gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor bzhengs nas zhang gi
NK086(lu)001:5076: ban+de dz+ny+aa na la dbang bskur gsang mtshan dri med
NK086(lu)001:5077: zla shar du btags nas grub pa yang thob /
NK086(lu)001:5078: lha sras ral pa can gyi phyag rgya btab pa dbang gi chu bo gcig go //
NK086(lu)001:5079: yang rnam par snang mdzad kyi sprul ba lo ts+aa
NK086(lu)001:5080: ba bee ro tsa nas rgya gar du slob dpon
NK086(lu)001:5081: dga' rab rdo rje dngos dang de'i slob ma 'phags
NK086(lu)001:5082: pa 'jam dpal gyi zhal dngos su mthong ba slob
NK086(lu)001:5083: dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gnyis las dbang thob cing
NK086(lu)001:5084: bee ro tsa nas rgyal mo g.yu sgra la dbang
NK086(lu)001:5085: bskur / des yar lung shel gyi brag phug tu zhang dz+ny+aa na la dbang bskur ba'o //
NK086(lu)001:5086: nyi zla rtod la gnon nus pa slob dpon nam
NK086(lu)001:5087: mkha'i snying pos rgya gar gyi yul gser brag bya
NK086(lu)001:5088: khyung tshal du badz+ra h+aum ka ra la dbang nos
NK086(lu)001:5089: nas gnyal gyi dge ri ru mar med dgu pa
NK086(lu)001:5090: bzhengs nas zhang la dbang bskur ba yin no //
NK086(lu)001:5091: de ltar na slob dpon bzhi bo de dag gi
NK086(lu)001:5092: dbang gi chu bo bzhi ka gcig tu 'dus pa'i
NK086(lu)001:5093: zhang dz+ny+aa na ku m+aa ra'am gsang mtshan dri med
NK086(lu)001:5094: la zla shar du grags pa de nyid yin la
NK086(lu)001:5095: / des gra'i man khang du sog po lha dpal dang /
NK086(lu)001:5096: gnub sangs rgyas ye shes rin po che la dbang bskur /
NK086(lu)001:5097: sangs rgyas ye shes kyis gnub yon tan rgya mtsho sogs gtsang gi mi bzhi la dbang bskur /
NK086(lu)001:5098: de'i nang nas bka' thams cad bab pa'i mchog gnub
NK086(lu)001:5099: yon tan rgya mtsho gsang mtshan gter bzhad rtsal la
NK086(lu)001:5100: sngar gyi bka' bab bzhi'i steng du phyis d+aa na
NK086(lu)001:5101: ta la'i dbang bka' dang lnga 'dus shing /
NK086(lu)001:5102: de las rim par grub thob dngos grub kyi par
NK086(lu)001:5103: du brgyud nas mnga' bdag nyang ral pa can gyis
NK086(lu)001:5104: zhus / mnga' bdag nyang rin po che ni chos
NK086(lu)001:5105: rgyal tshangs pa lha'i me tog gi sku phreng bcu
NK086(lu)001:5106: drug pa yin pas bka' ma'i dbang brgyud du ma
NK086(lu)001:5107: zad bde gshegs 'dus pa'i chos gter kyi bka' bab
NK086(lu)001:5108: pa'i chos kyi 'khor los sgyur ba chen po nyid
NK086(lu)001:5109: zhus / yin la / de las rim par brgyud
NK086(lu)001:5110: de chos kyi rgyal po'i sprul pa mnga' ris kyi
NK086(lu)001:5111: pan+di ta pad+ma dbang gi rgyal po sogs mkhas shing
NK086(lu)001:5112: grub pa brnyes pa'i rdo rje slob dpon zam ma
NK086(lu)001:5113: chad pa las rim par brgyud de bdag gi bla
NK086(lu)001:5114: ma dam pa mtshan brjod par dka' yang don gyi
NK086(lu)001:5115: slad du mtshan nas smros na 'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i
NK086(lu)001:5116: dbang po gtsug lag smra ba'i nyi ma 'am /
NK086(lu)001:5117: mtshan gzhan pad+ma 'od gsal mdo sngags gling pa zhes
NK086(lu)001:5118: su yul gyi tha gru kun na grags pa mnga'
NK086(lu)001:5119: bdag chos kyi rgyal po'i sprul pa'i skur rdo rje'i
NK086(lu)001:5121: rje rang nyid kyis kyang chos rgyal dang mnga' ris
NK086(lu)001:5122: pan+di tar 'khrungs dus sogs khar sang bzhin du gsal
NK086(lu)001:5123: por dran tshul zhal nas gsungs shing mkhas dang grub
NK086(lu)001:5124: pa'i rnam thar 'gran zla med pa'i snyan pa chen
NK086(lu)001:5125: pos bod kyi yul ljongs thams cad du khyab pa
NK086(lu)001:5126: bka' bab bdun dang ldan zhing khyad par du grub
NK086(lu)001:5127: pa'i rig 'dzin brgyad dang gu ru mtshan brgyad dang
NK086(lu)001:5128: dbyer med pa'i dpal sgrub sde chen po brgyad kyi
NK086(lu)001:5129: dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po rnams las /
NK086(lu)001:5130: lam 'di'i smin grol dngos su nos shing yongs su
NK086(lu)001:5131: rdzogs pa'i bka' bab pa gang des gzim khang bkra
NK086(lu)001:5132: shis 'chi med grub pa'i dga' tshal du bdag cag
NK086(lu)001:5133: la sogs pa 'dus pa'i tshogs la thugs dgyes pa
NK086(lu)001:5134: chen po'i ngang nas bka' brgyad bde gshegs 'dus pa'i
NK086(lu)001:5135: dbang yongs rdzogs su gnang zhing /
NK086(lu)001:5136: der ma zad rje nyid kyi zab gter gyi chos
NK086(lu)001:5137: skor gu ru mtshan brgyad dang grub pa'i rig 'dzin
NK086(lu)001:5138: brgyad kyi dgongs pa snyan du brgyud pa'i bka' brgyad
NK086(lu)001:5139: kyi chos sde rnams las sku gsung thugs yon tan
NK086(lu)001:5140: phrin las lnga'i sgrub pa'i dbang dang de dag gi
NK086(lu)001:5141: dgongs don gyi bshad pa dang /
NK086(lu)001:5142: zab mo'i dmar khrid rnams dang /
NK086(lu)001:5143: gzhan yang nye brgyud kyi bka' brgyad du ma'i dbang
NK086(lu)001:5144: dang bshad bka' sna tshogs rtsal nas 'di rnams la
NK086(lu)001:5145: brten te bka' brgyad kyi rnam bshad zhig kyang gyis
NK086(lu)001:5146: zhes bdag cag la snga phyir gsung gis yang nas
NK086(lu)001:5147: yang du nan tan chen pos bskul zhing rjes su
NK086(lu)001:5148: gnang la thugs kyi dgongs pa gtad pa mdzad pa
NK086(lu)001:5149: dang / slad nas gzim khang de nyid du rje
NK086(lu)001:5150: bla ma nyid dbur bzhugs pa'i rig 'dzin 'dus pa'i
NK086(lu)001:5151: tshogs dang bdag cag lhan cig tu 'jam mgon smra
NK086(lu)001:5152: ba'i seng ge pad+ma gar dbang blo gros mtha' yas
NK086(lu)001:5153: pa'i sde'i zhal snga nas bka' brgyad bde gshegs 'dus
NK086(lu)001:5154: pa chen po'i gzhung pod dgu'i lung gi rgyud kyang
NK086(lu)001:5156: de lta bur gter chen bla ma rin po che
NK086(lu)001:5157: rnam pa gnyis las brgyud pa'i bka' srol thob pa'i
NK086(lu)001:5158: skal bzang du gyur pa yin no //
NK086(lu)001:5159: de lta deng sang gi bar du sgrub pa chen
NK086(lu)001:5160: po bka' brgyad kyi smin grol zab mo'i tshul dang
NK086(lu)001:5161: ldan pa'i nyams len gyi brgyud pa 'di la /
NK086(lu)001:5162: mkha' la rig 'dzin brgyud pa'i gral ma zhig /sa la dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i bkrag ma yal /
NK086(lu)001:5163: bar du sman raka bdud rtsi'i mtsho ma skam /
NK086(lu)001:5164: dam nyams dang 'dres khyer gyi slad ma zhugs /
NK086(lu)001:5165: ma dang mkha' 'gro'i kha rlangs kyi ngad ma yal /
NK086(lu)001:5166: byin rlabs don brgyud kyi zam ma chad par bzhugs pa lag pas /
NK086(lu)001:5167: snga 'gyur pa'i ring lugs 'dzin pa rnams kyis lam
NK086(lu)001:5168: 'di gtso bor 'dzin dgos par o rgyan brgyud pa
NK086(lu)001:5169: dang bcas pa'i bka' gtsigs phyag rgyas btab pa yin
NK086(lu)001:5170: pas / dus kyi mthar skyes pa rnying ma'i chos
NK086(lu)001:5171: gral 'dzin pa'i dman pa bdag gis kyang sgo gsum
NK086(lu)001:5172: g.yo zol med pas bla ma'i bka' dang rang gi
NK086(lu)001:5173: mos pa la brten nas bka' brgyad kyi rnam bshad
NK086(lu)001:5174: zhig 'bri 'dod yod kyang ji bzhin dus su smin
NK086(lu)001:5175: pa phral du ma byung bas de gar lus par
NK086(lu)001:5176: pas / gyur cing / chu 'brug gi lo'i cho
NK086(lu)001:5177: 'phrul zla ba'i tshes nyer gcig la bdag gi bla
NK086(lu)001:5178: ma rin po che zhing 'dir gzugs sku'i bkod pa
NK086(lu)001:5179: bsdu ba'i tshul gyis ri bo rtse lnga pan chen
NK086(lu)001:5180: bi ma la'i thugs kyi dbyings su thim pa'i mdzad
NK086(lu)001:5182: nye char zhe chen pa rgyal tshab sprul pa'i sku
NK086(lu)001:5183: rin po che dpon slob kyis bkra shis pa'i lha
NK086(lu)001:5184: rdzas dang / gter byon gnam lcags rdo rje rin chen byi ru'i phreng ba spus legs /
NK086(lu)001:5185: mi yi nor bu bde skyong gi snod sogs dngos
NK086(lu)001:5186: rdzas du ma dang bcas nas bka' brgyad bde gshegs
NK086(lu)001:5187: 'dus pa'i spyi don zhig 'bri dgos par nan gyis
NK086(lu)001:5188: bskul ba sogs don gnyer can du mas bskul ba'i
NK086(lu)001:5189: rkyen byas nas / rnam rgyal zhes pa chu sbrul
NK086(lu)001:5190: gyi lor yang dben pad+ma bde ldan du bde gshegs
NK086(lu)001:5191: 'dus pa'i bsnyen sgrub la zla ba drug gi bar
NK086(lu)001:5192: du ngag bcad kyi tshul du gcad rgya dam por
NK086(lu)001:5193: byas nas gsol ba btab cing slar tshogs kyi mchod
NK086(lu)001:5195: lo de yi gro bzhin zla ba'i tshes bco brgyad la glo bur 'bri 'dod zhig byung ba bzhin /
NK086(lu)001:5196: pad 'byung bi ma bee ro nam snying ste mkhas
NK086(lu)001:5197: pa mi bzhis brtsams pa'i bde gshegs 'dus pa'i bshad
NK086(lu)001:5198: thabs kyi gzhung rnams gzhi byas /
NK086(lu)001:5199: bka' brgyad rdzong 'phrang dang bla ma'i man ngag sogs
NK086(lu)001:5200: kyis zur brgyan te nyin bzhin brgyud mar bris pas
NK086(lu)001:5201: srog gi skor 'bri tshe nad nyams shin tu 'tshub
NK086(lu)001:5202: pa byung yang tshogs mchod sogs phul nas nan tan
NK086(lu)001:5203: gyis bris te zla ba de yi tshes nyer gcig
NK086(lu)001:5204: pa'i snga dro legs par grub par bgyid pa po
NK086(lu)001:5205: ni mi pham 'jam dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje'am che
NK086(lu)001:5206: mchog dgyes pa rtsal du 'bod pa ste 'dis kyang
NK086(lu)001:5207: kun mkhyen rgyal pa'i bstan pa spyi dang bye brag
NK086(lu)001:5208: du gsang sngags rdo rje'i theg pa khyad par bde
NK086(lu)001:5209: gshegs sgrub pa chen po bka' brgyad kyi lam srol
NK086(lu)001:5210: 'di nyid phyogs dus thams cad du dar zhing rgyas
NK086(lu)001:5211: pa mi nub par gnas shing de yi mthu las
NK086(lu)001:5212: sems can thams cad kyi dngos grub rnam pa gnyis
NK086(lu)001:5213: bde blag tu 'grub par gyur cig /dpal ldan mkha'
NK086(lu)001:5215: bka' sdod mi bzad 'bar ba'i srin 'phro bas //
NK086(lu)001:5216: tshul 'dir gus shing 'dzin par bgyid rnams la //
NK086(lu)001:5217: dngos grub 'dod dgu'i gru char 'beb par mdzod //
NK086(lu)001:5218: grub pa'i rig 'dzin tshom bur bcas pa dang //
NK086(lu)001:5219: sras bcas rgyal ba'i dgyes zhal mngon bstan nas //
NK086(lu)001:5220: glu dbyangs dang bcas mdzes pa'i me tog gi //
NK086(lu)001:5221: char gyis deng 'dir dge mtshan bkra shis stsol //
NK086(lu)001:5222: lam mchog 'di nyid phyogs dang dus kun du //
NK086(lu)001:5223: ches cher 'phel zhing mi nyams gnas pa'i mthus //
NK086(lu)001:5224: sa dang bar snang nam mkha'i khyod kun kyang //
NK086(lu)001:5225: sngags kyi snyan grags chen pos khyab gyur cig /ces kyang smras so ////mang+ga lam //
NK086(lu)001:5227: ston pa kun bzang che mchog he ru kas //
NK086(lu)001:5228: dus gsum rnam dag 'og min gsang mchog tu //
NK086(lu)001:5229: dpal chen rnam brgyad rig 'dzin 'khor tshogs la //
NK086(lu)001:5230: brjod med dgongs brgyud chos nyid rang sgras gsungs //
NK086(lu)001:5231: rig 'dzin rtsal 'chang rdo rje chos rab kyis //
NK086(lu)001:5232: ngag tu bsdus te sems 'grel lung lngar bcas //
NK086(lu)001:5233: mkha' 'gro'i gtso dang gtum chen sde brgyad la //
NK086(lu)001:5234: brda' brgyud chos kyi 'khor los gtad brgyad mdzad //
NK086(lu)001:5235: re zhig spel bar dus la ma bab bas //
NK086(lu)001:5236: so sor phyin te rin chen sgrom du bcug /mi 'jigs bka' rtag rim pa bdun gyis btab //
NK086(lu)001:5237: ro gling tshal gyi bde byed brtsegs par spas //
NK086(lu)001:5238: nam zhig grub pa'i rig 'dzin rnam dgu yi //
NK086(lu)001:5239: 'od gsal nyams kyi snang bar mchod rten de //
NK086(lu)001:5240: mkha' 'gro dregs pa bye bas srung zhing mchod //
NK086(lu)001:5242: brtags pas 'dzam gling 'tshengs nus chos gter mthong //
NK086(lu)001:5243: rdzu 'phrul gyis 'dus ting 'dzin mthus bskul pas //
NK086(lu)001:5244: dregs pa'i tshogs kyis sgrom rnams so sor phul //
NK086(lu)001:5245: mkha' 'gros dbang bskur snyan brgyud bka' babs so //
NK086(lu)001:5246: de nyid kun 'dus pad+ma sam b+ha yis //
NK086(lu)001:5247: brag dmar ke'u tshang byang chub len tshal du //
NK086(lu)001:5248: rje 'bangs bka' bab snying gi bu dgu la //
NK086(lu)001:5249: dbang dang gdams pa ma lus rdzogs par stsal //
NK086(lu)001:5250: da lta ma spel lnga brgya'i tha ma la //
NK086(lu)001:5251: bod yul bde spyid chos kyi rtsa bar 'gyur //
NK086(lu)001:5252: mdo sngags bstan pa gzhan kun nyams kyang sla'i //
NK086(lu)001:5253: bka' brgyad rnam gsum nyams ma 'jug ces gdams //
NK086(lu)001:5254: de phyir pad+ma'i ring lugs 'dzin rnams kyis //
NK086(lu)001:5255: 'di nyid kho nar bshad sgrub 'bad rigs pas //
NK086(lu)001:5256: mi pham bshes gnyen dam pa'i dpyad gsum gyis //
NK086(lu)001:5257: rmad byung rnam bshad dngos grub snying por grub //
NK086(lu)001:5258: gang de 'dzad med chos sbyin rgya che'i rgyu //
NK086(lu)001:5259: gcig las du mar 'byung ba spar gyi 'phrul //
NK086(lu)001:5260: la dkar khyim bdag dad gsum blo yis gzhengs //
NK086(lu)001:5261: de las byung ba'i rnam dkar dge tshogs kun //
NK086(lu)001:5262: bstan 'dzin mchog rnams zhabs pad rtag brtan cir //
NK086(lu)001:5263: bstan pa rin chen bshad dang sgrub pa rgyas //
NK086(lu)001:5264: bstan 'dzin rnam kyang thugs mthun khrims gtsang bas //
NK086(lu)001:5265: bstan pa yul du gnas pa'i rgyu ru bsngo //
NK086(lu)001:5266: rgyu sbyor po yang gnas skabs thams cad du //
NK086(lu)001:5267: mi mthun log 'dren mda' lnga'i 'tsheb zhi //
NK086(lu)001:5268: tshe dpal yon tan yar zla'i rjes 'gro bas //
NK086(lu)001:5269: bstan pa'i zhabs 'degs rtag tu bgyid par shog /phyogs mtha' mi mngon mkha' mnyam 'gro tshogs kun //
NK086(lu)001:5270: bde legs rtsa ba dge bcu'i lam bzang spyod //
NK086(lu)001:5271: bde skyid skabs gsum ljongs kyi dpal thob ste //
NK086(lu)001:5272: bde dga' 'gyur med byang chub mchog thob shog /ces
NK086(lu)001:5273: pa'i spar byang nyung ngu 'di yang phyi mo'i zhu
NK086(lu)001:5274: dag dang chabs cig mkhan ming rat+na ki rtis smras
